Key.Original: You are challenged to a deathmatch in which everyone uses the same item.
Key.English: You are challenged to a deathmatch in which everyone uses the same item.

Key.Original: Win by eliminating all of your opponents!
Key.English: Win by eliminating all of your opponents!

Key.Original: Survive a deathmatch while taking out your opponents.
Key.English: Survive a deathmatch while taking out your opponents.

Key.Original: Low-level precision flying is essential to avoiding Anti-Air threats. Sometimes this includes flying by an object at incredibly fast speeds and at close ranges.
Key.English: Low-level precision flying is essential to avoiding Anti-Air threats. Sometimes this includes flying by an object at incredibly fast speeds and at close ranges.

Key.Original: Fly your aircraft within <t color='#ff0000ff'>%1</t> meters of the object shown on your map.
Key.English: Fly your aircraft within <t color='#ff0000ff'>%1</t> meters of the object shown on your map.

Key.Original: You failed to perform the flyby in the available time.
Key.English: You failed to perform the flyby in the available time.

Key.Original: In many combat scenarios you may not be able to avoid conflict with your enemies. It's either you or them. Survival is key, but you need to get rid of your enemies as well.
Key.English: In many combat scenarios you may not be able to avoid conflict with your enemies. It's either you or them. Survival is key, but you need to get rid of your enemies as well.

Key.Original: Kill at least <t color='#ff0000ff'>%1</t> enemies in the next <t color='#ff0000ff'>%2</t> seconds without dying.
Key.English: Kill at least <t color='#ff0000ff'>%1</t> enemies in the next <t color='#ff0000ff'>%2</t> seconds without dying.

Key.Original: You did not kill enough enemies during the allotted time.
Key.English: You did not kill enough enemies during the allotted time.

Key.Original: The enemy is pursuing one of our items aggressively. Protect it at all costs!
Key.English: The enemy is pursuing one of our items aggressively. Protect it at all costs!

Key.Original: Protect the item from the enemy!
Key.English: Protect the item from the enemy!

Key.Original: You managed to protect the item.
Key.English: You managed to protect the item.

Key.Original: Fight off any enemies coming for the item.
Key.English: Fight off any enemies coming for the item.

Key.Original: Press <t color='%1' shadow='1' shadowColor='%2'>%3</t> to continue.
Key.English: 按下<t color='%1' shadow='1' shadowColor='%2'>%3</t>以继续.

Key.Original: Press <t color='%1' shadow='1' shadowColor='%2'>%3</t> to skip.
Key.English: 按下<t color='%1' shadow='1' shadowColor='%2'>%3</t>以跳过.

Key.Original: Closing in <t color='%1' shadow='1' shadowColor='%2'>%3</t> sec(s).
Key.English: 将在<t color='%1' shadow='1' shadowColor='%2'>%3</t>秒内关闭.

Key.Original: This tutorial will take you through:
You have mastered the camera and movement controls.
Key.English: 您已经掌握了视角和移动操作.

Key.Original: You screwed it up? Never mind, try once more!
Key.English: 您搞砸了吗? 不要紧, 再来一遍!

Key.Original: Go back and try it again!
<t underline='true'>Sprint</t> to the next marked cone!
Key.English: <t underline='true'>冲刺</t>到下一个圆锥标记处!

Key.Original:
Sprinting is even faster then running but it's also very tiring and noisy. When you sprint for too long, you'll come out of breath and your movement and aim will be severaly hampered.

Sprinting is best used for short distances, like moving from cover to cover or flanking an enemy.
Key.English:
冲刺比奔跑的速度更快, 但是它也更加费力且拥有很大的噪音. 当您冲刺了过长的距离后, 您将会呼吸加剧同时移动和瞄准变得更加困难.

冲刺的最佳应用场合是短距离移动, 比如从一个掩体到另一个掩体或者在包抄敌人时使用.

Key.Original: Go back and try it again!
<t underline='true'>Walk</t> to the next marked cone and watch where your weapon points!
Key.English: <t underline='true'>步行</t>到下一个圆锥标记处, 并且留意观察在此过程中您的武器瞄准方向!

%1: 步行/奔跑临时切换
%2: 步行/奔跑状态保持

Key.Original: While walking you move silently and you do not lower your weapon. That means that you do not loose the ability to quickly react to enemy threat like you do while running or sprinting.
Key.English: 当处于步行状态下, 您的移动将会更加安静并且不会放低您手中的武器. 也就是说, 与奔跑和冲刺状态相比, 您不会在遭遇敌方威胁时丧失快速反应能力.

Key.Original: By default you can look around using your mouse.
Key.English: 在默认情况下, 您可以使用您的鼠标来观察四周.

Key.Original: Switch back to 3rd person view and keep it, so you can better survey your environment and watch your moves.
Key.English: 请切换回并保持在第三人称视角, 这样能够使您更好的观察您的周围环境以及移动状态.

Key.Original: Keep the 3rd person view, so you can better survey your environment and watch your moves.
Key.English: 请保持在第三人称视角, 这样能够使您更好的观察您的周围环境以及移动状态.

Key.Original: There are 3 modes of move in the game:
Key.English: 在游戏中有3种移动方式:

Key.Original:
%1: move forward
%2: move backward
%3: strafe left
%4: strafe right
Key.English:
%1: 向前移动
%2: 向后移动
%3: 向左平移
%4: 向右平移

Key.Original: Running is your default and usually the most useful movement mode.
Key.English: 奔跑是您默认的 - 通常也是最有用的移动方式.

Key.Original:
%1: move forward
%2: move backward
%3: strafe left
%4: strafe right
Key.English:
%1: 向前移动
%2: 向后移动
%3: 向左平移
%4: 向右平移

Key.Original: There are 3 stances in the Operation Arrowhead:
Key.English: 在《箭头行动》中有3种人物姿态:

Key.Original:
%1: look left
%2: look right
%3: look up
%4: look down
Key.English:
%1: 观察左侧
%2: 观察右侧
%3: 观察上方
%4: 观察下方

Key.Original: While crouching you have a lower profile and so you are less likely to be spotted or hit by enemy.
Key.English: 当处于蹲姿状态下, 您将拥有更加低矮的轮廓, 这样敌人也就更加难以发现和击中您.

Key.Original: Going prone is useful when you need to hide behind low cover or when you need to shoot over a long distances.
Key.English: 卧姿状态在您需要隐蔽在低矮的掩体后面时或者需要远距离射击时将会非常有用.

Key.Original: You have learned the basics of camera and movement controls.
Key.English: 您已经学会了视角和移动的基础操作.

Key.Original: Now prepare to run the obstacle course in limited time.
Key.English: 现在请准备以最少的时间通过障碍训练场.

Key.Original: Now prepare to run the obstacle course in limited time.
Key.English: 现在请准备以最少的时间通过障碍训练场.
步行状态保持已经开启!

Key.Original: Use %1 to turn OFF the 'walk toggle'.
Key.English: 使用%1来关闭‘步行状态保持’.

Key.Original: You did fine during the obstacle course walkthrough.
Key.English: 您在通过障碍训练场的过程中表现很出色.

Key.Original: Proceed to the starting position of the obstacle course!
Key.English: 进入障碍训练场的起点!

Key.Original: Proceed to the starting position of the obstacle course!
Key.English: 进入障碍训练场的起点!

Key.Original: You have mastered the camera and movement controls.
Key.English: 您已经掌握了视角和移动的操作.

Key.Original: Enter that HMMWV to complete the mission!
Key.English: 进入"悍马"越野车以完成任务!

Key.Original:
Press %1 to toggle between 1st and 3rd person view.

It can not be used while playing on expert difficulty.
Key.English:
按下%1可以在第一人称和第三人称视角间切换.

当游戏处于专家难度时该功能将无法使用.

Key.Original:
Follow the marker through the obstacle course.

Check-points are marked by the red arrow.
Key.English:
请跟随指示标记来通过障碍训练场.

检查点已用红色箭头标出.

Key.Original:
%1: open action menu/select next action
%2: open action menu/select previous action
Key.English:
%1: 打开动作菜单/选择下一个动作
%2: 打开动作菜单/选择前一个动作

Key.Original:
You can get over lower obstacles like is this one.

Move close to it and press %1.
Key.English:
您可以跨越比如面前这样的低矮障碍物.

请走到它跟前并且按下%1.

Key.Original: Use %1 or %2 when you see an
Key.English: 使用 %1 或 %2 激活动作菜单, 直到

Key.Original: Use %1 or %2 when you see an
Key.English: 使用 %1 或 %2 激活动作菜单, 直到

Key.Original: icon to access the action menu. Then click the left mouse button to execute the selected <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Open door'</t> action.
Key.English: 图标出现. 然后单击鼠标左键来执行已选定的<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'开门'</t>动作.

Key.Original: icon to access the action menu. Then click the left mouse button to execute the selected <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Open door'</t> action.
Key.English: 图标出现. 然后单击鼠标左键来执行已选定的<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'开门'</t>动作.

Key.Original: By going prone and moving forward you can crawl under some barriers and obstacles.
Key.English: 您可以通过卧倒并向前移动来爬行通过一些栅栏或者障碍物.

Key.Original: This is a good point for using sprint.
Key.English: 这是一个使用冲刺状态的好时机.

Key.Original: Run the obstacle course as fast as you can.
Key.English: 以你最快的速度通过障碍训练场.

Key.Original: Reach the finish faster then the BLUE marker!
Key.English: 必须先于蓝色标记抵达终点!

Key.Original: You can interact with an object when you see its interaction icon.
Key.English: 当您看到物体交互图标出现时, 您便可以同这个物体进行交互.

Key.Original: You will succeed if you get to the finish before the BLUE marker.
Key.English: 如果您先于蓝色标记抵达训练场, 您将会取得胜利.

Key.Original: You will succeed if you get to the finish before the BLUE marker.
Key.English: 如果您先于蓝色标记抵达训练场, 您将会取得胜利.

Key.Original: Learn the basics of the infantry controls and movement.
Key.English: 学习步兵单位移动及操作的基本知识.

Key.Original: You have learned everything you need to know about the task system.
Key.English: 您已经学会了您需要了解的有关任务系统的全部知识.

Key.Original: Task without specific location. To complete it, set it as current.
Key.English: 该任务没有具体的位置, 如果要完成它, 请将其设置为当前任务.

Key.Original: Go to marker location to end the tutorial.
Key.English: 移动到标记位置以结束该教程.

Key.Original: Observe onscreen notification about newly added task.
Key.English: 观察新任务加入时的屏幕提示.

Key.Original:
When you get more than one task pending at the same time, you can switch between them whenever you want.

If current task leads to some specific location, you'll see it's position in game world.
Key.English:
当您在同一时间得到了超过一项以上的任务时, 您可以随时在它们之间进行切换.

如果您的当前任务需要引到您前往到一些特定位置时, 您将可以在游戏环境中看到该位置的提示.

Key.Original: Set second task as current by selecting it and clicking on <t color='#d9d096' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Set as current task'</t>.
Key.English: 要设置第二个任务为当前任务时, 请选定它并且单击<t color='#d9d096' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'设置为当前任务'</t>.

Key.Original:
In some cases, HQ can react to a battlefield situation by canceling some of your tasks, sometimes assigning alternative ones in same time.

Notice that icon disappears from the map when a task is no longer available.
Key.English:
在某些情况下, 指挥部会根据战场形势取消您的一些任务, 或者会在同一时间给你下达二选一的任务.

请注意当一个任务永远不可用时, 它的图标将会从地图上消失.

Key.Original: Apart from having tasklog in map view, you can access separate task list directly.
Key.English: 除了从地图界面查看任务记录以外, 您还可以直接访问一个独立的任务列表.

Key.Original: However, if you won't be able or willing to finish the task, it will fail.
Key.English: 但是, 如果您不乐意或者没有能力完成任务, 它就会失败.

Key.Original:
The tasks specify your objectives during a mission.

Every time a task is added or its status is changed, you are notified by a message appearing on the screen.
Key.English:
任务列表指定了您在任务中的任务目标.

在任何时候, 每当一个任务新增或状态改变时, 您都会在屏幕上看到提示消息.

Key.Original: That is everything you need to know about tasks.
Key.English: 这些就是您需要了解的全部有关于任务列表的内容.

Key.Original: Finish 'Ending Task' to complete the tutorial!
Key.English: 请完成‘结束任务’以结束该教程!

Key.Original: Select <t color='#d9d096' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Tasks'</t> in the menu!
Key.English: 在菜单中选择<t color='#d9d096' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'任务列表'</t>!

Key.Original:
Here you can see a list of all available tasks and their basic descriptions.

A location may be relevant to it, in that case a double-click on the task name centers map on it.
Key.English:
在这里您可以看到一个包含了全部可用任务及其简单描述的列表.

也许有某个位置可能与任务相关, 如果是那样, 则可以通过双击任务名称以便在地图上居中显示该位置.

Key.Original: The task list is accessible from the map screen, together with information about mission and units.
Key.English: 任务列表可以通过地图界面进入, 它同时显示有任务和单位的信息.

Key.Original: Use %1 to open the task log!

Tasks can have several states.

Your current task is 'Pending'. That means, you can still complete it.
Key.English:
任务可以拥有不同的状态.

您的当前任务状态是‘正在执行’, 也就是说, 您可以继续完成它.

Key.Original:
When you successfully complete the task, you'll be notified and its icon will turn green.

Obviously, this is preferred end state of all asigned tasks.
Key.English:
当您成功完成了任务, 您会注意到它的图标将会变成绿色.

很显然这是所有已下达任务的最佳完成状态.

Key.Original: This tasklog doesn't block view and allows you to monitor your surroundings. In the absence of map however, you can't check task location. It's still fastest way to check your tasks.
Key.English: 该任务记录不会锁定您的视角并且可以允许您观察您的周围情况. 当您没有携带地图时, 您将无法查看任务位置, 但您仍然可以通过这个快捷途径来查看你的任务情况.

Key.Original: Use %1 again to close the task log!
Key.English: 再一次使用%1以关闭任务记录!

Key.Original: You have mastered the basics of weapon controls and mechanics.
Key.English: 您已经掌握了有关武器操作和应用的基础知识.

Key.Original: You screwed it up? Never mind, try once more!
Key.English: 您搞砸了吗? 不要紧, 再试一次!

Key.Original: indicator on Javelin optics turns off.
Key.English: 指示器会在"标枪"的瞄准具界面熄灭.
使用 %1 以切换手榴弹!

Key.Original: Your grenade hits only count when you are at the correct training position.
Key.English: 只有当处于正确的训练位置时您的手榴弹才能命中有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to grenade training position!
Key.English: 回到手榴弹训练位置以继续!

Key.Original: If you run out of grenades, take some from the box.
Key.English: 如果您用光了手榴弹, 可以从弹药箱里进行补充.

Key.Original: Aim at the training targets with the dot pointer. Then, to throw a grenade, press and release the fire button.
Key.English: 使用圆点准心瞄准训练靶标, 然后按下并释放射击键投掷手榴弹.

Key.Original: The power of the throw is determined by how long the fire button is held down.
Key.English: 投掷的力度取决于射击键按下并保持的时间有多长.

Key.Original: Hit at least %2 target(s) with your frag grenades!
Key.English: 使用你的破片手榴弹击倒至少%2个靶标!

Key.Original: Your hits only count when you are at the correct training position.
Key.English: 您只有在正确的射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to the training position!
If you run out of rockets, take some from the box.
Key.English: 如果您用光了火箭弹, 您可以从弹药箱里补充.

Key.Original: Destroy all of the practice targets with the MAAWS rocket launcher.
Key.English: 使用MAAWS火箭发射器摧毁全部训练靶标.
拿取"标枪"反坦克导弹发射器!

Key.Original: Your hits count only when you are at the correct training position.
Key.English: 您只有在正确的训练区域进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to the training position!
If you run out of rockets, take some from the box.
Key.English: 如果您用光了火箭弹, 您可以从弹药箱里补充.

Key.Original:
Lock-on 2 of the 3 distant targets and destroy them with the Javelin rocket.

When target gets locked the
Key.English:
使用"标枪"导弹锁定并摧毁3个训练靶标中的2个.

当目标被成功锁定时

Key.Original: Switch to Mk16 EGLM Holo rifle!
Key.English: 切换到Mk16 EGLM Holo自动步枪!

Key.Original: Your hits count only when you are at the correct training position.
Key.English: 只有在正确的训练位置发射并命中目标才能有效!

Key.Original: To continue, move back to the training position!
If you run out of grenades, take some from the box.
Key.English: 如果您用光了榴弹, 可以从弹药箱里进行补充.

Key.Original: Destroy the 2 groups of targets with the EGLM grenade launcher.
Key.English: 使用EGLA榴弹发射器摧毁2组靶标.

Key.Original: The hits count only when you are at the correct training position.
Key.English: 只有在正确的训练位置发射并命中目标才能有效!

Key.Original: To continue, move back to the training position!
If you run out of grenades, take some from the box.
Key.English: 如果您用光了榴弹, 可以从弹药箱里进行补充.

Key.Original: Destroy all 4 groups of targets with the M32 grenade launcher.
Key.English: 使用M32榴弹发射器摧毁全部4组靶标.

Key.Original: Your shots count only when you are at the firing position.
Key.English: 您只有在射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to firing position!
Key.English: 请回到射击位置以继续!
使用 %1 以装填你的武器!

Key.Original:
Hit %1 targets within %2 secs with the M249 SAW light machine gun.

Going crouch will slightly lower the weapon's recoil.
Key.English:
使用M249 SAW轻机枪在%2秒内击倒%1个目标.

蹲姿射击能稍微减少一些武器后座力.

Key.Original: You have run out of time!
Your shots count only when you are at the firing position.
Key.English: 您只有在射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to firing position!
Key.English: 请回到射击位置以继续!
使用 %1 以装填你的武器!

Key.Original:
Hit %1 targets within %2 secs with the M249 SAW light machine gun.

Go prone to compensate the weapon's high recoil.
Key.English:
使用M249 SAW轻机枪在%2秒内击倒%1个目标.

卧姿射击能有效补偿武器的高后座力.

Key.Original: You have run out of time!

Key.English: 训练目标: 机枪卧姿射击

Key.Original: Your training starts at the area marked by the red arrow.
Key.English: 您的训练将会在红色箭头所标识的区域开始.

Key.Original: All equipment carried by the player is stored in his 'Gear' dialog.
Key.English: 玩家所携带的全部装备被存放在了他的‘装备’对话框里.

Key.Original:
Approach the nearby weapon crate and turn so that you face it.

An
Key.English:
靠近附近的武器箱并且面对它.

一个

Key.Original: clicking the arrow to the right of the item name
Key.English: 单击该物品名称右侧的箭头

Key.Original: selecting the item and clicking the 'Take' button
Key.English: 选定该物品并单击‘拿取’按钮
打开这个<t underline='true'>容器里的</t>装备.
使用%1以打开您的装备对话框.

Key.Original: icon will pop-up on your screen, indicating that an interaction is possible.
Key.English: 图标将会出现在您的屏幕上, 这表示有一个交互动作可用.

Key.Original: There are two new items on the list:
Key.English: 这个列表里两个新的物品:

Key.Original: click the arrow left of the item name
Key.English: 单击该物品名称左侧的箭头

Key.Original: You can take an item from the box either by:
Key.English: 您可以通过几种方式从容器中拿取一个物品:

Key.Original: select the item and click the 'Drop' button
Key.English: 选定该物品并单击‘放下’按钮

Key.Original: Notice that when you take a weapon, you also get full load of it's default magazines.
Key.English: 请注意当您拿取一件武器, 您也会装满该武器的默认弹药.

Key.Original: If you are accessing a container, these items will drop into it, otherwise they will drop on the ground.
Key.English: 如果您正在访问一个容器, 这些物品将会放入到容器中, 否则它们将会放在地上.

Key.Original: To remove an item from your inventory you can either:
Key.English: 您可以通过几种办法从您的身上移除物品:

Key.Original: Items dropped on the ground can be accessed the same way as the items in the container.
Key.English: 放在地上的物品可以通过与容器中物品一样的办法进行访问.

Key.Original: icon is visible to access the container's gear.
Key.English: 图标显示出来以访问该容器中的装备.

Key.Original: Close the gear window by clicking the 'Close' button or by pressing %1 again.
Key.English: 单击‘关闭’按钮或者再一次按下%1以关闭装备窗口.

Key.Original:
There are plenty of weapons and ammo stored in boxes at each shooting range.

If you somehow manage to run out of weapons or ammo you can always find some extra stuff at the back of the offroad car.
Key.English:
在每个靶场都有存放了大量武器及弹药的储存箱.

如果您耗尽了武器或弹药, 则常常能够在越野车的后备箱里找到额外的补给.

Key.Original: To procceed in this tutorial, you need an M9 pistol. Take one from the ammo box or the offroad car.
Key.English: 要继续该教程, 您需要一把M9手枪, 请从弹药箱或者越野车上拿取一把.

Key.Original: Here in the gear dialog you can check what weapons, ammo and special items you have.
Key.English: 在这个装备对话框中您可以查看您都携带了哪些武器, 弹药以及特殊物品.

Key.Original: The number to the left shows the number of items available in the container, while the number to the right shows the number of items you carry.
Key.English: 物品名称左侧的数字显示了该容器中这种物品的可用数量, 而物品名称右侧的数字则显示了您所携带的这种物品的数量.

Key.Original: You can close the gear window by clicking the 'Close' button or by pressing %1 again.
Key.English: 您可以通过单击‘关闭’按钮或者再次按下%1以关闭装备窗口.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M9</t> is a name of your current weapon.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M9</t>是您当前手中武器的名称

Key.Original: The information about your weapon is displayed in the top-right corner of your screen.
Key.English: 您的武器信息显示在屏幕右上角.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Number before |</t> shows the amount of ammo that is loaded in your weapon.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>| 前面的数字</t>显示了您的武器内已装填好的弹药总数.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Number after |</t> is the number of magazines you carry.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>| 后面的数字</t>显示的是您所携带的弹匣总数.

Key.Original:
Some weapons have more then a single fire mode.

The selected fire mode of your current weapon is displayed in the top-right corner of your screen.
Key.English:
一些武器拥有超过一种以上的射击模式.

当前您的武器所选定的射击模式显示在屏幕右上角.

Key.Original: The Mk16 assault rifle has the Semi and the Full-automatic fire modes.
Key.English: Mk16自动步枪拥有半自动以及自动-两种射击模式.

Key.Original: The <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Semi</t>-automatic mode fires a single shot whenever the trigger is pressed.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>半自动</t>模式按下扳机时只会进行单发射击.

Key.Original: Pick-up Mk16 CQC Holo rifle and some magazines.
Key.English: 拿取Mk16 CQC Holo自动步枪以及一些弹匣.

Key.Original: The <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Full</t>-automatic mode fires bullets in burst as long as the trigger is pressed.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>自动</t>模式则会在按下扳机时进行连发射击.

Key.Original: You can cycle through available fire modes by using %1.
Key.English: 您可以使用 %1 来切换可用的射击模式.

Key.Original: Use %1 to select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Full</t>-auto fire mode!
Key.English: 使用%1以选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>自动</t>射击模式!

Key.Original: Now, you will practice shooting at several training targets using the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Full</t>-auto fire mode.
Key.English: 现在您将练习使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>自动</t>射击模式对一些训练靶进行射击.

Key.Original: Aiming through the 'crosshair' is fine over short or medium distances. You better use iron sights or some sort of optics when you fire over long distances.
Key.English: 通过‘准心光标’进行瞄准比较适合近距或中距, 而在远距射击时使用机械照门或者某些光学瞄准具则会有更好的表现.

Key.Original: The Mk16 CQC Holo rifle has a collimator. A device that looks like a scope but works actually more like iron sights. It doesn't have a zoom, but it's more lucid and accurate then the classic iron sights.
Key.English: Mk16 CQC Holo自动步枪拥有一个准直式瞄准具, 一个看上去像显示器但是实际上功能更像机械照门的设备. 它无法进行调焦, 但是它比传统的机械照门更加清晰和精准.

Key.Original: Use %1 to look through the collimator!
Key.English: 使用 %1 以通过准直式瞄准具进行瞄准.
%1: 使用机械照门/光学瞄准具

Key.Original:
Even though the collimators don't have any optics, the game provides you with some basic zooming functionality.

It is here to compensate for the difference between real life and virtual gaming experience.
Key.English:
虽然准直式瞄准具并不能像光学瞄准具那样变焦, 但是游戏仍然提供给您一些基础的变焦功能.

这做样能够对现实生活中和仿真环境下的差异进行一定的补偿.

Key.Original: Use %1 to zoom while looking through the collimator!
Key.English: 使用 %1 以便在通过准直式瞄准具进行瞄准时进行变焦!

Key.Original:
You can toggle the zoom by pressing %1.

While toggled, the zooming will stay on until you cancel it by pressing %2.
Key.English:
您可以通过按下 %1 来保持变焦.

在保持变焦过程中, 变焦将会一直保持直到您通过按下 %2 进行取消.

Key.Original: Toggle the zoom while looking through the collimator!
Key.English: 在通过准直式瞄准具进行瞄准时保持变焦!

%1: 保持变焦
%2: 取消保持变焦

Key.Original: While the zoom toggle is on, you can further zoom in and out by %1 and %2.
Key.English: 当保持变焦开启时, 您可以通过 %1 和 %2 进行视野的放大和缩小.

Key.Original: You can switch carried weapons using the action menu.
Key.English: 您可以通过动作菜单来切换所携带的武器.

%1: 视野放大
%2: 视野缩小

Key.Original: Now, you will practice in shooting at distant targets.
Key.English: 现在您将练习射击远距离靶标.

Key.Original: To be effective, you'll need to aim precisely and use the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Semi</t>-automatic fire mode.
Key.English: 为了射击更加有效, 您需要进行精确瞄准并且使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>半自动</t>射击模式

Key.Original: Move to the next firing range where you will learn how to:
Key.English: 移动到下一个靶场, 您将在那里学习:

Key.Original: Use %1 to open the action menu, select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Weapon Mk16 CQC Holo'</t> and press %1 again.
Key.English: 使用 %1 以打开动作菜单, 选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'切换武器Mk16 CQC Holo'</t>然后再一次按下 %1 .

Key.Original: Approach the highlighted weapon crate and pick-up the M249 SAW.
Key.English: 靠近高亮的武器箱并拿取M249 SAW.

Key.Original: Move to the position and go crouch!
Key.English: 移动到制定位置并蹲下!

Key.Original: As you could see, it's hard to control the machine gun fire while standing. Crouching helps, but to fire realy precisely, you will have to go prone.
Key.English: 如您所见, 在立姿射击时机枪的后座力非常难以控制, 虽然蹲姿射击时能够有所改善, 但是如果需要精准射击, 那么您必须采用卧姿射击方式.

Key.Original: Next, you will learn how to:

The M249 SAW light machine gun has a high rate of fire and an accuracy and portability akin to an assault rifle.

It is an excellent squad support weapon.
Key.English:
M249 SAW轻机枪在具有较高射速的同时还拥有同自动步枪相近的精准度和便携性.

它是一种非常棒的班用火力支援武器.

Key.Original:
Due to the 5.56x45 mm caliber the M249 SAW doesn't suffer as significant recoil as its high caliber cousins.

It's still better to crouch or go prone when firing this weapon.
Key.English:
归功于5.56x45毫米口径弹药, M249 SAW并不像他的兄弟们那样拥有很大的后座力.

在蹲姿和卧姿射击时这种武器依然能够有很好的表现.

Key.Original: Take a M249 SAW machine gun and some magazines.
Key.English: 拿取M249 SAW机枪和一些弹仓.

Key.Original:
The M249 SAW high recoil is a problem when firing at distant targets.

To compensate that, you need to assume a very stable position.
Key.English:
M249 SAW的高后座力在远距射击时是一个很头痛的问题.

为了进行补偿, 您应该采取一种非常稳定的姿势.

Key.Original: Now you will learn how to use the sniper rifles.
Key.English: 现在您将学习如何使用狙击步枪.

Key.Original:
In other words: a fired bullet drops according to its ballistic curve.

It's not a big problem when shooting over 100m, but over 300m and more the bullet drop is so significant that it has to be taken into account.

This is done by adjusting the optics to a specific range.
Key.English:
换句话说, 一颗射出的子弹将根据它的弹道曲线自然下坠.

这个因素在100米距离射击是并不是什么问题, 但是当距离超过300米时, 子弹下坠就不得不被考虑在内了.

这可以通过调节瞄准镜密位来得到解决.

Key.Original:
The M24 scope is set to 300m by default. You can see the value in the top-right corner of your screen.

Use %1 to increase the range by 100m.

Use %2 to decrease the range by 100m.
Key.English:
M24的瞄准镜默认设置为300米, 您可以在屏幕右上角看到这个数值.

使用 %1 可以使距离增加100米,

使用 %2 可以使距离减少100米.

Key.Original:
%1: increase the range
%2: decrease the range
Key.English:
%1: 增加距离
%2: 减少距离

Key.Original: Get up and take the M24 Desert from the box.
Key.English: 起立并从武器箱里取出M24 Desert.

Key.Original: Move to the positon and go prone to steady your aim.
Key.English: 移动到指定位置并卧倒以便稳定你的瞄准.

Key.Original: Lay on the mattress and ready your M24!
Key.English: 趴在垫子上并准备好你的M24!

Key.Original:
Now, you will practice shooting at moving targets.

Because of the distance and bullet travel time, you will also need to take the target speed and direction into account!
Key.English:
现在您将练习射击移动靶标.

受射击距离和子弹飞行时间的影响, 您也需要将目标移动速度和移动方向考虑在内!

Key.Original: And as always, mind the range and adjust your scopes accordingly.
Key.English: 同往常一样, 您需要根据实际情况考虑射击距离并且调整瞄准镜.

Key.Original: Move to the grenade training area!

The M24 is a bolt-action sniper rifle that is equipped with 10x40mm fixed-power scope.

The 10x magnification and powerful 7.62x51mm caliber makes the weapon effective up to 800m.
Key.English:
M24是一种直动式枪机的狙击步枪, 它安装有10x40毫米固定倍率瞄准镜.

10倍放大倍率和5.62x51毫米弹药使得这种武器的有效射程达到了800米.

Key.Original: The game uses very realistic ballistics system for tracing bullet trajectory, so the target distance is an important factor.
Key.English: 本游戏的拟真模型拥有一个真实弹道学系统来跟踪子弹的弹道, 所以射击位置到目标之间的距离是一个非常重要的因素.

Key.Original: you don't want to risk exposing yourself to enemy fire
Key.English: 您不想冒风险暴露在敌人的直射火力之下

Key.Original: you need to hit an enemy which is hiding behind cover
Key.English: 您需要打击藏在掩体后面的敌人

Key.Original: Thanks to the large blast radius, grenades can hit multiple enemies at once.
Key.English: 归功于较大的杀伤半径, 手榴弹能同时杀伤多名敌人.

Key.Original: Take some frag grenades from marked box!
Key.English: 从所标识的弹药箱里拿取一些破片手榴弹!

Key.Original: Move to the heavy weapons shooting range!
Grenades are accessed by switching fire mode.
Key.English: 手榴弹可以通过切换射击模式来选择.
使用 %1 以切换到手榴弹!

Key.Original:
Frag grenades are very effective anti-personnel devices.

As grenades do not require direct line of sight, they are ideal for situations where:
Key.English:
破片手榴弹是非常有效的人员杀伤装备.

因为手榴弹不需要直瞄视野, 所以他们在这些情况下是理想的选择:

Key.Original: Take the MAAWS rocket launcher and some HEAT rounds from highlighted weapon crate.
Key.English: 从已高亮的武器箱中拿取MAAWS火箭发射器和一些高爆火箭弹.

Key.Original:
The MAAWS is a classic BLUFOR recoilless anti-tank weapon.

It comes with 3x optical sight.
Key.English:
MAAWS是一种经典的无后座力反坦克武器.

它拥有3倍放大的瞄准镜.

Key.Original: Aim at one of the 3 targets using the weapons optics!
Key.English: 使用武器瞄准镜瞄准3个目标中的1个!

Key.Original: Take the FGM-148 Javelin self-guided anti-tank missile launcher.
Key.English: 拿取FGM-148"标枪"自动寻的反坦克导弹发射器.

Key.Original: Take the Javeling launcher from highlighted box!
Key.English: 从已高亮的武器箱中拿取"标枪"发射器!

Key.Original: Remember that you can switch the weapons you carry via the action menu.
Key.English: 请记住, 您可以通过动作菜单来切换武器.

Key.Original: Take the MAAWS and at least 3 HEAT missiles!
Key.English: 拿取MAAWS以及至少3枚高爆火箭弹!

Key.Original: Use %1 to acess the action menu, select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Weapon Javelin'</t> and press %1 again.
Key.English: 使用 %1 以打开动作菜单, 选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'切换武器FGM-148"标枪"'</t>并再次按下 %1 .

Key.Original:
The Javelin missile has to be locked-on, before it's launched.

To achieve that, you need to aim at the target for several seconds. The Javelin sound signalization will tell you, when the target gets locked.
Key.English:
"标枪"导弹在发射前需要锁定目标.

您需要瞄准目标若干秒来实现目标锁定, 在目标成功锁定时"标枪"发射器会用声音进行提醒.

Key.Original: Aim at one of the distant targets using Javelin optics!
Key.English: 使用"标枪"的瞄准具瞄准训练靶标中的一个!

Key.Original: There is a Mk16 assault rifle with a grenade launcher attachment in the highlighted weapon crate.
Key.English: 在已高亮的武器箱中有一把安装了榴弹发射器附件的Mk16自动步枪.

Key.Original: Take the MK16 EGLM Holo rifle!
Key.English: 拿取MK16 EGLM Holo自动步枪!

Key.Original: The Mk16 grenade launcher attachment is activated using the %1 key.
Key.English: Mk16榴弹发射器可以通过使用 %1 键来激活.

Key.Original: Use %1 to select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>EGLM Launcher</t>!
Key.English: 使用 %1 以选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>EGLM发射器</t>!

Key.Original:
Now try the last weapon in this tutorial. It is the M32 grenade launcher.

The weapon basicaly works the same way as the Mk16 EGLM Launcher, but its rate of fire is much higher.
Key.English:
现在让我们来尝试这个教程中的最后一件武器, 它就是M32榴弹发射器.

这种武器工作原理从本质上来说与Mk16 EGLM发射器是一个道理, 但是它的发射频率则高出许多.

Key.Original: Follow the marker to the starting area to finish the mission.
Key.English: 跟随标识返回到起始区域以完成这个任务.

Key.Original: Remember that you can switch the weapons you carry via the action menu.
Key.English: 请记住, 您可以通过动作菜单来切换武器.

Key.Original: Enter that HMMWV to complete the mission!
Key.English: 进入"悍马"越野车以完成这个任务!

Key.Original: Use %1 to acess the action menu, select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Weapon MAAWS'</t> and press %1 again.
Key.English: 使用 %1 以打开动作菜单, 选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'切换武器MAAWS'</t>并再次按下 %1 .

Key.Original: Master various personal weapons and learn to adjust your loadout.
Key.English: 掌握各种单兵武器的使用并且学习如何调整您的武器.

Key.Original: Your shots count only when you are at the firing position.
Key.English: 您只有在射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to firing position!
Key.English: 请回到射击位置以继续!
使用 %1 以装填你的武器!

Key.Original: Hit all the targets with the M9 semi-automatic pistol!
Key.English: 使用M9半自动手枪击倒全部靶标!

Key.Original: Your shots count only when you are at the firing position.
Key.English: 您只有在射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to firing position!
Key.English: 请回到射击位置以继续!

Key.Original: Pick-up Mk16 CQC Holo assault rifle!
Key.English: 拿取Mk16 CQC Holo自动步枪!
使用 %1 以装填你的武器!

Key.Original: Hit %1 targets within %2 secs with the Mk16 CQC Holo assault rifle while using <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Full</t>-auto fire mode.
Key.English: 使用Mk16 CQC Holo自动步枪的<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>自动</t>射击模式在%2秒之内击倒%1个靶标.

Key.Original: You have run out of time!
This training is focused on the use of <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Full</t>-Auto fire mode.
Key.English: 这个训练只能使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>自动</t>射击模式.

Key.Original: Use %1 to switch to Full-auto mode!
Key.English: 使用 %1 以切换到自动射击模式!

Key.Original: Your shots count only when you are at the firing position.
Key.English: 您只有在射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to firing position!
Key.English: 请回到射击位置以继续!

Key.Original: Pick-up Mk16 CQC Holo assault rifle!
Key.English: 拿取Mk16 CQC Holo自动步枪!
使用 %1 以装填你的武器!

Key.Original: Hit %1 targets within %2 secs with the Mk16 CQC Holo assault rifle while using <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Semi</t>-auto fire mode.
Key.English: 使用Mk16 CQC Holo自动步枪的<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>半自动</t>射击模式在%2秒之内击倒%1个靶标.

Key.Original: You have run out of time!
This training is focused on the use of <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Semi</t>-auto fire mode.
Key.English: 这个训练只能使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>半自动</t>射击模式.

Key.Original: Use %1 to switch to Semi-auto mode!
Key.English: 使用%1以切换到半自动模式!

Key.Original: Your shots are counted only when you are at the firing position.
Key.English: 您只有在射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to firing position!
Key.English: 请回到射击位置以继续!
使用 %1 以装填你的武器!

Key.Original: Aim at the training target and when it turns red, hit it with the M24 sniper rifle.
Key.English: 瞄准训练靶标, 当它转向成红色时使用M24狙击步枪对其进行射击.

Key.Original: Do not forget to adjust the range!

%1: increase the range
%2: decrease the range
Key.English:
%1: 增加距离
%2: 减少距离

Key.Original:
Notice that when you aim at distant targets, your crosshair shakes a lot.

You can steady your aim by holding your breath for a while.
Key.English:
请注意, 当您瞄准远距离目标时, 您的准心游标将会有较大幅度的晃动.

您可以通过在短时间内屏住呼吸来稳定您的瞄准.

Key.Original: Use %1 to hold your breath while aiming through the M24 optics!
Key.English: 在通过M24的瞄准镜进行瞄准时使用 %1 以屏住呼吸!

Key.Original: Your shots are count only when you are at the firing position.
Key.English: 您只有在射击位置进行射击才能有效.

Key.Original: To continue, move back to firing position!
Key.English: 请回到射击位置以继续!
使用 %1 以装填你的武器!

Key.Original: Hit the target %1x before it reaches its final destination.
Key.English: 在靶标抵达终点之前命中%1次.

Key.Original: You were too slow. The training target reached its final destination.
Key.English: 你太慢了, 训练靶标已经抵达了它的终点.

Key.Original: You've successfuly learned everything about treating injuries and supporting wounded soldiers.
Key.English: 您已经成功学会了处理战伤以及支援受伤战友的知识.

Key.Original: You screw it up! Don't worry, try it once more.
Key.English: 你搞砸了! 不要紧, 再试一次!

Key.Original:
To start your training, go to your assistant.

He's pretending to be wounded.
Key.English:
请移动到您的助手处以开始您的训练.

他现在正扮演一名伤员.

Key.Original: The assistant will play wounded again. Now you will try to <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Drag'</t> him from one point to another.
Key.English: 您的助手将再次扮演伤员, 您接下来要尝试将其从一个地方 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>‘拖拽’</t> 到另一个地方.

Key.Original: To drag a wounded soldier, turn so that you face him, then use %1 when you see the label <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Drag'</t> over his body.
Key.English: 如要拖拽一名受伤的士兵, 您必须面对它, 然后当动作<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>‘拖拽’</t>出现在他身体上时, 使用 %1 执行该动作.
%1: 执行鼠标所选定的动作

Key.Original: Drag the wounded soldier to the marked cone!
Key.English: 拖拽伤员至已标记的锥形路障处!
%1: 执行鼠标所选定的动作

Key.Original: If you need to transport the wounded over longer distances you should <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Carry'</t> him instead.
Key.English: 如果您需要将受伤的战友转移到较远的地方, 您应当采用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>‘搬运’</t>的方法.

Key.Original:
Use %1 or %2 while dragging to access the action menu.

Select the 'Carry' action and press %3 to perform it.
Key.English:
当拖拽伤员时使用 %1 或 %2 进入动作菜单.

选择‘搬运’动作然后按下 %3 以执行它.

Key.Original: Use the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Carry'</t> action!
Key.English: 使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>‘搬运'</t>动作!

Key.Original:
%1 or %2: open action menu
%3: perform context action
Key.English:
%1 或 %2: 打开动作菜单
%3: 执行选定动作

Key.Original: You may also drop or carry a dragged person by pressing stance keys %1, %2 and %3.
Key.English: 您同样可以通过按下快捷键 %1, %2 和 %3 来放下或者搬运一个处于被拖拽状态中的伤员.

%1: 立姿
%2: 蹲姿
%3: 卧姿

Key.Original: Carry the assistant to the marked cone near an ambulace!
Key.English: 将伤员搬运到救护车附近的锥形路障处!

Key.Original:
You've learned how to apply first aid and how to drag and carry wounded soldiers.

Use %1 to lay down the assistant on the ground. You can also use the action menu.
Key.English:
您已经学会了如何实施急救以及如何拖拽或搬运伤员.

使用 %1 可以伤员放在地面上, 您同样可以通过动作菜单来实现这个动作.
%1: 蹲姿/放下所搬运的人物

Key.Original: If you suffer from a light injury, look for an ambulance car, first aid tent or similar medical facility.
Key.English: 如果您自己受到了轻伤, 那么请迅速寻找救护车, 医疗帐篷或者其他类似的医疗设施.

Key.Original: To apply first aid, move close to the assistant and turn to face him.
Key.English: 如要实施急救, 首先需要靠近您的助手然后面对他.

Key.Original: Approach the ambulance car from the back and use %1 when you see the %2 icon.
Key.English: 靠近旁边的救护车, 并且当您看见 %2 图标时使用 %1.

Key.Original: Heal yourself at the ambulance car!
Key.English: 在急救车处治疗你自己!
%1: 执行鼠标所选定的动作

Key.Original:
You have learned how to heal yourself at an ambulance car and similar medical facilities.

We won't need that ambulace anymore.
Key.English:
您已经学会了如何使用急救车或者类似的医疗设施进行自我救治.

接下来我们将不再需要这辆救护车.

Key.Original:
If you get seriously injured and fall into agony, you must rely on the help of others.

While skilled medic can give you complete treatment that will fully heal your wounds, an ordinary soldier can give you just a basic first aid. A simple treatment that will get you out of the agony and stops the bleeding.
Key.English:
如果您受到重伤并丧失了行动能力, 您就必须依靠他人的救助.

一名熟练的医护兵可以治疗任何类型的创伤并使您恢复如初, 而一名普通的士兵则只能对您进行简单的急救: 通过简单的包扎使您止血并恢复行动能力.

Key.Original: Lay down and pretend that you are wounded!
Key.English: 躺下并且假装你受了重伤!

Key.Original: When you are seriously wounded a medic will come to you, if he's around and the area is not too dangerous.
Key.English: 当您受了重伤时, 如果医护兵就在您的不远处并且处于相对安全的情况时, 他就会前来救治你.

Key.Original:
Try calling a medic now.

Use %1 to open the quick command menu and select the 'Injured' command.
Key.English:
现在请尝试呼叫一名医护兵.

使用 %1 以打开快速指挥菜单并选择执行‘负伤’命令.
移动到那辆"悍马"越野车处!

Key.Original: Enter the HMMWV to complete the mission!
Key.English: 进入"悍马"越野车以完成这个任务!

Key.Original: Learn how to handle combat casualties and to administer the first aid.
Key.English: 学习如何处理战伤以及如何进行急救.
图标出现在他的身体上.
图标, 按下 %1 便可以对其进行治疗.

Key.Original: You have mastered technology for night combat.
Key.English: 您已经掌握了夜间作战的技术.

Key.Original: You screw it up! Try it once more!
Key.English: 你搞砸了! 重来一遍!

%1: 步行/奔跑临时切换
%2: 步行/奔跑状态保持

Key.Original: NVGs are sensitive to light intensity and can easily blind you when you're looking into direct light. Watch for car lights, flashlights and urban light sources.
Key.English: 头戴式夜视仪对光线强度非常敏感, 并且能够在您目视直射光线时轻易的让您眼睛失明. 所以使用夜视仪时一定要当心车灯, 手电筒以及城市光源.

Key.Original: Now you know basics of night-ops. You may complete the tutorial, or you can try out various NVG and TI equipped weapons in the ammo box.
Key.English: 现在您已经掌握了夜间行动的基本技能, 您可以结束这个教程, 或者您可以从弹药箱里获取并体验不同的夜视仪或者装备有热成像仪的武器.

Key.Original: Get in HMMWV to finish the tutorial.
Key.English: 进入"悍马"越野车以完成这个教程.

Key.Original: The flashlight is simplest way to stay effective during night-ops combat.
Key.English: 手电筒是夜间作战期间最简单有效的夜战装备.
%1: 使用机械照门/光学瞄准具

Key.Original: In some cases, you'll need to mark specific locations for allied attack vehicles. In order to conceal an intended target from enemy detection, use Infra Red (IR) Strobes, which are visible only through NV optics.
Key.English: 在某些情况下, 您将需要为盟友的攻击武器标记特定区域, 为了不被敌方侦查发现, 可以使用红外线指示器对预定目标进行隐蔽标记, 红外线指示器只能被夜视仪器所观测到.
投掷一个红外线指示器.

Key.Original: Remember, a flashlight exposes your position and, in order to keep it steady, you cannot run or sprint.
Key.English: 请记住, 手电筒会暴露您的位置, 另外为了保持手电筒光照的稳定, 您最好不要采取奔跑或冲刺的移动方式.

Key.Original: To compensate, scoped sights often provide secondary sights compatible with NVGs.
Key.English: 作为补偿, 瞄准镜通常提供了辅助瞄准具以便在使用头戴式夜视仪时进行瞄准.
通过辅助瞄准具进行观察.

Key.Original: While NVGs don't prevent you from using weapon ironsights and red-dot sights, they cannot be used in conjunction with scoped sights.
Key.English: 虽然头戴式夜视仪并不影响您使用武器机械照门以及红点瞄准具, 但是它不能够在使用光学瞄准镜的时候同时使用.
通过辅助瞄准具进行观察.
%1: 使用机械照门/光学瞄准具

Key.Original: TI gives you ability to see through smoke, making close combat lot easier even during the day.
Key.English: 热成像仪能够提供您看穿烟幕的能力, 这使得近距离作战变得更加容易 - 即使在白天也一样.

Key.Original: Lasers are only visible with NV optics; they are hidden from low-tech enemies.
Key.English: 激光射线只能被夜视仪观测到: 它们对于武器装备技术含量较低的敌人来说是隐蔽的.

Key.Original: Many advanced rifles are already equipped with NV or Thermal Imaging (TI) technology, giving you huge advantage in night combat.
Key.English: 一些先进的步枪已经具备了夜视或者热成像(TI)技术, 它为您的夜间作战提供了极大的优势.
拿取装备有红外线瞄准具的自动步枪.

Key.Original: Some rifles come with an attached laser pointer, enhancing your aiming precision and enabling you to mark targets for your teammates.
Key.English: 一些步枪提供了激光指示器附件, 在增加了您的瞄准精度的同时还能够为您的队友提供目标指示功能.

Key.Original: Take a rifle with a laser pointer.
Key.English: 拿取装有激光指示器的自动步枪.

Key.Original: For the majority of missions, you'll be equipped with Night Vision Goggles (NVGs).
Key.English: 在绝大多数的任务中, 您将会装备头戴式夜视仪(NVGs).

Key.Original: Watch the heat signatures on allied forces.
Key.English: 观察盟军部队的热量特征.

Key.Original:
Thermal Imaging identifies heat signatures, revealing soldiers, vehicles and other objects. This technology is effective during night and in day.

Possible heat sources:
%1 Living soldiers
%1 Running vehicle engines
%1 Weapon barrels
%1 Fires and explosions
Key.English:
热成像仪能够识别热量特征, 显示士兵, 载具以及其他物体. 这项技术在夜间及白天均有效.

可能的热源:
%1活的士兵
%1工作中的载具引擎
%1武器枪管
%1火光或爆炸

Key.Original: Learn about the gadgets which help you in night combat.
Key.English: 学习如何使用附加工具来帮助您进行夜间作战.
您已经掌握了跳伞的要领.

Key.Original: You screw it up! Don't worry and try it once more.
Key.English: 你搞砸了! 不要紧, 再来一遍!

Key.Original: You opened your parachute too early. Try again!
Key.English: 您过早的打开了您的伞包, 重来一遍!
您已经掌握了"高跳低开"(HALO)跳伞技能.

Key.Original: Enter the HMMWV to complete the mission!
Key.English: 进入"悍马"越野车以完成这个任务!

Key.Original:
HALO (Hight Altitude Low Opening) is technique used to airdrop soldiers from hight altitudes, far above enemy Anti Air (AA) defense.

Parachute is opened very close to ground in order to stay hidden from enemy radar and patrols.
Key.English:
高跳低开(HALO)是一种将士兵从高空投放以避开敌方防空火力的伞降方式.

为了不被敌方雷达和巡逻队发现, 降落伞必须在离地面很近的高度打开.

当前海拔高度: %5米
(%6 ft)

Key.Original: You can control the direction of your fall using the movement keys.
Key.English: 您可以使用移动键控制您下落的方向.

Key.Original: Use %7 to open your parachute once your altitude reads below 500 m (1640 ft)!
Key.English: 一旦您的海拔高度计读数低于500米(1640英尺), 请立刻使用 %7 打开您的降落伞!

%1: 前进
%2: 后退
%3: 左移
%4: 右移

当前海拔高度: %5米
(%6 ft)

Key.Original: Use %7 to open the parachute NOW!
Key.English: 现在立刻使用 %7 打开降落伞!

%1: 前进
%2: 后退
%3: 左移
%4: 右移

Key.Original: You are now flying at an altitude of 2500 m (8200 ft).
Key.English: 您现在飞行在海拔2500米(8200英尺)高度.

Key.Original: Go to the ramp and jump from the airplane!
Key.English: 移动到斜坡并且跳出飞机!

%1: 前进
%2: 后退
%3: 左移
%4: 右移

Key.Original: The steerable parachute allows you to land at a position you desire.
Key.English: 可操纵降落伞能够使您降落在您所期望的位置.

Key.Original: Note that you can't go backwards with the parachute.
Key.English: 请注意, 您的降落伞无法进行后退操作.

Key.Original: Land in the target area marked by the waypoint!
Key.English: 降落到路径点所标记的目标区域!

%1: 加快
%2: 减慢
%3: 向左
%4: 向右

Key.Original: You landed outside of the target area. Try again!
Key.English: 你降落到了目标区域以外, 重来一遍!

Key.Original: Master the precision landing with steerable parachute.
Key.English: 掌握使用可操纵降落伞进行精确伞降的技能.

Key.Original: Well done, you have mastered the basics of vehicle controls and mantainance.
Key.English: 做的很好! 你已经掌握了基本的载具控制和维护技能.

Key.Original: Slow down and stop in the marked area!
Key.English: 减速并在标记区域内停车!

Key.Original: To start with your training, move closer to the Humvee.
Key.English: 靠近悍马车, 开始你的驾驶练习.

Key.Original: Use %1 to open the vehicle action menu.
Key.English: 使用 %1 打开载具动作菜单.

Key.Original: There, select <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'To back seat'</t> to switch seats.
Key.English: 这里, 选择 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>"到后座"</t> 从而切换到后座.

Key.Original: Open the action menu again and select <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'To driver's seat'</t> to move back.
Key.English: 再次打开动作菜单选择 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>"到驾驶座位"</t> 从而回到驾驶座位.

Key.Original: Leave the vehicle using the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Get out'</t> action from the action menu.
Key.English: 使用动作菜单下的 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>"离开"</t> 指令离开载具.

Key.Original:
You can also use the action menu to enter the vehicle.

Use %1 or %2 when you see the %3 icon to open the vehicle action menu.

Select 'Get in HMMWV as driver' to board the vehicle as the driver.
Key.English:
你也可以使用动作菜单进入载具.

当你看到 %3 图标时使用 %1 或 %2 打开载具动作菜单.

选择 "进入悍马车驾驶座位" 从而作为驾驶员进入载具.

Key.Original: These are the vehicle's basic controls:
Key.English: 这些是载具的基本控制:

Key.Original:
There are many ways how you can set the vehicle controls.

If you don't like the default settings you can change them in 'Controls' section of the games 'Options'.
Key.English:
有很多更改驾驶控制的方式.

如果你不适应默认的设定, 你可以在"选项"菜单下的"控制设置"菜单内设置自己的控制方式.

Key.Original:
Use %1 to move slowly to the marked position.

There you will start driving practice.
Key.English:
使用 %1 低速行驶至标记区域.

在那里将会开始你的驾驶训练.
使用 %1 切换到自由查看视角.

Key.Original:
Check the fuel level. It is displayed in the top-left corner of your screen.

The fuel tank is half empty.
Key.English:
请检查显示在屏幕左上角油量表.

油箱空了将近一半.

Key.Original:
To refuel, drive to the marked tanker.

Refueling will start when you see the %1 icon on your screen.
Key.English:
行驶到标记出的油罐位置开始加油.

加油过程会在 %1 图标出现在屏幕的同时开始.

Key.Original: Wait till the tank is full.
'Repairing' and 'Rearming' a vehicle works the same way as refueling. You would approach the 'Ammo' and 'Repair' trucks in the same way as you just did for the 'Refuel' truck.
Key.English: 给载具"维修"和"补充弹药"的方法同"加油"相同: 你必须同加油的时候靠近加油车一样地靠近弹药车和维修车.

Key.Original: Press <t color='#e6b448' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t> to finish the tutorial.
Key.English: 按 <t color='#e6b448' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> 结束教学.

Key.Original: Well done, you have mastered the basics of vehicle controls and mantainance.
Key.English: 做的很好! 你已经掌握了基本的载具控制和维护技能.

Key.Original: Press <t color='#e6b448' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t> to finish the tutorial.
Key.English: 按 <t color='#e6b448' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t> 结束教学.

Key.Original: Learn the basics of driving and interacting with vehicles.
Key.English: 学习基本驾驶技能并上车实践.

Key.Original: Drive through the gate and follow the guide through all the checkpoints.
Key.English: 驶过大门并随指引通过所有的检查点.

Key.Original: Turn right and follow the road.
Stick to the road to avoid slowing down on rough terrain.
Key.English: 保持在公路上行驶以免受阻于崎岖的地形.

Key.Original: Well done! You have mastered all armor controls.
Key.English: 干的好! 你现在掌握了所有的装甲车控制技能.

Key.Original: Follow the 3d guide through all check-points!
Key.English: 沿着3D导向标通过所有的检查点!

Key.Original: Now, you will move out of the road.
Key.English: 现在, 请你驶离路面.

Key.Original: Carefull now, soldier! Slow down and stop at the marked point near the supply truck.
Key.English: 小心点大兵! 慢下来, 慢慢地停靠在补给车旁的标记点位置.

Key.Original: Click here, to order the M1A2 to move there!
Key.English: 点击这里命令M1A2移动到此!

Key.Original: The core of the M1A2 TUSK crew consists of 3 members:
Key.English: M1A2 TUSK(城市作战型)坦克具有3名核心乘员:

Key.Original: Use %1 to start the engine and move forward!
Key.English: 使用 %1 启动引擎并前进!

Key.Original:
%1: accelerate
%2: deccelerate
%3: turn left
%4: turn right
Key.English:
%1: 加速
%2: 减速
%3: 左转
%4: 右转

Key.Original: We will start with the driver's training.
Key.English: 我们会以驾驶训练开始.

Key.Original: Well done, now you should be familiar with the basics of driver's work.
Key.English: 不错, 现在你应该弄明白基本的驾驶员技能了.

Key.Original: icon to display available interactions and to select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Get in M1A2 TUSK Desert as driver'</t> action. Then use %3 to perform that action.
Key.English: 标志(用来显示可执行的动作), 选择 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'作为驾驶员登入M1A2 TUSK Desert'</t> 动作. 然后使用 %3 执行这个动作.

Key.Original: Move to that tank and use %1 or %2 when you see the
Key.English: 靠近那辆坦克使用 %1 或者 %2 当你看到

Key.Original: Board that M1A2 TUSK and take the driver's seat!

%1: open action menu/select next action
%2: open action menu/select previous action
%3: perform selected action
Key.English:
%1: 打开动作菜单/选择下一个动作
%2: 打开动作菜单/选择上一个动作
%3: 执行动作

Key.Original: Wait for the rest of the crew to board in.
Before you proceed to the driving training, you should get familiar with the basics of the M1A2 interface.
Key.English: 在开始你的驾驶训练之前, 你最好先熟悉一下M1A2的交互操作界面.

Key.Original:
The compass is your basic navigation tool. It is located at the top of the screen.

If you have an assigned waypoint, its direction will appear on the compass as a small orange arrow.
Key.English:
罗盘是你的基本导航工具. 它处在屏幕上端.

如果你已经被指派了一个路径, 路径的方位会以小橘红色箭头的形式在雷达上表示出来.

Key.Original:
There are two indicators above the compass.

The indicator to the left is showing your speed, while the indicator in the middle of the compass shows your azimuth.
Key.English:
罗盘上有两种指示标记.

左边的标志为当前的速度, 中部的标志为车辆水平角度.

Key.Original: Next to the compass to the left you can see your radar. It shows all ground and air targets in your vicinity.
Key.English: 在罗盘仪的左侧是雷达, 它显示了周边地区所有的地面及空中目标.

Key.Original: Driver's field of view (FOV) is marked by a green arc, while gunner's FOV is displayed by a grey arc.
Key.English: 驾驶员的视距 (FOV) 由绿色的圆圈标出, 炮手的视距 (FOV) 则由灰色的圆圈标出.

Key.Original: Left of the radar there are 6 damage warning lights. These lights show status of the different parts of the M1A2 tank.
Key.English: 雷达的左边有6种警告高光. 这些警告高光指示了坦克不同部分的损坏情况.
<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'> [L-TR]</t> - 左侧履带
<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'> [R-TR]</t> - 右侧履带

Key.Original:
The last interface element, that is located in the top-left corner of your screen is the fuel indicator.

The fuel tank of the M1A2 is currently empty.
Key.English:
最后的界面元素, 在屏幕左上角的是油表.

目前M1A2的油表是空的.

Key.Original: If you are not playing on expert difficulty you might use %1 to toggle between internal and external view.
Key.English: 如果不是在专家模式难度下你可以使用 %1 切换车内和车外视角.

Key.Original: For now, switch back to external view and keep it. This way you can better survey your environment.
Key.English: 现在, 切换回车外视角. 这样你能更好地观察周围环境.

Key.Original: Keep the external view for now, so you can better survey your environment.
Key.English: 现在保持车外视角, 这样你能很好地观察你所处的环境.

Key.Original: Before the driving practice starts you need to refuel.
Key.English: 驾驶训练开始前先加个油.

Key.Original: To refill the fuel tank, your vehicle must stand close to fuel truck or an oil barrel. Then the refueling will start automaticaly.
Key.English: 你的车辆必须靠近油罐或者油车开始加油. 加油会自动开始.

Key.Original: Wait until the fuel tank gets filled!
Well done, now you are ready to start the driver's training.
Key.English: 好棒喔! 现在你可以开始驾驶训练了哟.

Key.Original: There are 4 basic controls used for controlling speed and direction:
Key.English: 有4种控制速度和方向的基本方式

Key.Original: You will be automatically switched to gunner's position.
Key.English: 你会被自动切换到炮手位置.

Key.Original: Now, you will train with the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M240</t> machine gun.
Key.English: 现在你将使用 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M240</t> 机枪进行训练.

Key.Original: Use %1 to switch to machine gun!

The coaxial M240 machine gun is mounted to the right of the M256 cannon.

The weapon is controlled by the same computer system as the main gun.
Key.English:
同轴M240机枪搭载于M256主炮的右侧.

由控制主炮的同一台计算机系统控制.

Key.Original: There are several groups of dummy targets along the route. Hit all of them with the M240 machine gun.
Key.English: 沿路有若干组训练目标, 使用M240机枪射击它们.

Key.Original: Hit all targets with machine gun!
The machine gun practice was successfully completed.
Wait until the M1A2 reaches the resupply point!
Rearming works the same way as refueling - when the vehicle is close to ammunition truck or ammo stockpile, the ammo will automaticaly starts to fill-in.
Key.English: 补充弹药跟加油的方式相同 - 当车辆靠近弹药补给车或弹药库, 补给会自动进行.

Key.Original: Wait until all ammunition gets loaded!
Key.English: 等待直到弹药装载完毕!

Key.Original: The M1A2 TUSK weapon system consists of:
The gunner's job is to operate the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M256</t> cannon and the coaxial <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M240</t> machine gun.
Key.English: 炮手的工作是操作 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M256</t> 主炮以及同轴 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M240</t> 机枪.

Key.Original: The <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M256</t> cannon is the main armament of the M1A2 TUSK. This cannon can fire <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>Sabot</t> or <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>HE</t> rounds.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>M256</t> 火炮是M1A2炮塔的主武器. 它能发射 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>穿甲</t> or <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>高爆</t> 弹药.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>Sabot</t> is a high velocity armor-piercing round that is best used against enemy armor.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>穿甲弹</t> 是具有高速穿透性能的弹药, 适合用来对付装甲目标.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>HE</t> is a high explosive warhead. It is very effective against light-armored vehicles, fortifications and buildings.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>高爆弹</t> 是一种高爆炸性弹头. 对付轻装甲目标, 碉堡要塞及建筑具有很好的效果.

Key.Original: The information about the current selected weapon is displayed in the top-right corner of your screen.
Key.English: 选择的武器信息显示在屏幕右上角.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M256</t> is a name of selected weapon.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M256</t> 是选择的武器称号.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Sabot %1</t> shows type and ammount of loaded ammunition.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>穿甲弹 %1</t> 显示装填的弹药数量和类型.

Key.Original: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Zeroing %2</t> shows distance in meters to that is aiming adjusted.
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>归零 %2</t> 显示距离目标的米数.

Key.Original: The M1A2 is now moving towards the first target.
Wait till it gets into position!
Key.English: 等待直到到达指定位置!

Key.Original:
There is an old empty truck close to the road ahead.

If you have problems locating your target, check the radar for
Key.English:
路前有辆空的卡车.

如果你不确定你的目标位置, 请查看雷达

Key.Original: Because of the real-life factors like is a speed, momentum, gravity and an aerodynamic drag, fired projectiles don't travel along straight lines. Their trajectory is defined by so called balistic curves.
Key.English: 由于例如速度, 动量, 重力以及空气阻力等现实因素的影响, 发射的炮弹并不会保持太长的直线飞行距离. 它们的飞行抛物线由所谓的"弹道曲线"决定.

Key.Original: While the acctual drop of the fired round might not be noticeable at short distance, it is a huge issue when aiming at distant targets.
Key.English: 短距离的弹道变化并不明显, 但对于远处的目标会有巨大的影响.

Key.Original:
To negate for the projectile drop, the aiming has to be adjusted according to the target distance.

In case of lockable targets it's done automaticaly by the balistic computer.

If you need to hit targets that cannot be locked like buildings, empty vehicles or an area for a surpressive fire can, you need to adjust the aiming manualy.
Key.English:
为了修正弹道曲线, 瞄具必须根据目标距离调整.

对于锁定的目标, 弹道计算机会自动修正弹道.

但如果你想射击类似空载具, 建筑等不能锁定的目标或是对某地区进行火力支援, 你必须手动调整瞄具.

Key.Original: The M1A2 is equipped with <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>Sabot</t> and <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>HE</t> rounds.
Key.English: M1A2装备了 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>穿甲弹</t> 以及 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>高爆</t> 弹.

Key.Original: Try using the high-explosive rounds in the next practice. Their balistic curve is more steep.
Key.English: 接下来的练习中要试试使用高爆弹喔! 它们的弹道曲线会更陡呢!

Key.Original: Use %1 or the action menu to load the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>HE</t> rounds!
Key.English: 使用 %1 或指挥菜单装填 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>高爆</t> 弹!

Key.Original: The M1A2 is now moving to the area of the second firing practice. There you will train at several distant targets.
Key.English: M1A2正在向第2个射击练习场地前进哦~ 在那里你会训练射击若干远处的目标呢!

Key.Original: Wait till the M1A2 gets into position!
Key.English: 等待直到M1A2到达指定位置哦!

Key.Original: There are 3 more empty trucks to the West. Try to hit them with the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M256</t> cannon.
Key.English: 西面有3辆多的空卡车呢. 快去试试使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M256</t> 火炮蹂躏它们的感觉哦!

Key.Original: You will need to adjust the zeroing value according to target distance.
Key.English: 你需要根据目标距离适当调节归零哦.

Key.Original:
%1: increase range
%2: decrease range
%3: zoom in
%4: zoom out
Key.English:
%1: 增加标尺
%2: 减少标尺
%3: 放大
%4: 缩小

Key.Original: Welcome to commander training. You will learn everything you need to know to succesfully command a tank crew in battle.
Key.English: 欢迎来到指挥官训练哦:) 你会学习在战场上成功地指挥坦克成员所需要了解的一切哟!

Key.Original: Wait until fuel tank gets filled and all ammunition gets loaded!
Key.English: 等油加满哦, 也要等弹药装满呢:P

Key.Original: Wait till the M1A2 gets to the next checkpoint!
Key.English: 等待直到M1A2到达下个检查点!

Key.Original: Order the M1A2 to move to the next checkpoint!
Key.English: 命令M1A2移动至下一个检查点!

Key.Original:
%1: access command menu
%2: open the map
Key.English:
%1: 进入指挥菜单
%2: 打开地图

Key.Original:
The tank commander's job is also to decide on targets and how to engage them.

In the following lesson you will learn how to:
Key.English:
坦克指挥官同时也必须选定一个目标并处理它们.

接下来你会学习如何进行:

Key.Original: There are two wooden training targets ahead, lying left of the road. You can see them on radar as
Key.English: 前面有两个木质练习目标, 就在路的左边, 你会在雷达上看到它们显示为

Key.Original: Move to the checkpoint, there you will learn how to instruct your gunner to destroy them.
Key.English: 移动至检查点, 在那里你会学习如何指挥你的炮手去摧毁它们.

Key.Original: Order the M1A2 to move to next checkpoint and wait till it gets there!
Key.English: 指挥M1A2移动至下一个检查点并等待直到它到达.

Key.Original: The most common procedure to destroy a target consists of two steps:
Key.English: 最常用的击毁目标步骤有两步:

Key.Original: Now you are ready to start the commander's training.
Key.English: 现在你已经准备好开始指挥练习了.

Key.Original: To mark a target for your gunner, you can either:
Key.English: 为了给你的炮手标记目标, 你也可以:

Key.Original: Use %1 to cycle through all available targets.
Key.English: 使用 %1 在所有可见目标上循环切换.

Key.Original: Point at the target and use the %2.
Use %1 to mark one of the two targets!
Key.English: 使用 %1 标记两个中的一个目标!

Key.Original:
%1: cycle and mark targets
%2: mark target at pointer
Key.English:
%1: 切换并标记目标
%2: 在鼠标指针位置上标记目标

Key.Original: When the target is marked, use %1 to assign the command fire to your gunner.
Key.English: 当目标被标记后, 使用 %1 给你的炮手下达开火指令.

Key.Original: %1: command to fire at marked target
Key.English: %1: 下达向标记目标开火指令

Key.Original: Use %1 to mark the second target and then use %2 to give your gunner a command to fire at it.
Key.English: 使用 %1 标记第2个目标, 使用 %2 给你的炮手下达开火指令.

Key.Original:
%1: cycle through targets
%2: command to fire at marked target
Key.English:
%1: 在目标间切换
%2: 命令向标记目标上开火

Key.Original:
There is another wooden target at the road ahead.

You will try to command your gunner to destroy it by using the context sensitive feature of the command menu.
Key.English:
前面的路上有另一个木质目标.

你会练习通过指挥菜单的智能上下文敏感识别功能指挥炮手摧毁它.

Key.Original:
The content of the command menu is context sensitive.

You can see it when you open the menu and point at the training target. A brand new 'Attack Tank' command will appear.

When you execute the command, your gunner will start firing at the target with his currently selected weapon.

This 'Attack Tank' command won't be available if the gunner has some target marked.
Key.English:
指挥菜单的内容具有智能上下文敏感识别功能.

你会在打开菜单并指出一个练习目标时看到. 一个新的 '攻击坦克' 指令将会出现.

当你执行指令, 你的炮手会开始使用当前的武器攻击目标.

This '攻击坦克' 指令不会在炮手已经有一个标记目标时出现.

Key.Original:
In the last part of this tutorial, you will learn how to use the M2 heavy machine gun.

Then you will be ordered to move through a small abandoned village and destroy several personel and armored training targets.

You are going to use everything you've learned so far.
Key.English:
在最后一个教学任务中, 你将会学习如何使用 M2 重机枪.

然后你会受命通过一个废弃的小村并且摧毁一些平台及装甲目标.

你将会需要使用之前所学的所有技能.

Key.Original: The <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M2</t> heavy machine gun is mounted on the Common Remotely Operated Weapon Station (CROWS).
Key.English: <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>M2</t> 重机枪搭载于通用遥控武器站(CROWS)上.

Key.Original: The CROWS system allows commander to operate the M2 without exposing himself to enemy fire and it's optics gives him a zoom functionality.
Key.English: CROWS系统允许指挥官避免暴露在敌军火力的情况下操作M2机枪, 并具有瞄镜缩放功能.

Key.Original:
%1: increase aim range
%2: decrease aim range
%3: zoom in
%4: zoom out
Key.English:
%1: 增加标尺
%2: 减少标尺
%3: 放大
%4: 缩小

Key.Original:
There are several targets at the road ahead. Hit them all with the M2 heavy machine gun.

You might need to use zooming and adjust the aiming distance.
Key.English:
路前面有一些目标, 使用M2重机枪摧毁它们.

你可能需要缩放瞄镜或者调节标尺.

Key.Original: Hit all marked targets with the M2 machine gun!
Key.English: 使用M2机枪打击所有标记出的目标

Key.Original:
%1: increase aim range
%2: decrease aim range
%3: zoom in
%4: zoom out
Key.English:
%1: 增加标尺
%2: 减少标尺
%3: 放大
%4: 缩小

Key.Original:
You have learned all the basic procedures how to lead and command a tank crew.

To finish this tutorial, you will have to secure the village to the North.
Key.English:
你已经学习了如何领导并指挥坦克成员的所有基本程序.

接下来你必须成功保卫北方的村庄以完成这次教学.

Key.Original: As an M1A2 commander, you have a full responsibility and control over tank's crew.
Key.English: 作为一名M1A2的指挥官, 你具有完全的职责去掌控坦克成员.

Key.Original: Destroy all pop-up targets with the M2 heavy machine gun and command the gunner to destroy all armored targets using the M256 cannon.
Key.English: 使用M2机枪摧毁所有弹出目标并指挥炮手使用M256火炮摧毁所有的装甲目标.

Key.Original: Destroy all targets in nearby village!
Key.English: 摧毁附近村庄里所有的目标!

Key.Original: All targets were destroyed and the village was secured!
Key.English: 所有目标已摧毁, 村庄得到了拯救!

Key.Original: There are several ways for a commander to assign move commands to his driver:
Key.English: 这里有几种指挥官给驾驶员下达移动指令的方式:

Key.Original: Now, you'll be automatically switched to commander's position.
Key.English: 现在, 你会被自动地切换到指挥官位置.

Key.Original: This is the most common and useful way how to control vehicle movement from commander's position.
Key.English: 这是在指挥官位置上控制载具移动最常用和有效的方式.

Key.Original: To effectively use this feature you need to use the internal camera.
Key.English: 为了有效地使用这个特性你需要使用车内视角.

Key.Original: Use %1 to switch the view to internal camera!
Key.English: 使用 %1 切换到车内视角!

Key.Original: The command menu is accessed by using the %1.
Key.English: 使用 %1 进入指挥菜单.

Key.Original: Navigation in command menu is similar to the action menu, by using the %2 or %3.
Key.English: 在指挥菜单里导航就跟动作菜单里一样, 使用 %2 或 %3.

Key.Original: Point at the checkpoint marked by the red arrow, select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Move There'</t> command from the command menu and execute it by using %4.
Key.English: 指定由红色箭头标出的检查点, 在指挥菜单里选择 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'移动至此'</t> 命令, 并使用 %4 执行.

Key.Original: If you decide to stop the M1A2, assign the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Stop'</t> command to driver.
Key.English: 要是你想让M1A2停下来, 就给驾驶员下达 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'停止'</t> 指令.

Key.Original: Use the command menu to send the M1A2 to move to the next checkpoint!
Key.English: 使用指挥菜单让M1A2移动至下一个检查点!

Key.Original:
You have successfully commanded the M1A2 to move to the 1st checkpoint.

When it reaches the point, the driver of M1A2 will automatically stop there and will wait for another commands.
Key.English:
你已经成功地指挥坦克移动至第一个检查点.

当到达检查点, M1A2的驾驶员会停止在那里并等下下一个指令.

Key.Original: Wait until the tank moves close to the checkpoint!
Key.English: 等待直到坦克接近检查点!

Key.Original:
%1: access command menu
%2: navigate up
%3: navigate down
%4: execute command
Key.English:
%1: 进入指挥菜单
%2: 向上翻页
%3: 向下翻页
%4: 执行指令

Key.Original: Command the M1A2 to move to next checkpoint!
Key.English: 指挥M1A2移动至下一个检查点!

Key.Original:
%1: access command menu
%2: navigate up
%3: navigate down
%4: execute command
Key.English:
%1: 进入指挥菜单
%2: 向上翻页
%3: 向下翻页
%4: 执行指令

Key.Original: Command the M1A2 to move to next checkpoint!
Key.English: 指挥M1A2移动至下一个检查点!

Key.Original:
%1: access command menu
%2: navigate up
%3: navigate down
%4: execute command
Key.English:
%1: 进入指挥菜单
%2: 向上翻页
%3: 向下翻页
%4: 执行指令

Key.Original: Another useful way to assign move commands to driver is to set the destination coordinates through map.
Key.English: 另一种给驾驶员指派移动指令有效的方式是在地图上设置目的地坐标.

Key.Original: To assign the move command through map:
Key.English: 通过地图下达移动指令:

Key.Original: Click on the point where you want to move.
Key.English: 点击你所要移动的目标点.

Key.Original: It gets very handy when you need to move over long distances.
Key.English: 当你需要长距离移动的时候这是相当有效的方式.

Key.Original: Open the map and order the M1A2 to move to the crossroad that's lying ahead!
Key.English: 打开地图指派M1A2移动至前方的十字路口!

Key.Original:
You have successfully assigned command through the map using the move coordinates.

The M1A2 is now moving towards the junction.
Key.English:
你成功地通过地图下达了坐标移动指令

M1A2正前往指定点.

Key.Original: The 3rd way how to command the tank movement is through direct orders.
Key.English: 第3种指挥坦克移动的方式是通过方位指令操作.

Key.Original: Before proceeding to commander's training you need to refuel and rearm.
Key.English: 在开始指挥训练之前你必需加满你的油箱, 补充你的弹药.

Key.Original: Learn to drive, command and shoot from armored vehicles.
Key.English: 学习装甲车辆的驾驶, 指挥和射击技能.

Key.Original: Well done! You have mastered helicopter controls.
Key.English: 做的好! 你看起来似乎是掌握了飞机的控制技能.

Key.Original: Use %1 or %2 when you see the
Key.English: 使用 %1 或 %2 当你看到
起飞, 飞行, 着陆.

Key.Original: To start with the training, move to that UH60 Blackhawk and take the pilot seat.
Key.English: 接近UH60黑鹰直升机选择飞行员座位以开始训练.

Key.Original:
%1: accelerate
%2: deccelerate
%3: bank left
%4: bank right
%5: increase alt.
%6: decrease alt.
At the top of the screen you see your basic navigation tool - the compass.
Key.English: 在屏幕的上方你可以看到基本的导航工具-罗盘.

Key.Original:
Slow down and land on the marked helipad.

If you want to, you can use the 'Auto-hover On' action. It can be activated via the action menu or by pressing %1.
Key.English:
减速并着陆在标记处的机坪上.

可以使用 '自动悬停开启' 动作保持机身稳定. 这可以通过动作菜单或者按 %1实现.

Key.Original: Open the action menu and use <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Engine off'</t> to turn off the Blackhawk's engine.
Key.English: 打开动作菜单并使用 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'引擎关闭'</t> 动作关闭飞机的引擎.

Key.Original:
Well done!

Open the action menu and use 'Get out' action to disembark the UH60 Blackhawk.
Key.English:
做的不错!

打开动作菜单并使用 '离开' 动作离开UH60黑鹰.

Key.Original:
There are three indicators above the compass.

The leftmost is showing your speed. The middle one shows your azimuth and the one to the right displays your acctual altitude.
Key.English:
罗盘上有3种指示标记.

左侧显示为速度. 中间的为飞机的方位角度. 右侧的为飞机当前的高度.

Key.Original: If you have an assigned waypoint, its direction will appear on the compass as an orange arrow.
Key.English: 如果你已经被指派了一条路径, 这条路径的目标点会以橘红色箭头的形式显示在罗盘中.

Key.Original:
Next to the compass to the left, you see your radar. It shows all enemy and friendly targets in your vicinity.

More of the radar will be explained in the helicopter combat tutorial.
Key.English:
左边靠近罗盘的是雷达, 它显示了你周边所有的敌军和友军目标.

更多的内容我们会在武装直升机教学中进一步学习到.

Key.Original: Left of the radar there are 5 damage warning lights. These lights show status of the different parts of the chopper.
Key.English: 雷达左侧显示了5种损坏警告指示高光. 这些高光显示了飞机不同的损坏部位.
<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'> [ATRQ]</t> - 反扭尾桨
<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'> [INST]</t> - 机械构件

Key.Original: icon to display available interactions and to select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'Get in UH-60M as pilot'</t> action. Then use %3 to perform that action.
Key.English: 标志显示激活的动作命令 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#000000'>'作为飞行员进入UH-60M'</t> 动作. 接着使用 %3 执行动作.

Key.Original:
The last interface element, that is located in the top-left corner of your screen is the fuel indicator.

As you can see, the UH60 tank is being filled with fuel right now.
Key.English:
最后一项界面元素, 是在屏幕左上方的油表.

就如你看到的, UH60的油箱正被加满.

Key.Original: Wait until the tank is full!

Press and hold %1 to start the engine.

The chopper will lift-off after a while.
Key.English:
按住 %1 启动引擎.

等获得了足够的升力后飞机就能起飞了.

Key.Original:
If you need to stabilize the chopper, use the 'Auto-hover On' action.

It is accessed via the action menu or by pressing %1.
Key.English:
如果你想让飞机稳定下来, 使用'自动悬停开启' 动作.

这可以通过动作菜单或者按 %1实现.

Key.Original:
Press and hold %1 to gain some altitude.

Remember that the helicopter won't start gaining altitude immediately as well as it won't stop increasing it in the exact moment you start holding the button.
Key.English:
按住 %1 爬升高度.

记住飞机并不会在你按下按钮同时立即开始爬升.

Key.Original: You can yaw (rotate) the chopper left and right while hovering or flying at low speeds.
Key.English: 当飞机悬停或低速飞行时你可以使飞机偏航(原地转向)

Key.Original:
%1: open action menu/select next action
%2: open action menu/select previous action
%3: perform selected action
Key.English:
%1: 打开动作菜单/选择下一个动作
%2: 打开动作菜单/选择上一个动作
%3: 执行选定的动作

Key.Original: At high speeds it is necessary to bank (lean) the whole helicopter, when you want to change your heading.
Key.English: 在高速飞行的情况下, 如果你想转向, 让飞机往摆向一侧是很有效的.

Key.Original: Hold %1 to bank the helicopter left.
Key.English: 按住 %1 把飞机往左摆.

Key.Original:
%1: bank the helicopter left
%2: bank the helicopter right
Key.English:
%1:把飞机往左摆
%2: 把飞机往右摆

Key.Original: Hold %2 to bank the helicopter right.
Key.English: 按住 %2 把飞机往右摆.

Key.Original:
%1: bank the helicopter left
%2: bank the helicopter right
Key.English:
%1: 把飞机往左摆
%2: 把飞机往右摆

Key.Original:
If you need to increase the helicopters speed, you need to pitch down (lean its nose slightly down).

As a side effect it will also decrease your attitude, so don't forget to compensate for that if necessary.
Key.English:
如果你想增加飞机的速度, 你须要压低机头.

作为负面影响这同时也会失去一些上升的动力, 所以如果必要的话请及时补偿升力.

Key.Original: Press %1 for a while to pitch down and move forward!
Key.English: 按住 %1 一会儿压低机头并前进!

Key.Original:
%1: accelerate
%2: rapid accelerate
%3: deccelerate
%4: increase altitude
Key.English:
%1: 加速
%2: 迅速加速
%3: 减速
%4: 上升

Key.Original:
To decrease the choppers speed, you need to pitch up (point its nose up into the air).

If you are moving forward, this manoeuvre will also give you some extra altitude.
Key.English:
为了减少飞机的速度, 你必须抬起机头.

如果飞机正在前进, 这个操作也会给飞机带来额外的升力.

Key.Original: Press %3 for a while to decrease your speed/move backward.
Key.English: 按住 %3 一会儿减速或倒退.

Key.Original:
%1: accelerate
%2: rapid accelerate
%3: deccelerate
%4: decrease altitude
Key.English:
%1: 加速
%2: 迅速加速
%3: 减速
%4: 下降

Key.Original: Press and hold %2 to decrease your altitude. Be careful because the helicopter has some momentum.
Key.English: 按住 %2 减少飞机的高度. 请小心飞机本身具有的惯性和动量.

Key.Original: Before you lift-off you should get familiar with the basics of the UH60 interface.
Key.English: 起飞之前你最好先熟悉一下UH60的基本操作界面.

Key.Original:
Now, you will fly a short training course.

The checkpoints are marked by the semi-transparent circles. The active checkpoint glows red and has a waypoint attached to it.
Key.English:
现在, 你将开始一段短距离的飞行课程.

检查点由一些半透明的圆圈构成. 变成红色的圆圈代表激活的路点.

Key.Original: Turn so that the first checkpoint is in front of you!
Key.English: 转到第一个检查点在你的正面位置!

Key.Original: Turn off the auto-hover from the action menu or by pressing the %1.
Key.English: 通过动作菜单或者按下 %1.关闭自动悬停.

Key.Original:
%1: accelerate
%2: deccelerate
%3: bank left
%4: bank right
%5: increase alt.
%6: decrease alt.
Press %1 to gain some speed and head towards that red circle. It's your 1st checkpoint.
Key.English: 按下 %1 获得一些速度并通过那个红色的圆圈. 那是你的第一个检查点.

Key.Original: Slow down a bit and prepare for the sharp turn at the next checkpoint.
Key.English: 略减速并准备在下一个检查点急转.

Key.Original:
Proceed carefully to the next checkpoint.

You will be instructed to land there and pick up some BLUFOR troops.
Key.English:
小心地往下一个检查点前进.

你将被指令在那里着陆并带上一些蓝方士兵.

Key.Original:
Descend slowly and land on the marked helipad. No rush, take your time!

If you want to, you can use the 'Auto-hover On' action. It can be activated via the action menu or by pressing %1.
Key.English:
低速并稳定地下降在标记出的机坪上. 千万不能操之过急!

你也可以使用 '自动悬停开启' 动作. 这可以通过动作菜单或者按下 %1 实现.

%1: 自动悬停开启
%2: 减速

Key.Original: Wait for all the soldiers to board your chopper!
Key.English: 等待所有的士兵登上你的直升机!

Key.Original:
Your last task is to transport the troops safely to their destination.

Use %1 to lift off and gain some altitude.
Key.English:
你最后的任务是运载一队步兵安全地到达其目的地.

使用 %1 起飞并增加一些高度.

Key.Original: Basic helicopter controls and flying course.
Key.English: 基本的直升机控制及飞行课程.

Key.Original: Well done, you have learned how to control an attack helicopter.
Key.English: 做的好! 你应该学会了武装直升机的控制和攻击技能.

Key.Original: If you experience problems with the basics, such as controlling the chopper movement or using the auto-hover, we strongly encourage you to quit this mission and try the <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Helicopter Basics</t> tutorial instead.
Key.English: 若您对基础的直升机飞行技能有所不解, 我们强烈建议您退出这个任务而先尝试 <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>直升机基础</t> 教学任务.

Key.Original: To begin the tutorial, move to that Apache and take the pilot seat.
Key.English: 靠近阿帕奇武装直升机并选择飞行员座位开始训练教学.

Key.Original: Before you lift-off you should familiarise yourself with the basics of the AH-64D interface.
Key.English: 起飞之前你最好熟悉一下 AH-64D 的基本操作交互界面.

Key.Original: At the top of the screen there is a compass.
If you have an assigned waypoint, its direction will appear on the compass as an orange arrow.
Key.English: 如果你被指派了一条路径, 路径点就会以橘红色箭头的形式出现在罗盘上.

Key.Original:
There are three indicators above the compass.

From left to right, it is speed, azimuth and altitude.
Key.English:
罗盘上有3种指示标记.

从左到右分别表示速度, 水平角度以及高度.

Key.Original: To the left of the compass you can see your radar. It shows all ground and air targets in your vicinity.
Key.English: 罗盘的左上方是雷达. 雷达显示了临近地区所有的地面和空中目标.

Key.Original: Target faction is indicated by color:
Target type is indicated by shape:
The pilot's field of view (FOV) is marked by a green arc, while the gunner's FOV is displayed by a grey arc.
Key.English: 飞行员的视野(FOV)由绿圈标明, 而炮手的视野则由灰圈表示.

Key.Original: Left of the radar there are 5 damage warning lights. These lights show the status of different parts of the chopper.
Key.English: 雷达左边的5个损坏警告高光显示了机身不同的损坏部位.
<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'> [ATRQ]</t> - 反扭尾桨
<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'> [INST]</t> - 机械构件

Key.Original:
The last interface element, located to the top-left corner of your screen, is the fuel indicator.

As you can see, the AH-64D fuel tank is being filled with fuel right now.
Key.English:
显示屏左上方的是油表.

现在你看到AH-64D的油箱正即将被加满.

Key.Original: Wait until the fuel tank gets full!
This is an advanced tutorial, built on knowledge presented in the <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Helicopter Basics</t> training.
Key.English: 这是进阶训练, 建立于基本的 <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>直升机基础</t> 训练之上.

Key.Original: Choppers get vulnerable to enemy fighters and AA missiles at high altitudes!
Key.English: 直升机在高处更容易受到敌方歼击机及对空导弹的威胁!

Key.Original:
Press and hold %1 to start the engine.

The chopper will lift-off after a while.
Key.English:
按住 %1 启动引擎.

过一会直升机就会起飞.

Key.Original: Start the engine and take off!
In the first training, you will practice controlling the chopper, while flying low over the ground.
Key.English: 在第一个训练内容中, 你将练习直升机在低空掠地飞行的操作技能.

Key.Original: In the first training, you will practice controlling the chopper, while flying low over the ground.
Key.English: 在第一个训练内容中, 你将练习直升机在低空掠地飞行的操作技能.

Key.Original: Turn so that the first checkpoint is in front of you!
Key.English: 转动机身至正对于第一个检查点!

%1: 向左偏航
%2: 向右偏航

Key.Original: Press %1 to gain some speed and head towards the red circle. It's your 1st checkpoint.
Key.English: 使用 %1 加速通过红圈, 这是你第一个检查点.

Key.Original:
%1: accelerate
%2: deccelerate
%3: bank left
%4: bank right
%5: increase alt.
%6: decrease alt.

Attack helicopters are more agile then transport choppers. They are designed to operate at low altitudes, where they maximise their manoeuvreability, use terrain to their advantage and remain hidden from enemy radar.
Key.English: 武装直升机相对于运输直升机具有更高的灵活性. 它们被设计成能在最大程度发挥其威力的低空执行任务. 能利用地形来躲避雷达的检测是其优点.

Key.Original: Go into auto-hover for explanation of RWR.
Key.English: 开启自动悬停模式进行RWR的说明.

Key.Original: AA Rockets represent a problem; however, you have the means to counter their threat - the Radar Warning Receiver (RWR) and flares system.
Key.English: 对空导弹是个威胁, 尽管如此, 你可以在雷达预警系统(RWR)和热干扰系统的帮助下避免导弹的威胁.

Key.Original: Failed to avoid the missile. Please repeat.
Key.English: 规避导弹失败, 请重新开始.

Key.Original:
When a rocket is inbound, it's represented by a blinking that signifies the incoming direction.

To avoid it, fire flares - dummy targets for the missiles.
Key.English:
当导弹来袭, 雷达会闪烁 显示了导弹来袭的位置.

释放一些热干扰弹-假目标来躲避导弹的攻击.

Key.Original: Well done, you just avoided an incoming missile.
Key.English: 做的好, 你成功避开了来袭的导弹.

Key.Original: Stop the chopper at the marked position and go into auto-hover!
Key.English: 让飞机停在标记位置并启动自动悬停!

Key.Original: The Apache weapon system consists of:
Use %1 to select <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'AGM-114 Hellfire'</t> missiles!
Key.English: 使用 %1 选择 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'AGM-114 地狱火'</t> 导弹!

Key.Original:
Guided missiles are used for destroying high-priority targets from a long range.

The common tactic used with the guided missiles is to:
Key.English:
制导导弹被用来对付高优先级的远距离目标.

制导导弹的常规战术是:

Key.Original: Turn the chopper so the marked target is in front of you!
Key.English: 调整飞机方向到标示的目标正对着你!

Key.Original:
Target has to be locked, prior to launching the 'AGM-114 Hellfire' missile.

Use %1 to mark a target. Your gunner will try to lock it and then he will fire the missile when 'Fire' command is issued.
Key.English:
目标已被锁定, 优先发射 'AGM-114 地狱火' 导弹.

使用 %1 标示一个目标. 炮手会试着锁定并在下达开火指令后攻击目标.

Key.Original: The high pitch beeping sound signalizes that target is successfully locked.
Key.English: 高频蜂鸣声代表目标已被成功锁定.

Key.Original:
Climb up, so you have a direct line of sight on the marked target.

Then use %1 and %2 to command your gunner to destroy all of the targets.
Key.English:
爬升, 直到标示目标具有直接的视野.

然后使用 %1和 %2 命令炮手摧毁所有的目标.

%1: 开火
%2: 标志下一个目标
%3: 缩放

Key.Original:
Well done, all targets were destroyed!

Now, you will move to un-guided rocket training.
Key.English:
做的好, 所有的目标已被摧毁!

现在你将开始非制导火箭弹的训练.

Key.Original:
Hydra rockets are used for destroying lower priority targets.

Due to its wide blasting radius, they are useful for engaging large groups of enemies.
Key.English:
Hydra 火箭弹被用来对付低优先级的目标.

由于其具有较大的杀伤范围, 对付大集群的敌方目标将具有极佳的效果.

Key.Original: Use %1 to select the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Hydra'</t> rockets.
Key.English: 使用 %1 选择 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Hydra'</t> 火箭弹.

Key.Original:
Unlike Hellfires, Hydras do not use the locking mechanics.

Use %1 to mark the target. Your gunner will automaticaly fire when the marked target gets into range.
Key.English:
和 Hellfires(地狱火) 不同, Hydras火箭弹没有锁定过程.

使用 %1 标示一个目标. 炮手会自动攻击射程范围内所标示的目标.

%1: 向左偏航
%2: 向右偏航

Key.Original:
%1: assign 'Fire'/'Cease Fire' command
%2: mark next target
%3: zoom view
Key.English:
%1: 指派 '开火'/'停火' 命令
%2: 标示下一个目标
%3: 放大视野

Key.Original:
Well done, all targets were destroyed!

Cannon training is commencing.
Key.English:
干的好! 所有的目标已被摧毁!

即将开始机炮训练.

Key.Original: The M230 cannon is best used against light armored targets.
Key.English: M230机炮是对付软装甲目标的绝好武器.
