Key.Original: Use %1 to select <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'M230'</t> cannon!
Key.English: 使用 %1 选择 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'M230'</t> 机炮!

Key.Original: When the 'M230 cannon' is selected, the gunner will automatically engage known light armored targets until a 'Cease Fire' command is issued.
Key.English: 当 'M230 机炮' 被选择, 炮手会自动锁定并攻击发现的敌方软装甲目标直到 '停火' 指令被下达.
%1: 下达 '开火'/'停火' 指令

Key.Original:
Well done, all targets were destroyed!

Now, you will learn how to defend against enemy AA missiles.
Key.English:
做的好! 所有的目标已被摧毁!

现在, 你得学学如何防御对方对空导弹的袭击.

Key.Original:
Follow the path marked by the checkpoints.

You need to get some altitude to practice in using the RWR and flare systems.
Key.English:
沿着标记出的检查点飞行.

为了练习使用RWR和热干扰系统你最好保持一定的高度.

Key.Original:
%1: accelerate
%2: deccelerate
%3: bank left
%4: bank right
%5: increase alt.
%6: decrease alt.
Failed to avoid the missile. Please repeat.
Key.English: 规避导弹失败! 请重来.

Key.Original:
When a rocket is inbound, it's represented on radar by a blinking that signifies the incoming direction.

Use %1 to launch several heat flares to confuse the guidance system of the AA missile.
Key.English:
当导弹来袭时, 雷达会闪烁 指出了来袭导弹的位置.

使用 %1 释放一些热干扰弹以迷惑导弹的制导系统.
使用 %1 释放一些热干扰弹!

Key.Original: Well done, you've countered the incoming AA missile!
Key.English: 不错, 你已经成功避开了对空导弹的威胁!

%1: 释放热干扰弹(s)
%2: 切换单发/自动模式

Key.Original:
AA Rockets represent a problem for any combat helicopter.

To counter the threat the AH-64D is equipped with the Radar Warning Receiver (RWR) and flares system.
Key.English:
对空导弹的威胁对所有的直升机飞行员来说都是个大麻烦.

为了避开这个威胁, AH-64D装备了雷达预警系统(RWR)以及热干扰系统.

Key.Original: You have successfully completed <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Attack Helicopter</t> tutorial.
Key.English: 你已经成功地完成了 <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>武装直升机</t> 训练课程.

Key.Original: Master the weapon systems and tactics of helicopter gunships.
Key.English: 掌握武装直升机的武器系统操作及战术技能.

Key.Original:
%1 - Select all units
F1 - F10 - select single unit
F11 / F12 - list command bar
Key.English:
%1: 选择所有单位
'F1'-'F10': 选择单个单位
'F11'/'F12': 指挥栏翻页

Key.Original:
%1 - open menu
Heal - give order (cursor have to be on wounded soldier)

F1 - F10 - select unit
F11 / F12 - list command bar (in case you lead more than 10 units)
Key.English:
'F1'-'F10': 选择单位
'F11'/'F12': 指挥栏翻页(当你指挥的单位超过10个时)

Key.Original:
%1 - open menu
%2 - give order
<t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> - give order (cursor have to be on ground)
Key.English: <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>: 下达命令(将指示光标对着地面)

Key.Original:
%1 - open menu
%2 - give order

%1 - open menu
Select unit # only - select single unit

Key.English: <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'1'</t>: 打开"移动"菜单

Key.Original: Well done, you have mastered how to command your team.
Key.English: 做得好! 你学会了如何指挥你的部队.

Key.Original: Learn how to command subordinates in your team.
Key.English: 学习如何指挥你的部下.

Key.Original: Here you'll find a list of actions for the selected unit. These display the actions you would have in your Action Menu if you were that unit.
Key.English: 这里列出了被选中单位可以执行的动作.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 7 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'7'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 8 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'8'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original:
You can control unit's behavior from this menu. You can switch to Safe or Combat states and set a unit's combat stance.

Special combat modes are indicated in bar:
- Combat mode
- Stealth mode
Key.English:
你可以使用此菜单控制单位的表现行为. 你可以切换至"安全"或"战斗"状态来设置你部下的作战姿态.

特殊的行为模式会标明在指挥栏中:
- 战斗模式
- 隐蔽模式

Key.Original: The engage menu sets the combat behavior of the selected unit. You may prohibit fire, allow units to engage at will or have the unit control their surroundings.
Key.English: 交战菜单可用来设置被选中单位的作战行为. 你可以下令禁止射击, 准许自由开火或者警戒四周.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 4 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'4'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original:
You can control group formation from this menu.

Close the menu by pressing %2 and press 9 to open the next menu.
Key.English:
你可以在这个菜单中设置编队队形.

按%2关闭菜单, 按'9'切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 9 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'9'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original: This menu contains a list of all nearby vehicles the selected unit can board.
Key.English: 这个菜单中列出了选中的单位可以乘坐的所有附近的车辆.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 5 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'5'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original: The Move menu is used for more complex movement orders. You can set formation here, stop the unit or manage waypoints.
Key.English: 移动菜单可用来下达更复杂的移动命令. 你可以集合编队, 命令单位停止或者设置路径点.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press '2' for the next menu.
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'2'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original:
This menu contains a list of all currently available targets that can be assigned to selected units.

You can also display main menu containing all previous categories.
Key.English:
这个菜单中列出了选中的单位目前可以被分配的所有目标.

你也可以退到包含所有前一级项目的主菜单.

Key.Original: The Status menu is used to report your status. As leader you can also ask subordinates about their status via 'Report Status'.
Key.English: 在状态菜单中你可以报告你所处的状况. 作为领队, 你可以使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"报告状态"</t>命令询问你部下的状况.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 6 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'6'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original: This menu contains a list of all currently available targets that can be assigned to selected units.
Key.English: 这个菜单中列出了选中的单位目前可以被分配的所有目标.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 3 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'3'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original: All radio communication is found in this section.
Key.English: 这个部分包含了所有的无线电通讯语句.

Key.Original: Close the menu by pressing <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> and press 0 for the next menu
Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>关闭菜单, 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'0'</t>切换到下一菜单.

Key.Original: In order achieve the best possible control over your team you have Commander View at your disposal.
Key.English: 要尽可能地控制好你的部队, 你可以使用指挥官视角.

Key.Original:
Your soldiers are listed in the Command Bar on the bottom of the screen. You are also listed there, usually in the first slot.

Icon determines which special role soldier have:

No Icon - Rifleman
- Medic
- Squad Leader
- Team Leader
- Officer
- Special Forces
Key.English:
你的士兵都列在了屏幕下方的指挥栏中, 一般位于第一个栏位的是你自己.

附带的图标用于区分士兵的角色:

无图标 - 步枪手
- 医护兵
- 班长
- 组长
- 军官
- 特种兵

Key.Original:
Your soldiers are listed in the Command Bar on the bottom of the screen. You are also listed there, usually in the first slot.

Icon determines which special role soldier have:

No Icon - Rifleman
- Medic
- Squad Leader
- Team Leader
- Officer
- Special Forces
Key.English:
你的士兵都列在了屏幕下方的指挥栏中, 一般位于第一个栏位的是你自己.

附带的图标用于区分士兵的角色:

无图标 - 步枪手
- 医护兵
- 班长
- 组长
- 军官
- 特种兵

Key.Original: When route is set, return back to normal view.
Key.English: 路径设置完毕后, 回到普通视角.

Key.Original:
Some categories became available only when you select some units.

With any of complex command menus opened, you can select specific ones using F1-F10, or you can use %1 key.
Key.English:
有些项目只有在选中一些单位时才可用.

打开任意一页综合指挥菜单时, 你仍可以使用'F1'-'F10'选择特定的单位, 或者使用%1键.

Key.Original: You can also issue individual orders to your units. With Quick command menu open, click on a target (a point to move to, enemy, vehicle, etc.) as soon as the cursor changes. The cursor shape gives you a clue as to what order you'll issue.
Key.English: 你还可以向你的部下下达单一的命令. 打开快速指挥菜单, 对着一个目标(比如要前往的地点, 敌人, 车辆等等), 当指示光标变化后点击即可. 指示光标的形状表示着你将下达何种命令.

Key.Original: Select medic only and order him to heal wounded officer.
Key.English: 指向受伤的军官, 只选择医护兵并使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"治疗军官"</t>命令让医护兵去治疗他.

Key.Original: That's everything you need to know about team commanding. You may experiment a bit with your units and army vehicles around, or you can finish the tutorial by boarding the black SUV.
Key.English: 以上即是你需要掌握的有关分队指挥的所有知识. 现在你可以用你的部下和周围的军用车辆进行自由练习, 或者你可以进入黑色SUV以完成这部分教程.

Key.Original: Finish the tutorial by boarding black SUV.
Key.English: 进入黑色SUV以完成这部分教程.

Key.Original:
You can recognize different soldier roles in map:
- Soldier
- Machine-gunner
- Medic
- Anti-Tank / Anti-Air
- Team leader
- Officer
- Special Forces
Key.English:
你可以在地图上分辨不同的兵种:

- 士兵
- 机枪手
- 医护兵
- 反坦克/防空兵
- 组长
- 军官
- 特种兵

Key.Original:
Units in vehicle have their role displayed in command bar:
- Commander
- Driver
- Gunner
- Cargo
Key.English:
载具中单位的角色也显示在指挥栏里:
指挥官
驾驶员
炮手
乘员

Key.Original:
You can manually select/deselect specific units for commands. Keys F1 to F10 correspond to units on the Command Bar at the bottom of your screen.

Keys F11 and F12 are used to cycle through units if there are more than 10 in your group.

You cannot select yourself.
Key.English:
你可以手动选择, 取消选择特定的单位. 'F1'至'F10'分别对应着屏幕下方指挥栏中的单位.

你的部队包含10个以上单位时使用'F11'和'F12'来翻页.

你无法选择你自己.

Key.Original: Commanding on the map works just like commanding in normal view. When commanding menu is opened, you can zoom map with <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Ctrl+Mousewheel.</br>
Key.English: 地图上的指挥和普通视角下的指挥类似. 注意, 当指挥菜单打开时, 则要使用<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"Ctrl+鼠标滚轮"</t>来缩放地图.

Key.Original: Select all units and click on the map to issue a command. Commands are context sensitive to the cursor.
Key.English: 选择所有单位, 在 <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%2'</t> 命令加亮显示时点击地图某处.

Key.Original: If necessary, you may also command troops on the map.
Key.English: 必要时, 你还可以在地图上指挥部队.

Key.Original: The menu content changes depending on what you're aiming at.
Key.English: 菜单的内容会随着你指向的目标而改变.

Key.Original: Point at the ground and use the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t> command in the quick command menu to order your units to move!
Key.English: 对着地面使用快速指挥菜单中的<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t>来命令你的部下移动!

Key.Original: Use %1 to open the quick command menu!

The easiest way to command is via the Quick Command menu.

Press %1 to simply open the menu. It will be closed with issued command.

Hold %1 and menu will be closed once you release it.
Key.English:
下达命令最方便的方法是使用快速指挥菜单.

请按%1打开该菜单, 下达命令后这个菜单会自动关闭.

如果按住%1, 松开按键时菜单即会关闭.

Key.Original: If your teammates become separated on different tasks, you may order them to return to formation.
Key.English: 如果你的队员因不同的任务分配而分散了, 你可以命令他们返回编队.

Key.Original: Use the <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%2'</t> command to order your units to regroup!
Key.English: 使用<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%2'</t>来命令你的部下归队!

Key.Original: Apart from using F1-F10 keys, you can select single unit by clicking at it with Quick Command menu open.
Key.English: 除了使用F1-F10键之外, 你还可以打开快速指挥菜单, 对着单位点击来选中该单位.

Key.Original: Apart from Quick Commands you can also issue more specific orders from the Complex Command menu.
Key.English: 除了快速指挥之外, 你还可以通过综合指挥菜单下达更具体的命令.
按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'1'</t>打开移动菜单.

Key.Original:
Another icon determines what weapons soldier have:

No Icon - Rifle
- Machine-gunner
- Sniper
- Anti-Tank
- Anti-Air
- Unarmed
Key.English:
另一个图标表示士兵持有何种武器:

无图标 - 步枪手
- 机枪手
- 狙击手
- 反坦克兵
- 防空兵
- 无武装人员

Key.Original: Well done, you have learned how to call for supports!
Key.English: 做得好! 你学会了如何呼叫支援.

Key.Original:
Supports are called from the communication menu.

Use %1 to open quick command menu and there select 'Communication' to access the communication menu.
Key.English:
使用通讯菜单即可呼叫支援.

按%1打开快速指挥菜单,
选择"通讯"即可进入通讯菜单.

Key.Original: All supports are displayed in right part of the screen.
Key.English: 所有的支援都显示在屏幕右侧.

Key.Original: There are 5 types of supports available:

Now, you can test results of various supports.

To call for a support, first select the desired support and then click on a position, to place it.
Key.English:
现在你可以测试各种支援的效果.

要呼叫支援, 选择想要的支援后点击目标地点即可.

Key.Original: Note that it may take some time until the selected support arrives.
Key.English: 注意, 等待一段时间后呼叫的支援才会到达.

Key.Original: Give it a try and when your're done, exit the mission by boarding HMMWV.
Key.English: 请随意尝试各种支援. 训练完毕后进入悍马以完成这部分教程.

Key.Original: Find out how to utilize wide array of assistance and fire support.
Key.English: 学习如何呼叫各种援助与火力支援.

Key.Original: You have mastered the high command training.
Key.English: 你通过了高级指挥训练.

Key.Original: You screw it up! Don't worry, try it once more!
Key.English: 你搞砸了! 不要紧, 再试一次!
<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"鼠标左键"</t>: 选择分队

Key.Original: <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>RMB</t>- anywhere in map - deselect
Key.English: <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"鼠标右键"</t>: 点击地图任意一处即可取消选择

Key.Original: Hold <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>LMB</t> and drag - select multiple groups
Key.English: 按住<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"鼠标左键"</t>并拖动: 选择多个分队

Key.Original: <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t> - give order (cursor have to be on ground)
Key.English: <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>: 下达命令(指示光标必须指向地面)

Key.Original:
The shape and colour indicates group faction.

%1
BLUFOR (US, CZ, G)
%2
OPFOR (Takistani Army)
%3
Independents (Takistani Rebels)
%4
Civilians
Key.English:
形状和颜色用以区分不同的阵营.

%1
蓝方(美国, 捷克, 德国)
%2
红方(塔基斯坦陆军)
%3
中立(塔基斯坦反抗军)
%4
平民

Key.Original:
Lastly, there is a cluster of small icons above the unit symbol that represent the size of the group. The following numbers and names may vary with different unit types.

%1 Fireteam
%2 Section (> 4)
%3 Squad (> 12)
%4 Platoon (> 25)
%5 Company (> 60)
Key.English:
单位标志上方的小图标表示该分队的规模. 下列数字和名称可能因部队的类型而有所不同.

%1 火力组
%2 小分队 (> 4)
%3 班 (> 12)
%4 排 (> 25)
%5 连 (> 60)

Key.Original:
The icon in the middle of each frame indicates unit type e.g. infantry, armour, helicopters etc. A list of the most common symbols follows:

%4 Armor
%1 Infantry
%2 Motorized infantry
%3 Mechanized infantry (Infantry + Armor)
%5 Helicopters
%6 Airplanes
%7 Headquarters (HQ)
Key.English:
每个方框中间的图标表示其部队类型, 例图步兵, 装甲部队, 直升机等等. 常见的标志如下:

%4 装甲部队
%1 步兵
%2 摩托化步兵
%3 机械化步兵(步兵+装甲车辆)
%5 直升机
%6 固定翼飞机
%7 指挥部(HQ)

Key.Original: You can set the same type of orders for a Waypoint as you can for a group. The orders will be executed when the group reaches the Waypoint.
Key.English: 你可以像命令部队那样, 把命令指派给某个路径点. 当部队到达该路径点时就会自动收到这个命令.
选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t>来删除一个路径点.
在地图任意位置按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"鼠标右键"</t>以取消部队选择!

Key.Original: That's everything you need to know about High Command. You may experiment a bit with your groups, or you can finish the tutorial by boarding the APC.
Key.English: 以上就是你需要掌握的关于高级指挥的知识. 你可以和你的部队继续练习, 或者进入旁边的APC(装甲运兵车)以完成这部分教程.

Key.Original: Finish the tutorial by boarding the APC.
Key.English: 进入APC(装甲运兵车)以完成这部分教程.

Key.Original: The Command Bar has now switched to the High Command Bar, displaying units as NATO symbols. These tell you about the side, type and size of a group.
Key.English: 指挥栏现在已经切换为高级指挥栏, 以北约通用符号显示部队. 这种符号标识了阵营, 部队类型和规模.

Key.Original: Commanding in 1st person view is quick and convenient, yet the map screen provides a more comprehensive overview of the strategic situation.
Key.English: 以第一人称视角指挥固然快速而方便, 然而地图可以提供更为全面的战场形势总览.

Key.Original: It's also possible to open the Waypoint Properties menu and set specific parameters.
Key.English: 还可以打开路径点属性菜单设置更具体的内容.

Key.Original: Click the <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Sec. Mouse Btn.'</t> on a waypoint to open its properties!
Key.English: 在路径点上按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"鼠标右键"</t>打开其属性!

Key.Original: <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>RMB</t> with cursor on waypoint.
Key.English: 在路径点上按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"鼠标右键"</t>.

Key.Original: Click on the ground while command <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t> is highlighted to order the selected units to move!
Key.English: 选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t>命令并点击某处地面来命令被选单位移动!

Key.Original: Menu contents are context sensitive: it changes depending on where you're aiming, your groups and your status. You can select or deselect single groups to issue more specific orders.
Key.English: 菜单的内容会随着你指向的目标, 你所处的状况而改变. 你可以选择单个分队以下达更具体的命令.

Key.Original: Select some units and click on the ground while command <t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t> is highlighted to order the unit(s) to move!
Key.English: 选择某分队, 然后选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'%1'</t>命令并点击某处地面来命令其移动!

Key.Original: You can place several waypoints in a row by holding the <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Ctrl'</t> button.
Key.English: 你可以按住<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Ctrl'</t>来连续放置多个路径点.

Key.Original: Create at least three Waypoints in a row.
Hold <t color='#c7c7c7' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>Ctrl</t> when placing a Waypoint to add additional points.
Key.English: 放置路径点时按住<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Ctrl'</t>以添加另外的路径点.

Key.Original: You can also select multiple groups in the Map.
Key.English: 你还可以在地图上选择多个分队.

Key.Original: Hold <t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>'Prim. Mouse Btn.'</t> and drag the mouse to select 2 groups!
Key.English: 按住<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"鼠标左键"</t>并拖动鼠标, 选择2个分队!

Key.Original:
In addition to using the F keys or Quick Command Menu, you can select groups in the map by clicking on them.

When the Commanding Menu is opened, you can zoom map using the Ctrl+Mousewheel.
Key.English:
除了使用F1-F12和快速指挥菜单之外, 你还可以在地图上点选分队.

当指挥菜单打开时, 你可以用"Ctrl+鼠标滚轮"来缩放地图.

Key.Original: The Command Bar at the bottom of the screen is for commanding units within your group.
Key.English: 屏幕下方的指挥栏用以显示你所指挥的部队.

Key.Original:
You can manually select/deselect specific groups for commands. Keys F1 to F10 correspond to units on the Command Bar at the bottom of your screen.

Keys F11 and F12 are used to cycle through groups if there are more than 10 groups under your command.
Key.English:
你可以手动选择/取消选择特定的单位, 'F1'至'F10'键对应着屏幕下方指挥栏中的单位.
当你指挥的分队超过10个时, 'F11'和'F12'用于指挥栏的翻页.

Key.Original: Learn how to command whole units in a large-scale operation.
Key.English: 学习如何在大规模行动中指挥部队.

Key.Original: The easiest way to issue commands is via the Quick Command Menu.
Key.English: 下达命令的最简单方法是使用快速指挥菜单.

Key.Original: Use %1 to quickly open the menu. It will be closed after a command is issued.
Key.English: 按%1打开菜单. 命令下达后菜单会自动关闭.

Key.Original: Hold the key and menu will be closed once you release it.
Key.English: 按住按键, 松开后菜单即会关闭.

Key.Original: You have mastered how to build a base and its defences.
Key.English: 你学会了如何建造基地和相关设施.

Key.Original: You screw it up! Just try it once more.
Key.English: 你搞砸了! 再试一次.

Key.Original:
%1: forward
%2: backward
%3: left
%4: right
%5: up
%6: down
Key.English:
%1: 前进
%2: 后退
%3: 左移
%4: 右移
%5: 上升
%6: 下降

Key.Original:
Test camera controls.
Grey wall limits your camera movement.
Key.English:
测试视角控制.
你的镜头只能在灰色墙壁范围内移动.

Key.Original: You can see a bulding category list in a menu to the left.
Key.English: 你可以在左侧看到一个建筑列表.
选择<t color='#66ab47' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>"基地"</t>!

Key.Original: The structure is ready; now, you'll learn how to repair it if it becomes damaged.
Key.English: 建筑准备完毕. 现在你需要学习如何在它受损时修理它.

Key.Original: This is all you need to know to build a base. You may continue building the base, or you can finish the tutorial.
Key.English: 以上就是你需要掌握的建造基地的知识. 你可以继续建造, 或者结束教程.

Key.Original: To end the tutorial, board the HMMWV!
Key.English: 进入悍马以完成这部分教程!

Key.Original:
This is a list of buildings. Each building has a description and price.

An item is greyed out when you do not have enough money. The amount of money available to you can be seen in the bottom left corner.
Key.English:
这是建筑列表. 每个建筑都有相应的描述和价格.

资金不足以建造的会显示为灰色. 可用的资金数量显示在左下角.

Key.Original:
Now you see a building preview; its color shows you whether it can be built:

Green - valid placement
Red - invalid placement
Grey - not possible to build (outside base area)
Key.English:
现在你可以看到建筑的预览. 它的颜色表示其是否能被建造:

绿色 - 可以建造
红色 - 不可建造
灰色 - 不可能建造(在基地范围之外)

Key.Original:
You can rotate the building preview by holding 'Ctrl' while moving your mouse.
Hold 'Alt' to rotate the building in predefined angles.
Key.English:
你可以按住'Ctrl'并移动鼠标来旋转将要放置的建筑.
同时按住'Alt'时可以将建筑旋转特定的角度.

Key.Original:
Repairing structures is important when your base is under enemy attack.

To repair the building, hover the cursor over it to reveal its description and status. Then press the assigned key.
Key.English:
当基地遭受敌方攻击时修理建筑物很重要.

要修理建筑物, 把指示光标移动到建筑上, 下方显示该建筑的描述时按下指定的键.

Key.Original: Selling buidings is useful way to recoup resources or free up limited space in a base.
Key.English: 卖出建筑可以收回资源并腾出空间.

Key.Original: Hover the cursor over the building and use %1.
Key.English: 把指示光标移到建筑上并按%1.

Key.Original: Find out how to build fortifications and military structures.
Key.English: 学习如何建造工事和军用设施.

Key.Original:
%1: increase alt.
%2: decrease alt.
%3: zoom in camera
%4: zoom out camera
Key.English:
%1: 增大高度
%2: 减小高度
%3: 放大图像
%4: 缩小图像

Key.Original:
Accessing action menu:
%4%1
%4%2
%4%3
%5: execute selected action
Key.English:
打开动作菜单:
%4%1
%4%2
%4%3
%5: 执行选择的动作

Key.Original:
%1: set waypoint
Ctrl + %1 - add waypoint
Key.English:
%1: 设置路径点
'Ctrl'+%1: 添加路径点

Key.Original:
%1: fire missile from Apache
%2: camera zoom in
%3: camera zoom out
Key.English:
%1: 从阿帕奇发射导弹
%2: 摄像头放大
%3: 摄像头缩小

Key.Original: Well done! You have mastered the spy drones.
Key.English: 做得好! 你学会了如何操控无人机.

Key.Original: You screw it up! Don't worry, try it once more.
Key.English: 你搞砸了! 不要紧, 再试一次!

Key.Original:
%1: forward
%2: backward
%3: left
%4: right
%5: up
%6: down
Key.English:
%1: 打开菜单
%2: 上
%3: 下
%5: 选择

Key.Original: You have selected Unmanned Little Bird (ULB) training.
Key.English: 你选择进行无人小鸟(ULB)训练.
按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>开始训练!
无人小鸟 - AH-6X: 概述

Key.Original:
The ULB is designed to support an Apache helicopter in situations where direct contact would be too dangerous for the Apache crew.

The ULB's main purpose is to infiltrate enemy territory and mark targets for the Apache's hellfire missiles.
Key.English:
无人小鸟被设计用来协助阿帕奇直升机, 用于直接暴露会危及阿帕奇机组的情形.

无人小鸟的主要任务是渗入敌占区并为阿帕奇的地狱火导弹指示目标.

Key.Original: Activate the ULB view via the action menu.
Key.English: 从动作菜单打开无人小鸟视角.

Key.Original: The camera of the UAV drone is controlled by the mouse.
Key.English: 无人机的摄像头由鼠标控制.

Key.Original: The camera of the ULB vehicle is controlled by the mouse.
Key.English: 无人小鸟的摄像头由鼠标控制.

Key.Original:
%1: yaw left
%2: yaw right
%3: increase alt.
%4: decrease alt.
%5: camera zoom in
%6: out camera zoom
Key.English:
%1: 左偏
%2: 右偏
%3: 升高
%4: 降低
%5: 摄像头放大
%6: 摄像头缩小

Key.Original: Close the map to return back to UAV view!
Key.English: 关闭地图以退回无人机视角!

Key.Original: When a route is set, return back to ULB camera.
Key.English: 航线设置完毕后, 退回无人小鸟视角.

Key.Original: You can leave the UAV view using %1.
Key.English: 你可以用%1退出无人机视角.

Key.Original: You can leave the ULB view by using %1.
Key.English: 你可以用%1退出无人小鸟视角.
所有目标都被成功摧毁!

Key.Original: Once a target is aquired, use

to fire a hellfire missile from the Apache.

Keep aiming at the target with the laser marker until it's destroyed.
Key.English:
从阿帕奇上发射一枚地狱火导弹.

保持激光指示器瞄准目标直至目标被摧毁.

Key.Original: Your AH-6X is equipped with a laser designator, which is used to guide the hellfire missiles fired by the Apache.
Key.English: 你的AH-6X上装备了一个激光指示器, 用来引导阿帕奇发射的地狱火导弹.

Key.Original:
Now, let's take a look at UAV movement.

You can't control UAV directly, but you can set its waypoints via the map.
Key.English:
现在让我们看一下无人机的移动.

你不能直接驾驶无人机, 但你可以用地图为其设置路径点.

Key.Original:
Now, let's take a look at ULB movement.

You can't control your ULB directly, but you can set its waypoints in the map.
Key.English:
现在让我们看一下无人小鸟的移动.

你不能直接驾驶你的无人小鸟, 但你可以在地图上为其设置路径点.

Key.Original: To remember a specific spot on the ground, you can use %1 to mark its position in the map.
Key.English: 若要记下地面上某个特定地点, 你可以用%1将它的位置标记在地图上.

Key.Original: You have selected the Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) training.

Key.English: 按<t color='#fed886' shadow='1' shadowColor='#312100'>%1</t>开始训练!

Key.Original: You have completed the UAV part of this tutorial!
Key.English: 你完成了此教程的无人机部分!

Key.Original: You have completed the ULB part of this tutorial!
Key.English: 你完成了此教程的无人小鸟部分!

Key.Original:
At the bottom of the ULB interface there are:

AGM-114 - Current weapon
AMMO - Ammo count

The graphic elements around the center mean:
- Direction to Apache
- Recognized target
Key.English:
无人小鸟界面的底部是:

AGM-114 - 目前使用的武器
AMMO - 弹药数量

画面中的图形标志表示:
- 阿帕奇所在的方向
- 被识别的目标

Key.Original:
To operate the ULB correctly, you need to get familliar with its interface.

The left column of the ULB interface consists of the following indicators:

AH-64D - helicopter type
ACC - hellfire missile accuracy
DST - target to Apache distance
MIS - missile on the way
Key.English:
要正确操作无人小鸟, 你需要熟悉它的界面.

界面左边列出的是:

AH-64D - 直升机型号
ACC - 地狱火导弹精度
DST - 目标到阿帕奇的距离
MIS - 导弹在途中

Key.Original:
The right column consists of the following indicators:

AH-6X - ULB type
TGT - Target is recognized
LSR - Laser is active
DST - Target to ULB distance
Key.English:
界面右边列出的是:

AH-6X - 无人小鸟型号
TGT - 目标已被识别
LSR - 激光已打开
DST - 目标到无人小鸟的距离

Key.Original:
You have successfully completed both parts of this tutorial.

You may finish the mission by boarding the HMMWV behind you, or you can repeat any part of this tutorial again.
Key.English:
你已成功完成此教程的两部分训练.

进入后面的悍马以完成此教程, 或者你也可以重做教程的任一部分.

Key.Original:
There are two different UAV systems available for training.

You need to finish both to complete the mission.

Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV)
- plane used for scouting operations and attack missions.

Unmanned Little Bird (ULB)
- helicopter works as a support for an Apache helicopter, targeting enemy units for longe range attacks.
Key.English:
此项训练包含两种无人机系统.

全部完成后才能通过训练.

无人机(UAV)
- 用于侦察行动和攻击任务的无人飞机.

无人小鸟(ULB)
- 用于协助阿帕奇直升机, 为远距离攻击指示目标的无人直升机.

Key.Original: Select one of the two systems by walking to it.
Key.English: 走向两种系统之一来选择它.

Key.Original: The vehicle is remotely controled from a UAV terminal. In this case, it's the HMMWV car.
Key.English: 无人机需要由无人机终端设备遥控. 此教程中, 遥控终端就是这辆悍马.

Key.Original: Move to the HMMWV and activate the UAV view from the action menu.
Key.English: 移动至悍马车, 然后从动作菜单打开无人机视角.

Key.Original: The MQ-9 Reaper is a reconnaissance UAV. The device is designed to search and reveal enemy positions from high altitudes.
Key.English: MQ-9"死神"无人机被设计用于从高空搜索, 侦察敌军.

Key.Original:
The missile is now heading towards the laser point.

Keep the laser on the target!
Key.English:
现在导弹正在飞向激光点.

将激光点保持在目标上!

Key.Original: The UAV camera has 2 different view modes:
Key.English: 无人机的摄像头有两种观察模式:

Key.Original: The ULB camera has 2 differen view modes:
Key.English: 无人小鸟的摄像头有两种观察模式:

Key.Original: Here in the map, you can plan a route for your UAV.
Key.English: 你可以在地图上为你的无人机规划航线.

Key.Original: Click in the map to set a waypoint!
Key.English: 在地图上点击以放置路径点!

Key.Original: Here in the map, you can plan a route for your ULB.
Key.English: 你可以在地图上为你的无人小鸟规划航线.

Key.Original: Click in the map to set a waypoint!
Key.English: 在地图上点击以放置路径点!

Key.Original: Master the controls of unmanned aerial vehicles.
Key.English: 学习无人机的操作控制.

Container.name: Assassination_failed
Container.situation: the assassination spot reached by the conspirators

Key.Original: The guy in the center, he's the target!
Key.English: 中间那个家伙, 他就是目标!
嘿, 有些不对劲! 他们好像发现了!

Key.Original: Okay, get ready, I've got the target in my sights.
Key.English: 好了, 做好准备, 目标已经出现在我的视野中.

Key.Original: Steady… steady… shit, which one is it?
Key.English: 稳住...稳住...该死, 是哪一个?
妈的, 我打偏了! 行动中止!

Key.Original: Let's get outta here! Move out, guys!
Key.English: 赶快离开这里! 伙计们, 快撤!

Key.Original: Did you see that? Poor s.o.b...
Key.English: 看到那个了吗? 可怜的倒霉蛋...

Key.Original: I'll do the shooting. Paul, you stay on the street and overwatch.
Key.English: 我来狙击. Paul, 你在街上观察掩护.

Key.Original: Good, let's go and finish it.
Key.English: 好了, 让我们结束这一切.

Key.Original: No rush, Sayid, hang a left here...
Key.English: 不要急, Sa'ed, 向左离开这里...

Key.Original: Yeah... I don't like the look of this.
Key.English: 好的...我不喜欢看到前面这些家伙.

Key.Original: Did you hear that? Sounds like the Taki's really mean it...
Key.English: 你听到那个了吗? 听上去这塔基斯坦佬说的像是真的...

Key.Original: C'mon, they don't stand a chance.
Key.English: 拜托, 他们没有这机会了.

Key.Original: Citizens of Takistan don't need to worry about the American threats. Shall the foreign dogs attack our homeland, our army is strong enough to fend off the American threats and seize the integral part of our territory.
Key.English: 塔基斯坦的公民们, 请不要害怕那些美国佬的恐吓. 如果这些外国狗胆敢侵略我们的祖国, 我们强大的军队将会挡住他们的入侵并守住我们全部的领土.

Key.Original: You heard official statement of Hamed Dzhbandasnee, Chief of Staff of the Ministry of Defence. Now for some traditional patriotic tune...
Key.English: 您刚才听到的是国防部总参谋长Hamed Dzhbandasnee的声明. 现在播放一些爱国歌曲...

Key.Original: Short news: All law-abiding citizens should report all defeatist, counter-state or suspicious behaviour to any military commander or militia patrol.
Key.English: 插播消息: 全体守法的公民们, 请主动将那些失败者, 叛国者和可疑人士报告给军事指挥官和巡逻队.

Key.Original: Republican Militia reservists of Southern and Coastal Districts are to report in their local headquarters.
Key.English: 南部及沿海地区的共和国民兵及预备役人员请速到当地指挥部报到.

Key.Original: RADIO: ...Special Military Police unit executed several traitors of the Republic, including three Karzeghi village chieftains in the Rasman region...
Key.English: 收音机: ...特别宪兵部队已经处决了几个共和国的叛徒, 包括三个热斯曼地区的卡热格酋长...

Key.Original: Gambler, I don't like this... Seems like the whole army's out on the street.
Key.English: "赌徒", 我不喜欢这样...看上去他们整个军队都跑到大街上来了.

Key.Original: Good for us: Aziz has left his safe haven; now, we've gotta chance take him down.
Key.English: 这样对我们更好: 这说明Aziz已经离开了他的避难所, 现在我们必须找机会干掉他.

Key.Original: We're not gonna get a better opportunity, and we're running outta time...
Key.English: 我们找不到比这更好的时机, 我们的时间已经不多了...

Key.Original: One good shot, and the Taki missile arty will be in total disarray.
Key.English: 只要漂亮一击, 塔基斯坦的导弹部队就会作鸟兽散.

Key.Original: Yes, good morning. We're seeing a significant military presence on the streets of Takmyr; the Republican Militia is being issued heavy weapons and assigned to anti-air defence positions. This increased activity stems from the expiration of the Alliance ultimatum four hours ago, which had stipulatied the total withdrawal of Takistani forces operating in Karzeghistan's border region, and which has passed with no response.
Key.English: 哦, 是的, 早上好. 我们现在注意到在塔科米尔(Takmyr)的街道上有大量的军事活动, 共和国民兵正在发放重型武器并进入防空阵地. 这些战备行动在联军发出最后通牒的前四个小时就展开了, 此前联合国安理会有关决议要求塔基斯坦军队必须撤回在卡热格斯坦(Karzeghistan)边境部署的军队, 但却迟迟得不到塔基斯坦方面的回应.

Key.Original: Takistan had demanded control of the oil-rich border area two weeks ago, prompting heightened tensions and alerting world leading powers to a potential flashpoint in the Green Sea Region.
Key.English: 塔基斯坦在两周前要求获得对盛产石油的边境争议地区的控制权, 这使得绿海这个大国角力的热点地区的局势骤然紧张.

Key.Original: Allied forces have just entered Takistani territory with an objective to overthrow the Takistani junta. The American 1st Armored Division just crossed the Takistani border from Karzeghistan; the 27th and 9th Marine Expeditionary Units are moving to seize the key ports of Takmyr and Bandar-e-Ghazmi. Government and military installations in Takmyr and Karichar have been targetted by joint US and British airstrikes.
Key.English: 联军刚刚进入了塔基斯坦领土, 其目标是推翻塔基斯坦政权. 美国陆军第1装甲师刚才已经从卡热格斯坦方向跨越了塔基斯坦边境, 第27和第9海军陆战队先遣部队正分别进攻并夺取塔科米尔和班达尔-卡兹米(Bandar-e-Ghazmi)这两个重要港口. 而美国和英国空军则对塔科米尔和卡瑞察(Karichar)的政府和军事设施进行空中打击.

Key.Original: Colonel Muhammad Rahim Aziz - hero of the 1988 coup d'état - has threatened to respond to American agression with decisive force, deploying the tactical ballistic missiles under his command against allied formations in Karzeghistan and the Alliance fleet amassed in the Green Sea.
Key.English: 1988年政变的"英雄" - Muhammad Rahim Aziz上校声称将以坚定而果断的武力对抗美国的"侵略", 同时他命令部署战术弹道导弹反击卡瑞察的联军部队以及在绿海集结的联军舰队.

Key.Original: Latest reports indicate that American special forces have commenced operations in deep within Takistani borders... This is Joe Harris, AAN, speaking from Takmyr, capital of Takistan.
Key.English: 最新报道称美国特种部队已经深入塔基斯坦境内... 这里是AAN电视台的Joe Harris, 从塔基斯坦首都塔科米尔发回的报道.

Key.Original: ...and I think we can go live to Takistan now with our front line reporter, Joe Harris. Joe, what's the situation on the ground?
Key.English: ...现在可以现场连线我们在塔基斯坦(Takistan)的前方记者Joe Harris. Joe, 当前的局势怎样?

Key.Original: UN Security Council authorize Allied counterattack in Takistan this morning.
Key.English: 今天早晨联合国安理会批准了联军对塔基斯坦的反击行动.

Key.Original: Takistani forces in state of readiness; armored units cross border of Karzeghistan.
Key.English: 塔基斯坦军队进入战备状态, 其装甲部队已经越过卡热格斯坦边境.

Key.Original: US Army Task Force Knight deployed to forward base established by Marine Task Force Bishop.
Key.English: 海军陆战队特遣部队高层证实美国陆军"骑士"特遣部队已部署到前进基地.

Key.Original: Ardistan report first refugees fleeing warzone; Chernarussian President Baranov promises humanitarian aid.
Key.English: 阿迪斯坦(Ardistan)报告第一批难民已经逃离战争地带, 黑俄罗斯(Chernarussian)总统Baranov承诺将提供人道主义援助.

Key.Original: British SAS troops seize port authority building of Bandar-e Ghazmi; harbour area secured by Royal Marines.
Key.English: 英国SAS特种部队占领了班达尔-卡兹米的港务局大楼, 港口地区已经被皇家海军陆战队夺取.

Key.Original: US President McKain authorizes surgical bombing against military targets in Takistan.
Key.English: 美国总统McKain批准对塔基斯坦军事目标进行外科手术式打击.

Key.Original: British RN Harriers sink Takistani light cruiser „Pride of Chalang" in Salak Darya delta.
Key.English: 英国皇家海军"鹞"式战斗机在沙拉克达雅三角洲地区击沉了塔基斯坦"察兰之耀"号轻型巡洋舰.

Key.Original: Scud missile strikes reported in Mazargan suburbs, Karzeghistan. Czech NBC specialist dismisses reports of chemical warheads.
Key.English: 有报道称卡热格斯坦的玛拉甘(Mazargan)郊区遭到了飞毛腿导弹的袭击, 捷克国家广播电视台专家否认了有关导弹搭载了生化弹头的报道.

Key.Original: US amphibious assault ship „USS Khe Sanh" sustains light damage from Takistani gunboat.
Key.English: 美国海军"溪山"号两栖攻击舰遭到塔基斯坦炮艇攻击, 轻微损伤.

Key.Original: USMC announces purchase of the latest generation of cutting-edge simulation software from Bohemia Interactive.
Key.English: 美国海军陆战队宣布将购买波西米亚互动研发的最新一代尖端军事模拟软件.

Key.Original: You will start at the <marker name "mrkVillage">village</marker> where our allied Sa'ed will take you to the <marker name="mrkZargabad">Zargabad city</marker>. Your taks is to kill Colonel Muhammad Rahim Aziz. This Aziz will be leaving from the palace at xx:xx. Sa'ed will show you the proper position and provide you a weapons. Listen to him careffully, he knows the city very well. You will start in civilian wear.
Key.English: 你们将从<marker name "mrkVillage">村庄</marker>出发, 我们的盟友Sa'ed将会把你送到<marker name="mrkZargabad">萨格巴德</marker>. 你们的任务是暗杀Muhammad Rahim Aziz上校. Aziz将会在xx:xx离开官邸. Sa'ed将会给你们指示合适的位置并提供武器, 请小心听从他的建议, 他对这个城市非常熟悉, 你们将利用贫民服装进行伪装.

Key.Original: Colonel Muhammad Rahim Aziz is leader of the executive of the Takistani Army. He continously terorize whole country. The regime uses this army to keep domination over the area.
Key.English: Muhammad Rahim Aziz上校是塔基斯坦军队的最高指挥官, 他对整个国家实施恐怖统治, 塔基斯坦政权利用这支军队控制整个地区.

Key.Original: Your mission is to terminate Col. Aziz in the <marker name="mrkZargabad">Zargabad city</marker>. Follow Sa'ed. After action, you will have to get out of the city as soon as possible. Use every accessible sources.
Key.English: 你们的任务是在<marker name="mrkZargabad">萨格巴德</marker>干掉Aziz上校, 跟好Sa'ed. 任务结束后, 你们要用尽一切办法尽快离开这座城市.

Key.Original: You will be picked up by our alied Sa'em guy. He was dormant agent in Takistan and now he is already in service. Sa'ed will take your Delta team to the Zargabad city and will show you the proper places. Also he will provide you a weapons. Before the execution he will disjoin from you and everything is up to you and your team.
Key.English: 你们将与我们的盟友Sa'ed接头, 他是潜伏在塔基斯坦的现役特工. Sa'ed将会把你们Delta小队带到萨格巴德市并且告诉你们合适的位置, 同时他会提供给你们武器. 在此之前他不会在你的队伍中, 任何事情都由你和你的小队决定.

Key.Original: Your support is your team only.
Key.English: 你的小队是你唯一的支援.

Key.Original:
Strike on Takistan
US Army offensive has just started.
Key.English:
塔基斯坦战斗已打响
美军不久前刚刚展开攻势.

Key.Original:
Voice of
JOE HARRIS
Takmyr, Takistan
Key.English:
现场连线
JOE HARRIS
位于塔基斯坦的塔科米尔

Key.Original:
COL. MUHAMAD R. AZIZ
Commander of Central military district
Army of Takistan
Key.English:
MUHAMAD R. AZIZ上校
中央军区指挥官
塔基斯坦军队

Key.Original: Col. Aziz's assassination failed. He managed to escape. We do not have time nor resources to attempt another kill before the invasion.
Key.English: 针对Aziz上校的暗杀行动失败, 他正设法逃跑. 我们没有更多的时间和精力在进攻前组织另一次暗杀行动.

Key.Original: You were not able to complete the operation order. The mission failed.
Key.English: 你未能完成作战命令, 任务失败.
正在初始化任务: 背刺...
正在初始化AAN电视台, 请稍等...

Key.Original: Special Forces attempt to kill enemy commander.
Key.English: 特种部队试图暗杀敌方指挥官.

Key.Original: Special Forces attempt to take out the enemy commander before the invasion.
Key.English: 特种部队试图在进攻之前除掉敌方指挥官.
长官, 目标已全部清除!

Key.Original: Hitman 1, this is Citizen. Go ahead, over.
Key.English: "杀手1号", 这里是"公民". 可以前进, 完毕.

Key.Original: Copy that, good work Hitman. Move on. Out!
Key.English: 收到, 干得漂亮"杀手1号". 继续前进, 完毕!
"杀手1号"呼叫"公民", 请报告情况, 完毕.

Key.Original: Hitman 1 reporting airport clear! Proceeding to next objective, over.
Key.English: "杀手1号"报告, 机场已经清理干净! 正在前往下一个目标, 完毕.

Key.Original: All right, we gotta move half a click east and secure Loy Manara and Jaza. Check nearby vehicles, we could use some transport...
Key.English: 很好, 我们必须向东边走大约半公里然后夺取洛伊玛纳拉和加萨. 检查附近的车辆, 我们可以使用一些运输工具...

Key.Original: Fuck, Stallion 4 bought it! Stay on course, everyone, we're close!
Key.English: 该死, 我们失去了"种马4号"! 大家坚持住, 我们离目标已经很近了!

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, move to point Echo. We were going too slow and got some pounding, need to regroup. Be advised, we have incoming hostile armor approaching from the north. Good luck everybody, out.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫全部单位, 全部前往Echo位置, 我速度太慢并且遭到了重创, 需要重新编队. 请注意, 敌方装甲部队已经从北部赶来支援他们. 祝所有人好运, 完毕.

Key.Original: Oh, I remember reading something in my Cultural Reference Handbook...
Key.English: 哦, 我记得在我的文化参考手册上读到一些东西...

Key.Original: Okay, but don't let them get in front of our guns.
Key.English: 好的, 但是不要让他们站在我们的枪口前面.
不要再杀死更多的塔基斯坦人了!

Key.Original: Hello, American. You are welcome. You help us fight Aziz?
Key.English: 你好, 美国人, 欢迎你们的到来. 你们来帮助我们与Aziz作战?

Key.Original: Yes, we are Karzhegi. Government oppressing our people. Aziz killer. I am Khaled, the warlord of Loy Manara.
Key.English: 是的, 我们是卡热格斯坦人. 政府压迫我们的人民, Aziz是个刽子手. 我叫Khaled, 是洛伊玛纳拉的军阀.

Key.Original: American, my men want fight Aziz with you.
Key.English: 美国人, 我的人想要同你们一道与Aziz作战.
好的, 祝你们走运, 美国人.

Container.name: insertion_atmosphere
Container.situation: hitman is being inserted

Key.Original: Hitman 1 touchdown! Get out, people, go, go, go!
Key.English: "杀手1号"已着陆! 全部下来, 弟兄们, 快, 快, 快!

Key.Original: Hitman 2 on the ground, securing perimeter!
Key.English: "杀手2号"已着陆, 正在建立防御圈!

Key.Original: Hitman 3 on the ground, we got enemy contacts. Opening fire, over!
Key.English: "杀手3号"已着陆, 我们已接敌. 交火中, 完毕!

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Stallion Lead, be advised, all Hitman squads inserted, Stallion moving out. Good luck!
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"种马"指挥官, 请注意, 全部"杀手"小队已进入战区, "种马"开始撤出. 祝你们好运!

Key.Original: Hitman 1, Citizen. We need you to secure the villages of Jaza and Loy Manara, do you copy?
Key.English: "公民"呼叫"杀手1号", 我们需要你们立即夺取加萨和洛伊玛纳拉两个村庄, 是否收到请回答?

Key.Original: Hitman 1, avoid any collateral damage, we don't need any dead civilians here, do you copy? Over.
Key.English: "杀手1号", 请避免造成附加伤害, 我们不希望有任何平民受到伤害, 是否收到请回答? 完毕.
报告"公民", 已收到指示, 完毕.

Key.Original: Hitman copies, ROE in effect. Out.
Key.English: "杀手"收到, 将遵守交战守则, 完毕.

Key.Original: All right, we're moving east. Anyone who kills a civvie is fucked!
Key.English: 好了, 我们向东移动, 谁要是敢伤到平民的话小心军法处置!

Key.Original: Right, don't worry. It's gonna be a piece of cake.
Key.English: 嘿, 不用担心, 这些都是小菜一碟.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, commencing Operation Arrowhead. Codename Juleen, I say again, Juleen in effect. Good luck everyone, Citizen out.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫所有单位, "箭头行动"正式展开. 行动代号: Juleen, 我再重复一遍, Juleen已经生效. 祝大家好运, "公民"呼叫完毕.

Key.Original: Well, guys, it looks pretty hot down there. Looks like we've thrown a lot of shit at them already. Just take care of yourselves.
Key.English: 好吧, 伙计们, 貌似下边有点棘手, 看上去我们先前已经往他们头上扔了很多狗屎了. 都注意照顾好自己.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, we've achieved the mission objectives in time. Everyone regroup at the airport, we move forward at 1000 Zulu.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫全部单位, 我们已经按时完成了任务目标. 所有人在机场集结整编, 我们接下来要在10点整前往Zulu位置.

Key.Original: You made me proud so far, but there's still work to do.
Key.English: 到目前为止你们让我很满意, 但是接下来仍然还有许多事情要做.

Key.Original: Sir, there are no more OPFOR around here. They're all dead or fleeing.
Key.English: 长官, 这周围已经没有敌方武装了, 他们除了被击毙的以外全都逃跑了.

Key.Original: Hitman 1, Citizen. Good copy, well done. Proceed to Jaza. How about the civvies? Over.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫"杀手1号", 通话很清晰, 干的漂亮, 请接下来夺取加萨. 平民们的情况如何? 完毕.

Key.Original: Hitman 1, I'm gonna kick your ass later. Regroup and proceed to the second objective, and no more dead civvies, you hear me? Out!
Key.English: "杀手1号", 事情完了以后我要踹烂你的屁股! 现在快点收拾一下前往下一个目标, 不要再给我造成任何平民伤亡了, 你听明白了吗? 完毕!

Key.Original: Good, stick to the rules of engagement—no dead civilians if possible.
Key.English: 很好, 请遵守交战守则, 尽可能的避免平民伤亡.

Key.Original: Good work, secure the perimeter, gotta report in to Citizen.
Key.English: 干得好, 建立防御圈, 现在我要向"公民"报告.

Key.Original: Citizen this is Hitman 1, the first village is ours. Over.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"杀手1号", 第一个村庄已经归咱们了, 完毕.

Key.Original: Uhh, they look pretty pissed off, guess we zapped some of them in the shooting, over.
Key.English: 啊哈, 他们看上去相当愤怒, 我猜我们可能在交火中干掉了他们一些人, 完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen, they just hold back and don't do shit. Probably waiting what's gonna come out of this, over.
Key.English: 呼叫"公民", 他们只是躲了起来并且没有做什么有威胁的事情, 可能他们正在等待这一切赶快结束, 完毕.

Key.Original: All on me, we're moving out. Remember ROE, no more dead civvies, fire at armed guys only. Let's move.
Key.English: 都注意, 我们要行动了. 务必牢牢记住交战守则, 不要造成更多的平民伤亡, 只对那些武装分子开火. 走吧.

Key.Original: Operation Arrowhead will start at 0700 with code Juleen, starting an airborne strike of TF (Task Force) Knight on Loy Manara <marker name="airfield">airport</marker> and an adjoined <marker name="hq">military base</marker> protecting it. This will allow our planes to establish supply routes and provide first bridgehead.
Key.English: "箭头行动"将会在早上7点整正式展开, 行动代号为: Juleen. "骑士"特遣部队将会从洛伊玛纳拉附近的<marker name="airfield">机场</marker>进入, 那里有一个<marker name="hq">敌方基地</marker>对其进行保卫. 夺取这里能够使我们的飞机建立补给线并对第一个前进基地进行补给.

Key.Original: The <marker name="airfield">airfield</marker> is defended by a <marker name="hq">military base</marker>. A small company sized heavy weapons infantry unit, technicals and armor is to be expected to defent the objective. Militia units may emerge from among civlians in nearby villages of <marker name="village1">Loy Manara</marker> and <marker name="village2">Jaza</marker>.
Key.English: 该<marker name="airfield">机场</marker>受到<marker name="hq">军事基地</marker>的保护. 一只由重装步兵, 技术装备和装甲单位组成的小规模部队将会对目标进行突击. 在附近的<marker name="village1">洛伊玛纳拉</marker>和<marker name="village2">加萨</marker>的平民中可能潜伏着民兵组织.

Key.Original: Your mission is to secure the <marker name="airfield">airfield</marker> and the <marker name="hq">base</marker>, neutralize all OPFOR units and avoid collateral damage. A defensive perimeter around the objective must be secured.
Key.English: 你们的任务是夺取<marker name="airfield">机场</marker>和<marker name="hq">敌方基地</marker>, 清除全部敌方单位并避免造成附加伤害. 同时要在目标区域周围建立稳固的防御圈.

Key.Original:
Start with code Juleen at 0700.
Secure the LZ (Landing Zone) perimeter and report after landing.Engage any contacts and move towards the base to gain control over the objective. Await further instructions as militia counterattack is higly likely.
Key.English:
在早上7点整开展行动, 代号Juleen.
在着陆区着陆后建立防御圈并进行汇报. 同任何抵抗力量交战并夺取敌方基地以便完全控制目标区域, 之后等待进一步命令. 另外, 当地民兵组织有可能会进行反击.

Key.Original: No support available for this mission, as the TF Knight did not establish a solid base yet.
Key.English: 因为"骑士"先遣部队还没有建立任何稳固的基地, 所以此次任务得不到任何其他支援.

Key.Original: The TF Knight managed to get the airport and its defensive perimeter under control. Hercules planes have already started shipping in gear and reinforcements.
Key.English: "骑士"先遣部队已夺取机场及其防御圈的控制权, "大力神"运输机已经开始空运作战装备和增援部队.

Key.Original: You were not able to complete the operation order. The mission failed.
Key.English: 你们未能完成行动命令, 任务失败.
塔基斯坦中部地区, 靠近洛伊玛纳拉...

Key.Original:
Remember, we're here to win the hearts and minds of the local Takistanis - do not harm them or damage their property.

You can check your standing with the locals in your notes, under 'Situation'.
Key.English:
请记住, 我们来到这里是为了赢得当地塔基斯坦人的民心和支持 - 不要伤害他们及他们的财产.

你可以在地图界面中的"当前形势"一栏中查看当地人对你的评价.
正在初始化任务: 早安塔基斯坦...

Key.Original: Secure the perimeter of your landing site in order to facilitate insertion of other squads. Gunships may help with overhead cover.
Key.English: 在着陆区建立防御圈以便协助其他分队的突击行动, 武装直升机将会提供空中掩护.

Key.Original: After infantry captures the airstrip, support their attack on the Jaza village.
Key.English: 在步兵夺取机场之后, 协助他们进攻加萨.

Key.Original: Protect incoming friendlies and destroy any target of opportunity.
Key.English: 保护全部友好势力并消灭任何其他的危险目标.

Key.Original: An entrenched ZU-23 was detected in the AO. It is not manned at the moment, but we do not want it to operate neutralize it.
Key.English: 在行动区域内发现一个固定的ZU-23, 虽然此刻似乎没有人操纵它, 但是我们不希望它在关键时刻动起来.

Key.Original: We have detected a field HQ. Move to its position and eliminate all radio operators and cepture the building. The command has concerns about incoming reinforcements that may be called and coordinated from this HQ.
Key.English: 我们发现了一个敌方野战指挥部, 前往其所在位置干掉所有无线电操作员并夺取建筑物, 我方指挥官担心这个指挥部可能会呼叫敌方支援力量.

Key.Original: There is some OPFOR resistance in the airfield control tower. They are resisting for quite long now, se we need you - the special forces to solve the issue.
Key.English: 在机场塔台有一些敌方的抵抗力量, 他们已经抵抗了相当长一段时间了, 所以我们需要你们这群特种部队来解决这个问题.

Key.Original: Move to a hill N of the airstrip and observe the road. No OPFOR may pass through towards the airstrip. Neutralize any approaching OPFOR vehicles. The command authorized you to use support in case of need.
Key.English: 移动到机场跑道北边的山上并监视公路, 阻止敌方从此通过并到达机场跑道, 消灭任何可能的敌方车辆, 指挥部授权你可以根据需要使用任何支援.

Key.Original: Proceed north to the airstrip and clean it from all OPFOR units. Cooperate with remaining M3 Bradleys if possible/necessary.
Key.English: 前进到机场北部并清除那里的全部敌方单位, 如果可能(或者有必要)可以和剩下的M3"布雷德利"步兵战车一起协同作战.

Key.Original: Travel to and destroy entrenchments near oil tanks. Try to avoid fighting in and around the <marker name='BIS_oilfield'>oil fields</marker>.
Key.English: 前往石油储存设施并摧毁那里的防卫工事, 请避免在<marker name='BIS_oilfield'>油田</marker>里面和周围进行战斗.

Key.Original: After infantry captures the airstrip, support their attack on the Loy Manara village.
Key.English: 在步兵占领了机场跑道之后, 支援他们进攻洛伊玛纳拉.
对敌方机场进行联合突击.

Key.Original: Latest intel claims Loy Manara village is held by OPFOR who probably fled there from the airstrip. Move there to seek and destroy OPFOR units. Avoid civilian casualties.
Key.English: 最新情报显示洛伊玛纳拉被一群从机场逃脱的敌方势力所控制, 前往那里搜索并消灭敌方单位, 同时避免造成平民伤亡.

Key.Original: The Jaza village E from the airstrip is held by OPFOR militia. Spotters claim they might be preparing for a counterattack. Eliminate them. No civilian casualties.
Key.English: 机场东边的加萨被敌方民兵控制着, 侦查员发现他们可能正在准备一次反击, 消灭他们, 同时避免造成平民伤亡.

Container.name: Advise_convoy_to_continue
Container.situation: tell convoy to continue over radio

Key.English: 车队, 继续向目的地前进.
好的, 让我们继续前进.

Container.name: Advise_convoy_to_stop
Container.situation: tell convoy to stop over radio

Container.name: Approaching_objective
Container.situation: thrilled briefng before attacking the mission objective

Key.Original: All right, ladies, approaching the objective.
Key.English: 好了, 女士们, 开始接近目标.

Key.Original: Let's clear the defenses in Naran Dare and move north. Those LOST guys might still be alive at the damn crash site.
Key.English: 让我们清理干净纳兰达尔的全部防御力量然后继续向北推进, 那些掉到坠落地点的伙计们可能还活着.

Key.Original: Well, I don't think they'd lie to us.
Key.English: 嗯, 我觉得他们应该不会欺骗我们.

Key.Original: Citizen copies. The coltan mine's where you're heading anyway. Citizen out.
Key.English: "公民"收到, 钶钽铁矿矿场就在你前进的路上. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen, I think we should definitely double-check it, over.
Key.English: "公民", 我认为我们必须仔细检查这些地方, 完毕.

Key.Original: You're right. Let's use the UAV. Gimme one mike. Out.
Key.English: 你是对的, 让我们使用无人机(UAV)进行侦查, 给我侦查结果, 完毕.

Key.Original: Cowboy 1, come out, we gotta talk to them face to face. Out.
Key.English: "牛仔1号", 下车, 我们必须和他们当面谈谈, 完毕.

Key.Original: Hey guys, thanks for help. Who are you?
Key.English: 嘿, 伙计们, 谢谢你们的帮助. 你们是什么人?

Key.Original: All right, well... we're here because of this plane. We thought maybe we could find some survivors. They were civilians… doctors.
Key.English: 原来是这样, 好吧...我们来到这里是因为这架飞机, 我们本以为我们可以找到一些幸存者. 他们是平民...一些医生.

Key.Original: Well, at least they survived. The Takis will wanna use 'em as hostages rather than kill 'em. I gotta report this.
Key.English: 好吧, 至少他们幸存了下来, 塔基斯坦人肯定会觉得用他们当人质好过直接干掉他们. 我必须把这些进行汇报.

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Badger, come in, over.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"狼獾", 收到请回答, 完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen, we've teamed up with Karzegh rebels to fight the Takistani specials guarding the wreck. No survivors at the crash site, but the rebels claim they saw the OPFOR taking survivors in trucks. Please advise, over.
Key.English: "公民", 我们同卡热格起义者一道与看守飞机残骸的塔基斯坦特种部队进行了战斗, 但在着陆点没有找到任何幸存者. 这些起义者声称看到敌人把幸存者压上卡车带走了, 请指示, 完毕.

Key.Original: No survivors at the crash site. Please advise, over.
Key.English: 在着陆点没有找到任何幸存者, 请指示, 完毕.

Key.Original: Badger, this is Citizen, go ahead, over.
Key.English: "狼獾", 这里是"公民", 请继续, 完毕.

Key.Original: Badger, do you think they can be trusted? Over?
Key.English: "狼獾", 你觉得他们是否可信? 完毕.

Key.Original: Shit! I knew we'd be late.
Key.English: 该死! 我就知道我们来晚了.
你好我的朋友! 欢迎你们!

Key.Original: We are Karzeghi warriors. Do not thank us. This government kills our people. It is our duty to kill them.
Key.English: 我们是卡热格勇士, 不用感谢我们, 这个该死的政府杀害了我们的同胞, 干掉他们是我们的使命.

Key.Original: Somebody tried to kill their commander two days ago. He framed us, militias came to kill us!
Key.English: 两天前有一些人试图干掉他们的指挥官但未能成功, 事后他(Aziz上校)却诬陷是我们干的, 所以那些民兵来到这里屠杀我们!

Key.Original: Yes, we know this. Soldiers take them to Feruz Abad, they had trucks. There is base near the mines. Coltan. Understand?
Key.English: 是的, 我们知道这个, 那些士兵把他们带到费罗斯艾巴德去了, 他们有卡车. 在矿场附近有个基地, 钶钽铁矿, 你们听说过那个吗?

Container.name: C130_Crashing
Container.situation: a c130 is hit by a rocket overhead and flies past the convoy behind a ridge

Key.Original: Mohican 5-1, Revolver. Keep cool, attempt an emergency landing. Rescue inbound.
Key.English: "左轮"呼叫"莫希干人5-1号", 保持冷静, 快想办法迫降, 我们马上展开救援行动.

Key.Original: Mayday, mayday. Mohican 5-1, SAM impact, I'm going down!
Key.English: 紧急情况, 紧急情况, 这里是"莫希干人5-1号", 我们被地空导弹击中了, 我们正在下坠!
该死, 他飞得太低了...

Key.Original: Naran Darre Pass is Militia-free, and the Crash Site has been secured. Although the survivors of the C-130 crash-landing have been taken captive by the Takistani Army, we at least know their likely whereabouts.
Key.English: "纳兰达尔"走廊的敌方民兵已被清除, 并且飞机坠落地点也被夺取. 虽然C-130在紧急迫降以后机上的幸存人员被塔基斯坦军队附录, 但是我们至少知道了他们可能的下落.

Key.Original: The APCs have been incapacitated and without them we lack the necessary supplies and equipment to secure the area beyond the Pass.
Key.English: 全部装甲车均失去了战斗能力, 没有他们我们就没有足够的支援和装备来夺取远处的走廊区域.

Key.Original: Colonel Kane has been Killed in Action.
You have disobeyed orders and abandoned the Convoy.
Key.English: 你违反了命令并抛弃了车队.

Key.Original: We have lost too much time. The Takistani forces have surely had enough time to dig in, making it almost impossible to effectively secure the area.
Key.English: 我们浪费了太多的时间, 塔基斯坦军队有了充足的时间进行推进, 这使得夺取这个区域已经完全不可能了.

Key.Original: Get back in your vehicle and keep moving!
Key.English: 回到你的载具上并继续前进!

Key.Original: You have strayed too far from one or more of the vehicles in the Convoy. Get back.
Key.English: 你们离车队太远了, 快回去.

Key.Original: You are still too far from one or more of the vehicles in the Convoy. Get back now!
Key.English: 你们依旧离车队太远了, 现在立刻回去!

Key.Original: The UAV Terminal is online and is available in one of the convoy's APCs.
Key.English: 无人机终端已经上线, 你可以在车队中的一辆装甲车上使用它.

Key.Original: It appears that the survivors of the downed C-130 have been taken captive by the Takistani Army. Command has ordered we immediately scan the area for their whereabouts. Your unit has been assigned this task. Intel reports that there are 3 possible locations where the captives could have been taken. Search the locations (<marker name='BIS_MrkPOWLoc_1'>1</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkPOWLoc_2'>2</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkPOWLoc_3'>3</marker>) from afar using an UAV for signs of the captives.
Key.English: 看上去坠毁的C-130上的幸存者已经被塔基斯坦军队俘虏了, 指挥部命令我们立即搜索他们可能被关押的区域. 情报显示俘虏可能被带到3个可能的位置, 搜索这些区域(<marker name='BIS_MrkPOWLoc_1'>1</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkPOWLoc_2'>2</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkPOWLoc_3'>3</marker>), 利用无人机从远处标记俘虏可能存在的位置.

Key.Original: Protect the <marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>US Convoy</marker> over <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre Pass</marker>, eliminating any enemy units posing a threat.
Key.English: 保护<marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>美军装甲车队</marker>通过<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>, 消灭所有构成威胁的敌方单位.

Key.Original: Get to and secure the <marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130 Crash Site</marker>. The earlier we get to the downed aircraft's personnel, the more likely they are to be alive.
Key.English: 抵达并夺取<marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130坠落地点</marker>. 我们越早的找到坠毁飞机中的人员, 他们存活的可能性就越大.

Key.Original: As part of the <marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>US Convoy</marker>, clear the Insurgent-controlled <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre Pass</marker> of enemy units. You have been assigned the task of eliminating any Insurgent strongpoints and static defenses present there in order to establish a foothold at the <marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>FOS Planck</marker>.
Key.English: 作为<marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>美军装甲车队</marker>任务的一部分, 便是清理由敌方控制的<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>. 你被安排清理沿途的敌方据点和固定防御工事, 以便建立<marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>"普朗克"前哨站</marker>, 以便作为我们的一个落脚点.

Key.Original: Intel reports that the Insurgents have several <marker name='BIS_MrkCheckpointPos_1'>Strongpoints</marker> set up along the route to <marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>Timurkalay</marker>. Neutralize these zones.
Key.English: 情报显示武装分子在通往<marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>缇穆尔喀拉依</marker>的道路沿途建立了一些<marker name='BIS_MrkCheckpointPos_1'>据点</marker>, 清理这些区域.

Key.Original: The local Takistanis have asked for help. They say <marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>Timurkalay</marker> will be raided by some militia hiding out in the <marker name='BIS_MrkOptObj_Hills'>hills</marker> to the northeast. Although this is optional, it would boost support for us if we helped the locals. The choice is yours.
Key.English: 当地的塔基斯坦人寻求帮助, 他们说<marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>缇穆尔喀拉依</marker>会被藏匿在东北方<marker name='BIS_MrkOptObj_Hills'>山里</marker>的游击队所攻击. 虽然这个请求是可以被拒绝的, 但是如果帮助他们则能够促进我们同本地人之间的关系以便获得援助. 选择权在你手中.

Key.Original: The personnel of the downed <marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130</marker> aircraft were not present at its crash site. They have most likely been taken captive by enemy forces. Find them.
Key.English: 在坠毁地点没有找到坠毁的<marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130</marker>运输机上的幸存者, 他们很可能已经被敌方军队俘虏了, 找到他们.

Key.Original: There is a Militia-controlled <marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_FarmPos'>Farm</marker> that is believed to be housing a Militia Leader of considerable stature. Secure the Farm and eliminate any enemy units posing a threat. Once the Farm is secure, troops will move in to take care of the rest.
Key.English: 这里有一个被民兵控制的<marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_FarmPos'>农场</marker>, 我们相信这里住着一个地位很高的民兵首领. 夺取这个农场并且消灭任何构成威胁的敌方单位. 一旦农场被夺取, 部队就可以进去照顾其他人.

Key.Original: Your team is to clear the Militia-controlled <marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_FortPos'>Fortification</marker> of enemy units. Engagement from long range is advised.
Key.English: 你的小队将去清除由民兵控制的<marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_FortPos'>防御工事</marker>中的全部敌方单位, 建议你尽可能的从远距离消灭他们.

Key.Original: The personnel of the downed <marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130</marker> aircraft were not present at its crash site. They have most likely been taken captive by enemy forces. Find them.
Key.English: 在坠毁地点没有找到坠毁的<marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130</marker>运输机上的幸存者, 他们很可能已经被敌方军队俘虏了, 找到他们.

Key.Original: You have been assigned the task of providing air support for the <marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>US Convoy</marker> over <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre Pass</marker>, eliminating any enemy units posing a threat to the convoy.
Key.English: 你的任务是为<marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>美军装甲车队</marker>提供空中支援, 以便使其通过<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>, 清楚所有对车队构成威胁的敌方单位.

Key.Original: The personnel of the downed <marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130</marker> aircraft were not present at its crash site. They have most likely been taken captive by enemy forces. Find them.
Key.English: 在坠毁地点没有找到坠毁的<marker name='BIS_MrkCrashSiteText'>C-130</marker>运输机上的幸存者, 他们很可能已经被敌方军队俘虏了, 找到他们.

Key.Original: Protect the <marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>US Convoy</marker> over <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre Pass</marker> to the designated <marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>FOS Planck</marker>.
Key.English: 保护<marker name='BIS_MrkConvoy'>美军装甲车队</marker>通过<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>抵达指定的<marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>"普朗克"前哨站</marker>.

Container.name: Civilians_help
Container.situation: here the player negotiates wit a village elder on protecting the village.

Key.Original: Good American, good soldier, go kill militia. Allahu akbar! Allahu akbar!
Key.English: 好美国人, 好士兵, 去干掉那些民兵. 真主至大! 真主至大!

Key.Original: I think we should try to win the hearts and minds, shouldn't we?
Key.English: 我想我们应该尝试赢得民心和支持, 不是吗?

Key.Original: No time for boogeymen, sir, we've got an MIA out there.
Key.English: 没有时间理会这些混蛋, 长官, 我们必须去拯救那些幸存者.
滚开, 你们这些脏东西!
不, 让我们继续前进.
求求你先生, 帮帮我们!

Key.Original: Me village problem! Militia come very bad, very bad. They weapons! Kill village! Go from north!
Key.English: 我村子有麻烦! 民兵来了, 很坏, 很坏. 他们有武器! 杀害村民! 从北边过来的! (Alex.XP语: 当地老乡英语说的不是很好...)

Key.Original: Militia go there, Imarat, Garmarud. Bad militia. Kill village. Weapons. Bad man militia.
Key.English: (塔基斯坦语)民兵到了艾姆拉特和格玛路德. 这些民兵有武器, 他们杀害村民. 一群坏蛋.

Key.Original: Sir, looks like the villagers want something.
Key.English: 长官, 看上去这些村民们想要告诉咱们些什么事情.

Key.Original: Sir, I think they fear some militiamen wanna kill them.
Key.English: 长官, 我认为他们是害怕那些民兵组织想要杀了他们.

Key.Original: Lieutenant, he's warning us from militia coming in from the north. My guess is the bad guys saw us and fled to the valley down there to regroup.
Key.English: 中尉, 他警告咱们民兵正从北方赶过来, 我猜那些坏蛋看到了咱们并且进入山谷以便重新集结.

Key.Original: Support group is still enroute, Badger. You're clear to hunt some bad guys, but don't forget your primary mission. Your call. Citizen out.
Key.English: 支援部队还在途中, 你可以去搜索并消灭这些家伙, 但是不要忘了你的主要任务. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Okay, anyone speak Takistani? Never mind, didn't think so.
Key.English: 好吧, 谁会说塔基斯坦语? 哦算了, 我看没人会.

Key.Original: Sure, old man, how can we help you?
Key.English: 好的, 老人. 我们有什么能够帮助你的?

Key.Original: Fine, we got a cultural advisor here. Go on, talk to him.
Key.English: 很好, 看来我们找到个文化顾问(Alex.XP语: 还是个日裔...). 来吧, 去和他们谈谈.

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Badger, we've gotten word that Timurkalay might be at risk of militia attack. Advise, over.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"狼獾", 我们得到情报表明缇穆尔喀拉依可能正处于地方民兵的攻击中, 请指示, 完毕.

Key.Original: Get ready, guys, the camp should be just over this ridge. I'll take you in close.
Key.English: 准备好, 伙计们, 越过这个山脊应该就到了那个营地, 我会把你们带到尽可能近的敌方.

Container.name: Delta_deploy
Container.situation: chopper at lz and delta are hopping out

Key.Original: This is it, good luck, Gambler. Give 'em hell!
Key.English: 就是它了, 祝你们好运, "赌徒". 让他们下地狱吧!

Container.name: Engine_Troubles
Container.situation: reached second checkpoint and a stryker gets engine troubles

Key.Original: Copy that, Badger. Do what you have to do but do it with some quickness. I want that Pass cleared! Citizen out.
Key.English: 收到, "狼獾". 请求已批准, 但是请快一点, 我需要尽快把那个走廊清理干净! "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Ahh crap.. Stand by, going to report in.
Key.English: 啊, 狗屎运...请待命, 我来报告.

Key.Original: Citizen, Badger here. We have a malfunction in one of the APCs. Saying again, we need to hold on for some time, and fix the problem. Acknowledge, over.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"狼獾". 我们的一辆装甲车发生了故障, 我再重复一遍, 我们需要在原地停留一会儿以便排除故障. 收到请回答, 完毕.

Key.Original: Shit, having some issues here. She's showing low fuel, but I filled 'er up just before we left!
Key.English: 该死, 这儿出了点状况. 她显示快没燃料了, 可是我明明在咱们出发前就喂饱她了!

Container.name: First_shots
Container.situation: players meet their first enemy.

Key.Original: Badger to Cowboy. We have some infantry ahead. They do not look like regulars, over.
Key.English: "狼獾"呼叫"牛仔", 我们前方有一些步兵, 他们看上去不像是正规军, 完毕.

Key.Original: Cowboy copies. It's got to be militia. Light them up!
Key.English: "牛仔"收到, 那他们肯定是民兵, 把他们干掉!

Container.name: Fort_Taken
Container.situation: delta force took fort and inform kane

Key.Original: Gambler 1 to Command, Fort is clear.
Key.English: "赌徒1号"呼叫指挥部, 要塞已被清理干净.
非常好"赌徒1号", 这样就解决了一个麻烦.

Key.Original: Shit! Enemy gunship inbound from the north, engage at will! Badger out.
Key.English: 该死! 敌方武装直升机从北面飞过来了, 准备战斗! "狼獾"通话完毕.

Container.name: Incoming_Mi24D
Container.situation: an incoming mi24 has been spotted at big ridge pass

Key.Original: Shit! Enemy gunship inbound from the north, engage at will! Badger out.
Key.English: 该死! 敌方武装直升机从北面飞过来了, 准备战斗! "狼獾"通话完毕.

Container.name: Intro_briefing
Container.situation: players get briefing on their assignment in the mission when a plane crashes suddenly not far from their positions

Key.Original: Mornin' Herrera! The first op was a snap, now we gotta continue pushing north.
Key.English: 早上好Herrera! 前一次任务完成的非常迅速, 现在我们必须继续向北推进.

Key.Original: Your assignment today is to recon the Naran Darre pass and take it by force if possible. You'll be at the vanguard of Malarky's recon element, callsign "Cowboy."
Key.English: 今天分配给你们的任务是侦查"纳兰达尔"走廊, 如果有可能的话最好能动用武力把它夺下来. 你们将担当Malarky的侦查部队的先锋, 他们的呼叫代号为"牛仔".

Key.Original: The pass is defended by Takistani regulars who won't give up easily, but we need to take it before any of their reinforcements arrive. Report in once it's secured. Understood?
Key.English: 这个走廊被塔基斯坦正规军所把守, 对付他们不会太轻松, 但是我们必须要在他们的援军到达之前夺下那里. 一旦得手务必立即汇报, 明白了吗?
看上去你状态不错, 中尉, 解散!

Key.Original: Yes, sir! In front of the Cowboy, taking heat from some pissed-off Takis, just how I like it, sir.
Key.English: 遵命, 长官! 为"牛仔"开道, 然后问那群暴躁的塔基斯坦佬借个火, 我非常喜欢这个, 长官.

Key.Original: Shit! That was a mine wasn't it? Watch out everyone! Mines!
Key.English: 该死! 刚才那是一个地雷是吗? 大家都注意了! 有地雷!

Container.name: Mountain_Farm_Taken
Container.situation: delta force took plantation and inform kane

Key.Original: Gambler 1 reporting enemy position in mountain farm neutralized.
Key.English: "赌徒1号"报告, 山中农场的敌人已被清除.

Key.Original: Roger that, Citizen. Be advised, we have several militia in custody and need a chopper to pick them up.
Key.English: 遵命, "公民". 请注意, 我们需要直升机带走几个被抓起来的民兵.

Key.Original: Understood Gambler 1, good work. Move on to your next objective.
Key.English: 收到, "赌徒", 干的漂亮. 前往你的下一个目标.

Key.Original: Citizen copies enemy prisoners. Redirecting an air unit in the vicinity, stand by. Out.
Key.English: "公民"收到, 我们已派遣空中单位前往运送敌方俘虏, 请稍等, 完毕.
"公民", "狼獾"已准备好, 请继续.

Key.Original: Badger copies all, Citizen. Unconfirmed HUMINT that our MIAs might have been snatched by Taki army.
Key.English: "公民", "狼獾"已全部收到. 未经证实的情报说我们的失踪人员可能已经被塔基斯坦军队抓走了.
请求无人机支援, 完毕.

Key.Original: Okay, operator, get hold of a drone, callsign Vampire 3.
Key.English: 好了, 操作员, 开始操纵无人机, 呼叫代号: "吸血鬼3号".

Key.Original: Badger, this is Citizen. Be advised we have intel on three likely places the Takis could hide the Mohican survivors. Prepare to take down locations, over.
Key.English: "狼獾", 这里是"公民". 请注意, 我们得到情报显示塔基斯坦人很有可能把"莫希干人"的幸存者藏在塔基斯坦的三个地方. 准备好记录这些位置, 完毕.

Key.Original: First, there's a military base near the village of Garmsar.
Key.English: 第一个位置, 在加姆沙村庄附近有一个军事基地.

Key.Original: Another base is near the coltan mine, north-west of your position.
Key.English: 另一个位置在钶钽铁矿矿场附近, 位于你们现在所在位置的西北方.

Key.Original: Final location is an OP on top of Mount Gur Dur. How copy, over?
Key.English: 最后一个位置是位于古尔杜尔山顶的一个观测所. 是否收到? 完毕.

Key.Original: Affirmative, Badger. One of the Reapers is in the air right now, callsign Vampire 3. Out.
Key.English: 这是肯定的, "狼獾". 一架"收割者"已经在空中就位, 呼叫代号为: "吸血鬼3号", 完毕.

Key.Original: Roger, sir. I have the drone online, you can come and check for yourself.
Key.English: 明白, 长官. 我已将无人机上线, 您可以亲自前来控制它.

Key.Original: Nope, this base seems empty, let's get to the other point.
Key.English: 不是这个, 这个基地看上去是空的, 让我们看看下一个地点.

Key.Original: Nothing here. Gotta check another location.
Key.English: 这里什么也没有, 赶快查看另一个位置.

Key.Original: Yes! There are trucks parked near a military building! They're the same as the one we found near the wreckage! Looks like we got 'em!
Key.English: 就是这个! 在一个军事建筑附近停着一些卡车! 它们和我们在飞机残骸附近找到的一模一样! 看来我们找到他们了!

Key.Original: Badger Lead to Citizen. We have a possible site where our captives are held. We've got suspected trucks stationed at 050-068, coltan mine complex. Acknowledge, over.
Key.English: "狼獾"呼叫"公民". 我们找到了俘虏可能被关押的地方, 我们在坐标050068, 钶钽铁矿矿场设施. 目标已确认, 完毕.

Key.Original: Copy that, Badger, good job! We're gonna work that one out, you stay put for a while and wait for reinforcements. We gotta plan that one out. Citizen out.
Key.English: 收到, "狼獾", 干的好! 你暂时留在原地等待增援部队, 我们必须制定一个行动计划. "公民"通话完毕.

Container.name: Rebels_approaching
Container.situation: seing the rebels is quite a surprise for players

Key.Original: I see incoming armed locals approaching the crash site from the west. Hope they're rebels, they could engage the tangos.
Key.English: 我看见一些地方武装正在从西边接近坠落地点. 希望他们是起义者, 他们可能会攻击那些塔基斯坦佬.

Container.name: Repairing
Container.situation: stryker crew tells repairing crew to hurry up

Key.Original: Yeah, yeah. I'm on it, don't rush me, or I'll fuck something up and we ain't goin' nowhere...
Key.English: 是, 是, 我正在弄, 请不要催我, 否则我有可能越搞越遭, 那样的话我们就哪儿也去不了了...
赶快把那个混蛋问题解决了, 士兵!

Container.name: Reporting_to_Kane
Container.situation: players have won over the enemy.

Key.Original: Citizen here. Good job, Badger. Move on to Timurkalay and secure the area, we are moving in some reinforcements and support. Over.
Key.English: "公民"收到, 干的好, "狼獾". 前进到缇穆尔喀拉依并夺取那个地方, 我们将提供一些增援部队和补给, 完毕.

Key.Original: Badger, proceed to the crash site. You can either wait for support trucks near Timurkalay, or move out at once. Citizen out.
Key.English: "狼獾", 继续前往坠落地点, 你可以在缇穆尔喀拉依附近等待补给卡车, 也可以即刻出发. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Badger to Citizen. We're on top of Naran Darre pass, OPFOR are dead or fleeing. There's a nice view down the valley, over!
Key.English: "狼獾"呼叫"公民", 我们现在位于"纳兰达尔"走廊最顶端, 敌方已被消灭或已逃跑, 这里是俯瞰山谷视野最棒的地方, 完毕!

Key.Original: O.K. sir, how about the survivors? Over.
Key.English: 好的, 长官. 那些幸存者的情况如何? 完毕.

Container.name: Secure_Crashsite
Container.situation: players get a change in plans, they have to rescue an aircraft that crash landed just recently.

Key.Original: Citizen to units Badger and Cowboy. Be advised, we have the exact position of the aircraft crash site. Grid 066048, OPFOR country. How copy?
Key.English: "公民"呼叫"狼獾"和"牛仔". 请注意, 我们对飞机的坠落地点进行了精确定位, 位于坐标0660048, 是一个敌方的村子. 是否收到请回答?

Key.Original: Badger, I need you to check the site and search for survivors. There were some civvie doctors and embeds aboard. Hold position while Revolver uploads the details to your onboard computers.
Key.English: "狼獾", 我需要你检查坠落点并寻找幸存者, 飞机上有一些民间医生和随行人员. 稍等一会儿, "左轮"会把详细信息上传到你的车载计算机.

Key.Original: We've got signs of life down there, but bad guys are closing in, so hurry up!
Key.English: 我们已经知道那里存在生命迹象, 但是坏蛋们正在接近, 所以必须赶快!

Key.Original: Roget that, Citizen. Mohican crash site at grid 066048.
Key.English: 已收到, "公民". "莫希干人"的坠落地点位于坐标066048.

Key.Original: Understood sir, we're Oscar Mike, Badger 1 out.
Key.English: 明白长官, 我们正在前进, "狼獾1号"通话完毕.

Container.name: Taksitanis_at_crashsite
Container.situation: players see enemy units that they hate

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Badger, I see some people near the wreck. Armed guys... looking like Takistani commandos.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"狼獾". 我看到在失事飞机附近有一些人. 武装人员...看上去好像是塔基斯坦特种部队.

Key.Original: Citizen, Badger here, we have several contacts on the crash site, Taki specials, over!
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"狼獾". 我们在坠落地点同敌方交火, 是塔基斯坦特种部队, 完毕!
"公民"收到, 干掉他们, 完毕.

Container.name: Too_Far_From_Convoy
Container.situation: player gets too far away from convoy

Key.Original: Herrera, you're straying too far from the convoy! Get back!
Key.English: Herrera, 你离车队太远了! 回来!

Container.name: Trucks
Container.situation: commenting suspicious activity leading to conclusion that government helps militias.

Key.Original: Contact dead ahead! Cowboy, I see some Takistani army trucks, engaging, over.
Key.English: 正前方发现敌人! 呼叫"牛仔", 我发现了一些塔基斯坦军用卡车, 正在攻击, 完毕.

Key.Original: Yeah, looks like milita and army are best friends. Light up the bastards. Cowboy out.
Key.English: 嘿, 看起来民兵和塔基斯坦军队是亲哥们儿, 干掉那些杂种. "牛仔"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Shit, we've lost the UAV! Everyone lets get fuckin' movin', we gotta drive there.
Key.English: 该死, 我们失去了无人机! Everyone lets get fuckin' movin', we gotta drive there.

Key.Original: TF Knight pushes OPFOR towards mountain ridges N of <marker name='BIS_MrkFOBRevolverText'>FOB Revolver</marker>. The decisive strike gave us momentum we must exploit. Your task is to clear the <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre pass</marker> NNE of Loy Manara and secure it against counterattacks by moving to <marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>Timurkalay</marker> and establishing FOS (Forward Operating Site) <marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>Planck</marker> there.
Key.English: "骑士"特遣部队向<marker name='BIS_MrkFOBRevolverText'>"左轮"前哨站</marker>的北部山岭地区推进, 先前我们给予敌人以决定性的打击, 我们必须进一步扩大这个势头. 你的任务是清除洛伊玛纳拉东北方的<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>, 然后前进并夺取<marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>缇穆尔喀拉依</marker>以便在这里建立<marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>"普朗克"前哨站</marker>来抵御敌方的反击.

Key.Original: OPFOR militias are holding the <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>pass</marker>. The confidence is high that Takistani army may send reinforcements from N. Minor militia units may be contacted S of the pass.
Key.English: 敌方民兵正把守着这个<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>走廊</marker>, 我们相信塔基斯坦军队很可能从北方派遣增援部队, 在走廊的南边可能会碰到小股的民兵单位.

Key.Original: Your mission is to move N on the road to <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre pass</marker>, neutralize all contacts and move further N to establish a Refuel Point in <marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>Timurkalay</marker>.
Key.English: 你的任务是沿着道路向北前进到<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>, 消灭遇到的全部敌方单位, 然后继续向北在<marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>缇穆尔喀拉依</marker>建立补给点.

Key.Original: Move from the <marker name='BIS_MrkFOBRevolverText'>FOB Revolver</marker> to the <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre pass</marker> with caution. Militia may ambush you along the route. </ br>Neutralize any contacts in and around <marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>Naran Darre pass</marker> and repel any counterattacks, report afterwards. </ br>Move to <marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>Timurkalay</marker>, report and wait for reinforcements from <marker name='BIS_MrkFOBRevolverText'>FOB Revolver</marker> who'll man the <marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>FOS Planck</marker>. Neutralize any contacts.
Key.English: 从<marker name='BIS_MrkFOBRevolverText'>"左轮"前进基地</marker>谨慎的前进到<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>, 敌方民兵可能在沿途伏击你们. </ br>消灭位于<marker name='BIS_MrkRidgeText'>"纳兰达尔"走廊</marker>及其周边的敌方单位, 并击退敌方可能的反击, 然后进行汇报. </ br>前进到<marker name='BIS_MrkTimurkalay'>缇穆尔喀拉依</marker>, 报告并等待增援部队从<marker name='BIS_MrkFOBRevolverText'>"左轮"前进基地</marker>前来建立<marker name='BIS_MrkRnRPointText'>"普朗克"前哨站</marker>, 消灭全部敌方单位.

Key.Original: An A-10 unit, codename 'Cruncher' is waiting for your call for an aistrike. You may also call in for an artillery strike.
Key.English: 一架A-10攻击机, 代号为: "粉碎者". 正在待命以便为你的空中打击请求提供支援, 另外你还可以呼叫一次火炮打击.
"左轮"前进基地, 位于塔基斯坦
正在初始化任务: 探路者...

Key.Original: TF Knight established a bridgehead, now it's time to push north.
Key.English: "骑士"特遣部队已经建立了一个前哨站, 现在是向北推进的时候了.
正在建立"普朗克"前哨站

Container.name: Abusing_taki_explosive_expert
Container.participants: Taki civilian explosive expert;Taki guarding the bomb;
Container.situation: takistani soldiers are being rude to civil explosive expert in the room, where the central bomb trigger is.

Key.Original: Do it or your family dies, bastard. Come on!
Key.English: 要么快点干, 要么你的家人全部死掉, 杂种. 快点!

Key.Original: Please, no! I do not want to kill people…
Key.English: 不, 请不要! 我不想杀人...

Key.Original: Badger here, ready to engage, over.
Key.English: 这里是"狼獾", 已做好攻击准备, 完毕.

Key.Original: We can see them sir, just let us engage. Over.
Key.English: 我们可以看见他们, 长官, 随时可以进攻. 完毕.

Key.Original: Gambler, Citizen. Copy that. Continue to stand by for signal.
Key.English: "赌徒", 这里是"公民". 已收到. 继续等待行动信号.
"狼獾", 请报告目前情况, 完毕.
"杀手", 请报告目前情况, 完毕.
"叛逆者", 请报告目前情况, 完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen copies all. Execute Montana. I say again, Montana in effect. Montana task force is clear to engage. Citizen out.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫各单位. 开始执行Montana, 我再说一遍, Montana已生效. Montana任务有关部队可以展开攻击. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Gambler, Citizen. Be advised, Montana is moving in. Pursue your objective, but no gambles. Acknowledge.
Key.English: "赌徒", 这里是"公民". 请注意, Montana已展开, 继续完成你的目标, 但是别冒险. 完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Gambler. LZ secure, standing by.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"赌徒". 已抵达着陆点, 待命中.

Key.Original: Roger that, Citizen, Gambler movin' in. Out.
Key.English: 收到, "城市人", "赌徒"正在前进, 完毕.

Key.Original: Listen up, team, it's time to play guardian angel, so move it.
Key.English: 大家听好了, 扮演守护神的时候到了, 我们走.

Key.Original: This is Renegade Actual, ready to move in.
Key.English: 这里是"叛逆者", 已做好前进准备.

Key.Original: Gambler, this is Citizen. Our forces have taken control of the Feruz Abad base, and you can be damn sure that's going to steam some Taki collars, so light a fire and get moving!
Key.English: "赌徒", 这里是"公民". 我们的部队已经控制了费罗斯艾巴德军事基地, 你们可以放心的去收拾那些塔基斯坦佬了, 可以开火前进了!

Key.Original: Roger that, Citizen, movin' with a quickness. Out.
Key.English: 遵命, "公民". 正在快速前进. 完毕.

Key.Original: What? Gambler, can you defuse? We can't lose that mine!
Key.English: 什么? "赌徒", 你可以拆除它吗? 我们不能失去那个矿场!

Key.Original: Copy that, search for it on the double time! Citizen out.
Key.English: 收到, 快点找到它! "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: What is that… ? Oh, fuck! Break, break, Citizen, Gambler Lead, this place is rigged to blow!
Key.English: 那是什么...?哦，干！等等, 等等, "公民", "赌徒"报告, 这里被装上了炸弹!

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Gambler. Unknown. The charge looks to be triggered remotely. Might be a detonator somewhere around here…
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"赌徒". 我不确定. 这个炸弹看上去应该是直接遥控引爆的, 这附近什么地方应该有一个起爆器...

Container.name: Coltan_mine_taken
Container.situation: kane informs players about tasks done by other units

Key.Original: All Montana, this is Gambler. Coltan mine secure, no threats. Cleared for Misfit.
Key.English: 全体Montana有关单位, 这里是"赌徒". 钶钽铁矿矿场已被夺取, 已没有威胁. 已为"不爽"清理干净.

Key.Original: Please! No shoot! They come, say make bomb or they kill family! Bombs in mine, detonator here. Here, I give code, but I go family! I'm sorry, good luck!
Key.English: 求求你! 不要开枪! 他们来到这里, 说要么装炸弹要么他们杀掉我的家人! 炸弹在矿场里, 起爆器在这儿. 拿着, 我给你编码, 但是我要回家了! 对不起, 祝你好运!

Key.Original: Shit! He must've rigged this place!
Key.English: 该死! 他肯定操纵着这个地方!

Key.Original: I sure hope this is the code written on his hand...
Key.English: 我希望他手上写得东西就是起爆器编码...

Key.Original: Citizen copies, good work. Proceed to your next objective. Out.
Key.English: "公民"收到, 干的漂亮. 继续完成你的目标. 完毕.

Key.Original: This should be a piece of ca... oh shit! Taki numerals...
Key.English: 这应该就是一张...噢, 该死! 塔基斯坦符号...

Key.Original: Done. Good thing I had my Cultural Reference Handbook, huh?
Key.English: 搞定了. 还好我带了我的文化参考手册, 哈?

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Gambler, charge defused, over.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"赌徒", 炸弹已被拆除, 完毕.
该死, 我们来不及了!
"赌徒", 这里是"公民". 请讲.

Key.Original: Citizen copies, proceed to your next objective. Misfit will take care of him. Out.
Key.English: "公民"收到, 继续搜索其他被俘人员, "不爽"会照料他的后事的. 完毕.

Key.Original: Fuck… Citizen, Gambler, bad news, over.
Key.English: 妈的..."公民", 这里是"赌徒", 坏消息, 完毕.

Key.Original: One KIA, identified as Joe Harris. No other hostages.
Key.English: 已经发现有一人阵亡, 确认是Joe Harris, 没有发现其他被俘人员.
"赌徒", 这里是"公民". 请讲.

Key.Original: What? Gambler, can you defuse? We can't lose that mine!
Key.English: 什么? "赌徒", 你可以拆除它吗? 我们不能失去那个矿场!

Key.Original: Copy that, search for it on the double time! Citizen out.
Key.English: 收到, 快点找到它! "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Fuck… Citizen, Gambler, bad news, over.
Key.English: 妈的..."公民", 这里是"赌徒", 坏消息, 完毕.

Key.Original: One KIA, identified as Joe Harris. No other hostages.
Key.English: 已经发现有一人阵亡, 确认是Joe Harris, 没有发现其他被俘人员.

Key.Original: What is that… ? Oh, fuck! Break, break, Citizen, Gambler Lead, this place is rigged to blow!
Key.English: 那是什么...?噢，干！等等, 等等, "公民", "赌徒"报告, 这里被装上了炸弹!

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Gambler. Unknown. The charge looks to be triggered remotely. Might be a detonator somewhere around here…
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"赌徒". 我不确定. 这个炸弹看上去应该是直接遥控引爆的, 这附近什么地方应该有一个起爆器...

Key.Original: Roger. What's the situation at the objective?
Key.English: 明白, 目标当前的情况如何?

Key.Original: Hey guys, objective due east, 30 seconds. Ready up!
Key.English: 嘿, 伙计们, 目的地位于正东方, 还有30秒. 准备好!

Key.Original: Revolver's reporting a few contacts, probably some local guerillas.
Key.English: "左轮"报告说发现有一些人员活动, 可能是一些地方游击队.

Key.Original: Let's make it a quick drop-off then, in case the LZ turns hot.
Key.English: 如果着陆点情况变糟的话, 咱们就采用快速滑降.

Key.Original: Listen up, team! I want an even spread on landing, could be a bit hot there!
Key.English: 都听好了! 我希望大家在着陆的时候都能畅快点, 那里很有可能有点危险!

Key.Original: Taki regulars are supposedly holed up in there, and they may have some heavy shit too.
Key.English: 塔基斯坦正规军很可能把守着那里, 而且他们也可能拥有一些重家伙.

Key.Original: Remember the primary: storm in, neutralize all armed hostiles, and secure our people. There are women there, too. They might be hurt and they're probably scared as hell, so be careful with your entries.
