Key.English: 记住主要目标: 火速杀入, 干掉所有敌人, 救出咱们的人. 那里还有几个女人, 她们很有可能会收到伤害而且大概已经吓傻了, 所以你们进去的时候一定要小心.

Key.Original: Once we have our guys, they'll be extracted by air. Unless the shit hits the fan, we should be done within 30 mikes.
Key.English: 一旦我们找到了所有被俘人员, 会有直升机来把他们接走. 除非发生大麻烦, 否则我们应当在30分钟之内搞定一切.

Key.Original: Now get those guns ready, we could be coming in hot.
Key.English: 现在都把手中的家伙准备好了, 我们马上就到了.

Key.Original: Gambler, this is Citizen. Enemy fast-movers inbound from the northeast. No anti-air available. Misfit's gonna give you a lift to an abandoned militia AA post overlooking Feruz Abad. See if you can make use of it to defend the city. Over.
Key.English: "赌徒", 这里是"公民". 敌方快速移动目标正从东北方向接近, 目前没有防空武器可用. "不爽"将前去把你带到一个被遗弃的民兵防空工事, 那里能俯瞰费罗斯艾巴德. 看看你能否用它来保卫城市. 完毕.

Key.Original: Gambler, you got it. Get ready, son, there's no time to waste. Citizen out.
Key.English: "赌徒", 就是这样. 准备好, 孩子. 没有时间可以浪费了. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen, you want us to stop a bomb raid with bare hands and some Takistani scrap metal? Over.
Key.English: "公民", 你难道想让我们赤手空拳用一堆塔基斯坦废铁去阻止空袭吗?

Key.Original: Good shooting, Gambler! Let's get you home, break. Montana, be advised, Gambler just saved the day for Task Force Knight and the people of Feruz Abad. Out.
Key.English: 打的漂亮, "赌徒"! 让我们接你回家, 稍等. Montana各单位注意, "赌徒"刚刚使"骑士"先遣部队反败为胜, 并且拯救了费罗斯艾巴德的居民. 完毕.

Key.Original: Gambler, Citizen. Good work up there. Let's get you home, out.
Key.English: "赌徒", 这里是"公民". 干的不错. 让我们接你回家, 完毕.

Key.Original: Gambler, this is Citizen. Too bad about those bandits. Reports are already coming in of casualties and extensive damage to downtown Feruz Abad. RTB. I repeat, RTB. Citizen out.
Key.English: "赌徒", 这里是"公民". 这些土匪太糟糕了. 报告显示费罗斯艾巴德市中心已经遭受了极大的伤亡和损失. 返回基地, 我再重复一遍, 返回基地. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: That's one less to worry about..
Key.English: 少了一个令人讨厌的家伙...
该死, 我没有打掉他!
妈的! 他投下炸弹了!

Key.Original: They'll probably move'em and try to trade them for some officers as soon as we catch enough of them.
Key.English: 他们也许会把剩下的人带走, 然后当作用于交换他们的一些被俘军官的筹码, 一旦我们逮到得足够多的话.

Key.Original: No just one of them, ANN journalist I think...photographer maybe. He did some cool photos for ANN Big Picture.
Key.English: 不, 只有其中一个, AAN的记者, 我想...也许是个摄影师。 他给AAN的大海报拍过一些很酷的照片.

Key.Original: Hey Gambler, heard you found the captives dead?
Key.English: 嘿, "赌徒", 听说你找到了俘虏, 但是他们都死了?

Key.Original: I guess they just hang them on the streets to boost morale or something like that as we approach.
Key.English: 我猜, 他们是想在我们接近的时候把他们挂在街头来提升士气或者其他之类的.

Key.Original: What do you think happens with the rest?
Key.English: 你觉那些得剩下的人会发生些什么事情?

Key.Original: Yeah, let's get going! We got asses to kick!
Key.English: 好吧, 让我们走吧! 我们去狠狠的踹他们的屁股!

Container.name: Rebels_at_LZ_FTL_is_HIGH
Container.dialogName: Rebels at LZ FTL is HIGH

Key.Original: Terry, these guys could help us out. A few extra guns couldn't hurt.
Key.English: Terry, 这些伙计可以帮我们, 多几条枪无妨.

Key.Original: We are honored. Please tell us what you know.
Key.English: 我们很荣幸, 请告诉我们你们所知道的一切.

Key.Original: We thank you for the information, we are here to help your people.
Key.English: 我们非常感谢你们提供了这些信息, 我们来到这里就是为了帮助你们的同胞.

Key.Original: Yeah, but they'll have to wait till we start the party, or else we will be extracting hostages in body bags.
Key.English: 是的, 但是他们必须等到我们开始行动才行, 要不然我们就只能用裹尸袋把那些被俘人员运出来了.

Key.Original: Allright, we will gladly fight alongside you, but wait until the mine gets alarmed, then come to help. We have people we need to save, early attack could mean they die.
Key.English: 好吧, 我们很乐意与你们一同战斗, 但是请你们等到矿场响起警报的时候再出来帮助我们. 那里有我们需要救的人, 过早进攻会害死他们.

Key.Original: No shoot! Americans! We friends, please, we help you. We know place where bad men, we watch. We tell you what weapons.
Key.English: 不要开枪! 美国人! 我们是朋友, 我们来这帮助你们. 我们知道那些坏蛋在哪里, 我们观察过. 我们告诉你他们都有什么武器.

Key.Original: We watch. Men have small weapon, no large. We see two standing gun, big, shoot fast. Also car with gun, shoot fast. Careful Americans, danger.
Key.English: 我们观察过, 他们拿着小武器, 没有大的. 我们看见两个固定的枪, 大的, 射速高. 另外车上也有枪, 射速高. 小心点美国人, 很危险.(Alex.XP语: 不是翻译有误, 依旧是老乡英语不好, 请意会...)

Key.Original: No, thank we you! We can help, have weapons. Fight well.
Key.English: 不, 我们感谢你们! 我们可以帮忙, 我们有武器, 仗打的好.

Key.Original: Okay, okay. We move downhill, we wait for fighting start. Many luck wish you, brother.
Key.English: 行, 行. 我们下山, 然后等战斗开始. 祝你们好运, 兄弟.

Container.name: Rebels_at_LZ_FTL_is_LOW
Container.dialogName: Rebels at LZ FTL is LOW

Key.Original: Hmph… I don't like leaving those guys behind.
Key.English: 哼...我不喜欢把这些家伙留在屁股后面.

Key.Original: Citizen advises you disengage—we've got enough troubles with the locals as it is.
Key.English: "公民"命令你们不要攻击 - 我们已经在这些本地人身上犯了太多错误了.

Key.Original: Hold your fire! They're retreating, minimal threat.
Key.English: 不要开枪! 他们正在撤退, 威胁不大.

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Gambler, two armed guerillas retreating from the LZ. Please advise.
Key.English: "公民", 这里是"赌徒", 两个武装的游击队员正在从着陆点离开, 请指示.

Key.Original: Gambler copies. Disengaging and continuing mission.
Key.English: "赌徒"收到, 不进行攻击并继续执行任务.

Key.Original: You heard it, team, we have another objective. Let's get to those hostages.
Key.English: 你们都听到了, 我们还有其他任务, 让我们去营救那些被俘人员.

Key.Original: Like we haven't run past dangerous locals before, Pete. We can do it.
Key.English: 就像我们之前没有遇见这些危险的本地人一样, Pete. 我们能做到.

Container.name: Rebels_at_LZ_FTL_is_NEUTRAL
Container.dialogName: Rebels at LZ FTL is NEUTRAL

Key.Original: We are honored. Please tell us what you know.
Key.English: 我们很荣幸, 请告诉我们你们所知道的一切.

Key.Original: We thank you for the information, we are here to help your people.
Key.English: 我们非常感谢你们提供了这些信息, 我们来到这里就是为了帮助你们的同胞.

Key.Original: Thank you. We hope your families stay safe.
Key.English: 谢谢你们. 我们希望你们的家人永远平安.

Key.Original: No shoot! Americans! We friends, please, we help you. We know place where bad men, we watch. We tell you what weapons.
Key.English: 不要开枪! 美国人! 我们是朋友, 我们来这帮助你们. 我们知道那些坏蛋在哪里, 我们观察过. 我们告诉你他们都有什么武器.

Key.Original: We watch. Men have small weapon, no large. We see two standing gun, big, shoot fast. Also car with gun, shoot fast. Careful Americans, danger.
Key.English: 我们观察过, 他们拿着小武器, 没有大的. 我们看见两个固定的枪, 大的, 射速高. 另外车上也有枪, 射速高. 小心点美国人, 很危险.(Alex.XP语: 不是翻译有误, 依旧是老乡英语不好, 请意会...)

Key.Original: Many luck wish you, Americans. We go home, family, we care for sons. Wish fight win you.
Key.English: 祝你们好运, 美国人. 我们回家了, 家庭, 我们回去照看孩子们. 希望你们打赢.

Key.Original:
Latest intel reveals that the civilian captives from the downed C-130, codename 'Mohican', are being held in the coltan mine, near Feruz Abad. This makes the military base and the mine priority targets. Our intent is to seize the city, the mine and rescue the prisoners.

* At 1300 hours, a 4-man Special Force team, codename 'Gambler', will be inserted 500m northwest of the mine (codenamed point 'Alice').

* The rest of TF Knight will assault the base and neutralize all resistance.

* It is crucial that the mine is secured ASAP, for once the assault begins, the situation there will surely deteriorate.
Key.English:
最新情报显示坠毁的代号为'莫希干人'的C-130运输机上的幸存者被敌人俘虏并关押到了费罗斯艾巴德附近的钶钽铁矿矿场. 这里建有一个军事基地, 矿场将作为我们的首要目标. 我们的目的是夺取城市, 矿场并且营救被俘人员.

* 在中午13点整, 代号为'赌徒'的4人特战小组将被空降至矿场西北方500米处(该位置代号为'Alice').

* 其余的"骑士"特遣部队将进攻军事基地并瓦解全部敌方阻力.

* 尽快夺取矿场至关重要, 因为一旦进攻开始, 这里的形势将急剧恶化.

Key.Original:
OPFOR - The majority of enemy units are located in the military base, with smaller contingents patrolling Feruz Abad and the coltan mine.
BLUFOR - TF Knight is prepared south of the city. Special Force team 'Gambler' will be inserted by air to point 'Alice'.
CIVILIAN - The captives are being held in the coltan mine. The city is full of non-combatants, and the US Army did not issue any warnings of the assault.
Key.English:
敌方 - 绝大多数的敌方单位均位于军事基地内, 费罗斯艾巴德和钶钽铁矿矿场可能会有小撮的巡逻队.
我方 - "骑士"先遣部队已经在城市的南部做好了进攻准备. '赌徒'特战小组将会被空降至位置'Alice'.
平民 - 俘虏被关押在钶钽铁矿矿场. 在城市中到处都是非军事目标, 美军在进攻之前不会发出任何警告.

Key.Original:
Your mission is to:

* Infiltrate the coltan mine north of Feruz Abad and eliminate any hostiles posing a threat.
* Locate and exfiltrate the captives from the downed C-130, being held at the mine (see attachment).
Key.English:
你们的任务是:

* 渗入费罗斯艾巴德北方的钶钽铁矿矿场并消灭所有构成威胁的敌方单位.
* 定位并救出被关押在矿场的先前坠毁的C-130上的幸存者(详情见附件).

Key.Original:
The ideal course of your action:

* Insertion on point 'Alice'
* Infiltrate the coltan mine and locate the captives
* Eliminate OPFOR forces guarding the mine
* Await extraction by chopper (codename 'Misfit') at the mine.

Note: Examine the attachment for info on the captives.
Key.English:
你们行动的理想方案:

* 抵达位置'Alice'
* 渗入钶钽铁矿矿场并定位被俘人员位置
* 消灭守卫矿场的敌方单位
* 在矿场等待直升机(代号'不爽')接应并撤出.

注意: 请查看附件了解被俘人员的相关资料.

Key.Original: HQ has allocated the use of an UAV, codename 'Predator', to your team. You have been issued a mobile UAV Terminal pack.
Key.English: 指挥部已指派给你们小组一架无人机, 代号为'捕食者'. 你们随身携带有移动式无人机终端.

Key.Original: A Takistani worker at the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker> gave us the code to the detonator:
Key.English: 一个在<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>工作的塔基斯坦工人给了我们起爆器的编码:

Key.Original: A dead Takistani worker at the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker> had a piece of paper with a code written on it:
Key.English: 一个死去的在<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>工作的塔基斯坦工人身上有一张写有编码的纸:

Key.Original: Information about the Detonator Code was written into your Notes...
Key.English: 有关钶钽铁矿矿场起爆器编码的信息已写进你的记事本...
钶钽铁矿矿场起爆器编码

Key.Original: Information about the coltan mine defenses was written into your Notes...
Key.English: 有关钶钽铁矿矿场防御情况的情报已写进你的记事本...
钶钽铁矿矿场防御情况

Key.Original: A group of Takistani Rebels present at the <marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_Insertion'>Delta Force Insertion</marker> zone informed us that the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker> is defended by Takistani Army soldiers which are only lightly armed, and that there is also an <marker name='BIS_MrkStaticGun1'>MG nest</marker> near the Southern entrance of the mine.
Key.English: 一伙儿在<marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_Insertion'>三角洲部队着陆区</marker>的塔基斯坦起义者们给我们提供了情报, <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>被塔基斯坦军队士兵守卫着, 他们只配备有轻型武装, 另外在矿场北边的入口附近还有<marker name='BIS_MrkStaticGun1'>机枪掩体</marker>.

Key.Original: The Takistani troops have rigged the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker> with explosives. Find them, and defuse them. Failure to do so will make it appear that the US destroyed the mine, which will lower public support, and make the locals ever more angered.
Key.English: 塔基斯坦军队在<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>安装了爆炸装置, 找到并拆除它们. 如果失败了, 会造成这件事看上去像是美军摧毁了矿场, 这将严重影响公众支持度, 并且激起当地民众的长久愤怒.

Key.Original: Once the <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>Military Base</marker> is in US hands, protect <marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>Feruz Abad</marker> from expected enemy retaliation. You will be air-lifted to an <marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad_DELTA'>AA nest</marker> just west of the city. The incoming aircraft will most likely approach from the <marker name='BIS_MrkIncomingAir_1'>North-East</marker>.
Key.English: 一旦<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>落入美军手中, 必须保卫<marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>费罗斯艾巴德</marker>以抵抗敌方已知的报复行动. 你将被空降到一个在城市西边的<marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad_DELTA'>防空工事</marker>. 敌方飞机很可能会从<marker name='BIS_MrkIncomingAir_1'>东北方</marker>向此接近.

Key.Original: Once the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker> is secure, assist in the attack on the Takistani controlled <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>military base</marker> southeast of the Mine, should there be a need.
Key.English: 一旦<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>被拿下, 如果形势需要, 协助进攻位于矿场东南方的<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>.

Key.Original: Move in and secure the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker>. Failure to do so will almost certainly lead to a worsening situation for the Captives.
Key.English: 前进并夺取<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>, 如果失败的话, 将会使得被俘人员的情况变得非常凶险.

Key.Original: The C-130 Captives are being held by Takistani troops somewhere within the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker>, and you have been tasked with locating them.
Key.English: C-130上的幸存者被塔基斯坦军队关押在<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>某处, 你奉命对他们的具体位置进行定位.

Key.Original: Wait for the go signal from Command before proceeding with the mission.
Key.English: 在继续执行任务之前等待指挥部的进攻信号.

Key.Original: Provide Air Support above the Takistani controlled <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>military base</marker> southeast of the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker>. This is a key location that will be used as a launch location for the next step in Operation Arrowhead.
Key.English: 对进攻敌方控制的位于<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>东南方的<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>的行动提供空中支援. 这个地方对于"箭头行动"的下一步计划非常关键.

Key.Original: Wait for the go signal from Command before proceeding with the mission.
Key.English: 在继续执行任务之前等待指挥部的进攻信号..

Key.Original: Secure the Takistani controlled <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>military base</marker> southeast of the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker>. This is a key location that will be used as a launch location for the next step in Operation Arrowhead.
Key.English: 夺取敌方控制的位于<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>东南方的<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>. 这个地方对于"箭头行动"的下一步计划非常关键.

Key.Original: Wait for the go signal from Command before proceeding with the mission.
Key.English: 在继续执行任务之前等待指挥部的进攻信号.

Key.Original: Secure the Takistani controlled <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>military base</marker> southeast of the <marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>coltan mine</marker>. This is a key location that will be used as a launch location for the next step in Operation Arrowhead.
Key.English: 夺取敌方控制的位于<marker name='BIS_MrkColtanMineText'>钶钽铁矿矿场</marker>东南方的<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>. 这个地方对于"箭头行动"的下一步计划非常关键.

Key.Original: Once the <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>Military Base</marker> is in US hands, protect the local populace of <marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>Feruz Abad</marker> from expected enemy retaliation.
Key.English: 一旦<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>落入美军手中, 保护<marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>费罗斯艾巴德</marker>的当地民众, 抵御敌人预料中的报复行动.

Key.Original: Once the <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>Military Base</marker> is in US hands, protect the local populace of <marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>Feruz Abad</marker> from expected enemy retaliation.
Key.English: 一旦<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>落入美军手中, 保护<marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>费罗斯艾巴德</marker>的当地民众, 抵御敌人预料中的报复行动.

Key.Original: Once the <marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>Military Base</marker> is in US hands, protect the local populace of <marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>Feruz Abad</marker> from expected enemy retaliation.
Key.English: 一旦<marker name='BIS_MrkMilitaryBaseText'>军事基地</marker>落入美军手中, 保护<marker name='BIS_MrkFeruzAbad'>费罗斯艾巴德</marker>的当地民众, 抵御敌人预料中的报复行动.

Key.Original:
A list with a short description of the captives (in alphabetical order):

Baker, Annie

Female, 26, blonde hair, employed as a doctor for 'Humans in Need', NGO.
Last seen in apparel: blue hoody, grey trousers, sneakers.

Ensler, Rita

Female, 33, short, dark hair, employed as a manager for Humans in Need NGO.
Last seen in apparel: Black vest, striped brown sweater, worn purple shorts, black boots.

Harris, Joe

Male, 36, dark hair, employed as a journalist for ANN.
Last seen in apparel: Free Tibet T-shirt, brown leather 'PRESS' vest, jeans, sneakers.

Hladik, Vojtech

Male, 32, ginger hair and beard, employed as a doctor for 'Ludmila Medical Network', NGO.
Last seen in apparel: brown shirt, white west with LMN logo, white trousers, hiking shoes.
Cpt. Grover, Larry

Information classified
Key.English:
以下是被俘人员的有关简要资料(以字母顺序排序):

Baker, Annie

女, 26岁, 金黄色头发, 受雇于民间组织'人类之需'的一名医生.
最后一次见到时的穿着: 蓝色套头衫, 灰色长裤, 运动鞋.

Ensler, Rita

女, 33岁, 深色短发, 受雇于民间组织'人类之需'的一名管理人员.
最后一次见到时的穿着: 黑色衬衫, 有条纹的棕色运动服, 紫色短裤, 黑色靴子.

Harris, Joe

男, 36岁, 深色头发, 受雇于AAN电视台的一名记者.
最后一次见到时的穿着: '自由西藏'体恤衫(Alex.XP语: 丫儿就是一该死的藏独支持者...), 棕色皮革'媒体'马甲, 牛仔裤, 运动鞋.

Hladik, Vojtech

男, 32岁, 姜黄色头发并蓄须, 受雇于民间组织'Ludmila医学网络'的一名医生.
最后一次见到时的穿着: 棕色衬衫, 印有LMN标志的白色西服, 白色西裤, 登山鞋.

领队 Grover, Larry

资料保密

Key.Original: The coltan mine and the military base are out of Takistani Army hands, and Feruz Abad has been saved from devastation. Although the captives were not present at the coltan mine complex, we will locate them. Good work people.
Key.English: 已经把钶钽铁矿矿场和军事基地从塔基斯坦军队手中夺了过来, 并且费罗斯艾巴德也免于被毁灭. 虽然在钶钽铁矿矿场设施内没有找到其余被俘人员, 但是我们一定会定位他们. 大家干的不错.

Key.Original: The TF Knight managed to get the airport and its defensive perimeter under control. Hercules planes have already started shipping in gear and reinforcements.
Key.English: "骑士"先遣部队已夺取机场及其防御圈的控制权, "大力神"运输机已经开始空运作战装备和增援部队.

Key.Original: Although the coltan mine was lost, the nearby military base is under our control. Now we must continue searching for the captives. Not a total success, but the results could have been worse.
Key.English: 虽然损失了钶钽铁矿矿场, 但是附近的军事基地已在我们的控制之中. 现在我们必须继续搜索被俘人员, 虽然这个胜利并不完整, 但是结果还不是很糟糕.

Key.Original: We have taken too many casualties, we cannot afford to lose good soldiers like this.
Key.English: 我们伤亡惨重, 我们不能再像这样失去更多优秀的士兵了.

Key.Original: You were not able to complete the operation order. The mission failed.
Key.English: 你未能完成行动命令, 任务失败.

Key.Original: The coltan mine has been detonated by the Takistani Army, and the captives with it. Not only have we failed to recover the captives, but now the Takistani populace will never side with us.
Key.English: 钶钽铁矿矿场被塔基斯坦军队引爆, 被俘人员均在其中. 不但我们拯救被俘人员的行动失败, 而且现在塔基斯坦民众永远不会站在我们这一边了.

Key.Original: Although the coltan mine and the nearby military base are under our control, we failed to protect Feruz Abad from devastation. Nonetheless, we must continue searching for the captives. Results could have been better, but also worse.
Key.English: 虽然钶钽铁矿矿场和附近的军事基地已在我们的控制之下, 但是我们未能阻止费罗斯艾巴德遭到毁灭性打击. 尽管如此, 我们必须继续搜索其余的被俘人员. 结果可能会更好, 但也可能会更糟.

Key.Original: We are taking too much time to seize this area. The Takistani forces to the North have surely had enough time to prepare a formidable defence, hindering our efforts significantly. We cannot continue with the Operation.
Key.English: 我们夺取这个区域时浪费了太多的时间. 北方的塔基斯坦军队有了足够的时间去准备强大的防御力量, 这将极大的阻碍我们的努力. 我们无法再将这个行动继续下去了.

Key.Original: Emergency! Special Forces prepare to free the captives held in a mining facility.
Key.English: 紧急情况! 特种部队准备从矿场设施中营救被俘人员.

Key.Original:
ARMED TAKISTANI LOCAL GROUPS

Several armed groups operate amongst the local populace, the Takistani Militia, which support and uphold the ideals of the current regime, and the local Guerilla, who strongly reject this pretentious government.
Of these groups, the Guerilla are supportive of the US operation, and have provided assistance to our forces on several occasions. It is important to be able to distinguish between these two factions, especially considering the civilian populace sides with the Guerilla.

Examine the following two images and compare the differences in apparel of the two groups:

Fig:1 Militia Forces (Enemy)

Note that the Takistani Militia wear some form of uniform, often bearing some symbols of rank and camouflage to help blend in with the environment.

Fig:2 Guerilla (Neutral)

In comparsion with Militia, Guerilla forces usually wear ordinary clothing, lacking any Military-like ranks or symbols.
It pays to keep an eye out for these differences, as opening fire on a group of Guerilla who are coming to help will certainly not help the situation.
Key.English:
塔基斯坦地方武装组织

在当地民众中存在着一些武装组织, 比如支持并认同现政权的塔基斯坦民兵, 以及强烈抵制这个自负政府的地方游击队.
在这些组织中, 游击队是支持美国行动的, 并且在多个场合对我们提供了帮助. 考虑到当地老百姓大多站在游击队那一边, 在此提供一些用于区分这两个派系的重要资料.

请仔细查看以下两张图片以便比较这两个组织着装上的区别:

着装 1: 民兵组织(敌方)

请注意, 塔基斯坦民兵拥有各种形式的统一着装, 通常配有一些象征军衔的符号以及伪装, 以便使其更好的融入到周围的环境中.

着装 2: 游击队(中立方)

相对民兵而言, 游击队组织的服装比较破旧, 缺少一切军事元素 - 比如军衔或伪装.
请特别留意这些区别, 很显然, 朝前来帮忙的游击队组织开火是非常不利于当前局势的.
正在初始化任务: 钶钽蓝调...

Key.Original: Mechanized recon advances to the north.
Key.English: 机械化侦察部队向北推进.

Key.Original: Special Forces raid on a mining facility.
Key.English: 特种部队突击矿场设施.
收到, 正在传送坐标. "曼彻斯特"通话完毕.

Key.Original: This is Renegade, I'm ready to smash them, over.
Key.English: 这里是"叛逆者", 我已准备好狠狠的揍他们了, 完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester acknowledges, Renegade. Remain on station. Out.
Key.English: "曼彻斯特"明白, "叛逆者". 继续留在那里. 完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester, Renegade is unable to divert, how copy, over?
Key.English: "曼彻斯特", "叛逆者"无法转移, 是否收到? 完毕.

Key.Original: Renegade, this is Winchester. A convoy is inbound toward the airfield from the south. Can you divert and engage? Over.
Key.English: "叛逆者", 这里是"曼彻斯特. 一支敌方车队正从南方向机场驶去, 你能否转移并消灭他们? 完毕.
"叛逆者", 这里是"曼彻斯特", 完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen reports you did a fine job today. You are RTB, over.
Key.English: "公民"报告说你今天干的非常不错, 你可以返回基地了, 完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester, you're coming in lima charlie, over.
Key.English: "曼彻斯特", 你的声音很清晰, 完毕.

Key.Original: Renegade copies RTB. My baby could use some fuel and payload anyhow. Renegade out.
Key.English: "叛逆者"收到, 返回基地. 我的宝贝可以享用一些燃料和弹药了. "叛逆者"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester, Renegade. Visual on several Taki militiamen manning an observation post at grid 032081. Requesting permission to engage, over.
Key.English: "温彻斯特", 这里是"叛逆者". 我看到坐标032081处有塔基斯坦民兵的一个观察哨, 请求进行攻击, 完毕.
"温彻斯特", 这里是"叛逆者". 观察哨已被干掉, 完毕.

Key.Original: Good copy, Winchester. Sparky's wanted to try one out since he started flying. Over.
Key.English: 已收到, "温彻斯特". Sparky在他出发以后就已经跃跃欲试了. 完毕.

Key.Original: Get some?' What are we, Marines? Hah!
Key.English: 永不退缩? 我们是谁? 海军陆战队吗? 哈哈!

Key.Original: Renegade, you are go to engage. Winchester out.
Key.English: "叛逆者", 你可以进行攻击. "温彻斯特"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Good job, Renegade. We need you to eliminate several AA guns north of your position. Suggest you send in your UAV first.
Key.English: 干得好, "叛逆者". 我们需要你干掉你现在所在位置北方的几个防空炮, 建议你先送无人机过去.

Key.Original: Once you have visual, the UAV can lase them for your guided missiles. How copy, over?
Key.English: 一旦你看见他们, 无人机可以用激光指示器引导你们的导弹进行攻击. 是否收到请回答? 完毕.

Key.Original: All right, control's been patched over to you. So get some! Winchester out.
Key.English: 很好, 无人机控制权已经移交给你了. 永不退缩! "温彻斯特"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units. We have the airport locked down, good job everyone.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫各单位, 我们已成功封锁了机场, 大家干的不错.

Key.Original: The offensive will continue. Suggest you all regroup and prepare for the final push to Rasman. Citizen out.
Key.English: 攻势将会继续进行, 建议你们全部进行整编并准备向热斯曼进行最后的进攻. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Renegade One hit and going down!
Key.English: "叛逆者1号"中弹, 我们正在坠落!
请求救援! 请求救援!

Key.Original: Going down hard! Will need medevac!
Key.English: 硬着陆! 我们需要救援直升机!

Key.Original: I should have been a lawyer!
Key.English: 我想我应该赶快找个律师!

Key.Original: That takes care of the paperwork. Now to go collect some scalps!
Key.English: 注意核对飞行手册, 现在让我们去收集一些战利品吧!

Key.Original: Renegade 1, Winchester. How's it going? Over.
Key.English: "叛逆者1号", 这里是"温彻斯特". 准备的如何了? 完毕.

Key.Original: Renegade, you are cleared for takeoff. Remember to report all hostiles before engaging. Good hunting! Over.
Key.English: "叛逆者", 你已获准起飞. 请记住, 在你向敌方目标开火之前必须进行报告. 祝你狩猎愉快! 完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester, this is Renegade, requesting takeoff clearance to heading 350, combat patrol over Band-e Kirmiz. Preflight checks complete.
Key.English: "温彻斯特", 这里是"叛逆者". 请求起飞并清空航向350, 在班达尔-卡兹米进行武装巡逻. 飞行前检查完毕.
谢谢, "温彻斯特". "叛逆者"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Keep those eyes peeled, Sparky. Take in the view, three minutes to bad guy territory.
Key.English: 睁大眼睛, Sparky. 注意观察仪表, 3分钟后抵达坏蛋们的领地.

Key.Original: Winchester, this is Citizen, Renegade just eliminated at an enemy outpost southwest of the airport. Break. Warmonger, move in Stryker team, the road is clear. Citizen out.
Key.English: "温彻斯特", 这里是"公民". "叛逆者"刚刚在机场西南方的敌方前哨站附近被击落. 稍等. "好战者", 让"斯特赖克"装甲车分队前进, 道路已被清理干净. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester, Citizen. Enemy air defenses southwest of the airport have been neutralized, over.
Key.English: "温彻斯特", 这里是"公民". 机场西南方的敌方防空火力已被清除, 完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester, Citizen. Gunships confirming kills on enemy convoys inbound your position, I can hear your of relief from here! Citizen out.
Key.English: "温彻斯特", 这里是公民. 武装直升机正在确认敌方车队的击毁数量, 我知道你们已减轻了这里的压力! "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Warmonger copies, oscar mike to point Alabama. Big hug to Renegade for paving the way to Taki Hell. Warmonger out.
Key.English: "好战者"收到, 正在前往位置'Alabama', 为深入塔基斯坦拥抱"叛逆者"铺平道路. "好战者"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester copies clear skies. All Manhunters on station, standing by for takeoff, ETA 30 seconds.
Key.English: "温彻斯特"收到, 声音很清晰. 全部搜救人员就位, 30秒之后起飞.

Key.Original: Roger that, Citizen. One more six-pack we owe to the Renegade riders. Thumbs-up from air control, Winchester out.
Key.English: 明白, "公民". 我们应该请"叛逆者"上的骑士们多喝几杯, 他们牢牢的控制着制空权. "曼彻斯特"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Renegade, Winchester. Nice job, move on to your other objectives. Out.
Key.English: "叛逆者", 这里是"温彻斯特". 干的漂亮, 前往你的下一个目标. 完毕.

Key.Original: Damn, Sparky, I wish we'd had these drones back in 2009... it's like I'm watching the bad guys on the Discovery Channel, just plain awesome!
Key.English: 干, Sparky, 如果我们在2009年的时候就有这些遥控飞机话那就太好了(Alex.XP语: 这里指的是原版中发生在黑俄罗斯的战争.)...这就好像我在"探索频道"上面盯着这些坏蛋一样, 真是太棒了!

Key.Original: Okay, search these hills, keep it steady and lase those guns. Easy…
Key.English: 好了, 搜索这些山体, 保持稳定然后用激光照射那些防空炮. 放松点...

Key.Original: Whoa! It works! Man, I love it!
Key.English: 哇! 干掉了! 伙计, 我爱死它了!

Key.Original: One less motherfucker to worry about! Yeah!
Key.English: 又他妈的少了一个混蛋! 耶!

Key.Original: Yeah, that's the last one. Another job well done, Sparky.
Key.English: 耶, 这是最后一个了, 干的很好, Sparkey.

Key.Original: Winchester, this is Renegade 1. All AA batteries on Band-e Kirmiz have been neutralized. Skies are clear, over.
Key.English: "温彻斯特", 这里是"叛逆者1号". 班达尔-卡兹米的全部防空火力群已被清除. 空中已经干净了, 完毕.

Key.Original: Careful with these things, Renegade, they're not exactly cheap, you know! Stand by for another one…
Key.English: 小心使用这些东西, "叛逆者". 它们可真的不便宜, 我想你应该知道! 请待命, 我会提供给你另一架...

Key.Original: Acknowledge? What the hell are you doing, Renegade? Using them as cruise missiles? Stand by for the last available drone. Winchester out.
Key.English: 你确定吗? 你到底都在干些什么, "叛逆者"? 难道你把它们当作巡航导弹在用吗? 继续待命, 我提供给你最后一架可用的无人机. "温彻斯特"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Winchester here. I don't know what to say anymore! The one I'm sending now is the last one! If you waste it, you're gonna kamikaze the AA batterie yourself, understood? Over.
Key.English: 这里是"温彻斯特", 我对你已经不知道该说些什么了! 那是我提供给你的最后一架! 如果你把它浪费了, 你就亲自给我去向这些防空火力群展开神风攻击, 明白吗? 完毕.

Key.Original: Fuck! The UAV is dead! Citizen won't like this.
Key.English: 妈的! 无人机被干掉了! 纳税人肯定不喜欢这个.

Key.Original: Renegade One to Winchester, the UAV is down, please advise, over.
Key.English: "叛逆者1号"呼叫"温彻斯特", 无人机已坠毁, 请指示, 完毕.

Key.Original: OK, sir, I'll do my best. Renegade One out.
Key.English: 好的, 长官, 我会尽力而为的. "叛逆者1号"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Oh crap! Another one down. God, why are you punishing me?
Key.English: 噢, 狗屎运! 另一个也完蛋了, 上帝啊, 您为什么要这样惩罚我?

Key.Original: Renegade One to Winchester, I'm afraid the second UAV is down as well, over.
Key.English: "叛逆者1号"呼叫"温彻斯特", 我很抱歉, 第二架无人机也坠毁了, 完毕.

Key.Original: Renegade One to Winchester, reporting another UAV down. Over.
Key.English: "叛逆者1号"呼叫"温彻斯特", 这一架无人机也报销了. 完毕.
收到, 长官. "叛逆者1号"通话完毕.

Key.Original: After capturing the Feruz Abad Coltan mine, the next step is an offensive of <marker name="BIS_airstrip">Rasman military airport</marker>. Our air traffic is being disrupted by <marker name="BIS_AA">AA batteries</marker> so Renegade One will force recon the area S and SW of the <marker name="BIS_airstrip">airport</marker> to seek and destroy the AA installations using a combination of ULB and Apache chopper.
Key.English: 在夺取了费罗斯艾巴德和钶钽铁矿矿场之后, 接下来的计划是进攻<marker name="BIS_airstrip">热斯曼军用机场</marker>. 我们的空中航线被<marker name="BIS_AA">防空火力群</marker>所截断, 所以"叛逆者1号"将对<marker name="BIS_airstrip">机场</marker>的南部和西南部进行武装侦查, 并使用"无人小鸟"(ULB)无人直升机和"阿帕奇"武装直升机联合搜索并摧毁敌方防空设施.

Key.Original:
Most of the OPFOR units are located at the airfield or in its surroundings. The OPFOR AA batteries are scattered W and SW from Nagara. There is a line of defense between them and the airport. Renegade One starts at FARP Winchester in Feruz Abad where more BLUFOR units are located as well as on point Zoidberg on the road from Feruz Abad to Rasman.

Intel says there is a hidden militia command center somewhere in the AO.
Key.English:
绝大多数敌方单位均位于机场及其周围的区域. 敌方防空火力群分散在纳格拉的西部和西南部. 在他们和机场之间有一道敌方的防线. "叛逆者1号"在开始时位于费罗斯艾巴德的"温彻斯特"前方补给站, 其他更多的我方单位位于'Zoidberg'位置, 就在从费罗斯艾巴德到热斯曼的公路上.

情报显示在行动区域内有一个敌方的隐蔽指挥中心.

Key.Original: Force recon the areas W and SW from <marker name="BIS_nagara">Nagara</marker> to map OPFOR defensive perimeter and neutralize any contacts, especialy any <marker name="BIS_AA">AA installations</marker> and airport's <marker name="BIS_defenseLine">line of defense</marker>.
Key.English: 对<marker name="BIS_nagara">纳格拉</marker>西部和西南部的敌方防御圈, 以及和机场之间的<marker name="BIS_defenseLine">敌方防线</marker>进行武装侦查并摧毁一切敌方单位, 特别是任何的<marker name="BIS_AA">防空设施</marker>.

Key.Original: At 1730 Renegade One will lift off <marker name="BIS_start">FARP Winchester</marker> to cross the mountain ridge and force recon the areas W and SW from <marker name="BIS_nagara">Nagara</marker>. You will encounter AA weapons, so the use of a ULB is a necessity. After all <marker name="BIS_AA">AA batteries</marker> are eliminated, proceed in an attack on the airport's <marker name="BIS_defenseLine">perimeter defenses</marker> if possible.
Key.English: 在下午17点30分, "叛逆者1号"将从<marker name="BIS_start">"温彻斯特"前方补给站</marker>起飞并越过山脉对<marker name="BIS_nagara">纳格拉</marker>的西部和西南部区域进行武装侦查. 你将会遭遇敌方防空兵器, 所以使用"无人小鸟"(ULB)是非常有必要的. 当全部<marker name="BIS_AA">防空火力群</marker>被清理干净之后, 如果有可能的话, 加入对敌方机场<marker name="BIS_defenseLine">防御圈</marker>的进攻战斗.

Key.Original: <marker name="BIS_start">FARP Winchester</marker> is your home base, you may return there anytime to refuel, repair or rearm.
Key.English: <marker name="BIS_start">"温彻斯特"前方补给站</marker>是你的总部, 你可以随时回到这里进行补给和休整.

Key.Original: Your recon of the AO was succesful. Good job!
Key.English: 你对任务区域的侦查完成了, 干的不错!

Key.Original: Although you were shot down by OPFOR, you managed to get to safety. A pilot is worth more than his machine.
Key.English: 虽然你被敌方击落了, 但是你却平安无恙. 一个飞行员永远要比他的飞机宝贵.

Key.Original: You were shot down and captured by OPFOR. A pilot is worth more than his machine and as long as you live, you may escape or get rescued. Hopefully Specail Forces are already planning that.
Key.English: 你被敌方击落并俘虏, 只要活着, 一个飞行员永远要比他的飞机宝贵, 你也许可以逃跑或者等待被营救. 希望特种部队已经开始准备救援计划了.

Key.Original: You were not able to complete the operation order. The mission failed.
Key.English: 你未能完成行动命令, 任务失败.

Key.Original: Gunships go hunting enemy in the mountains before the decisive strike of ground troops.
Key.English: 武装直升机赶在地面部队展开决定性打击之前在山谷中猎杀敌人.
"温彻斯特"前方补给站, 位于费罗斯艾巴德

Key.Original: There is a convoy approaching from the west, moving to the north. You must stop it. It is militia reinforcements, probably movign towards the airport. We have been informed by locals. They fear repressions from them, so by destroying it we might add a point on the 'friendliness scale'.
Key.English: 在西方出现了一支正在向北运动的车队, 你必须阻止他们. 这是一支民兵增援部队, 目的地可能是机场. 我们得到当地人的消息, 他们说害怕这些民兵会对他们进行镇压. 所以如果我们消灭他们, 就可以使我们和当地人之间的友好关系得到加强.

Key.Original: Attack the line of defense of Rasman airport. The defenses are set on the line stretching from <marker name="BIS_defence">here</marker> to <marker name="BIS_defence_2">here</marker>.
Key.English: 攻击热斯曼机场的防线. 该防线从<marker name="BIS_defence">这里</marker>一直延伸到<marker name="BIS_defence_2">这里</marker>.

Key.Original: You discovered a hidden observation point of Aziz's milita. It is your target of opportunity. Eliminate all OPFOR militia defending the post.
Key.English: 你发现了Aziz的民兵的一个隐蔽观察哨. 这是你的一个意外目标, 消灭该处的全部敌方守军.

Key.Original: Destroy the AA (1, 2, 3, 4) on positions W and SW of the airport using the UAV. Do not expose your chopper directly.
Key.English: 使用无人机摧毁位于机场西部和西南部的防空火力(1, 2, 3, 4), 不要直接暴露你自己的直升机.

Key.Original: Land in the base and turn off your engines to finish the mission.
Key.English: 在基地降落并关闭发动机来结束这个任务.

Key.Original: Takistani reinforcements are advancing toward the freshly conquered aristrip. Engage and eliminate them.
Key.English: 塔基斯坦增援部队正在向刚刚被攻打下来的机场推进, 攻击并消灭他们.

Key.Original: We have captured the airfield. Patrol around it and destroy any POFOR units. You may expect fleeing Takistani troops, incoming militia reinforcements, or Taki armor. We also suspect some mortar entrenchments N, E, W of the airport.
Key.English: 我们已夺取了机场, 在其周围进行巡逻并消灭一切敌方单位. 如果有塔基斯坦军队从你眼皮底下逃走, 就有可能招来民兵增援部队或者塔基斯坦装甲部队. 另外我们怀疑在机场的北部, 东部, 西部还存在一些敌人的迫击炮工事.
正在初始化任务: 狩猎季节...

Key.Original: Force recon the situation around the road from Gospandi to Mulladost. Neutralize any hostile forces you encounter.
Key.English: 对连接高斯潘迪和穆拉多斯特的公路进行武装侦查, 消灭你所遇到的任何敌方单位.

Key.Original: Destroy ammo supplies near the defense line.
Key.English: 摧毁防线附近的弹药物资.

Key.Original: Destroy enemy vehicles parked in the area.
Key.English: 摧毁停放在这个地区的敌方载具.

Key.Original: US forces advance to the major objective.
Renegade, Gambler 1 here. AA defenses neutralized, you're all clear, over.
Key.English: "叛逆者", 这里是"狼獾1号". 敌方防空火力已被清除, 你可以自由活动了, 完毕.

Key.Original: Gambler, this is Renegade, I love you guys. All ground units clear the target area, we're going in hot. Renegade out.
Key.English: "狼獾", 这里是"叛逆者". 我爱你们, 伙计. 所有地面单位清理目标区域, 我们要大显身手了. "叛逆者"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Good one! The comms are down, so much for Takistani combat coordination.
Key.English: 干的漂亮! 通讯中心已被干掉, 塔基斯坦军队的战斗协同将乱成一锅粥了.

Key.Original: Citizen, Badger reporting in, their comms are FUBAR. Out.
Key.English: "公民", "狼獾"报告. 他们的通讯已经乱套了. 完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, stand by for orders.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫各单位, 请待命.

Key.Original: New objective is the airfield and base in Rasman. Make no mistake, OPFOR will be cornered and desperate. It's possible they may even blow the oil rigs as diversion, so don't let that happen.
Key.English: 新的目标是夺取位于热斯曼的机场和军事基地. 毋庸置疑, 敌方将走投无路并感到绝望. 他们很有可能会通过点燃油田来分散我们的注意力, 所以不要让他们得逞.

Key.Original: Follow your FRAGOs, avoid blue-on-blue, and maintain ROE.
Key.English: 按照你们各自的作战计划行事, 避免误伤, 并且遵守交战守则.

Key.Original: By the way, our good diplomacy with the locals has paid off: the Karzeg rebels marked the minefields around the airbase. Check your maps.
Key.English: 顺便说一下, 我们与当地民众的外交努力已见成效: 卡热格起义者为我们标记出了机场周围的雷区, 请查看你们的地图.
全体单位开始行动, "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, hold your positions and stand by, we've just taken the Rasman airport, good job everybody. Warmonger and Sundance, advance north along the hardball niner and pursue fleeing OPFOR. Citizen out.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫各单位, 留在你们现在的位置待命, 我们已经夺取了热斯曼机场, 大家干的非常不错. "好战者"和"太阳舞"请注意, 继续向北乘胜追击逃跑的敌方部队. "公民"通话完毕.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, be advised Takis managed to ingnite some of the oil rigs, damage unknown. Keep moving to your objectives, we fucked up with the oil rigs, all we can do now is to wait for Red Adair. Out.
Key.English: "公民"呼叫各单位, 请注意, 塔基斯坦军队点燃了一些油田设施, 毁坏程度不明. 继续向你们的目标前进, 我们输掉了油田, 我们现在只能等待'Red Adair'(美国著名消防英雄)到来了. 完毕.

Key.Original: As if we didn't see you doing that all the time, lieutenant. Just let me see what I can do. See you guys, gotta report in.
Key.English: 这就好像我们没办法时时刻刻看见你在做什么一样, 中尉. 只要我知道我能够做什么. 伙计们回头见, 我必须去汇报情况了.

Key.Original: Well, let's not lose hope just yet. We're supposed to take downtown Zargabad, I might try to ask my commander and take a look.
Key.English: 好了, 现在还不是失去希望的时候. 我们应该寄期望于拿下萨格巴德市中心. 我是不是应该说服我的上司批准我去看一下.

Key.Original: Wrong again, mister wing-wiper. Take a look at this stuff my team snatched while searching the tower...
Key.English: 你再一次错了, 伙计. 来看看我们在夺取并搜查塔台的时候找到的这个资料...

Key.Original: Well, let's not loose hope just yet. We're supposed to take downtown Zargabad. I might try to ask my commander and take a look.
Key.English: 好了, 现在还不是失去希望的时候. 我们应该寄期望于拿下萨格巴德市中心. 我是不是应该说服我的上司批准我去看一下.

Key.Original: Hey, guys! Any news about those missing civvies and pilot?
Key.English: 嘿, 弟兄们! 有关于那些失踪的平民和飞行员呃最新消息吗?

Key.Original: You serious? You really wanna try and convince a US Army lieutenant to ignore orders and let you enjoy a sightseeing tour?
Key.English: 你是认真的吗? 你真的想要说服一个美军中尉, 让他无视战斗命令批准你去"旅游观光"吗?

Key.Original: I give up. Good luck, man.
Key.English: 好吧, 我投降. 祝你好运, 伙计.

Key.Original: Not that we know of… surprisingly.
Key.English: 我不认为我们能得到什么...令人眼睛一亮的消息.

Key.Original: Dunno, Gambler. You... Okay, you know where they may be, but their chances of surviving the street fighting is close to zip.
Key.English: 我不确定, "赌徒". 你...好吧, 你知道他们可能在哪里, 但是他们在巷战中幸存下来的机会几乎等于零.

Key.Original: Drake, I like your style. If things get hot tomorrow on your crusade, gimme a call, you dig?
Key.English: Drake, 我喜欢你这风格. 如果明天你在"十字军东征"的时候遇到麻烦, 告诉我一声, 懂了吗?

Key.Original: TF Knight assumed attack positions around the <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">Rasman airport</marker> for the offensive starting at 2200. Civilan warnings were issued at 1800 and most of them departed an hour ago. ROE still in effect.
Key.English: "骑士"特遣部队已进入了<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">热斯曼机场</marker>周围的进攻位置, 进攻将在晚上22点整开始. 战争警告已在18点整向当地民众发出, 他们绝大多数都已在一个小时之前撤出相关区域. 但是交战守则依然有效.

Key.Original: OPFOR are holed up at the <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">airport</marker> and a nearby <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText">base</marker>. Some units may set up ambushes in the urban terrain of <marker name="BIS_MrkTKFlag1">Rasman city</marker>. BLUFOR units are entrenched S and SW of the airport. Badger group led by 1lt Herrera starts <marker name="BIS_MrkARM_Insertion">here</marker>.
Key.English: 敌方坚守着<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">机场</marker>以及附近的<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText">基地</marker>. 一些敌方单位可能会依靠<marker name="BIS_MrkTKFlag1">热斯曼城</marker>的城市地形对我们进行伏击. 我方单位已在机场南部和西南部建立稳固阵地, "狼獾"分队将由1号Herrera带领, 起始位置位于<marker name="BIS_MrkARM_Insertion">这里</marker>.

Key.Original: Your mission is to lead your unit to the <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">airfield</marker>, neutralize all resistance and destroy crucial OPFOR installations.
Key.English: 你的任务是带领你的分队前往<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">机场</marker>, 清除遇到的一切阻碍并摧毁敌方重要的军事设施.

Key.Original: Approach the <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">airport</marker> with caution and neutralize all resistance. Destroy <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText">OPFOR HQ</marker>, <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_CommsText">communication center</marker> and <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1">AA nests</marker> during or after the attack on the airport. Don't forget you've been assigned a commander of the whole Badger unit - concentrate on leadership as well as fighting.
Key.English: 慎重的接近<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText">机场</marker>并清除所遇到的一切阻碍. 摧毁<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText">敌方指挥部</marker>和<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_CommsText">通讯中心</marker>, 并且在进攻机场的过程中或者在夺得机场之后摧毁敌方的<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1">防空阵地</marker>. 不要忘了你被指派为整个"狼獾"分队的指挥官 - 请把全部精力集中在如何更好的指挥作战上.

Key.Original:
Use standard procedures to call artillery barrages anytime.

Call for refuel or ammo trucks if needed.
Key.English:
可以随时通过标准流程呼叫火炮进行火力覆盖.

可以在需要时呼叫燃料或弹药补给卡车.

Key.Original: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Rasman military base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Military Airfield</marker>. As leader of the armor division, Command has assigned engagement of any enemy armor units to you.
Key.English: 进攻并瓦解<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>热斯曼军事基地</marker>以及<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>军用机场</marker>的作战能力. 作为装甲分队的指挥官, 你可以与任何敌方装甲单位交战.

Key.Original: Attack the airport. It is defended by <marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1">AA batteries</marker> so it would be wise to wait until Special Forces neutralize it.
Key.English: 攻击机场, 但它受到<marker name="BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1">防空火力群</marker>的保护, 所以等待特种部队将防空火力群清除掉将会是明智的选择.

Key.Original: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. You are clear to engage all aircraft, armor and light armor units on sight, and eliminate any infantry units posing a threat.
Key.English: 进攻并瓦解<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>主要军事基地</marker>以及<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>北方的军用机场</marker>的作战能力. 你可以与任何对你构成威胁的飞机, 装甲单位, 轻型单位或者步兵单位交战.

Key.Original: There are 3 Anti-Aircraft Nests (<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1'>1</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_2'>2</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_3'>3</marker>) located just North of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. These must be put out of action.
Key.English: 在<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>北部军用机场</marker>附近有3个防空阵地(<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1'>1</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_2'>2</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_3'>3</marker>), 必须将它们摧毁.

Key.Original: To prevent any further complications, Command has extrapolated that the best course of action would be to destroy the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_Comms'>Communications Centre</marker>, located South-West of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Rasman Military Airfield</marker>.
Key.English: 为了防止任何不可预知的意外发生, 指挥部认为最好的办法就是摧毁位于<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>热斯曼军用机场</marker>西南方的<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_Comms'>通讯中心</marker>.

Key.Original: It is likely that once the Takistani Army starts losing the battle, they will destroy the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OilfieldText'>Oil Field Installations</marker> to avoid US forces taking control of the resources available there. Though this is not a critical objective, we need as much of local infrastructure intact for future rebuilding of the country. Your task is to clear the oilfield from OPFOR units while preserving the infrastructure.
Key.English: 塔基斯坦军队一旦开始输掉战斗, 他们很有可能摧毁<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OilfieldText'>油田设施</marker>以避免美军控制这里可用的资源. 虽然这不是一个关键目标, 但是我们在这个国家未来重建的过程中需要大量完好的基础设施. 你的任务是清除油田地区的敌方单位, 保护油田设施完好无损.

Key.Original: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. You are clear to engage all aircraft, light armor units and any infantry units posing a threat on sight.
Key.English: 进攻并瓦解<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>主要军事基地</marker>以及<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>北方的军用机场</marker>的作战能力. 你可以与任何对你构成威胁的飞机, 轻型单位或者步兵单位交战.

Key.Original: We are holding the Rasman airport with the military base. Good job, soldier!
Key.English: 我们占领了热斯曼机场以及军事基地, 干的漂亮, 士兵!

Key.Original: You were not able to complete the operation order. The mission failed.
Key.English: 你未能完成行动命令, 任务失败.

Key.Original: Activate high-command function by %1 to issue orders to other tanks in your command.
Key.English: 通过1%激活高级指挥功能, 以便对你麾下的其他坦克下达命令.
正在初始化任务: 沙漠风暴...

Key.Original: Joint night attack on enemy base.
Key.English: 联合对敌方基地进行夜间攻击.

Key.Original: Ground forces of TF Knight storm the military airfield. This is the shit!
Key.English: "骑士"特遣部队的地面部队将对敌方军用机场展开突袭!

Key.Original: All Knights be advised, Taki anti-air capabilities were eliminated, the skies are yours. I say again, enemy anti-air is out of action. Citizen out.
Key.English: All Knights be advised, Taki anti-air capabilities were eliminated, the skies are yours. I say again, enemy anti-air is out of action. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Holy shit! This is gonna be one hell of a ride!
Key.English: Holy shit! This is gonna be one hell of a ride!

Key.Original: God damn, imagine what's happening in the airport...I really hate to be in their shoes right now.
Key.English: God damn, imagine what's happening in the airport...I really hate to be in their shoes right now.

Key.Original: Shit! These artillerymen...blowing things up. Why don't they just level the whole area and then we come in to take out the rest? Then we'd…
Key.English: Shit! These artillerymen...blowing things up. Why don't they just level the whole area and then we come in to take out the rest? Then we'd…

Key.Original: You heard the boss! Let's get destructive! Come on!
Key.English: You heard the boss! Let's get destructive! Come on!

Key.Original: Citizen to all units. Artillery preparation done. All units cleared to move in. I say again, all units engage. Out.
Key.English: Citizen to all units. Artillery preparation done. All units cleared to move in. I say again, all units engage. Out.

Container.name: Chopper_LZ_secure
Container.situation: chopper with pierce is taking off.

Key.Original: We just loaded Renegade on board the Apache you sent for him. He's going to battle as we speak, over.
Key.English: We just loaded Renegade on board the Apache you sent for him. He's going to battle as we speak, over.

Key.Original: Good job, Hitman, now continue with your main objective. Citizen out.
Key.English: Good job, Hitman, now continue with your main objective. Citizen out.

Key.Original: All units, Citizen. The battle is ours, people, good job. The base and airfield are ours. You made me proud, Citizen out.
Key.English: All units, Citizen. The battle is ours, people, good job. The base and airfield are ours. You made me proud, Citizen out.

Key.Original: All units, Citizen. We are abort. I say again, abort all. All units return to initial positions. The Takis are way tougher than we thought. Citizen out.
Key.English: All units, Citizen. We are abort. I say again, abort all. All units return to initial positions. The Takis are way tougher than we thought. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Sir, we found Pierce... I mean Renegade 1. Over.
Key.English: Sir, we found Pierce... I mean Renegade 1. Over.

Key.Original: Citizen copies, good job. Someone from Renegade is gonna pick him up. He will land at the compound. Mark the LZ with IR strobes and stand by. Over.
Key.English: Citizen copies, good job. Someone from Renegade is gonna pick him up. He will land at the compound. Mark the LZ with IR strobes and stand by. Over.

Key.Original: Renegade 1, this is Citizen. Report your position, over.
Key.English: Renegade 1, this is Citizen. Report your position, over.

Key.Original: Renegade 1, stand by for blue infantry, callsign 'Hitman.' I'm sending them to you. How copy, over?
Key.English: Renegade 1, stand by for blue infantry, callsign 'Hitman.' I'm sending them to you. How copy, over?

Key.Original: Renegade 1 to all units. Can anyone hear this? Over.
Key.English: Renegade 1 to all units. Can anyone hear this? Over.

Key.Original: Citizen, the artillery destroyed the base I was being held in. OPFOR military compound at Rasman. Please advise, over.
Key.English: Citizen, the artillery destroyed the base I was being held in. OPFOR military compound at Rasman. Please advise, over.

Key.Original: Renegade 1 has solid copy and is standing by. Out.
Key.English: Renegade 1 has solid copy and is standing by. Out.

Key.Original: Pierce? Holy shit! You are supposed to be held captive!
Key.English: Pierce? Holy shit! You are supposed to be held captive!

Key.Original: Cool, you are the toughest. Let me call Citizen.
Key.English: Cool, you are the toughest. Let me call Citizen.

Key.Original: Hey! I'm over here, guys! Thank God I found you. I'm over here! Thank you God. Whew!
Key.English: Hey! I'm over here, guys! Thank God I found you. I'm over here! Thank you God. Whew!

Key.Original: Artillery took out enough that building I was in to let me escape. I'm so damn glad you're here.
Key.English: Artillery took out enough that building I was in to let me escape. I'm so damn glad you're here.

Key.Original: Razor 1 Actual to all units. We just found Renegade. I repeat, Renegade is going home. Out.
Key.English: Razor 1 Actual to all units. We just found Renegade. I repeat, Renegade is going home. Out.

Key.Original: Hey, Pierce, wake up, you all right?
Key.English: Hey, Pierce, wake up, you all right?

Key.Original: Shit, not really, those arty blasts rang my bell pretty good.
Key.English: Shit, not really, those arty blasts rang my bell pretty good.

Key.Original: Sure, I'm just a little dizzy.
Key.English: Sure, I'm just a little dizzy.

Key.Original: Since you're here, we could use you on the guns, captain. I suggest switching to thermal and getting some payback.
Key.English: Since you're here, we could use you on the guns, captain. I suggest switching to thermal and getting some payback.

Key.Original: How the fuck you know? Does Detachment know it all?
Key.English: How the fuck you know? Does Detachment know it all?

Key.Original: Gotcha, Capt'n. Anyway, we're supposed to take the downtown tomorrow, I might try to ask my commander and take a look.
Key.English: Gotcha, Capt'n. Anyway, we're supposed to take the downtown tomorrow, I might try to ask my commander and take a look.

Key.Original: As if we didn't see you doin' that all the time, Lieutenant. Just let me see what I can do. See you guys, gotta report in.
Key.English: As if we didn't see you doin' that all the time, Lieutenant. Just let me see what I can do. See you guys, gotta report in.

Key.Original: Hmm, that rings a bell. That's how locals call an old ornate building in Zargabad downtown...
Key.English: Hmm, that rings a bell. That's how locals call an old ornate building in Zargabad downtown...

Key.Original: You wish, smartie. Let's just say I know and the source is classified.
Key.English: You wish, smartie. Let's just say I know and the source is classified.

Key.Original: Hey Drake, see you in Zargabad.
Key.English: Hey Drake, see you in Zargabad.

Key.Original: No shit! How do you know?
Key.English: No shit! How do you know?

Key.Original: You can't be serious? You really wanna convince a US army lieutnant to ditch orders and let you enjoy a sightseeing tour?
Key.English: You can't be serious? You really wanna convince a US army lieutnant to ditch orders and let you enjoy a sightseeing tour?

Key.Original: I give up. Good luck, man.
Key.English: I give up. Good luck, man.

Key.Original: Guys, I've found something out. The four survivors from Mohican were still alive, they were transporting them north just when they brought me in that compound.
Key.English: Guys, I've found something out. The four survivors from Mohican were still alive, they were transporting them north just when they brought me in that compound.

Key.Original: Saw a Taki officer scaring the shit outta them. He told them they're brought to a 'Palace' for interrogation.
Key.English: Saw a Taki officer scaring the shit outta them. He told them they're brought to a 'Palace' for interrogation.

Key.Original: Drake, I like your style. If things get hot tomorrow on your crusade, gimme a call. You dig?
Key.English: Drake, I like your style. If things get hot tomorrow on your crusade, gimme a call. You dig?

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, get ready, ladies.
Key.English: Citizen to all units, get ready, ladies.

Key.Original: Be advised. There is also a blue POW somewhere out there. A pilot who was shot down around 1800 today. Callsign is Renegade. I repeat, Renegade.
Key.English: Be advised. There is also a blue POW somewhere out there. A pilot who was shot down around 1800 today. Callsign is Renegade. I repeat, Renegade.

Key.Original: It's highly likely he is in Rasman. So keep your eyes peeled, Hitman.
Key.English: It's highly likely he is in Rasman. So keep your eyes peeled, Hitman.

Key.Original: All units, commence the attack. Citizen out.
Key.English: All units, commence the attack. Citizen out.

Key.Original: All units, commence the attack. Citizen out.
Key.English: All units, commence the attack. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Hitman to Citizen, do you copy? Over.
Key.English: Hitman to Citizen, do you copy? Over.

Key.Original: We've cleared the southernmost part of Rasman. Over.
Key.English: We've cleared the southernmost part of Rasman. Over.

Key.Original: Hitman to Citizen. We've cleared central part of Rasman. Over.
Key.English: Hitman to Citizen. We've cleared central part of Rasman. Over.

Key.Original: Hitman to Citizen, the northern part of Rasman is ours, over.
Key.English: Hitman to Citizen, the northern part of Rasman is ours, over.

Key.Original: Citizen here, go ahead Hitman. Over.
Key.English: Citizen here, go ahead Hitman. Over.

Key.Original: Good job Hitman, keep moving. Out.
Key.English: Good job Hitman, keep moving. Out.

Key.Original: Citizen copies. Press on toward the town center, Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen copies. Press on toward the town center, Citizen out.

Key.Original: Nice work Hitman. Move towards the airport. Be advised, our armor is moving in, so be careful, over.
Key.English: Nice work Hitman. Move towards the airport. Be advised, our armor is moving in, so be careful, over.

Key.Original: You bastard! You move I kill you! You understand? You understand?
Key.English: You bastard! You move I kill you! You understand? You understand?

Key.Original: Kill the guy, he's runnig away. Kill the american! Alarm!
Key.English: Kill the guy, he's runnig away. Kill the american! Alarm!

Key.Original: My god, what happened here? I never saw more armor wrecks anywhere.
Key.English: My god, what happened here? I never saw more armor wrecks anywhere.

Key.Original: TF Knight has assumed attack positions around <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Rasman airport</marker>. This is our decisive offensive against the bulk of Aziz's forces. We have to be careful though, because CPT Garry Pierce is being held prisoner somewhere in the vicinity, most likely within the <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>militia compound</marker>.
Key.English: TF Knight has assumed attack positions around <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Rasman airport</marker>. This is our decisive offensive against the bulk of Aziz's forces. We have to be careful though, because CPT Garry Pierce is being held prisoner somewhere in the vicinity, most likely within the <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>militia compound</marker>.

Key.Original: OPFOR are holed up at the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>airport</marker> and a nearby <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>base</marker>. Our confidence is high CPT Pierce is being held withinin a <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>militia compound</marker> in Rasman. BLUFOR units are positioned south and southwest of the airport.
Key.English: OPFOR are holed up at the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>airport</marker> and a nearby <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>base</marker>. Our confidence is high CPT Pierce is being held withinin a <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>militia compound</marker> in Rasman. BLUFOR units are positioned south and southwest of the airport.

Key.Original: Your mission is to locate and save CPT Pierce, then to secure the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>base</marker> and <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>airfield</marker>, and immobilize as many vehicles as possible at the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>HQ</marker>.
Key.English: Your mission is to locate and save CPT Pierce, then to secure the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>base</marker> and <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>airfield</marker>, and immobilize as many vehicles as possible at the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>HQ</marker>.

Key.Original: Wait until the artillery barrage is over and then approach the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>airfield</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>base</marker> ASAP. We need to utilize the moment of surprise. Look for any signs of CPT Pierce at the <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>militia compound</marker>.
Key.English: Wait until the artillery barrage is over and then approach the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>airfield</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>base</marker> ASAP. We need to utilize the moment of surprise. Look for any signs of CPT Pierce at the <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>militia compound</marker>.

Key.Original: An artillery barrage will be fired before you enter the AO. Additionaly, an UAV callsign 'Hawk-Eye', has been linked to your HMMWV Terminal.
Key.English: An artillery barrage will be fired before you enter the AO. Additionaly, an UAV callsign 'Hawk-Eye', has been linked to your HMMWV Terminal.

Key.Original: The Helicopter Pilot, callsign 'Renegade One', which was taken captive by enemy forces has been located and will be picked up by an AH64D Helicopter at the designated <marker name='BIS_mrkImprovisedLZ'>Helicopter Landing Zone</marker>. The area is controlled by enemy forces, so you have been assigned to clear the area for the chopper. Once the area is clear, remain there until the pilot is safely picked up.
Key.English: The Helicopter Pilot, callsign 'Renegade One', which was taken captive by enemy forces has been located and will be picked up by an AH64D Helicopter at the designated <marker name='BIS_mrkImprovisedLZ'>Helicopter Landing Zone</marker>. The area is controlled by enemy forces, so you have been assigned to clear the area for the chopper. Once the area is clear, remain there until the pilot is safely picked up.

Key.Original: HQ has assigned an AH64D Helicopter to pick you up at the designated <marker name='BIS_mrkImprovisedLZ'>Helicopter Landing Zone</marker>. You will board the chopper as gunner, once it arrives. An infantry squad, callsign 'Hitman', will ensure the LZ is clear for the chopper and that you are safely picked up.
Key.English: HQ has assigned an AH64D Helicopter to pick you up at the designated <marker name='BIS_mrkImprovisedLZ'>Helicopter Landing Zone</marker>. You will board the chopper as gunner, once it arrives. An infantry squad, callsign 'Hitman', will ensure the LZ is clear for the chopper and that you are safely picked up.

Key.Original: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. You are clear to engage all aircraft, light armor units and any infantry units posing a threat on sight.
Key.English: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. You are clear to engage all aircraft, light armor units and any infantry units posing a threat on sight.

Key.Original: The <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OilfieldsText'>Lalezar Valley Oildfields</marker> are under Takistani Army control. Eliminate any units in the area posing a threat and secure the Oildfields.
Key.English: The <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OilfieldsText'>Lalezar Valley Oildfields</marker> are under Takistani Army control. Eliminate any units in the area posing a threat and secure the Oildfields.

Key.Original: Once you manage to escape, get into the air and help the US attack in the assault on the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>.
Key.English: Once you manage to escape, get into the air and help the US attack in the assault on the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>.

Key.Original: After being shot down, you were taken captive and are held in a <marker name='BIS_MrkJail'>Detention Facility</marker>, South-East of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker>. Find a way to escape and re-establish contact with Command.
Key.English: After being shot down, you were taken captive and are held in a <marker name='BIS_MrkJail'>Detention Facility</marker>, South-East of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker>. Find a way to escape and re-establish contact with Command.

Key.Original: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. You are clear to engage all aircraft, armor and light armor units on sight, and eliminate any infantry units posing a threat.
Key.English: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. You are clear to engage all aircraft, armor and light armor units on sight, and eliminate any infantry units posing a threat.

Key.Original: There are 3 Anti-Aircraft Nests (<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1'>1</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_2'>2</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_3'>3</marker>) located just North of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. These must be put out of action.
Key.English: There are 3 Anti-Aircraft Nests (<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_1'>1</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_2'>2</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AANestText_3'>3</marker>) located just North of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. These must be put out of action.

Key.Original: Your team will be transported via C-130 flying at high altitude to the <marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_Insertion'>Insertion point</marker>, whereupon you will perform a High Altitude Low Opening drop to a location close to the enemy lines.
Key.English: Your team will be transported via C-130 flying at high altitude to the <marker name='BIS_MrkDELTA_Insertion'>Insertion point</marker>, whereupon you will perform a High Altitude Low Opening drop to a location close to the enemy lines.

Key.Original: Locate the captive Helicopter Pilot, callsign 'Renegade One', which was taken captive by enemy forces and is most probably being held somewhere in the marked <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>Military Compound</marker>.
Key.English: Locate the captive Helicopter Pilot, callsign 'Renegade One', which was taken captive by enemy forces and is most probably being held somewhere in the marked <marker name='BIS_mrkHELIAreaText'>Military Compound</marker>.

Key.Original: Clear the city of Rasman (<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OutskirtsText'>Southern Outskirts</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_RasmanText_1'>South Rasman</marker>, and <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_RasmanText_2'>North Rasman</marker>) of enemy units and defences.
Key.English: Clear the city of Rasman (<marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OutskirtsText'>Southern Outskirts</marker>, <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_RasmanText_1'>South Rasman</marker>, and <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_RasmanText_2'>North Rasman</marker>) of enemy units and defenses.

Key.Original: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. As leader of the Armor Division, Command has assigned engagement of any enemy Armor units to you.
Key.English: Assault and disable the attack capabilities of the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_MainBaseText'>Main Military Base</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_AirfieldText'>Northern Military Airfield</marker>. As leader of the Armor Division, Command has assigned engagement of any enemy Armor units to you.

Key.Original: In a glorious effort we have crushed the Takistani forces present at the Main Military Base and the Northern Military Airfield. Our downed helicopter pilot has been rescued and we have sustained minimal casualties. A job well done.
Key.English: In a glorious effort we have crushed the Takistani forces present at the Main Military Base and the Northern Military Airfield. Our downed helicopter pilot has been rescued and we have sustained minimal casualties. A job well done.

Key.Original: Our forces have taken too many casualties, we cannot continue losing good soldiers like this, we're pulling out.
Key.English: Our forces have taken too many casualties, we cannot continue losing good soldiers like this, we're pulling out.

Key.Original: The rescue attempt for our downed helicopter pilot, codename 'Renegade One', has failed.
Key.English: The rescue attempt for our downed helicopter pilot, codename 'Renegade One', has failed.

Key.Original: The assault is taking too long. We are taking countless casualties and cannot continue with the Operation.
Key.English: The assault is taking too long. We are taking countless casualties and cannot continue with the Operation.

Key.Original: Major night strike on enemy main base.
Key.English: Major night strike on enemy main base.

Key.Original: Ground troops are on the move to the major objective. There is a downed US pilot somewhere, waiting for salvation...
Key.English: Ground troops are on the move to the major objective. There is a downed US pilot somewhere, waiting for salvation...

Key.Original: All we know is he was taken away in the night.
Key.English: All we know is he was taken away in the night.

Key.Original: They were beating him, calling him a murderous pig. Then they took him away, we believe he's dead.
Key.English: They were beating him, calling him a murderous pig. Then they took him away, we believe he's dead.

Key.Original: Guards in black turbans came and took him away in the night. It's all we know.
Key.English: Guards in black turbans came and took him away in the night. It's all we know.

Container.name: asking_to_free_hostages
Container.situation: player found dead hostages in the mosque

Key.Original: I guess all of us should sometimes do the right thing, including the COs.
Key.English: I guess all of us should sometimes do the right thing, including the COs.

Key.Original: Oh god... Drake, listen, there's a lot of confusion in combat, right? Noone's gonna blame you for missing a turn and getting lost in the city, you got it?
Key.English: Oh god... Drake, listen, there's a lot of confusion in combat, right? Noone's gonna blame you for missing a turn and getting lost in the city, you got it?

Key.Original: Just don't make me regret it.
Key.English: Just don't make me regret it.

Key.Original: Sir, there are our people out there. If you don't permit me to take few men and this Bradley, I am gonna desert and save them with my bare hands.
Key.English: Sir, there are our people out there. If you don't permit me to take few men and this Bradley, I am gonna desert and save them with my bare hands.

Key.Original: Hey, that's very kind of you, sir. I appreciate it.
Key.English: Hey, that's very kind of you, sir. I appreciate it.

Key.Original: That won't be necessary. I want my objectives accomplished, rest is up to you... Take your Bradley and out of my sight!
Key.English: That won't be necessary. I want my objectives accomplished, rest is up to you... Take your Bradley and out of my sight!

Key.Original: May I have a word with you, sir?
Key.English: May I have a word with you, sir?

Key.Original: Sir, I have sort of hard intel on the location of the people from that plane crash tomorrow. It's close to our objectives anyway, we can check it.
Key.English: Sir, I have sort of hard intel on the location of the people from that plane crash tomorrow. It's close to our objectives anyway, we can check it.

Key.Original: Spit it out Drake... We're outta time.
Key.English: Spit it out Drake... We're outta time.

Key.Original: Been hanging out with Delta types lately, huh? Why the hell should I allow you to command one of my squads to some shithole instead of taking out a missile depot?
Key.English: Been hanging out with Delta types lately, huh? Why the hell should I allow you to command one of my squads to some shithole instead of taking out a missile depot?

Key.Original: Hitman, Citizen. There's an SUV near your position, we believe Aziz is inside.
Key.English: Hitman, Citizen. There's an SUV near your position, we believe Aziz is inside.

Key.Original: He must have slipped through… anyway, secure the site, we're sending a chopper to eliminate him. Citizen out.
Key.English: He must have slipped through… anyway, secure the site, we're sending a chopper to eliminate him. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Hitman, this is Citizen. Be advised, we've lost Madman. Repeat, we lost Madman. Out.
Key.English: Hitman, this is Citizen. Be advised, we've lost Madman. Repeat, we lost Madman. Out.

Container.name: aziz_killed
Container.situation: player found dead hostages in the mosque

Key.Original: Citizen, Hitman here, reporting Madman is down! I say again, Madman is a confirmed kill, over.
Key.English: Citizen, Hitman here, reporting Madman is down! I say again, Madman is a confirmed kill, over.

Key.Original: Citizen copies the good news, Hitman. Secure the surroundings and continue mission, out.
Key.English: Citizen copies the good news, Hitman. Secure the surroundings and continue mission, out.

Key.Original: Okay, this is the place, that captives should be. Stay sharp everyone.
Key.English: Okay, this is the place, that captives should be. Stay sharp everyone.

Key.Original: Shit, where do they hold them? They're on the roof or what?
Key.English: Shit, where do they hold them? They're on the roof or what?

Container.name: hostages_killed
Container.situation: player found dead hostages in the mosque

Key.Original: Damn, we're late. The hostages are dead. Crap!
Key.English: Damn, we're late. The hostages are dead. Crap!

Key.Original: Hitman to Citizen. Sir, I got some bad news. We just found the bodies of people from Mohican, two women and the Czech doc. Transmitting grid coordinates. Over.
Key.English: Hitman to Citizen. Sir, I got some bad news. We just found the bodies of people from Mohican, two women and the Czech doc. Transmitting grid coordinates. Over.

Key.Original: Citizen copies Mohican losses. Keep it together and stand on your objective Hitman. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen copies Mohican losses. Keep it together and stand on your objective Hitman. Citizen out.

Key.Original: We're so happy you found us. God knows what more they had for us!
Key.English: We're so happy you found us. God knows what more they had for us!

Key.Original: OK, stay down! We're US Army! Are there any more guards around here?
Key.English: OK, stay down! We're US Army! Are there any more guards around here?

Key.Original: So good to see you in one piece! Everyone thought you're all dead.
Key.English: So good to see you in one piece! Everyone thought you're all dead.

Key.Original: OK, we're happy too, but now I need to make a phonecall.
Key.English: OK, we're happy too, but now I need to make a phonecall.

Key.Original: Hitman to Citizen, we found three, say again three of the MIAs from Mohican, none wounded. Need immediate evac for three people, over.
Key.English: Hitman to Citizen, we found three, say again three of the MIAs from Mohican, none wounded. Need immediate evac for three people, over.

Key.Original: Negative, but I'll keep looking. Allright, you just stay here, rescue team is on the way to extract you. You'll be safe.
Key.English: Negative, but I'll keep looking. Allright, you just stay here, rescue team is on the way to extract you. You'll be safe.

Key.Original: Thanks, doc. Allright men, gather up, we have work to do.
Key.English: Thanks, doc. Allright men, gather up, we have work to do.

Key.Original: Those you killed were the only ones who didn't run. Oh, God, it's so good to hear some English again.
Key.English: Those you killed were the only ones who didn't run. Oh, God, it's so good to hear some English again.

Key.Original: They were treating us quite well, but still... it was terrible.
Key.English: They were treating us quite well, but still... it was terrible.

Key.Original: Well, no wonder - they almost killed us several times!
Key.English: Well, no wonder - they almost killed us several times!

Key.Original: Thanks, sergeant. If you happen to come to Prague one day, beer's on me!
Key.English: Thanks, sergeant. If you happen to come to Prague one day, beer's on me!

Key.Original: Hard to believe, but outstanding news, Hitman! Rescue will be inbound momentarily. Any intel on that Air Force guy? Over.
Key.English: Hard to believe, but outstanding news, Hitman! Rescue will be inbound momentarily. Any intel on that Air Force guy? Over.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units. Our forces have eliminated Enemy Number One. We just nailed Aziz's ass. Stick to your plans, people, it should be easier now. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen to all units. Our forces have eliminated Enemy Number One. We just nailed Aziz's ass. Stick to your plans, people, it should be easier now. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, survivors from the Hercules that crashed yesterday morning were found safe. The guys from ANN are ecstatic about it. Continue with your objectives. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen to all units, survivors from the Hercules that crashed yesterday morning were found safe. The guys from ANN are ecstatic about it. Continue with your objectives. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, a huge Takistani Army unit just surrendered and is now handing over tons of intel. A reminder, that anyone surrendering must be treated well. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen to all units, a huge Takistani Army unit just surrendered and is now handing over tons of intel. A reminder, that anyone surrendering must be treated well. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units, Takistani ballistic missile launchers were neutralized minutes ago. Proceed with your objectives. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen to all units, Takistani ballistic missile launchers were neutralized minutes ago. Proceed with your objectives. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Be advised, strong resistance reported in the northern part of town. Be careful around there, Citizen out.
Key.English: Be advised, strong resistance reported in the northern part of town. Be careful around there, Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen, Warmonger. Civvies are coming forward in droves with militia hideout locations and other intel. Looks like they're behind us on this! Out.
Key.English: Citizen, Warmonger. Civvies are coming forward in droves with militia hideout locations and other intel. Looks like they're behind us on this! Out.

Key.Original: Sir, I'd love to kick that bastard ass myself. Over.
Key.English: Sir, I'd love to kick that bastard ass myself. Over.

Key.Original: Citizen copies. Continue with your mission. Out.
Key.English: Citizen copies. Continue with your mission. Out.

Key.Original: Sir, I really symapthize with the captives. I'd like to try freeing them myself, Citizen. Over.
Key.English: Sir, I really symapthize with the captives. I'd like to try freeing them myself, Citizen. Over.

Key.Original: Good copy, the job's yours. We'll assign other units to cover down on your current mission.
Key.English: Good copy, the job's yours. We'll assign other units to cover down on your current mission.

Key.Original: Hitman, Citizen. We have fresh intel on the captured doctors and pilot. Can you look into it?
Key.English: Hitman, Citizen. We have fresh intel on the captured doctors and pilot. Can you look into it?

Key.Original: Sir, we just neutralized the SCUD launchers. Over.
Key.English: Sir, we just neutralized the SCUD launchers. Over.

Key.Original: Citizen copies, all SCUDs dead. Good work. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen copies, all SCUDs dead. Good work. Citizen out.

Key.Original: All right, you heard the boss. Stay sharp. Movin' out!
Key.English: All right, you heard the boss. Stay sharp. Movin' out!

Key.Original: Citizen to all units. It's been a hell of a storm so far, but that's only the eye. Today we either make it or break it.
Key.English: Citizen to all units. It's been a hell of a storm so far, but that's only the eye. Today we either make it or break it.

Key.Original: ROE is vital. Too much collateral damage, and we lose even if we meet our objectives.
Key.English: ROE is vital. Too much collateral damage, and we lose even if we meet our objectives.

Key.Original: Also, Colonel Aziz, one of the wanted war criminals, is still in town. Find him, take him alive if possible, but if you can't, it's better we have a corpse than nothing at all. Stay sharp, and God bless you! Out.
Key.English: Also, Colonel Aziz, one of the wanted war criminals, is still in town. Find him, take him alive if possible, but if you can't, it's better we have a corpse than nothing at all. Stay sharp, and God bless you! Out.

Key.Original: Citizen to all units. Gentlemen, I'm pleased to inform you we've achieved all command objectives.
Key.English: Citizen to all units. Gentlemen, I'm pleased to inform you we've achieved all command objectives.

Key.Original: TF Knight fought very well today.
Key.English: TF Knight fought very well today.

Key.Original: Make no mistake: the fact that Aziz made it to the Top 5 today does not lessen your achievement. All of the surviving civilian prisoners have also been rescued.
Key.English: Make no mistake: the fact that Aziz made it to the Top 5 today does not lessen your achievement. All of the surviving civilian prisoners have also been rescued.

Key.Original: All units are RTB for celebration op. Drinks are on Uncle Sam! Out.
Key.English: All units are RTB for celebration op. Drinks are on Uncle Sam! Out.

Key.Original: After gaining control of the most important infrastructure and cities of Takistan, the TF Knight prepares for the battle of Zargabad. Col. Aziz is entrenched in his <marker name="BIS_villa">villa</marker> northeast of Zargabad and placed SCUD batteries in the city. We need to capture the city and Col. Aziz.
Key.English: After gaining control of the most important infrastructure and cities of Takistan, the TF Knight prepares for the battle of Zargabad. Col. Aziz is entrenched in his <marker name="BIS_villa">villa</marker> northeast of Zargabad and placed SCUD batteries in the city. We need to capture the city and Col. Aziz.

Key.Original:
The city is full of civilians so remember the ROE - think twice before you press the trigger!
Many OPFOR units, army and militia are present in the city. Aziz will probably by defended by his elite troops. SCUD batteries are placed here, here and here.
The BLUFOR are located in positions S and E of the city.
Key.English:
The city is full of civilians so remember the ROE - think twice before you press the trigger!
Many OPFOR units, army and militia are present in the city. Aziz will probably by defended by his elite troops. SCUD batteries are placed here, here and here.
The BLUFOR are located in positions S and E of the city.

Key.Original: Get hold of the city, elinimate all OPFOR resistance and find and capture colonel Aziz. Keep civilian casualties as low as possible as this is a very sensitive situation. Neutralizing of the SCUDS is a priority.
Key.English: Get hold of the city, elinimate all OPFOR resistance and find and capture colonel Aziz. Keep civilian casualties as low as possible as this is a very sensitive situation. Neutralizing of the SCUDS is a priority.

Key.Original:
The Op starts at 0600. You will move to the city and enter an MOUT (military operations in urban terrain).
Neutralize all resistance in the city, concentrate on the SCUD launchers.
Move to the villa of Col. Aziz and capture him. Dead or alive.
Key.English:
The Op starts at 0600. You will move to the city and enter an MOUT (military operations in urban terrain).
Neutralize all resistance in the city, concentrate on the SCUD launchers.
Move to the villa of Col. Aziz and capture him. Dead or alive.

Key.Original: Use standard proceedures to call in mortar round if needed.
Key.English: Use standard proceedures to call in mortar round if needed.

Key.Original: Col. Aziz is in US custody and the POW's are safely returned back home. What more could we wish for? Perfect job!
