Key.English: Col. Aziz is in US custody and the POW's are safely returned back home. What more could we wish for? Perfect job!

Key.Original: We managed to save the POW, who are now safe and recovering. Col. Aziz has fled however. Puruse party is forming an the moment.
Key.English: We managed to save the POW, who are now safe and recovering. Col. Aziz has fled however. Puruse party is forming an the moment.

Key.Original: We eliminated Col. Aziz but we weren't able to save the prisoners. At least their bodies will be returned home safely.
Key.English: We eliminated Col. Aziz but we weren't able to save the prisoners. At least their bodies will be returned home safely.

Key.Original: Col. Aziz fled, the POWs were found dead. In order to save us from disgrace, we must attempt to eliminate Aziz.
Key.English: Col. Aziz fled, the POWs were found dead. In order to save us from disgrace, we must attempt to eliminate Aziz.

Key.Original: The SCUD missiles were launched. The destruction is massive, people turn away from us, media feasts on it. We messed up pretty badly.
Key.English: The SCUD missiles were launched. The destruction is massive, people turn away from us, media feasts on it. We messed up pretty badly.

Key.Original: Initializing Mission: Eye of the Typhoon...
Key.English: Initializing Mission: Eye of the Typhoon...

Key.Original: Col. Aziz is our high priority target. He's located in his villa. We suppose he'll be heavily guarded and will not give up easily. He also might have an escape plan. Our confidence is high that he'll be picked up by a chopper and try to leave if things prove wrong for him.
Key.English: Col. Aziz is our high priority target. He's located in his villa. We suppose he'll be heavily guarded and will not give up easily. He also might have an escape plan. Our confidence is high that he'll be picked up by a chopper and try to leave if things prove wrong for him.

Key.Original: Aziz has deployed 3 SCUD launchers <marker name='BIS_scud1'>here</marker>, <marker name='BIS_scud2'>here</marker> and <marker name='BIS_scud3'>here</marker>. He claims he's going to fire them at major Takistani cities as our forces will try to capture him. We need the launchers eliminated ASAP, preferably before we strike on Aziz.
Key.English: Aziz has deployed 3 SCUD launchers <marker name='BIS_scud1'>here</marker>, <marker name='BIS_scud2'>here</marker> and <marker name='BIS_scud3'>here</marker>. He claims he's going to fire them at major Takistani cities as our forces will try to capture him. We need the launchers eliminated ASAP, preferably before we strike on Aziz.

Key.Original: To secure the whole area, we need to get hold of the northern bridge.
Key.English: To secure the whole area, we need to get hold of the northern bridge.

Key.Original: To secure the whole area, we need to get hold of the southern bridge.
Key.English: To secure the whole area, we need to get hold of the southern bridge.

Key.Original: The battle of Zargabad commences. The stakes are high...
Key.English: The battle of Zargabad commences. The stakes are high...

Key.Original: According to local intel sources, the civilian POW's are held in Zargabad. It is imperative we save them before they are moved or worse.
Key.English: According to local intel sources, the civilian POW's are held in Zargabad. It is imperative we save them before they are moved or worse.

Container.name: Aziz_down
Container.situation: main villain killed

Key.Original: Well done, Renegade, that's a positive kill.
Key.English: Well done, Renegade, that's a positive kill.

Key.Original: Negative, return to base immediately, we have the crash area under surveillance and recovery team's on the way. Citizen out.
Key.English: Negative, return to base immediately, we have the crash area under surveillance and recovery team's on the way. Citizen out.

Key.Original: That's for Sparky and Grover, motherfucker! No more boom-boom for this baby!
Key.English: That's for Sparky and Grover, motherfucker! No more boom-boom for this baby!

Key.Original: Citizen, reporting, Madman has been shot down. We just downed Colonel Aziz, over.
Key.English: Citizen, reporting, Madman has been shot down. We just downed Colonel Aziz, over.

Key.Original: Permission to strafe the crashsite, just in case? Over.
Key.English: Permission to strafe the crashsite, just in case? Over.

Container.name: Aziz_escaped
Container.situation: main villain escaped

Key.Original: Well guys. You can head back home. Aziz just left Takistani airspace. We lost him. Out.
Key.English: Well guys. You can head back home. Aziz just left Takistani airspace. We lost him. Out.

Key.Original: Lets head back to base, sir.
Key.English: Lets head back to base, sir.

Key.Original: You're right, let's go. Maybe another day...
Key.English: You're right, let's go. Maybe another day...

Container.name: Aziz_helicopter_reached
Container.situation: player sees the aziz's helicopter

Key.Original: OK, you're cleared to engage, over.
Key.English: OK, you're cleared to engage, over.

Key.Original: Renegade 6-1 to Revolver, we have Madman in sight, positive ID, over.
Key.English: Renegade 6-1 to Revolver, we have Madman in sight, positive ID, over.

Container.name: Aziz_lame
Container.situation: regular information update on fleeing target

Key.Original: Renegade, you won't believe it, but Aziz's helicopter crashed. You are RTB, mission complete. Over.
Key.English: Renegade, you won't believe it, but Aziz's helicopter crashed. You are RTB, mission complete. Over.

Key.Original: We have no idea, anyway, keep your mouth shut. RTB immediately, Citizen out.
Key.English: We have no idea, anyway, keep your mouth shut. RTB immediately, Citizen out.

Key.Original: Er… are you sure? I mean… it sounds really weird… did he pilot it himself or what? Over.
Key.English: Er… are you sure? I mean… it sounds really weird… did he pilot it himself or what? Over.

Container.name: Beginning
Container.situation: players are on the military airstrip. they stay near the ah-64 vehicles getting briefing about aziz.

Key.Original: Pierce, we've just received confirmation that Colonel Aziz is alive and trying to leave the country in a small helicopter.
Key.English: Pierce, we've just received confirmation that Colonel Aziz is alive and trying to leave the country in a small helicopter.

Key.Original: Get your ass in that Apache and head north-east, we'll be updating info on his position.
Key.English: Get your ass in that Apache and head north-east, we'll be updating info on his position.

Key.Original: Whatcha waiting for, get moving before he leaves to Ardistan!
Key.English: Whatcha waiting for, get moving before he leaves to Ardistan!

Container.name: Fox_hunters_down
Container.situation: a-10a destroyed the foxhunters

Key.Original: Copy, continue with the mission. Out.
Key.English: Copy, continue with the mission. Out.

Key.Original: Revolver, those Hinds won't be bothering us anymore, over.
Key.English: Revolver, those Hinds won't be bothering us anymore, over.

Container.name: Fox_hunters_found
Container.situation: player sees the aziz's support helicopters

Key.Original: Negative, we'll waste them ourselves, thank you. Out.
Key.English: Negative, we'll waste them ourselves, thank you. Out.

Key.Original: A little insurance is always welcome. Send them in, over.
Key.English: A little insurance is always welcome. Send them in, over.

Key.Original: Copy. We have an A-10 on-station not far from you. If you want some assistance, it's yours. Acknowledge, over.
Key.English: Copy. We have an A-10 on-station not far from you. If you want some assistance, it's yours. Acknowledge, over.

Key.Original: Sir, there are two Hinds approaching Aziz, looks like he has reinforcements.
Key.English: Sir, there are two Hinds approaching Aziz, looks like he has reinforcements.

Key.Original: Where the hell did they dig 'em from?
Key.English: Where the hell did they dig 'em from?

Key.Original: Revolver, we have contact on two Hind gunships covering the target. Over.
Key.English: Revolver, we have contact on two Hind gunships covering the target. Over.

Container.name: Heading_information
Container.situation: regular information update on fleeing target

Key.Original: Renegade, Madman at an altitude of
Key.English: Renegade, Madman at an altitude of

Key.Original: Your optimum course to reach him is
Key.English: Your optimum course to reach him is

Key.Original: Aziz's Helicopter, codename 'Madman' is trying to move over border to Ardistan, where he hopes to get out of our reach. You must stop him.
Key.English: Aziz's Helicopter, codename 'Madman' is trying to move over border to Ardistan, where he hopes to get out of our reach. You must stop him.

Key.Original: Apache gunships, codename 'Renegade' are going to hunt 'Madman' - a UH1H helicopter. The base is going to send current heading of 'Madman' to 'Renegade' as often as possible.
Key.English: Apache gunships, codename 'Renegade' are going to hunt 'Madman' - a UH1H helicopter. The base is going to send current heading of 'Madman' to 'Renegade' as often as possible.

Key.Original: Prevent 'Madman' to reach the border in his helicopter. We need him at any cost.
Key.English: Prevent 'Madman' to reach the border in his helicopter. We need him at any cost.

Key.Original:
Base will send you information on 'Madman' heading, altitude and course - follow this information to reach him.
After you make contact with 'Madman', you are free to engage and neutralize him.
At any cost.
Key.English:
Base will send you information on 'Madman' heading, altitude and course - follow this information to reach him.
After you make contact with 'Madman', you are free to engage and neutralize him.
At any cost.

Key.Original: You will be updated regularly on Madman's course, altitude and heading.
Key.English: You will be updated regularly on Madman's course, altitude and heading.

Key.Original: Col. Aziz was killed by US Army during his attempt to escape from Takistan. The country was a few next year in chaos, but...
Key.English: Col. Aziz was killed by US Army during his attempt to escape from Takistan. The country was a few next year in chaos, but...

Key.Original: Col. Aziz's escape was succesfull. US Army wasn't able to stop him...
Key.English: Col. Aziz's escape was succesfull. US Army wasn't able to stop him...

Key.Original: Aziz will try to escape Takistan in a helicopter. Locate and stop him forever
Key.English: Aziz will try to escape Takistan in a helicopter. Locate and stop him forever

Key.Original: After eliminating Aziz, your final task is to return to base for debriefing.
Key.English: After eliminating Aziz, your final task is to return to base for debriefing.

Key.Original: The three numbers are actually one number you should keep in the center of your compas to reach 'Mad Man'.
Key.English: The three numbers are actually one number you should keep in the center of your compas to reach 'Mad Man'.

Key.Original: Gunships take off to square the score.
Key.English: Gunships take off to square the score.

Key.Original: The war criminal tries to escape. Gunships are taking off to stop him.
Key.English: The war criminal tries to escape. Gunships are taking off to stop him.

Container.name: Aziz_down
Container.situation: col. kane(mission leader) informing graves (player) about aziz (mission target) is killed by apache (friendly helicopter).

Key.Original: Citizen, Gambler copies. Glad to hear we didn't lose him, over.
Key.English: Citizen, Gambler copies. Glad to hear we didn't lose him, over.

Key.Original: Centurion, Gambler Lead, do you copy? Over.
Key.English: Centurion, Gambler Lead, do you copy? Over.

Key.Original: It would've been your ass if he got away, but you came out of this one smelling like a rose, count yourself lucky. Citizen out.
Key.English: It would've been your ass if he got away, but you came out of this one smelling like a rose, count yourself lucky. Citizen out.

Container.name: Aziz_escaped
Container.situation: main target escaped.

Key.Original: Oh man, Citizen is pissed. He'll probably kill us.
Key.English: Oh man, Citizen is pissed. He'll probably kill us.

Key.Original: Gambler, Citizen. Bad news. Mad Dog just left Taki airspace, over.
Key.English: Gambler, Citizen. Bad news. Mad Dog just left Taki airspace, over.

Key.Original: Damn' is right. This just got a whole lot more complicated. Out.
Key.English: Damn' is right. This just got a whole lot more complicated. Out.

Container.name: Aziz_killed
Container.situation: player informing mission leader about primary target complete (aziz is killed).

Key.Original: Citizen, Hitman here, reporting Mad Man is down. I say again, Mad Man is a confirmed kill, over.
Key.English: Citizen, Hitman here, reporting Mad Man is down. I say again, Mad Man is a confirmed kill, over.

Key.Original: Citizen copies. Hold your position and await your extraction, callsign 'Nightstalker.' Good work out there. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen copies. Hold your position and await your extraction, callsign 'Nightstalker.' Good work out there. Citizen out.

Container.name: Aziz_leaves_the_facility
Container.situation: target leaves the facility

Key.Original: Citizen, Mad Dog is leaving the facility in a chopper! Over.
Key.English: Citizen, Mad Dog is leaving the facility in a chopper! Over.

Key.Original: Copy that, hold position. Air assets are being diverted to take up pursuit. You better hope they're successful. Out.
Key.English: Copy that, hold position. Air assets are being diverted to take up pursuit. You better hope they're successful. Out.

Container.name: Aziz_transport_arrived
Container.situation: player sees the aziz's (assassination mission target) transport helicopter who'll try to flee in it.

Key.Original: Chopper inbound, must be Mad Dog's transport. Double-time it, guys!
Key.English: Chopper inbound, must be Mad Dog's transport. Double-time it, guys!

Container.name: Beginning_in_Hercules
Container.situation: players are on the way to the facility. terry graves instructing the rest of the team.

Key.Original: All right, guys, let's do a quick recap.
Key.English: All right, guys, let's do a quick recap.

Key.Original: Our mark is Colonel Aziz, codename Mad Dog. He owes me, so I want this to be a smooth takedown.
Key.English: Our mark is Colonel Aziz, codename Mad Dog. He owes me, so I want this to be a smooth takedown.

Key.Original: He's hiding in the abandoned village of Ravanay. We'll HALO as close as possible.
Key.English: He's hiding in the abandoned village of Ravanay. We'll HALO as close as possible.

Key.Original: He's expecting us and will probably try to flee at first signs of contact. So we gotta be quiet and quick. Any questions?
Key.English: He's expecting us and will probably try to flee at first signs of contact. So we gotta be quiet and quick. Any questions?

Key.Original: The Special Forces team 'Gambler' succesfully neutralized OPFOR leader, Col. Aziz.
Key.English: The Special Forces team 'Gambler' succesfully neutralized OPFOR leader, Col. Aziz.

Key.Original: You were not able to complete the operation order. Col. Aziz escaped.
Key.English: You were not able to complete the operation order. Col. Aziz escaped.

Container.name: Delta_has_landed
Container.situation: whole delta team is regrouped on the ground after parachute jump.

Container.name: Time_to_HALO
Container.situation: graves is giving the last information, prepare for parachute jump.

Key.Original: One minute to the drop zone guys.
Key.English: One minute to the drop zone guys.

Key.Original: Intelligence found Aziz, codename 'Mad Dog', holed up in a remote village called <marker name='BIS_MrkRavanay'>Ravanay</marker>. Special Forces team 'Gambler' is being inserted to capture him.
Key.English: Intelligence found Aziz, codename 'Mad Dog', holed up in a remote village called <marker name='BIS_MrkRavanay'>Ravanay</marker>. Special Forces team 'Gambler' is being inserted to capture him.

Key.Original:
The village is guarded by Taki specials. Our IR readings show at least 12 operatives.
'Gambler' will be HALOed in the vicinity of the village. We want to keep a low profile here.
Key.English:
The village is guarded by Taki specials. Our IR readings show at least 12 operatives.
'Gambler' will be HALOed in the vicinity of the village. We want to keep a low profile here.

Key.Original: Infiltrate the village fo Ravanay, find 'Mad Dog' and eliminate him. He'll no doubt attempt to flee as soon as an alarm is raised.
Key.English: Infiltrate the village fo Ravanay, find 'Mad Dog' and eliminate him. He'll no doubt attempt to flee as soon as an alarm is raised.

Key.Original:
Insert via HALO from a C-130 Hercules codename 'Fatman' near Ravanay village.
Infiltrate the village, identify 'Mad Dog' and neutralize him.
Keep low profile until 'Mad Dog' is eliminated. He must not escape!
Key.English:
Insert via HALO from a C-130 Hercules codename 'Fatman' near Ravanay village.
Infiltrate the village, identify 'Mad Dog' and neutralize him.
Keep low profile until 'Mad Dog' is eliminated. He must not escape!

Key.Original: The Renegade gunship group is patrolling in the airspace outside the village.
Key.English: The Renegade gunship group is patrolling in the airspace outside the village.

Key.Original: The war criminal is still holed up in a mountain hideout. Time for a black op...
Key.English: The war criminal is still holed up in a mountain hideout. Time for a black op...

Key.Original: Aziz is barricated in an old mosque. He will try to escape from Takistan. Locate and get him!
Key.English: Aziz is barricated in an old mosque. He will try to escape from Takistan. Locate and get him!

Key.Original: Pickup helicopter is flying to pick your group up. Get away!
Key.English: Pickup helicopter is flying to pick your group up. Get away!

Key.Original: Wait for pickup and get away.
Key.English: Wait for pickup and get away.

Key.Original: Welcome to High Altitude, Low Opening parachute jump. You are now in free-fall mode. You can steer your fall by pressing %1, %2, %3 and %4.
Key.English: Welcome to High Altitude, Low Opening parachute jump. You are now in free-fall mode. You can steer your fall by pressing %1, %2, %3 and %4.

Key.Original: Wait until your altitude on the top right of the screen drops below 300 - otherwise it is not LOW OPENING. Use Open parachute action in appropriate altitude.
Key.English: Wait until your altitude on the top right of the screen drops below 300 - otherwise it is not LOW OPENING. Use Open parachute action in appropriate altitude.

Key.Original: Also remember to open your chute so that it is not High Altitude NO OPENING. After the chute is opened, you can steer it by pressing %1, %2, %3 and %4.
Key.English: Also remember to open your chute so that it is not High Altitude NO OPENING. After the chute is opened, you can steer it by pressing %1, %2, %3 and %4.

Key.Original: Special Forces air assault on an enemy hideout.
Key.English: Special Forces air assault on an enemy hideout.

Key.Original: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.
Key.English: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.

Key.Original: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; however, its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, has fled the country and remains at large.
Key.English: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; however, its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, has fled the country and remains at large.

Key.Original: Regrettably, no information regarding the missing civilian personnel has been obtained, despite the personal bravery of CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?
Key.English: Regrettably, no information regarding the missing civilian personnel has been obtained, despite the personal bravery of CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?

Key.Original: Listen, sir, the mission is far from a failure - we now control the majority of the country.
Key.English: Listen, sir, the mission is far from a failure - we now control the majority of the country.

Key.Original: I'm not the person to answer that, but we have good relations with the locals. Takistan will eventually be at peace.
Key.English: I'm not the person to answer that, but we have good relations with the locals. Takistan will eventually be at peace.

Key.Original: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. The situation in Takistan is under control at the moment, however fragile it may be. We now face a long and tough campaign to counter the rising insurgency threat, but I am certain we'll succeed.
Key.English: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. The situation in Takistan is under control at the moment, however fragile it may be. We now face a long and tough campaign to counter the rising insurgency threat, but I am certain we'll succeed.

Key.Original: Colonel, do you think the operation failed?
Key.English: Colonel, do you think the operation failed?

Key.Original: Do you think this victory will earn you enough local support to get rid of the remaining insurgents?
Key.English: Do you think this victory will earn you enough local support to get rid of the remaining insurgents?

Key.Original: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.
Key.English: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.

Key.Original: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; however, its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, has fled the country and remains at large.
Key.English: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; however, its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, has fled the country and remains at large.

Key.Original: Our forces successfully rescued the survivors of a plane crash, being held hostage by Colonel Aziz. I'd like to credit CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves, and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?
Key.English: Our forces successfully rescued the survivors of a plane crash, being held hostage by Colonel Aziz. I'd like to credit CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves, and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?

Key.Original: Definitely, yes. The hostages are safe, and we're positive we will get Aziz real soon.
Key.English: Definitely, yes. The hostages are safe, and we're positive we will get Aziz real soon.

Key.Original: Sorry, but that information is classified. Operation Arrowhead is still in progress; it's too early to draw conclusions.
Key.English: Sorry, but that information is classified. Operation Arrowhead is still in progress; it's too early to draw conclusions.

Key.Original: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. Even though we weren't able to accomplish some of our goals, the situation in Takistan is under control. Brave soldiers, such as these men, were what made the difference.
Key.English: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. Even though we weren't able to accomplish some of our goals, the situation in Takistan is under control. Brave soldiers, such as these men, were what made the difference.

Key.Original: Colonel, do you think the mission was successful?
Key.English: Colonel, do you think the mission was successful?

Key.Original: Do you know where Colonel Aziz might be? What are the military's plans to capture him?
Key.English: Do you know where Colonel Aziz might be? What are the military's plans to capture him?

Key.Original: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.
Key.English: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.

Key.Original: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, was killed during a fierce firefight.
Key.English: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, was killed during a fierce firefight.

Key.Original: Regrettably, no information regarding the missing civilian personnel has been obtained, despite the personal bravery of CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?
Key.English: Regrettably, no information regarding the missing civilian personnel has been obtained, despite the personal bravery of CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?

Key.Original: We weren't able to obtain enough intel. The Takis moved them too often for us to track them.
Key.English: We weren't able to obtain enough intel. The Takis moved them too often for us to track them.

Key.Original: I can assure you that all the possible resources were used to locate and rescue those people.
Key.English: I can assure you that all the possible resources were used to locate and rescue those people.

Key.Original: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. Although our rescue efforts were not successful, the situation in Takistan is under control. Brave soldiers, such as these men, were what made the difference.
Key.English: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. Although our rescue efforts were not successful, the situation in Takistan is under control. Brave soldiers, such as these men, were what made the difference.

Key.Original: Colonel, why do you think the hostages were lost?
Key.English: Colonel, why do you think the hostages were lost?

Key.Original: Did you use enough resources for that? We're talking about well-known Army efficiency here...
Key.English: Did you use enough resources for that? We're talking about well-known Army efficiency here...

Key.Original: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.
Key.English: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Department of Defense press conference regarding Operation Arrowhead.

Key.Original: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, was killed during a fierce firefight.
Key.English: Task Force Knight defeated the forces of the authoritarian regime in Takistan; its main driving force, and suspected war criminal, Colonel Muhammad Aziz, was killed during a fierce firefight.

Key.Original: Our forces successfully rescued the survivors of a plane crash, being held hostage by Colonel Aziz. I'd like to credit CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves, and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?
Key.English: Our forces successfully rescued the survivors of a plane crash, being held hostage by Colonel Aziz. I'd like to credit CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves, and SGT Drake here, who played a significant role in the operation. Questions?

Key.Original: Well, I'd say it was a combination of luck, skill, and good cooperation with the locals.
Key.English: Well, I'd say it was a combination of luck, skill, and good cooperation with the locals.

Key.Original: The first reaction was relief, obviously. The government intends to maintain their privacy for the sake their own security.
Key.English: The first reaction was relief, obviously. The government intends to maintain their privacy for the sake their own security.

Key.Original: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. I just want to say that such a success was possible only through the efforts of men like CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves, and SGT Drake here. Let's give them a hand!
Key.English: That'll be all, ladies and gentlemen. I just want to say that such a success was possible only through the efforts of men like CPT Pierce, 1LT Herrera, SFC Graves, and SGT Drake here. Let's give them a hand!

Key.Original: Colonel, how did you manage to save the captives?
Key.English: Colonel, how did you manage to save the captives?

Key.Original: What was the first reaction of the freed doctors? Why doesn't the government disclose their names?
Key.English: What was the first reaction of the freed doctors? Why doesn't the government disclose their names?

Key.Original: UN Security council discuss framework for political reconstruction in TK.
Key.English: UN Security council discuss framework for political reconstruction in TK.

Key.Original: First relief convoys reach Ardistan refugee camps; international aid agencies request further support.
Key.English: First relief convoys reach Ardistan refugee camps; international aid agencies request further support.

Key.Original: LATEST: Royal Navy patrol boats capture 'senior officials' fleeing through Salak Darya Delta.
Key.English: LATEST: Royal Navy patrol boats capture 'senior officials' fleeing through Salak Darya Delta.

Key.Original: British PM: 'Our duty is to rebuild Takistan as a stable and democratic nation'.
Key.English: British PM: 'Our duty is to rebuild Takistan as a stable and democratic nation'.

Key.Original: Chernarussian President Baranov promises round table discussions between vying regional groups.
Key.English: Chernarussian President Baranov promises round table discussions between vying regional groups.

Key.Original: German Special Forces free political activists imprisoned in Bandar-e Ghazmi.
Key.English: German Special Forces free political activists imprisoned in Bandar-e Ghazmi.

Key.Original: REPORT: Sporadic clashes with Aziz's elite forces in remote northern areas.
Key.English: REPORT: Sporadic clashes with Aziz's elite forces in remote northern areas.

Key.Original: IMF pledges $4.35bn aid to Takistan over three years.
Key.English: IMF pledges $4.35bn aid to Takistan over three years.

Key.Original: Karzeghistan oil fields destroyed by Takistani 'scorched earth' policy; fires cause significant respiratory problems.
Key.English: Karzeghistan oil fields destroyed by Takistani 'scorched earth' policy; fires cause significant respiratory problems.

Key.Original: Bohemia Interactive confirms St. George as new patron saint.
Key.English: Bohemia Interactive confirms St. George as new patron saint.

Key.Original: Heroes of Operation Arrowhead vs. world media.
Key.English: Heroes of Operation Arrowhead vs. world media.

Key.Original: Col. Kane announces the end of op. Arrowhead
Key.English: Col. Kane announces the end of op. Arrowhead

Key.Original: A few days later, heroes of TF Knight are taking part in a press conference.
Key.English: A few days later, heroes of TF Knight are taking part in a press conference.

Key.Original: T H E E N D
Key.English: T H E E N D

Key.Original:
Military press conference
Col. Kane announces the end of the op. Arrowhead
Key.English:
Military press conference
Col. Kane announces the end of the op. Arrowhead

Key.Original:
Military press conference
Col. Kane announces the end of the op. Arrowhead
Key.English:
Military press conference
Col. Kane announces the end of the op. Arrowhead

Key.Original: Особая благодарность сообществу игроков ArmA 2, в лице Dead_Kennedy, Selya, ManWithAGun, а также всем бойцам виртуального отряда "Наша Армия [СССР]" и особо отличившимся - Павлу "PKozik" Козику, Кириллу "Красноармеец" Секеражу и Вадиму "badger" Щемелинину за помощь в работе над Русской локализацией проекта.
Key.English: Особая благодарность сообществу игроков ArmA 2, в лице Dead_Kennedy, Selya, ManWithAGun, а также всем бойцам виртуального отряда "Наша Армия [СССР]" и особо отличившимся - Павлу "PKozik" Козику, Кириллу "Красноармеец" Секеражу и Вадиму "badger" Щемелинину за помощь в работе над Русской локализацией проекта.

Key.Original: Special thanks to the Russian-speaking ArmA 2 community and the members of the virtual squad "Our Army [USSR]" ("HA [CCCP]"), including Vadim "badger" Shchemelinin, Kirill "Krasnoarmeets" Sekerazh, Pavel "PKozik" Kozik and Kirill "Fry" Yakovlev, and also to the players "Dead_Kennedy", Sergey "[RFP]Selya" Kinash and Alexandr "ManWithAGun" Perevezencev for assisting with the works on Russian localization of the project.
Key.English: Special thanks to the Russian-speaking ArmA 2 community and the members of the virtual squad "Our Army [USSR]" ("HA [CCCP]"), including Vadim "badger" Shchemelinin, Kirill "Krasnoarmeets" Sekerazh, Pavel "PKozik" Kozik and Kirill "Fry" Yakovlev, and also to the players "Dead_Kennedy", Sergey "[RFP]Selya" Kinash and Alexandr "ManWithAGun" Perevezencev for assisting with the works on Russian localization of the project.

Key.Original: VARIANT 'SNOBBLE' WINS INTERNATIONAL CONTEST. %1 BIS 2.45 CDM 5.05 %1 US DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE APPROVES MANDO MISSILE SYSTEM DURING TODAY'S HEARING; NAVY AND AIR FORCE TO IMPLEMENT WEAPONS SYSTEM BY 2012. %1 REPORT: MILITARY COUP OUSTS ISLA DUALA'S PRESIDENT; OPPOSITION LEADER CLAIMS: 'ALL YOUR BASE ARE BELONG TO US!' %1 IN PRESTIGIOUS 86TH COMMUNITY AWARDS, BEST PICTURE GOES TO 'ADVANCED COMBAT ENVIRONMENT', BEST DIRECTOR TO 'SICKBOY', BEST LIVE ACTION SHORT TO 'A2: BLACK HAWK DOWN', BEST FOREIGN PICTURE TO 'SVOBODA' AND BEST DOCUMENTARY TO 'ARMAHOLIC.COM' %1 FINNISH DEFENCE FORCES TRAINING MANOEUVRES START AT PODAGORSK ISLAND, LOCALS FEAR CHRONIC BEER SHORTAGE. %1 NATIONAL MUSEUM CONFIRMS PLAN TO SHOWCASE 'CZECHOSLOVAK PEOPLE'S ARMY' EXHIBITION IN AUGUST. %1 TRAFFIC INFO: EPJ BOULEVARD, SOUTHBOUND, HEAVY TRAFFIC. %1 BREAKING: UNCONFIRMED REPORTS SUGGEST MORE BRITISH TROOPS TO REINFORCE ALLIANCE CONTINGENT IN TAKISTAN SOON.
Key.English: VARIANT 'SNOBBLE' WINS INTERNATIONAL CONTEST. %1 BIS 2.45 CDM 5.05 %1 US DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE APPROVES MANDO MISSILE SYSTEM DURING TODAY'S HEARING; NAVY AND AIR FORCE TO IMPLEMENT WEAPONS SYSTEM BY 2012. %1 REPORT: MILITARY COUP OUSTS ISLA DUALA'S PRESIDENT; OPPOSITION LEADER CLAIMS: 'ALL YOUR BASE ARE BELONG TO US!' %1 IN PRESTIGIOUS 86TH COMMUNITY AWARDS, BEST PICTURE GOES TO 'ADVANCED COMBAT ENVIRONMENT', BEST DIRECTOR TO 'SICKBOY', BEST LIVE ACTION SHORT TO 'A2: BLACK HAWK DOWN', BEST FOREIGN PICTURE TO 'SVOBODA' AND BEST DOCUMENTARY TO 'ARMAHOLIC.COM' %1 FINNISH DEFENCE FORCES TRAINING MANOEUVRES START AT PODAGORSK ISLAND, LOCALS FEAR CHRONIC BEER SHORTAGE. %1 NATIONAL MUSEUM CONFIRMS PLAN TO SHOWCASE 'CZECHOSLOVAK PEOPLE'S ARMY' EXHIBITION IN AUGUST. %1 TRAFFIC INFO: EPJ BOULEVARD, SOUTHBOUND, HEAVY TRAFFIC. %1 BREAKING: UNCONFIRMED REPORTS SUGGEST MORE BRITISH TROOPS TO REINFORCE ALLIANCE CONTINGENT IN TAKISTAN SOON.

Key.Original:
Relationship status: BAD
The stance of the local populace and armed groups towards US personnel is hostile. Our troops are likely to be attacked by local guerilla groups. Trying to help the local population would certainly improve the situation.
Key.English:
与当地人的关系状态: 糟糕
当地民众和武装组织对美军持敌视态度, 我们的部队很可能遭到当地游击队的攻击. 尝试帮助当地居民能够改变当前这糟糕的局面.

Key.Original:
Relationship status: GOOD
US armed personnel may count on the assistance of the local population or guerilla fighters. However, hostilities towards the locals may worsen the relationship.
Key.English:
与当地人的关系状态: 很好
美军能够得到当地民众和武装组织的援助. 但是, 如果向当地势力开战则会使关系恶化.

Key.Original:
Relationship status: NEUTRAL
The local population and guerilla forces are indifferent. US armed personnel are encouraged to strengthen the relationships with locals in order to win their hearts and minds.
Key.English:
与当地人的关系状态: 中立
当地民众和武装组织持中立态度. 美军鼓励改善与当地势力的关系以便赢得他们的民心和支持.

Key.Original:
Rules of Engagement (excerpt)
Remember we're here to win the hearts and minds of regular Takistanis - do not harm them or damage their property. We do not build the best reputation by burning cities.
If we're careful, we may turn people to our side and may get various help from them - intel at least.
Some of the guerilla groups that operate in Takistan, are anti-government and may want to help us if they see came to help, not to destroy.
Key.English:
交战守则(摘录)
请记住我们来到这里是为了赢得绝大多数塔基斯坦人的民心和支持 - 请不要伤害他们及他们的财产. 我们不能通过点燃整个城市来建立我们良好的声誉.
如果我们足够小心, 我们就能够将他们拉到我们这一边, 并且可能得到他们的各种帮助, 比如情报.
在塔基斯坦有一些长期活动的游击队组织, 他们是反现政府的, 并且有可能帮助我们, 只要他们愿意. 不要消灭他们.

Key.Original: Call in support (such as artillery) by selecting 'Supports' from the map. Support may not be available.
Key.English: Call in support (such as artillery) by selecting 'Supports' from the map. Support may not be available.

Key.Original: To buy gear, select 'Buy Weapons' from the Action Menu or press 'Y' (your Team Switch Previous key).
Key.English: To buy gear, select 'Buy Weapons' from the Action Menu or press 'Y' (your Team Switch Previous key).

Key.Original: To purchase from a factory, select 'Buy Units' from the Action Menu or press 'T' (your Team Switch key).
Key.English: To purchase from a factory, select 'Buy Units' from the Action Menu or press 'T' (your Team Switch key).

Key.Original: To vote for a new commander, select 'Vote' from the map. A current vote in progress can be also be opened from the Action Menu.
Key.English: To vote for a new commander, select 'Vote' from the map. A current vote in progress can be also be opened from the Action Menu.

Key.Original: In this mission your goal is to defeat the opposing side by destroying their base or finishing other victory conditions that have been set. Your side will need to earn income by capturing town blocks to gain supplies. Each side has a Commander who can build a base and order teams. The Commander starts with a Mobile HQ which can deploy into a headquarters and construct the base. The base can be expanded as towns are captured and supplies are delivered. Bases can be used by players to buy defenses, equipment, vehicles, and soldiers.
Key.English: In this mission your goal is to defeat the opposing side by destroying their base or finishing other victory conditions that have been set. Your side will need to earn income by capturing town blocks to gain supplies. Each side has a Commander who can build a base and order teams. The Commander starts with a Mobile HQ which can deploy into a headquarters and construct the base. The base can be expanded as towns are captured and supplies are delivered. Bases can be used by players to buy defenses, equipment, vehicles, and soldiers.

Key.Original: Transfer funds or view the status of teams be selecting 'Teams' from the map.
Key.English: Transfer funds or view the status of teams be selecting 'Teams' from the map.

Key.Original: You can also do limited buying at captured city depots and camps.
Key.English: You can also do limited buying at captured city depots and camps.

Key.Original: To build defenses select 'Contruction' from the Actiom Menu.
Key.English: To build defenses select 'Contruction' from the Actiom Menu.

Key.Original: To see team names press 'U' (your Team Switch Next key) when on the map.
Key.English: To see team names press 'U' (your Team Switch Next key) when on the map.

Key.Original: If you fly into any of the marked map corners, your plane will be fully repaired, refueled and rearmed.
Key.English: If you fly into any of the marked map corners, your plane will be fully repaired, refueled and rearmed.

Key.Original:
Operation Arrowhead is over and BLUFOR contingent has withdrawn from Takistan. Many planes were left behind, and rather than disassembling them, why not just have some well deserved fun? Especially if you stay dead for just a couple of seconds.

Your only objective is to shoot down anything that gets in your crosshairs.

Keep in mind that you'll be penalized with reduced ammo if you crash your plane because of your inability to fly it.
Key.English:
Operation Arrowhead is over and BLUFOR contingent has withdrawn from Takistan. Many planes were left behind, and rather than disassembling them, why not just have some well deserved fun? Especially if you stay dead for just a couple of seconds.

Your only objective is to shoot down anything that gets in your crosshairs.

Keep in mind that you'll be penalized with reduced ammo if you crash your plane because of your inability to fly it.

Key.Original: Fly and shoot down the others.
Key.English: Fly and shoot down the others.

Container.name: BLU_EX
Container.situation: blufor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: us central command (citizen), clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Citizen to Python. Welcome back home, folks, that's another mission accomplished. See you back at base. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen to Python. Welcome back home, folks, that's another mission accomplished. See you back at base. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen to Python. Glad you've made it out of that mess. We'll have to get that Headquarters some other time. See you back at base. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen to Python. Glad you've made it out of that mess. We'll have to get that Headquarters some other time. See you back at base. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen to Python. Python, report in! Citizen calling team Python. What's your status? Report!
Key.English: Citizen to Python. Python, report in! Citizen calling team Python. What's your status? Report!

Container.name: BLU_intro
Container.situation: blufor intro spoken dialogue - speaker: c130 crew chief, raised voice over engine noise in cargo hold

Key.Original: Get ready, we're thirty seconds away from the dropzone. I don't like running shuttle services over enemy territory, so I want you all out the moment that door opens.
Key.English: Get ready, we're thirty seconds away from the dropzone. I don't like running shuttle services over enemy territory, so I want you all out the moment that door opens.

Key.Original: Remember your briefing: Your LZ is highlighted by infrared strobes. X marks the spot, that's where we drop your gear. In case the LZ is compromised, you can request to reposition by radio.
Key.English: Remember your briefing: Your LZ is highlighted by infrared strobes. X marks the spot, that's where we drop your gear. In case the LZ is compromised, you can request to reposition by radio.

Key.Original: Keep a low profile at all costs. You're up against at least a company-size garrison, so your sole advantage is your night vision and thermal.
Key.English: Keep a low profile at all costs. You're up against at least a company-size garrison, so your sole advantage is your night vision and thermal.

Key.Original: Make sure we hold on to this advantage, people. If a man goes down, don't let his equipment fall in to enemy hands.
Key.English: Make sure we hold on to this advantage, people. If a man goes down, don't let his equipment fall in to enemy hands.

Key.Original: Ok, we're at the dropzone. Don't deploy your chute too soon, or you'll be having flak for breakfast.
Key.English: Ok, we're at the dropzone. Don't deploy your chute too soon, or you'll be having flak for breakfast.

Key.Original: Green light. Good luck Python! Go go go!
Key.English: Green light. Good luck Python! Go go go!

Container.name: BLU_OBJ1
Container.situation: blufor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: delta team leader (python), lowered voice, neutral - speaker: us central command (citizen), clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Citizen acknowledges. Proceed to exfiltration point. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen acknowledges. Proceed to exfiltration point. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Python to Citizen. Objective Parcel has been neutralized. Over.
Key.English: Python to Citizen. Objective Parcel has been neutralized. Over.

Key.Original: Python to Citizen. Objective Parcel is being evacuated out of the region. We've lost our shot at this one, over.
Key.English: Python to Citizen. Objective Parcel is being evacuated out of the region. We've lost our shot at this one, over.

Container.name: BLU_OBJ2
Container.situation: blufor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: delta team leader (python), lowered voice, neutral - speaker: us central command (citizen), clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Copy that Python. Air assets are on standby to provide support in that region. Out.
Key.English: Copy that Python. Air assets are on standby to provide support in that region. Out.

Key.Original: Python to Citizen. We've taken down an enemy anti-air site, over.
Key.English: Python to Citizen. We've taken down an enemy anti-air site, over.

Container.name: BLU_OBJ3
Container.situation: blufor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: delta team leader (python), lowered voice, neutral

Key.Original: Python to Citizen. Mortar site Echo has been disabled. Proceeding with mission. Python out.
Key.English: Python to Citizen. Mortar site Echo has been disabled. Proceeding with mission. Python out.

Container.name: BLU_SUP
Container.situation: blufor support request radio dialogue - speaker: delta team leader (python), lowered voice, neutral - speaker: us central command (citizen), clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Affirmative Python. Marking the new location on the map. Over.
Key.English: Affirmative Python. Marking the new location on the map. Over.

Key.Original: Coordinates received. Supply drops rerouted to the new location. Out.
Key.English: Coordinates received. Supply drops rerouted to the new location. Out.

Key.Original: Python, this is Citizen. Recon shows your LZ has been overrun. We've diverted our drops to a new location. Check your map for details. Citizen out.
Key.English: Python, this is Citizen. Recon shows your LZ has been overrun. We've diverted our drops to a new location. Check your map for details. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen to Python. Air support denied. We can't provide mission support inside the enemy anti-air envelope. Citizen out.
Key.English: Citizen to Python. Air support denied. We can't provide mission support inside the enemy anti-air envelope. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Python to Citizen. Requesting a new LZ, over.
Key.English: Python to Citizen. Requesting a new LZ, over.

Key.Original: Exfiltrate: Escape from enemy territory by reaching the BLUFOR forces on the frontline in the Southwest.
Key.English: Exfiltrate: Escape from enemy territory by reaching the BLUFOR forces on the frontline in the Southwest.

Key.Original: Initial objective: Deploy from a C-130J Hercules using a HALO jump and land behind enemy lines. The designated LZ containing supplies and vehicles can be moved on request by radio.
Key.English: Initial objective: Deploy from a C-130J Hercules using a HALO jump and land behind enemy lines. The designated LZ containing supplies and vehicles can be moved on request by radio.

Key.Original: Primary objective: Take out the Takistan Army headquarters, designated objective Parcel, before it can be evacuated from the region. Once destroyed, exfiltrate to friendly territory.
Key.English: Primary objective: Take out the Takistan Army headquarters, designated objective Parcel, before it can be evacuated from the region. Once destroyed, exfiltrate to friendly territory.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy Anti-Air site designated Alpha. This will allow Close Air Support to be called in in this region.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy Anti-Air site designated Alpha. This will allow Close Air Support to be called in in this region.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy Anti-Air site designated Bravo. This will allow Close Air Support to be called in in this region.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy Anti-Air site designated Bravo. This will allow Close Air Support to be called in in this region.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy Anti-Air site designated Charlie. This will allow Close Air Support to be called in in this region.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy Anti-Air site designated Charlie. This will allow Close Air Support to be called in in this region.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy mortar site designated Echo. This will disrupt the enemy's access to fire support in the AO.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Take out the enemy mortar site designated Echo. This will disrupt the enemy's access to fire support in the AO.

Key.Original: Click on the map to reposition the landing zone.
Key.English: Click on the map to reposition the landing zone.

Key.Original: Primary objective: Prevent the American Special Forces from escaping to their occupied territory. Find them and kill them.
Key.English: Primary objective: Prevent the American Special Forces from escaping to their occupied territory. Find them and kill them.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out Anti-Air site Alpha.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out Anti-Air site Alpha.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out Anti-Air site Bravo.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out Anti-Air site Bravo.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out Anti-Air site Charlie.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out Anti-Air site Charlie.

Key.Original: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out mortar site Echo.
Key.English: Secondary objective: Ensure the Americans don't take out mortar site Echo.

Key.Original: Return to the respawn base to collect your reinforcements.
Key.English: Return to the respawn base to collect your reinforcements.

Container.name: OP_EX
Container.situation: opfor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: takistani army central command, clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Command to garrison units. The American troops have escaped from the region. We're pulling back to Imarat. Abandon your positions and fall back. Out.
Key.English: Command to garrison units. The American troops have escaped from the region. We're pulling back to Imarat. Abandon your positions and fall back. Out.

Key.Original: All garrison units, this is Command. We have killed the last of the American Special Forces. Good job out there. You will be rewarded for this excellent work! Command out.
Key.English: All garrison units, this is Command. We have killed the last of the American Special Forces. Good job out there. You will be rewarded for this excellent work! Command out.

Container.name: OP_intro
Container.situation: opfor intro spoken dialogue - speaker: opfor high commander, authorative but slightly stressed voice at briefing

Key.Original: American forces are a ten-minute drive from us as we speak, so I'll keep this short. We expect them to launch a full offensive by noon today.
Key.English: American forces are a ten-minute drive from us as we speak, so I'll keep this short. We expect them to launch a full offensive by noon today.

Key.Original: Our local headquarters will be moved out of the region under the cover of heavy anti-air protection as soon as daylight breaks. Until then, we have to sit out the night under SAM cover.
Key.English: Our local headquarters will be moved out of the region under the cover of heavy anti-air protection as soon as daylight breaks. Until then, we have to sit out the night under SAM cover.

Key.Original: Now, we know the Americans will try to take out the HQ before that, but they won't risk inflicting civilian casualties over it. They'll send their Special Forces to get in close.
Key.English: Now, we know the Americans will try to take out the HQ before that, but they won't risk inflicting civilian casualties over it. They'll send their Special Forces to get in close.

Key.Original: Nearly all our best-equipped troops are dug in at the front line, so it'll be up to us to keep the HQ and surrounding SAM sites secure. Make no mistake, our only advantage will be our numbers.
Key.English: Nearly all our best-equipped troops are dug in at the front line, so it'll be up to us to keep the HQ and surrounding SAM sites secure. Make no mistake, our only advantage will be our numbers.

Key.Original: We're up against ghosts. Keep your men's spirit up until the break of dawn and radio in when you've taken casualties. I'll do my best to peel some replacements off our rear guard force.
Key.English: We're up against ghosts. Keep your men's spirit up until the break of dawn and radio in when you've taken casualties. I'll do my best to peel some replacements off our rear guard force.

Container.name: OP_OBJ1
Container.participants: TK Radio Operator;TK Army Central Command;
Container.situation: opfor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: takistani radio operator, stressed raised voice - speaker: takistani army central command, clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with our headquarters. Find and destroy the American troops before they escape! Command out.
Key.English: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with our headquarters. Find and destroy the American troops before they escape! Command out.

Key.Original: Command to garrison units. Daylight is breaking and the HQ is still intact. We're sending reinforcements to evacuate the base. Find the fleeing Americans! Command out.
Key.English: Command to garrison units. Daylight is breaking and the HQ is still intact. We're sending reinforcements to evacuate the base. Find the fleeing Americans! Command out.

Key.Original: Headquarters to all units. We are under attack!
Key.English: Headquarters to all units. We are under attack!

Container.name: OP_OBJ2
Container.participants: TK Radio Operator;TK Army Central Command;
Container.situation: opfor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: takistani radio operator, stressed raised voice - speaker: takistani army central command, clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with anti-air site Alpha. SAM cover in that region is gone, so watch out for enemy air strikes. Command out.
Key.English: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with anti-air site Alpha. SAM cover in that region is gone, so watch out for enemy air strikes. Command out.

Key.Original: Site Alpha to all units. We are under attack!
Key.English: Site Alpha to all units. We are under attack!

Container.name: OP_OBJ3
Container.participants: TK Radio Operator;TK Army Central Command;
Container.situation: opfor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: takistani radio operator, stressed raised voice - speaker: takistani army central command, clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with anti-air site Bravo. SAM cover in that region is gone, so watch out for enemy air strikes. Command out.
Key.English: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with anti-air site Bravo. SAM cover in that region is gone, so watch out for enemy air strikes. Command out.

Key.Original: Site Bravo to all units. We are under attack!
Key.English: Site Bravo to all units. We are under attack!

Container.name: OP_OBJ4
Container.participants: TK Radio Operator;TK Army Central Command;
Container.situation: opfor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: takistani radio operator, stressed raised voice - speaker: takistani army central command, clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with anti-air site Charlie. SAM cover in that region is gone, so watch out for enemy air strikes. Command out.
Key.English: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with anti-air site Charlie. SAM cover in that region is gone, so watch out for enemy air strikes. Command out.

Key.Original: Site Charlie to all units. We are under attack!
Key.English: Site Charlie to all units. We are under attack!

Container.name: OP_OBJ5
Container.participants: TK Radio Operator;TK Army Central Command;
Container.situation: opfor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: takistani radio operator, stressed raised voice - speaker: takistani army central command, clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with mortar site Echo. You can no longer call in flares and fire missions. Command out.
Key.English: Command to garrison units. We have lost contact with mortar site Echo. You can no longer call in flares and fire missions. Command out.

Key.Original: Site Echo to all units. We are under attack!
Key.English: Site Echo to all units. We are under attack!

Container.name: OP_PTRL
Container.situation: opfor mission update radio dialogue - speaker: takistani radio operator, stressed raised voice

Key.Original: Patrol to all units. We are under attack!
Key.English: Patrol to all units. We are under attack!

Container.name: OP_SUP
Container.situation: opfor support request radio dialogue - speaker: opfor high commander (garrison unit), clear and authorative voice, slightly stressed - speaker: takistani army central command (command), clear and authorative voice, neutral

Key.Original: Command to garrison unit. Reinforcements enroute to your base. Command out.
Key.English: Command to garrison unit. Reinforcements enroute to your base. Command out.

Key.Original: Command to garrison unit. Your reinforcements are ready for your retrieval at the base. Out.
Key.English: Command to garrison unit. Your reinforcements are ready for your retrieval at the base. Out.

Key.Original: This is Command. Good job. Destroy the site to prevent the Americans from using it. Command out.
Key.English: This is Command. Good job. Destroy the site to prevent the Americans from using it. Command out.

Key.Original: Garrison unit to Command. We've taken losses. Requesting reinforcements, over.
Key.English: Garrison unit to Command. We've taken losses. Requesting reinforcements, over.

Key.Original: Garrison unit to Command. We have located an enemy landing zone, over.
Key.English: Garrison unit to Command. We have located an enemy landing zone, over.

Key.Original: Garrison unit to Command. Enemy landing zone destroyed. Out.
Key.English: Garrison unit to Command. Enemy landing zone destroyed. Out.

Key.Original: The OPFOR headquarters has been destroyed. Mission Successful.
Key.English: The OPFOR headquarters has been destroyed. Mission Successful.

Key.Original: The OPFOR headquarters has not been destroyed, but the Delta operators have been extracted. Mission Failed.
Key.English: The OPFOR headquarters has not been destroyed, but the Delta operators have been extracted. Mission Failed.

Key.Original: The OPFOR headquarters has not been destroyed and all SF operators have been killed in action. Mission Failed.
Key.English: The OPFOR headquarters has not been destroyed and all SF operators have been killed in action. Mission Failed.

Key.Original:
- Due to the heavy SAM coverage in the valley, Close Air Support can only be called in outside this air defense canopy. Taking out AA sites will allow for CAS in these regions as well.
- Weapons, ammo and transportation will be dropped the the designated Landing Zone. If the LZ is no longer secure, it can be repositioned by radio request.
Key.English:
- Due to the heavy SAM coverage in the valley, Close Air Support can only be called in outside this air defense canopy. Taking out AA sites will allow for CAS in these regions as well.
- Weapons, ammo and transportation will be dropped the the designated Landing Zone. If the LZ is no longer secure, it can be repositioned by radio request.

Key.Original:
- Our mortar site in this valley is a powerful tool to flush out any hidden enemy troops. Be sure to protect the mortar site so we can maintain this advantage.
- If your squad takes casualties, you can use the radio to request reinforcements. They will be deployed at our starting point.
Key.English:
- Our mortar site in this valley is a powerful tool to flush out any hidden enemy troops. Be sure to protect the mortar site so we can maintain this advantage.
- If your squad takes casualties, you can use the radio to request reinforcements. They will be deployed at our starting point.

Key.Original: You have been selected as part of a Platoon of our finest soldiers and tasked with the defense of the Battle Group South headquarters. Use the men and vehicles at your disposal to root out the American Special Forces. Hunt them down, locate and destroy their hidden landing zones and protect our bases in order to stay in control on the ground and in the air. Once daylight breaks, reinforcements will be sent to evacuate the headquarters.
Key.English: You have been selected as part of a Platoon of our finest soldiers and tasked with the defense of the Battle Group South headquarters. Use the men and vehicles at your disposal to root out the American Special Forces. Hunt them down, locate and destroy their hidden landing zones and protect our bases in order to stay in control on the ground and in the air. Once daylight breaks, reinforcements will be sent to evacuate the headquarters.

Key.Original: Your primary mission objective is to defend our headquarters until we are able to evacuate it. The Anti Air and mortar sites should also be protected to prevent the Americans from getting the upper hand.
Key.English: Your primary mission objective is to defend our headquarters until we are able to evacuate it. The Anti Air and mortar sites should also be protected to prevent the Americans from getting the upper hand.

Key.Original:
- Our headqaurters is located in a village along the main road through the valley.
- The three Anti Air sites called Alpha, Bravo and Charlie will protect it from the hills overlooking the valley.
- Our mortar site Echo is located in the Northwest of the valley.
- We expect the Americans to send in a small Special Forces team to take out our installations.
Key.English:
- Our headqaurters is located in a village along the main road through the valley.
- The three Anti Air sites called Alpha, Bravo and Charlie will protect it from the hills overlooking the valley.
- Our mortar site Echo is located in the Northwest of the valley.
- We expect the Americans to send in a small Special Forces team to take out our installations.

Key.Original:
The Americans have surprised us with the aggressiveness of their push into the heart of our motherland. We have managed to slow them down now they reached the steep mountains, but the headquarters of Battle Group South was cut off from a safe retreat to the North.

Although the Americans dominate the sky now that it's night, we will have enough reinforcements to attempt a break out at first light tomorrow morning. For now we will lay low under the cover of our SAM sites, knowing that the American's won't risk hitting nearby civilian buildings with long range attacks.
Key.English:
The Americans have surprised us with the aggressiveness of their push into the heart of our motherland. We have managed to slow them down now they reached the steep mountains, but the headquarters of Battle Group South was cut off from a safe retreat to the North.

Although the Americans dominate the sky now that it's night, we will have enough reinforcements to attempt a break out at first light tomorrow morning. For now we will lay low under the cover of our SAM sites, knowing that the American's won't risk hitting nearby civilian buildings with long range attacks.

Key.Original: A 5-man Special Forces team will infiltrate the region using HALO insertion. Keeping a low profile to avoid detection by a numerically superior enemy, the team will have to assess the best way to destroy the enemy headquarters. The destruction of local Anti Air sites will allow for Close Air Support to be called in. Once the headquarters has been destroyed, the team is to exfiltrate to friendly territory.
Key.English: A 5-man Special Forces team will infiltrate the region using HALO insertion. Keeping a low profile to avoid detection by a numerically superior enemy, the team will have to assess the best way to destroy the enemy headquarters. The destruction of local Anti Air sites will allow for Close Air Support to be called in. Once the headquarters has been destroyed, the team is to exfiltrate to friendly territory.

Key.Original: Your primary mission objective is to infiltrate the region and destroy the Takistani headquarters before it is evacuated. Secondary targets can be neutralised if deemed necessary.
Key.English: Your primary mission objective is to infiltrate the region and destroy the Takistani headquarters before it is evacuated. Secondary targets can be neutralised if deemed necessary.

Key.Original:
- The Takistani headquarters is located in a village along the main road through the valley.
- Three Anti Air sites designated Alpha, Bravo and Charlie are positioned in the hills overlooking the valley.
- A mortar site designated Echo is located in the Northwest of the valley.
- At least a Company size enemy garrison is believed to be on active guard duty in the Area of Operations.
Key.English:
- The Takistani headquarters is located in a village along the main road through the valley.
- Three Anti Air sites designated Alpha, Bravo and Charlie are positioned in the hills overlooking the valley.
- A mortar site designated Echo is located in the Northwest of the valley.
- At least a Company size enemy garrison is believed to be on active guard duty in the Area of Operations.

Key.Original:
Our rapid advance North has taken the Takistani army by surprise. One of their regional headquarters has been nearly cut off from the main Takistani force to the North.

Intel shows preparations are being made to evacuate the HQ from the region, but the enemy's reliance on older ZSU-23 Shilkas for mobile air defense means they will not risk exposing themselves while it's dark. The HQ's current position is well covered by SAM sites and its proximity to numerous civilian objects rules out a high altitude strike.

To counter this, we will send in a small covert strike force to take out the target before day break.
Key.English:
Our rapid advance North has taken the Takistani army by surprise. One of their regional headquarters has been nearly cut off from the main Takistani force to the North.

Intel shows preparations are being made to evacuate the HQ from the region, but the enemy's reliance on older ZSU-23 Shilkas for mobile air defense means they will not risk exposing themselves while it's dark. The HQ's current position is well covered by SAM sites and its proximity to numerous civilian objects rules out a high altitude strike.

To counter this, we will send in a small covert strike force to take out the target before day break.

Key.Original: Special Forces team versus Takistani command.
Key.English: Special Forces team versus Takistani command.

Key.Original: Special Force Operators HALO jumps deep in Takistani territory, but they are expected.
Key.English: Special Force Operators HALO jumps deep in Takistani territory, but they are expected.

Key.Original: Go in, leave no survivors, take no prisoners.
Key.English: Go in, leave no survivors, take no prisoners.

Key.Original: Fly a patrol over enemy territory, engage at will!
Key.English: Fly a patrol over enemy territory, engage at will!

Key.Original: Call in support (such as artillery) by selecting 'Supports' from the map. Support may not be available.
Key.English: Call in support (such as artillery) by selecting 'Supports' from the map. Support may not be available.

Key.Original: You can also do limited buying at captured city depots and camps.
Key.English: You can also do limited buying at captured city depots and camps.

Key.Original: To build defenses select 'Contruction' from the Actiom Menu.
Key.English: To build defenses select 'Contruction' from the Actiom Menu.

Key.Original: To see team names press 'U' (your Team Switch Next key) when on the map.
Key.English: To see team names press 'U' (your Team Switch Next key) when on the map.

Key.Original: To buy gear, select 'Buy Weapons' from the Action Menu or press 'Y' (your Team Switch Previous key).
Key.English: To buy gear, select 'Buy Weapons' from the Action Menu or press 'Y' (your Team Switch Previous key).

Key.Original: To purchase from a factory, select 'Buy Units' from the Action Menu or press 'T' (your Team Switch key).
Key.English: To purchase from a factory, select 'Buy Units' from the Action Menu or press 'T' (your Team Switch key).

Key.Original: To vote for a new commander, select 'Vote' from the map. A current vote in progress can be also be opened from the Action Menu.
Key.English: To vote for a new commander, select 'Vote' from the map. A current vote in progress can be also be opened from the Action Menu.

Key.Original: In this mission your goal is to defeat the opposing side by destroying their base or finishing other victory conditions that have been set. Your side will need to earn income by capturing towns to gain supply lines. Each side has a Commander who can build a base and order teams. The Commander starts with a Mobile HQ which can deploy into a headquarters and construct the base. The base can be expanded as towns are captured and supplies are delivered. Bases can be used by players to buy defenses, equipment, vehicles, and soldiers.
Key.English: In this mission your goal is to defeat the opposing side by destroying their base or finishing other victory conditions that have been set. Your side will need to earn income by capturing towns to gain supply lines. Each side has a Commander who can build a base and order teams. The Commander starts with a Mobile HQ which can deploy into a headquarters and construct the base. The base can be expanded as towns are captured and supplies are delivered. Bases can be used by players to buy defenses, equipment, vehicles, and soldiers.

Key.Original: Transfer funds or view the status of teams be selecting 'Teams' from the map.
Key.English: Transfer funds or view the status of teams be selecting 'Teams' from the map.

Key.Original: You can quickly travel between friendly towns and the base. When near the city depot, select 'Fast Travel' from the map and click on a destination (marked as circles). Be careful, if there is an enemy presence or captured camp, then Fast Travel may not be available.
Key.English: You can quickly travel between friendly towns and the base. When near the city depot, select 'Fast Travel' from the map and click on a destination (marked as circles). Be careful, if there is an enemy presence or captured camp, then Fast Travel may not be available.

Key.Original: Increasing the supply value (SV) of a town (with Supply Trucks) improves its defensive capability and produces more income.
Key.English: Increasing the supply value (SV) of a town (with Supply Trucks) improves its defensive capability and produces more income.

Key.Original: Earn funds by completing assigned tasks, killing the enemy, salvaging destroyed vehicles, or driving supply trucks to town depots and the base.
Key.English: Earn funds by completing assigned tasks, killing the enemy, salvaging destroyed vehicles, or driving supply trucks to town depots and the base.

Key.Original: US Army and Takistani army fight for Takistan.
Key.English: US Army and Takistani army fight for Takistan.

Key.Original: View diplomatic relations with other sides by selecting 'Diplomacy' from the map. It is possible for two human commanders to form an alliance or cease-fire agreement.
Key.English: View diplomatic relations with other sides by selecting 'Diplomacy' from the map. It is possible for two human commanders to form an alliance or cease-fire agreement.

Your side will need to earn income by capturing towns to gain supply lines. Each side has a Commander who can build a base and order teams. The Commander starts with a Mobile HQ which can deploy into a headquarters and construct the base. The base can be expanded as towns are captured and supplies are delivered. Bases can be used by players to buy defenses, equipment, vehicles, and soldiers.

Key.Original: US, Takistanis and guerillas fight for Takistan.
Key.English: US, Takistanis and guerillas fight for Takistan.

Key.Original: Eliminate an enemy officer in a nearby base.
Key.English: Eliminate an enemy officer in a nearby base.

Container.name: flag_status
Container.situation: woman voice informing about lost/gained flag/sector

Key.Original: Fight for control of Zargabad, no AI.
Key.English: Fight for control of Zargabad, no AI.

Key.Original:
Teams must capture flags in the sector to get points. The more flags you hold the more points you get. Flags can be captured and recaptured by standing close to them. You need at least two people to capture a flag and the same amount to recapture them.


There are two types of flags:

1. Basic: your respawn point when held. Ammo boxes around the flag are filled with grenade launchers and rifles with mounted grenade launchers.

2. Center: Only one is found in each sector. Ammo boxes around it contain hi-tech weapons with thermal imaging optics and anti-material sniper rifles, but flag is not a respawn point.
Key.English:
Teams must capture flags in the sector to get points. The more flags you hold the more points you get. Flags can be captured and recaptured by standing close to them. You need at least two people to capture a flag and the same amount to recapture them.


There are two types of flags:

1. Basic: your respawn point when held. Ammo boxes around the flag are filled with grenade launchers and rifles with mounted grenade launchers.

2. Center: Only one is found in each sector. Ammo boxes around it contain hi-tech weapons with thermal imaging optics and anti-material sniper rifles, but flag is not a respawn point.

Key.Original:
When respawning, you can select one of four roles - Soldier, Machine gunner, Sniper and AT soldier. They differ with default weapon loadouts.

Default weapon is one of many possible ones for the particular role. If you're not comfortable with your particular weapon search ammo crates on respawn points. Those contain all weapons and equipment available for your role.
Key.English:
When respawning, you can select one of four roles - Soldier, Machine gunner, Sniper and AT soldier. They differ with default weapon loadouts.

Default weapon is one of many possible ones for the particular role. If you're not comfortable with your particular weapon search ammo crates on respawn points. Those contain all weapons and equipment available for your role.

Key.Original:
There are five sectors alltogether. Each sector contauns three flags to capture and hold. Each team begins on different Respawn Base.

Holding flags fills your team score bar. When the bar is full, team wins the sector and the fight moves towards its enemy base.

The sector with the base has only one flag and the defending team is already holding it. The attacking team has to capture and hold it as long as possible. The rules of capturing are the same for each sector. The team with more points wins the battle.
Key.English:
There are five sectors alltogether. Each sector contauns three flags to capture and hold. Each team begins on different Respawn Base.

Holding flags fills your team score bar. When the bar is full, team wins the sector and the fight moves towards its enemy base.

The sector with the base has only one flag and the defending team is already holding it. The attacking team has to capture and hold it as long as possible. The rules of capturing are the same for each sector. The team with more points wins the battle.

Key.Original:
Access to supports is awarded for successfully neutralizing number of enemy soldiers in row. All supports are available from Communication menu.

%1 in row - Mortar Fire
Scattered fire of mostly anti-infantry shots.

%2 in row - Artillery
Several rounds of 105 mm shells, powerful even agains vehicles.

%3 in row - Air Strike
Ultimate strike. Use laser designator to increase precision.
Key.English:
Access to supports is awarded for successfully neutralizing number of enemy soldiers in row. All supports are available from Communication menu.

%1 in row - Mortar Fire
Scattered fire of mostly anti-infantry shots.

%2 in row - Artillery
Several rounds of 105 mm shells, powerful even agains vehicles.

%3 in row - Air Strike
Ultimate strike. Use laser designator to increase precision.

Key.Original:
Each side has several vehicles near respawn point, including cars, APCs and even battle tanks in later sectors. Anyone can use the vehicle.

When destroyed, vehicles respawn on default positions after seveeral seconds and can be used again. If you leave the vehicle empty on battlefield, it won't respawn until it's destroyed.
Key.English:
Each side has several vehicles near respawn point, including cars, APCs and even battle tanks in later sectors. Anyone can use the vehicle.

When destroyed, vehicles respawn on default positions after seveeral seconds and can be used again. If you leave the vehicle empty on battlefield, it won't respawn until it's destroyed.

Key.Original: Cooperate with your tank platoon against the enemy.
Key.English: Cooperate with your tank platoon against the enemy.

Key.Original: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.
Key.English: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.

Key.Original: Kill or get killed the old-fashioned way.
Key.English: Kill or get killed the old-fashioned way.

Key.Original: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.
Key.English: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.

Key.Original:
Classic Deathmatch. Everything that moves is your enemy.

Leaving the zone will result first in warning and than death.
Key.English:
Classic Deathmatch. Everything that moves is your enemy.

Leaving the zone will result first in warning and than death.

Key.Original: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.
Key.English: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.

Key.Original:
Two forces compete in tactical combat.

Do not leave the zone - after a warning, you will be shot.

Death to the enemy!
Key.English:
Two forces compete in tactical combat.

Do not leave the zone - after a warning, you will be shot.

Death to the enemy!

Key.English: Investigate marked buildings, find target and eliminate him.

Key.Original: Steal car with crucial documents and bring it to extraction point.
Key.English: Steal car with crucial documents and bring it to extraction point.

Key.Original: Clear the area from all enemies.
Key.English: Clear the area from all enemies.

Key.Original: Make sure you'll kill no civilian during operation.
Key.English: Make sure you'll kill no civilian during operation.

Key.Original: Let no member of your group die.
Key.English: Let no member of your group die.

Key.Original: After long battle, your group is split. Find other members.
Key.English: After long battle, your group is split. Find other members.

Key.Original: Destroy UAV. To achieve that, get AA launcher and ammo from weapon caches hidden in the town.
Key.English: Destroy UAV. To achieve that, get AA launcher and ammo from weapon caches hidden in the town.
