Key.English: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.

Key.Original: If you'll manage to steal the %1 flag %2 (using 'Take Flag' action) and bring it to empty %3 flagpole %4, you'll be awarded with additional 10 points.
Key.English: If you'll manage to steal the %1 flag %2 (using 'Take Flag' action) and bring it to empty %3 flagpole %4, you'll be awarded with additional 10 points.

Key.English: Your objective is to hit as many enemies as possible while staying in the combat area.

Key.Original:
Objective is to get to %1enemy flag%2, steal it (using 'Take Flag' action) and return to %3your flag%4.
If enemy holds your flag, you have to wait until it's returned in order to score.
Key.English:
Objective is to get to %1enemy flag%2, steal it (using 'Take Flag' action) and return to %3your flag%4.
If enemy holds your flag, you have to wait until it's returned in order to score.

Key.Original: OPFOR are holed up at the airport and a nearby base. Some units may set up ambushes in the urban terrain of Rasman city. A nearby <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OilfieldText'>oil field installation</marker> is held by the enemy, who'll supposedly destroy it after we attack. BLUFOR units are entrenched S and SW of the airport. Badger group led by 1lt Herrera starts here.
Key.English: OPFOR are holed up at the airport and a nearby base. Some units may set up ambushes in the urban terrain of Rasman city. A nearby <marker name='BIS_MrkTA_OilfieldText'>oil field installation</marker> is held by the enemy, who'll supposedly destroy it after we attack. BLUFOR units are entrenched S and SW of the airport. Badger group led by 1lt Herrera starts here.

Key.Original:
Following supports are available for you:

Artillery barrage - use standard procedures for caling it.

Support trucks - refuel or ammo trucks are on standby waiting for your call.
Key.English:
Following supports are available for you:

Artillery barrage - use standard procedures for caling it.

Support trucks - refuel or ammo trucks are on standby waiting for your call.

Key.Original: We were not able to secure Rasman airport.
Key.English: We were not able to secure Rasman airport.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting immediate close air support. How copy?
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting immediate close air support. How copy?

Key.Original: Copy that. Airstrike is ready, transmit target location. Over.
Key.English: Copy that. Airstrike is ready, transmit target location. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, coordinates received, aircraft are inbound. Contact on laser designator. Out.
Key.English: %Team, coordinates received, aircraft are inbound. Contact on laser designator. Out.

Key.Original: Negative on the close air support.
Key.English: Negative on the close air support.

Key.Original: Requesting close air support at grid %location.
Key.English: Requesting close air support at grid %location.

Key.Original: %team requesting close air support at grid %location.
Key.English: %team requesting close air support at grid %location.

Key.Original: %Team, intel shows a convoy enroute near your position. Are you free to intercept and destroy it?
Key.English: %Team, intel shows a convoy enroute near your position. Are you free to intercept and destroy it?

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, other units will handle the convoy.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, other units will handle the convoy.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, target vehicle has reached its destination.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, target vehicle has reached its destination.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, target vehicle is disabled.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, target vehicle is disabled.

Key.Original: This is %team requesting supply drop at grid %location.
Key.English: This is %team requesting supply drop at grid %location.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting immediate artillery suppression, high explosive. How copy?
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting immediate artillery suppression, high explosive. How copy?

Key.Original: Artillery available, transmit target location. Over.
Key.English: Artillery available, transmit target location. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, roger that. Target location received, ordnance is inbound. Over.
Key.English: %Team, roger that. Target location received, ordnance is inbound. Over.

Key.Original: Be advised, artillery is unavailable at this time. Out.
Key.English: Be advised, artillery is unavailable at this time. Out.

Key.Original: Negative, we lost contact with the battery. Out.
Key.English: Negative, we lost contact with the battery. Out.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, the battery cannot target that grid. Out.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, the battery cannot target that grid. Out.

Key.Original: %Team, that's outside our firing envelope. Out.
Key.English: %Team, that's outside our firing envelope. Out.

Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, with an immediate artillery suppression request, smoke. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, the battery just dropped off the comm grid. You're on your own. Over.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, the battery just dropped off the comm grid. You're on your own. Over.

Key.Original: Roger, we'll handle it ourselves. Out.
Key.English: Roger, we'll handle it ourselves. Out.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting immediate cover with Willie Pete. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting immediate cover with Willie Pete. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting continuous illumination at the target location. How copy?
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting continuous illumination at the target location. How copy?

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, we need laser guided ordnance. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, we need laser guided ordnance. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, we need a guided anti-armor strike. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, we need a guided anti-armor strike. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting fire support. Fire for effect, over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting fire support. Fire for effect, over.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting fire support at the target location. Willie Pete in effect, how copy?
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting fire support at the target location. Willie Pete in effect, how copy?

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, adjust fire at the target location. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, adjust fire at the target location. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, enemy position in close proximity. Can you assault the location?
Key.English: %Team, enemy position in close proximity. Can you assault the location?

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, enemy has changed position. Attack cancelled.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, enemy has changed position. Attack cancelled.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, friendly units under attack. Can you assist?
Key.English: %Team, be advised, friendly units under attack. Can you assist?

Key.Original: %Team, good work, we see no more hostiles in the area.
Key.English: %Team, good work, we see no more hostiles in the area.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, zero hostiles. Attack halted.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, zero hostiles. Attack halted.

Key.Original: %HQ, we're unable to hold position. Falling back.
Key.English: %HQ, we're unable to hold position. Falling back.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, a high-value target has been marked on your map. Can you intercept and destroy?
Key.English: %Team, be advised, a high-value target has been marked on your map. Can you intercept and destroy?

Key.Original: %Team, cancelling the destroy order, bad intel. How copy?
Key.English: %Team, cancelling the destroy order, bad intel. How copy?

Key.English: Friendly troops requesting escort through hostile zone. Can you offer support along the designated route?

Key.Original: %Team, we have assigned another unit to this escort op.
Key.English: %Team, we have assigned another unit to this escort op.

Key.Original: Roger %Team. Be advised, enemy patrols in close proximity. How copy?
Key.English: Roger %Team. Be advised, enemy patrols in close proximity. How copy?

Key.Original: Solid copy, thanks for the intel.
Key.English: Solid copy, thanks for the intel.

Key.Original: Destination reached, everyone accounted for. Over.
Key.English: Destination reached, everyone accounted for. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, we're at the destination, reporting low casualties. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, we're at the destination, reporting low casualties. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, be advised, escort failed. We lost them. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, be advised, escort failed. We lost them. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %team requesting fast transport, over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %team requesting fast transport, over.

Key.Original: Roger, transport is available. Send destination, over.
Key.English: Roger, transport is available. Send destination, over.

Key.Original: Negative, transport unavailable. Enemy activity in your sector, out.
Key.English: Negative, transport unavailable. Enemy activity in your sector, out.

Key.Original: %team, negative, transport is unavailable at your location. Out.
Key.English: %team, negative, transport is unavailable at your location. Out.

Key.Original: %HQ destination reached. Thanks for the assistance. Out.
Key.English: %HQ destination reached. Thanks for the assistance. Out.

Key.Original: %Team, %HQ, we copy you loud and clear.
Key.English: %Team, %HQ, we copy you loud and clear.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, we copy you loud and clear.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, we copy you loud and clear.

Key.Original: Negative %HQ, we cannot divert at this time. Out.
Key.English: Negative %HQ, we cannot divert at this time. Out.

Key.Original: Sorry %HQ, no way we can help with that right now. Out.
Key.English: Sorry %HQ, no way we can help with that right now. Out.

Key.Original: Understood %HQ, we're on the way. Out.
Key.English: Understood %HQ, we're on the way. Out.

Key.Original: %HQ, unable to complete the objective, aborting. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, unable to complete the objective, aborting. Over.

Key.Original: Carry on with your prior tasks. Over.
Key.English: Carry on with your prior tasks. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, your request has been rejected. Out.
Key.English: %Team, your request has been rejected. Out.

Key.Original: Bit occupied at the moment, dude.
Key.English: Bit occupied at the moment, dude.

Key.Original: I will only tell you my name, rank, and serial number.
Key.English: I will only tell you my name, rank, and serial number.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting release of an attack helicopter near our position. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting release of an attack helicopter near our position. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, release authorized. Send strike target, over.
Key.English: %Team, release authorized. Send strike target, over.

Key.Original: Coordinates received, helo is attacking the target. Out.
Key.English: Coordinates received, helo is attacking the target. Out.

Key.Original: No idea, I don't live here.
Key.English: No idea, I don't live here.

Key.Original: No fire mission available at this time.
Key.English: No fire mission available at this time.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, hostiles reported near your location. Can you make a sweep of the checkpoints?
Key.English: %Team, be advised, hostiles reported near your location. Can you make a sweep of the checkpoints?

Key.Original: %Team, cancel the patrol. Bad intel, over.
Key.English: %Team, cancel the patrol. Bad intel, over.

Key.Original: %HQ, be advised, I'm passing checkpoint one.
Key.English: %HQ, be advised, I'm passing checkpoint one.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, we have a bird standing by. We can fly in reinforcements if needed. Check your map for the rendezvous point and confirm. Over.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, we have a bird standing by. We can fly in reinforcements if needed. Check your map for the rendezvous point and confirm. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, the bird had to RTB for fuel. Over.
Key.English: %Team, the bird had to RTB for fuel. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, we linked up with the reinforcements. Thanks for the support.
Key.English: %HQ, we linked up with the reinforcements. Thanks for the support.

Key.Original: %Team, we lost communication with the pilot. Bird could be down. Over.
Key.English: %Team, we lost communication with the pilot. Bird could be down. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, your reinforcements didn't make it to the rendezvous. You'll have to manage. Over.
Key.English: %Team, your reinforcements didn't make it to the rendezvous. You'll have to manage. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, there are friendly POWs held in close proximity. Can you extract them?
Key.English: %Team, there are friendly POWs held in close proximity. Can you extract them?

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, POWs were transported to unknown location. Mission cancelled.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, POWs were transported to unknown location. Mission cancelled.

Key.Original: %HQ, requesting transport for the recovered POWs. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, requesting transport for the recovered POWs. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, POWs are KIA, I say again, all friendlies KIA. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, POWs are KIA, I say again, all friendlies KIA. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, locals report enemy caches in your AO. Can you search for these caches?
Key.English: %Team, locals report enemy caches in your AO. Can you search for these caches?

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, finding the caches is no longer a priority.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, finding the caches is no longer a priority.

Key.Original: Search complete. Several storage caches uncovered and marked for collection. How copy?
Key.English: Search complete. Several storage caches uncovered and marked for collection. How copy?

Key.Original: Search complete. A large number of caches were located and marked for collection. Over.
Key.English: Search complete. A large number of caches were located and marked for collection. Over.

Key.Original: Search complete, nothing to report, zero caches found. Over.
Key.English: Search complete, nothing to report, zero caches found. Over.

Key.Original: The supplies have been dropped. Out.
Key.English: The supplies have been dropped. Out.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team. We require long-range transport. How copy?
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team. We require long-range transport. How copy?

Key.Original: Roger that. Transport available, requesting LZ. Over.
Key.English: Roger that. Transport available, requesting LZ. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, reporting successful insertion. Thanks for the ride, out.
Key.English: %HQ, reporting successful insertion. Thanks for the ride, out.

Key.Original: %Team, be advised, transport was immobilized. Out.
Key.English: %Team, be advised, transport was immobilized. Out.

Key.Original: %Team, I got a request for transport here. The pick-up is close by, can you handle it?
Key.English: %Team, I got a request for transport here. The pick-up is close by, can you handle it?

Key.Original: %Team, cancel that request, alternate transport found. Over.
Key.English: %Team, cancel that request, alternate transport found. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, we have pick-up point in sight. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, we have pick-up point in sight. Over.

Key.Original: Roger that. Those troops are needed elsewhere, double time gentlemen.
Key.English: Roger that. Those troops are needed elsewhere, double time gentlemen.

Key.Original: %HQ, we lost our transport, I say again, transport disabled.
Key.English: %HQ, we lost our transport, I say again, transport disabled.

Key.Original: %HQ, be advised, all passengers are KIA. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, be advised, all passengers are KIA. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, we're at our destination, everyone accounted for. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, we're at our destination, everyone accounted for. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, we're at our destination. Took some casualties, but the majority is safe. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, we're at our destination. Took some casualties, but the majority is safe. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, we have an aircraft down in your vicinity. Can you locate and secure the crash site?
Key.English: %Team, we have an aircraft down in your vicinity. Can you locate and secure the crash site?

Key.Original: %Team, return to your primary. SAR team's on route to the crash site.
Key.English: %Team, return to your primary. SAR team's on route to the crash site.

Key.Original: Survivors on board transport. Resuming primary.
Key.English: Survivors on board transport. Resuming primary.

Key.Original: %HQ, be advised, crash site compromised. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, be advised, crash site compromised. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, crash site secured. We've got survivors, requesting CASEVAC. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, crash site secured. We've got survivors, requesting CASEVAC. Over.

Key.Original: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting aerial recon. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, this is %Team, requesting aerial recon. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, UAV ready, requesting target location. Over.
Key.English: %Team, UAV ready, requesting target location. Over.

Key.Original: Coordinates received, drone is enroute. Over.
Key.English: Coordinates received, drone is enroute. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, drone is bingo fuel and RTB. Over.
Key.English: %Team, drone is bingo fuel and RTB. Over.

Key.Original: Understood %HQ, thanks for the update. Out.
Key.English: Understood %HQ, thanks for the update. Out.

Key.Original: We can fly in reinforcements as needed.
Key.English: We can fly in reinforcements as needed.

Key.Original: You will have to manage yourself.
Key.English: You will have to manage yourself.

Key.Original: Requesting reinforcements to our position, grid %location.
Key.English: Requesting reinforcements to our position, grid %location.

Key.Original: This is %team, requesting reinforcements to our position, grid %location.
Key.English: This is %team, requesting reinforcements to our position, grid %location.

Key.Original: They say it'll stay like this for a while.
Key.English: They say it'll stay like this for a while.

Key.Original: I reckon we'll get some rain soon.
Key.English: I reckon we'll get some rain soon.

Key.Original: Practice shooting - you can grab some light arms in weapon caches near the practice <marker name = ""range1"">range</marker>.
Key.English: Practice shooting - you can grab some light arms in weapon caches near the practice <marker name = ""range1"">range</marker>.

Key.Original: You may try out all vehicles of US Allies - the Czech, German and UN (Chernarussian) armies. The vehicles can be found at the <marker name = ""headquarters"">base</marker> . Right outside the base there are the <marker name = ""helipads"">helipads</marker> with choppers at your disposal. Test your shooting skills on an improvised shooting <marker name = ""range1"">range</marker>. Have fun!
Key.English: You may try out all vehicles of US Allies - the Czech, German and UN (Chernarussian) armies. The vehicles can be found at the <marker name = ""headquarters"">base</marker> . Right outside the base there are the <marker name = ""helipads"">helipads</marker> with choppers at your disposal. Test your shooting skills on an improvised shooting <marker name = ""range1"">range</marker>. Have fun!

Key.Original: The helicopters will return shortly after the mission starts to the <marker name = ""helipads"">helipads</marker>. Feel free to borad them and have some fun on the <marker name = ""helitargets"">range</marker>.
Key.English: The helicopters will return shortly after the mission starts to the <marker name = ""helipads"">helipads</marker>. Feel free to borad them and have some fun on the <marker name = ""helitargets"">range</marker>.

Key.Original: Try various vehicles used by the Allied forces, stationed at the <marker name = ""headquarters"">base</marker>.
Key.English: Try various vehicles used by the Allied forces, stationed at the <marker name = ""headquarters"">base</marker>.

Key.Original: Try vehicles and weapons used by the NATO allies and the Chernarussian UN contingent.
Key.English: Try vehicles and weapons used by the NATO allies and the Chernarussian UN contingent.

Key.Original: If you would like to use all of our light weapons and try to shoot some targets with them, the <marker name = ""lwrange_destroy"">shooting range</marker> is here for you. Select a weapon from the nearby <marker name = ""weaponcache"">cache</marker> or use some static weapon - it's really up to you, just get some practice.
Key.English: If you would like to use all of our light weapons and try to shoot some targets with them, the <marker name = ""lwrange_destroy"">shooting range</marker> is here for you. Select a weapon from the nearby <marker name = ""weaponcache"">cache</marker> or use some static weapon - it's really up to you, just get some practice.

Key.Original:
Welcome to the newly founded US training base in Takistan.

You can find all armored units and cars in the center of the base or the supply depot.

Many choppers and planes are at your disposal at the airfield too. If you are trigger happy, you'd probably want to wreck some srap metal on our practice range.

You can also use our light weapons or heavy weapons range for some shooting practice. "
Key.English:
Welcome to the newly founded US training base in Takistan.

You can find all armored units and cars in the center of the base or the supply depot.

Many choppers and planes are at your disposal at the airfield too. If you are trigger happy, you'd probably want to wreck some srap metal on our practice range.

You can also use our light weapons or heavy weapons range for some shooting practice. "

Key.Original: You might want to shoot with <marker name = ""hweaponcache"">rocket launchers</marker> or try our anti-tank weapons. In that case you may use a <marker name = ""hwrange_destroy"">range</marker> full of amored targets.
Key.English: You might want to shoot with <marker name = ""hweaponcache"">rocket launchers</marker> or try our anti-tank weapons. In that case you may use a <marker name = ""hwrange_destroy"">range</marker> full of amored targets.

Key.Original: Try out any army vehicle. They are stationed at our <marker name = ""base"">base</marker>. If you wish to try the support vehicles, they are at the <marker name = ""support"">supply depot</marker>.
Key.English: Try out any army vehicle. They are stationed at our <marker name = ""base"">base</marker>. If you wish to try the support vehicles, they are at the <marker name = ""support"">supply depot</marker>.

Key.Original: This FOB is bulit at an <marker name = ""airfield"">airfield</marker>, so you can try out everything the US Army can offer when it comes to the question of air units. You can fly any aircraft and have some target practice near a deserted country border where fake armored targets can be found on a <marker name = ""airtargets"">practice range</marker>.
Key.English: This FOB is bulit at an <marker name = ""airfield"">airfield</marker>, so you can try out everything the US Army can offer when it comes to the question of air units. You can fly any aircraft and have some target practice near a deserted country border where fake armored targets can be found on a <marker name = ""airtargets"">practice range</marker>.

Key.Original: Try all the vehicles used by the US Army.
Key.English: Try all the vehicles used by the US Army.

Key.Original: Explore the <marker name = ""live"">downtown</marker> and do whatever you want!
Key.English: Explore the <marker name = ""live"">downtown</marker> and do whatever you want!

Key.Original: It is an ordinary morning in Zagrabad - people are waking up, go shopping, pray... Explore the <marker name = ""live"">downtown</marker> and find out how it is like when you live in an middle eastern country!
Key.English: It is an ordinary morning in Zagrabad - people are waking up, go shopping, pray... Explore the <marker name = ""live"">downtown</marker> and find out how it is like when you live in an middle eastern country!

Key.Original: Visit the peaceful streets of Zargabad.
Key.English: Visit the peaceful streets of Zargabad.

Key.Original: Try guerilla personal weapons stored in weapon caches under the camo netting.
Key.English: Try guerilla personal weapons stored in weapon caches under the camo netting.

Key.Original: Try various vehicles used by Takistani guerillas.
Key.English: Try various vehicles used by Takistani guerillas.

Key.Original:
Guerillas use numerous vehicles and weapons stolen from enemy, smuggled from nearby countries or customized from local sources.

There is a stash of vehicles near an abandoned fuel pump, together with few targets scattered around to the south and north. There are few vehicles stolen from Takistani Army to the northwest, which may also serve as practice targets.

There are few of our men wandering around, be careful not to hit them.

Other than that, you can do whatever you want. Have fun!
Key.English:
Guerillas use numerous vehicles and weapons stolen from enemy, smuggled from nearby countries or customized from local sources.

There is a stash of vehicles near an abandoned fuel pump, together with few targets scattered around to the south and north. There are few vehicles stolen from Takistani Army to the northwest, which may also serve as practice targets.

There are few of our men wandering around, be careful not to hit them.

Other than that, you can do whatever you want. Have fun!

Key.Original: Wreck some targets on northern range.
Key.English: Wreck some targets on northern range.

Key.Original: Wreck some targets on southern range.
Key.English: Wreck some targets on southern range.

Key.Original: Have fun with static weapons on <marker name = ""range_1"">southern range</marker>.
Key.English: Have fun with static weapons on <marker name = ""range_1"">southern range</marker>.

Key.Original: Try all vehicles used by the Takistani guerillas.
Key.English: Try all vehicles used by the Takistani guerillas.

Key.Original: Wreck some targets on the firing range.
Key.English: Wreck some targets on the firing range.

Key.Original: Various helicopters are available on helipad.
Key.English: Various helicopters are available on helipad.

Key.Original: There are more vehicles used by the Army of Takistan in and around the base's motor pool.
Key.English: There are more vehicles used by the Army of Takistan in and around the base's motor pool.

Key.Original: Try various vehicles used by the Army of Takistan.
Key.English: Try various vehicles used by the Army of Takistan.

Key.Original:
The Army of Takistan uses mostly equipment from former Eastern Block. You see that clearly when you go to a nearby motor pool or walk around the base.

You may try out any vehicle you find as well as practice on the range northwest of the base - there are both static and portable arms, so feel free to wreck some targets.

There are also a few choppers on the helipad and some old aircraft on the airfield."
Key.English:
The Army of Takistan uses mostly equipment from former Eastern Block. You see that clearly when you go to a nearby motor pool or walk around the base.

You may try out any vehicle you find as well as practice on the range northwest of the base - there are both static and portable arms, so feel free to wreck some targets.

There are also a few choppers on the helipad and some old aircraft on the airfield."

Key.Original: Have fun with static weapons on the <marker name = ""range1"">firing range</marker>.
Key.English: Have fun with static weapons on the <marker name = ""range1"">firing range</marker>.

Key.Original: Try various personal weapons stored in weapon caches under the camo netting.
Key.English: Try various personal weapons stored in weapon caches under the camo netting.

Key.Original: There are more aircraft available for you on the airfield. It is recommended to fly to the airfield in one of the choppers available on <marker name = ""helipad"">helipad</marker> or ground vehicles prepared <marker name = ""start"">here</marker> or <marker name = ""pool"">here</marker>.
Key.English: There are more aircraft available for you on the airfield. It is recommended to fly to the airfield in one of the choppers available on <marker name = ""helipad"">helipad</marker> or ground vehicles prepared <marker name = ""start"">here</marker> or <marker name = ""pool"">here</marker>.

Key.Original: Try all the vehicles used by the Army of Takistan.
Key.English: Try all the vehicles used by the Army of Takistan.

Key.Original: Sir, we've lost contact with all our units! Seems like the battle is lost!
Key.English: Sir, we've lost contact with all our units! Seems like the battle is lost!

Key.Original: Magic control to Smasher. Last bird overpass indicates no threats in and around Zargabad. Well done, Smasher, Magic out.
Key.English: Magic control to Smasher. Last bird overpass indicates no threats in and around Zargabad. Well done, Smasher, Magic out.

Key.Original: This is Smasher, intel confirms we have crushed the batallion holding Zargabad. Well done fighting the bad guys, establish defenses and hold position, Zargabad is ours!
Key.English: This is Smasher, intel confirms we have crushed the batallion holding Zargabad. Well done fighting the bad guys, establish defenses and hold position, Zargabad is ours!

Key.Original: Smasher to all units, we have taken all of our objectives today! Zargabad is ours! Regroup at designated assembly areas and establish defensive perimeters. Smasher out.
Key.English: Smasher to all units, we have taken all of our objectives today! Zargabad is ours! Regroup at designated assembly areas and establish defensive perimeters. Smasher out.

Key.Original: Smasher, be advised we've lost contact with half of our combat force and will soon be combat ineffective. Perhaps it's time to fall back?
Key.English: Smasher, be advised we've lost contact with half of our combat force and will soon be combat ineffective. Perhaps it's time to fall back?

Key.Original: This is Smasher, nice work on taking the barracks. Keep up the good work, Smasher out.
Key.English: This is Smasher, nice work on taking the barracks. Keep up the good work, Smasher out.

Key.Original: Smasher here, we've taking downtown Zargabad. Out.
Key.English: Smasher here, we've taking downtown Zargabad. Out.

Key.Original: Be advised we've seized the hill north of the city. Smasher out.
Key.English: Be advised we've seized the hill north of the city. Smasher out.

Key.Original: Smasher to all units, be advised the airport is under our control. Well done, people, press on! Out.
Key.English: Smasher to all units, be advised the airport is under our control. Well done, people, press on! Out.

Key.Original: This is Smasher, the government villa was secured by our troops. Let's keep it safe and intact for the intel people, out.
Key.English: This is Smasher, the government villa was secured by our troops. Let's keep it safe and intact for the intel people, out.

Key.Original: Well done, we've seized the motor pool. Carry on, Smasher out.
Key.English: Well done, we've seized the motor pool. Carry on, Smasher out.

Key.Original: Smasher to all units, stand by for orders.
Key.English: Smasher to all units, stand by for orders.

Container.name: Attacking_enemy_base
Container.situation: base gives basic instructions about mission main objective

Key.Original: Eagle 4-2, Royal, confirm that the target was eliminated.
Key.English: Eagle 4-2, Royal, confirm that the target was eliminated.

Key.Original: Eagle 4-2 to Royal, Seven of Hearts is leaving the house. I say again, Seven of Hearts is on the move.
Key.English: Eagle 4-2 to Royal, Seven of Hearts is leaving the house. I say again, Seven of Hearts is on the move.

Key.Original: Positive hit, we've got positive hit. Seven of Hearts is confirmed.
Key.English: Positive hit, we've got positive hit. Seven of Hearts is confirmed.

Key.Original: Royal, this is Eagle 4-2, all Grads eliminated, RTB.
Key.English: Royal, this is Eagle 4-2, all Grads eliminated, RTB.

Container.name: Initial_briefing
Container.situation: base gives basic instructions about mission main objective

Key.Original: Eagle 4-2, this is Royal, you are cleared for takeoff. Proceed with extreme caution. Sneak the UAV in, destroy the Grads, sneak out. Intel says the 'Seven of Hearts' is still in base, so don't waste the time and eliminate him too. Royal out.
Key.English: Eagle 4-2, this is Royal, you are cleared for takeoff. Proceed with extreme caution. Sneak the UAV in, destroy the Grads, sneak out. Intel says the 'Seven of Hearts' is still in base, so don't waste the time and eliminate him too. Royal out.

Key.Original: Eagle 4-2, Royal. Ground intel says that the Seven of Hearts just left the base. Focus on eliminating the Grads now, we'll get him later. Royal out.
Key.English: Eagle 4-2, Royal. Ground intel says that the Seven of Hearts just left the base. Focus on eliminating the Grads now, we'll get him later. Royal out.

Key.Original: Seven of Hearts is not something you'd like to get...
Key.English: Seven of Hearts is not something you'd like to get...

Key.Original: Royal, Eagle 4-2 here, we've lost contact with the drone. Aborting, over.
Key.English: Royal, Eagle 4-2 here, we've lost contact with the drone. Aborting, over.

Key.Original: Destroy enemy artillery behind the frontline in a daring night raid.
Key.English: Destroy enemy artillery behind the frontline in a daring night raid.

Key.Original:
Intel indicates a position of BM-21 Grad battery, responsible for several casaulties of our forces. Mission objective is to destroy it before it is moved to a different location.

According to latest info, Abdul-Mussawir Ghafurzai, one of presidential military advisors, will be inspecting the enemy base tonight. Eliminating him along with the Grads would deal serious blow to enemy forces.
Key.English:
Intel indicates a position of BM-21 Grad battery, responsible for several casaulties of our forces. Mission objective is to destroy it before it is moved to a different location.

According to latest info, Abdul-Mussawir Ghafurzai, one of presidential military advisors, will be inspecting the enemy base tonight. Eliminating him along with the Grads would deal serious blow to enemy forces.

Key.Original:
Mission starts at FOB Revolver.

Assume a fire position above the mountain ridge. Do not proceed further, strong AAA activity reported in the north.

Move the UAV AH-6X using remote control, to a position with clear view of the enemy base. Intel pinpointed 3 possible Grad positions: 066104, 062095 and 066081, but you may find they moved as you approach. Make sure you won't get too close to the enemy AAA, only one UAV is available for this mission.

When ready, mark the targets and destroy them with Hellfire missiles. Fire the missiles from about 400m so that they have clear path to targets. The Grad battery is a priority. Eliminate 'Seven of Hearts' only when it won't pose threat to the mission. If he leaves, don't hunt him down.

Once targets are eliminated, return to the base.
Key.English:
Mission starts at FOB Revolver.

Assume a fire position above the mountain ridge. Do not proceed further, strong AAA activity reported in the north.

Move the UAV AH-6X using remote control, to a position with clear view of the enemy base. Intel pinpointed 3 possible Grad positions: 066104, 062095 and 066081, but you may find they moved as you approach. Make sure you won't get too close to the enemy AAA, only one UAV is available for this mission.

When ready, mark the targets and destroy them with Hellfire missiles. Fire the missiles from about 400m so that they have clear path to targets. The Grad battery is a priority. Eliminate 'Seven of Hearts' only when it won't pose threat to the mission. If he leaves, don't hunt him down.

Once targets are eliminated, return to the base.

Key.Original: Your mission is to use your AH64 in combination with UAV AH-6X to neutralize three Grad batteries near the enemy base. If possible, neutralize also Abdul-Mussawir Ghafurzai, the 'Seven of Hearts'. Do not lose the UAV, no other bird is available for the mission.
Key.English: Your mission is to use your AH64 in combination with UAV AH-6X to neutralize three Grad batteries near the enemy base. If possible, neutralize also Abdul-Mussawir Ghafurzai, the 'Seven of Hearts'. Do not lose the UAV, no other bird is available for the mission.

Key.Original: You will start at <marker name='start'>FOB Revolver</marker>. The <marker name='enemyPos'>enemy base</marker> is to the north. The best positions for your UAV to lase the targets are here: <marker name='uavpos_1'>066104</marker>, <marker name='uavpos_2'>062095</marker> and <marker name='uavpos_3'>066081</marker>.
Key.English: You will start at <marker name='start'>FOB Revolver</marker>. The <marker name='enemyPos'>enemy base</marker> is to the north. The best positions for your UAV to lase the targets are here: <marker name='uavpos_1'>066104</marker>, <marker name='uavpos_2'>062095</marker> and <marker name='uavpos_3'>066081</marker>.

Key.Original: Return to FOB Revolver when you need service. There are repair, ammo and fuel trucks available there.
Key.English: Return to FOB Revolver when you need service. There are repair, ammo and fuel trucks available there.

Key.Original: You managed to complete all mission objectives while preserving both birds. Good job!
Key.English: You managed to complete all mission objectives while preserving both birds. Good job!

Key.Original: You managed to destroy the Grads and preserve both birds. The 'Seven of Hearts managed to escape however.
Key.English: You managed to destroy the Grads and preserve both birds. The 'Seven of Hearts managed to escape however.

Key.Original: You managed to destroy the Grads, and neutralize the 'Seven of Hearts', however the UAV was destroyed.
Key.English: You managed to destroy the Grads, and neutralize the 'Seven of Hearts', however the UAV was destroyed.

Key.Original: You managed to destroy the Grads, and preserve the UAV, however the 'Seven of Hearts' escaped.
Key.English: You managed to destroy the Grads, and preserve the UAV, however the 'Seven of Hearts' escaped.

Key.Original: Not only you didn't destroy the Grads or neutralize the 'Seven of Hearts', but you also lost the UAV. What a shame!
Key.English: Not only you didn't destroy the Grads or neutralize the 'Seven of Hearts', but you also lost the UAV. What a shame!

Key.Original: Move your AH-64 to a suitable fire position close to, but out of range of the Grad batteries.
Key.English: Move your AH-64 to a suitable fire position close to, but out of range of the Grad batteries.

Key.Original: Use your UAV to destroy three BM-21 Grad launchers sighted near the enemy base.
Key.English: Use your UAV to destroy three BM-21 Grad launchers sighted near the enemy base.

Key.Original: High Value Target, codename 'Seven of Hearts', is currently inspecting the enemy base. We want him neutralized. He won't stay long, so don't waste you time.
Key.English: High Value Target, codename 'Seven of Hearts', is currently inspecting the enemy base. We want him neutralized. He won't stay long, so don't waste you time.

Key.Original: Return your AH-64 to FOB revolver, land and turn off the engines.
Key.English: Return your AH-64 to FOB revolver, land and turn off the engines.

Key.Original: Only one UAV AH-6X is assigned to current mission. It's survival is crucial to mission success.
Key.English: Only one UAV AH-6X is assigned to current mission. It's survival is crucial to mission success.

Container.name: Attack_wave_1_CZ_coming_to_base
Container.dialogName: Attack wave 1 CZ coming to base

Key.Original: Hey, Pueblo, this is Lancer 1, Czech Special Forces. We're closing on your location, try not to hit us!
Key.English: Hey, Pueblo, this is Lancer 1, Czech Special Forces. We're closing on your location, try not to hit us!

Key.Original: Glad you could make it, guys, defend the base!
Key.English: Glad you could make it, guys, defend the base!

Container.name: Attack_wave_1_player_not_in_UN_base
Container.dialogName: Attack wave 1 player not in UN base

Key.Original: Understood, hold on Pueblo, we're inbound. Lancer 1 out.
Key.English: Understood, hold on Pueblo, we're inbound. Lancer 1 out.

Key.Original: Lancer 1, this is Pueblo. We're under full-scale attack by insurgents, my men are under fire, where the hell are you?
Key.English: Lancer 1, this is Pueblo. We're under full-scale attack by insurgents, my men are under fire, where the hell are you?

Key.Original: Everyone get ready, here they come!
Key.English: Everyone get ready, here they come!

Key.Original: Roger, Pueblo. The Stryker company is on the way to secure your position. Lancer 1, you are RTB when the Strykers get there. You did well.
Key.English: Roger, Pueblo. The Stryker company is on the way to secure your position. Lancer 1, you are RTB when the Strykers get there. You did well.

Key.Original: We're here to help, captain. You can buy me a beer when this one's over...
Key.English: We're here to help, captain. You can buy me a beer when this one's over...

Key.Original: You surprise me, lieutenant! Unbelievable! I've heard stuff about you Czech special forces guys, but this just takes the cake!
Key.English: You surprise me, lieutenant! Unbelievable! I've heard stuff about you Czech special forces guys, but this just takes the cake!

Key.Original: Farmhouse, this is Pueblo. Be advised that we just fought off two attack waves of insurgents. Lancer 1 was of great help!
Key.English: Farmhouse, this is Pueblo. Be advised that we just fought off two attack waves of insurgents. Lancer 1 was of great help!

Key.Original: You fought well, lieutenant. But the base is gone, and we've got a lot of KIAs on our hands... let's call for extraction to the safe zone.
Key.English: You fought well, lieutenant. But the base is gone, and we've got a lot of KIAs on our hands... let's call for extraction to the safe zone.

Container.name: Attack_wave_2_UN_all_dead_and_destroyed
Container.dialogName: Attack wave 2 UN all dead and destroyed

Key.Original: Copy that, Lancer 1. Fall back to a safer position if possible, we don't need any more losses today.
Key.English: Copy that, Lancer 1. Fall back to a safer position if possible, we don't need any more losses today.

Key.Original: Shit! Farmhouse, Pueblo is gone, the UN peacekeepers are all KIA, we need to pull out. Sorry for the bad news, Lancer 1 out.
Key.English: Shit! Farmhouse, Pueblo is gone, the UN peacekeepers are all KIA, we need to pull out. Sorry for the bad news, Lancer 1 out.

Key.Original: All right, let's hold this place and call for reinforcements. We can do that, captain, don't you think?
Key.English: All right, let's hold this place and call for reinforcements. We can do that, captain, don't you think?

Key.Original: No worries, we still have plenty fo weapons and some fire support to call in, if necessary.
Key.English: No worries, we still have plenty fo weapons and some fire support to call in, if necessary.

Key.Original: Sir, I don't like being a sitting duck... we should egress the base, we can move to safe territory just two clicks away and call in support to blast this place. What do you think?
Key.English: Sir, I don't like being a sitting duck... we should egress the base, we can move to safe territory just two clicks away and call in support to blast this place. What do you think?

Key.Original: Listen, there's a good chance we'll be overrun. This isn't normal, forget the rules, pack just some ammo and most important stuff, and go!
Key.English: Listen, there's a good chance we'll be overrun. This isn't normal, forget the rules, pack just some ammo and most important stuff, and go!

Key.Original: Shit, there are more of them coming, and with some armor this time! Lieutenant, do your best to protect my men and equipment!
Key.English: Shit, there are more of them coming, and with some armor this time! Lieutenant, do your best to protect my men and equipment!

Key.Original: As you wish, but I deem you responsible for our equipment. We are not authorized to lose anything!
Key.English: As you wish, but I deem you responsible for our equipment. We are not authorized to lose anything!

Key.Original: There is a lot of expensive stuff I am responsible for! Why should I leave it behind?
Key.English: There is a lot of expensive stuff I am responsible for! Why should I leave it behind?

Key.Original: Here we are. You guys should be glad we made it in one piece... trucks are expendable, lives aren't, right?
Key.English: Here we are. You guys should be glad we made it in one piece... trucks are expendable, lives aren't, right?

Key.Original: You bet, lieutenant. Thanks for saving our asses, guess we'd be dead without you...
Key.English: You bet, lieutenant. Thanks for saving our asses, guess we'd be dead without you...

Key.Original: Farmhouse copies. We informed your liaison people about this, they're on the way to take care of you. Gunships and Strykers are inbound to secure the place. Lancer 1, you just saved the day, well done! Farmhouse out.
Key.English: Farmhouse copies. We informed your liaison people about this, they're on the way to take care of you. Gunships and Strykers are inbound to secure the place. Lancer 1, you just saved the day, well done! Farmhouse out.

Key.Original: Here we are. This one was fucking tough, eh?
Key.English: Here we are. This one was fucking tough, eh?

Key.Original: We don't know how to thank you, lieutenant. If you were Chernarussian, I would immediately recommend you for the Silver Cross of Heroism!
Key.English: We don't know how to thank you, lieutenant. If you were Chernarussian, I would immediately recommend you for the Silver Cross of Heroism!

Key.Original: Farmhouse, Pueblo here. We reached point Victor, we have only minor losses thanks to Lancer 1. How copy, over?
Key.English: Farmhouse, Pueblo here. We reached point Victor, we have only minor losses thanks to Lancer 1. How copy, over?

Key.Original: Not good, Lancer 1. Listen up, get to safety if you can and hold position, we're sending some help. Farmhouse out.
Key.English: Not good, Lancer 1. Listen up, get to safety if you can and hold position, we're sending some help. Farmhouse out.

Key.Original: Lancer 1 to Farmhouse, UN peacekeepers are KIA. Please advise, over.
Key.English: Lancer 1 to Farmhouse, UN peacekeepers are KIA. Please advise, over.

Key.Original: Lancer 1, the trucks are gone. Fuck 'em, get us outta here now!
Key.English: Lancer 1, the trucks are gone. Fuck 'em, get us outta here now!

Key.Original: Why don't we stop at Sayid's for some mutton? Major wanted to inquire about yesterdays shooting...
Key.English: Why don't we stop at Sayid's for some mutton? Major wanted to inquire about yesterdays shooting...

Key.Original: Goodbye, mutton... Shit, another MRE food day...
Key.English: Goodbye, mutton... Shit, another MRE food day...

Key.Original: No, I don't want to be late today.
Key.English: No, I don't want to be late today.

Key.Original: Copy that Pueblo, stay calm. We have a patrol near you which can assist. These guys have fire controllers with them, in case you're facing something phony. Out.
Key.English: Copy that Pueblo, stay calm. We have a patrol near you which can assist. These guys have fire controllers with them, in case you're facing something phony. Out.

Key.Original: Lancer 1, Pueblo has possible contacts. I want you to move there to investigate. How copy, over?
Key.English: Lancer 1, Pueblo has possible contacts. I want you to move there to investigate. How copy, over?

Key.Original: Lancer 1 copies, Farmhouse, we're on the move. Tell Pueblo to avoid shooting, they may just be some curious locals. Lancer 1 out.
Key.English: Lancer 1 copies, Farmhouse, we're on the move. Tell Pueblo to avoid shooting, they may just be some curious locals. Lancer 1 out.

Key.Original: Jedem, chlapi, tohle neni dobrý. Černarusové z OSN maj asi problém...
Key.English: Jedem, chlapi, tohle neni dobrý. Černarusové z OSN maj asi problém...

Key.Original: Farmhouse, this is Pueblo, we see some movement in our vicinity, group of six, armed. You may want someone check it out, those guys don't look much like shepherds, over.
Key.English: Farmhouse, this is Pueblo, we see some movement in our vicinity, group of six, armed. You may want someone check it out, those guys don't look much like shepherds, over.

Key.Original: You successfully repelled an attack at the UN base. Good job!
Key.English: You successfully repelled an attack at the UN base. Good job!

Key.Original: You managed to evacuate most of UN personnel. Well done!
Key.English: You managed to evacuate most of UN personnel. Well done!

Key.Original: You managed to evacuate some of the UN personnel, but the majority of them was killed.
Key.English: You managed to evacuate some of the UN personnel, but the majority of them was killed.

Key.Original: All UN personnel was killed, you did not manage to save them.
Key.English: All UN personnel was killed, you did not manage to save them.

Key.Original: Escort the Chernarussian garrison of <marker name = 'BIS_UNBase'>OP Pueblo</marker> and their supply vehicles to the <marker name = 'BIS_checkpoint'>US Army checkpoint</marker>.
Key.English: Escort the Chernarussian garrison of <marker name = 'BIS_UNBase'>OP Pueblo</marker> and their supply vehicles to the <marker name = 'BIS_checkpoint'>US Army checkpoint</marker>.

Key.Original: Several insurgent waves are en route to OP Pueblo. Defend the base, UN personel and vehicles. You have the base's defences at your disposal.
Key.English: Several insurgent waves are en route to OP Pueblo. Defend the base, UN personel and vehicles. You have the base's defences at your disposal.

Key.Original: Position static defences using the Construction Interface and send your troops to man them.
Key.English: Position static defences using the Construction Interface and send your troops to man them.

Key.Original: Patrol the surroundings of <marker name = 'BIS_patrolArea'>Anar</marker> and eliminate any insurgent troops you encounter.
Key.English: Patrol the surroundings of <marker name = 'BIS_patrolArea'>Anar</marker> and eliminate any insurgent troops you encounter.

Key.Original:
No support is assigned to your patrol. If necessary, support is coordinated by the Joint Operational Command.
- UN garrison at OP Pueblo may provide limited support for non-combat tasks (callsign 'Pueblo').
Key.English:
No support is assigned to your patrol. If necessary, support is coordinated by the Joint Operational Command.
- UN garrison at OP Pueblo may provide limited support for non-combat tasks (callsign 'Pueblo').

Key.Original:
Your MOT (callsign 'Lancer 1') will commence patrolling near Anar.
- Follow the main roads to reconnoiter the surroundings.
- Engage any insurgent infantry groups. Report heavy contacts to JOC (callsign 'Farmhouse').
- Report at US checkpoint at 1500 Z. Return to FOB Arizona.
Key.English:
Your MOT (callsign 'Lancer 1') will commence patrolling near Anar.
- Follow the main roads to reconnoiter the surroundings.
- Engage any insurgent infantry groups. Report heavy contacts to JOC (callsign 'Farmhouse').
- Report at US checkpoint at 1500 Z. Return to FOB Arizona.

Key.Original: Patrol the area of <marker name = 'BIS_patrolArea'>Anar</marker> and follow the main roads to reconnoiter the surroundings for presence of hostile foot troops. Eliminate any armed militia attacking your patrol, other Allied unit or local population in your AO.
Key.English: Patrol the area of <marker name = 'BIS_patrolArea'>Anar</marker> and follow the main roads to reconnoiter the surroundings for presence of hostile foot troops. Eliminate any armed militia attacking your patrol, other Allied unit or local population in your AO.

Key.Original:
One month after US forces defeated the Takistani military regime, Chernarussian contingent of United Nations supervises distribution of the humanitarian aid. As the former Takistani militias still terrorize the remote mountain areas, security needs to be maintained by the Mobile Observation Teams provided by NATO.
- Key UN installation is OP Pueblo near Feruz Abad, garrisoned by a squad-sized CDF sentry team. UN troops and friendly HUMINT report increased activity of old regime sympathizers in the area, attempts to disrupt distribution of humrats and intimidate representatives of the provisional government.
Key.English:
One month after US forces defeated the Takistani military regime, Chernarussian contingent of United Nations supervises distribution of the humanitarian aid. As the former Takistani militias still terrorize the remote mountain areas, security needs to be maintained by the Mobile Observation Teams provided by NATO.
- Key UN installation is OP Pueblo near Feruz Abad, garrisoned by a squad-sized CDF sentry team. UN troops and friendly HUMINT report increased activity of old regime sympathizers in the area, attempts to disrupt distribution of humrats and intimidate representatives of the provisional government.

Key.Original: Your Mobile Observation Team will patrol the area of <marker name = 'BIS_patrolArea'>Anar village</marker> and eliminate any armed threats. There were reported numerous sightings of militia insurgents in the past week, indicating possible increase of insurgent activity the command wishes to prevent.
Key.English: Your Mobile Observation Team will patrol the area of <marker name = 'BIS_patrolArea'>Anar village</marker> and eliminate any armed threats. There were reported numerous sightings of militia insurgents in the past week, indicating possible increase of insurgent activity the command wishes to prevent.

Key.Original: Routine patrol of Czech special forces turns into a race against the time...
Key.English: Routine patrol of Czech special forces turns into a race against the time...

Key.Original: Move to <marker name = 'BIS_UNBase'>OP Pueblo</marker> and protect it against the incoming guerrillas.
Key.English: Move to <marker name = 'BIS_UNBase'>OP Pueblo</marker> and protect it against the incoming guerrillas.

Key.Original: Use Communication in your command menu to call in available supports.
Key.English: Use Communication in your command menu to call in available supports.

Key.Original: Sweeper 1 here, did you destroy the cache, over?
Key.English: Sweeper 1 here, did you destroy the cache, over?

Key.Original: Affirmative, Sweeper 1. It's just a pile of scrap metal now, over.
Key.English: Affirmative, Sweeper 1. It's just a pile of scrap metal now, over.

Key.Original: Good job, just blow it up and report, over.
Key.English: Good job, just blow it up and report, over.

Key.Original: Boss, we've got a jackpot here. A weapons cache. AKs, RPGs, grenades, even SA-58s...
Key.English: Boss, we've got a jackpot here. A weapons cache. AKs, RPGs, grenades, even SA-58s...

Key.Original: Jesus fucking Christ! A weapon cache. Lieutenant needs to know about this.
Key.English: Jesus fucking Christ! A weapon cache. Lieutenant needs to know about this.

Key.Original: Sweeper 1, Sweeper 2 here. Reporting a weapon cache in the village of Khushab. It's militia stuff, a variety of small arms and anti-tank launchers. How copy?
Key.English: Sweeper 1, Sweeper 2 here. Reporting a weapon cache in the village of Khushab. It's militia stuff, a variety of small arms and anti-tank launchers. How copy?

Key.Original: Sweeper, be advised, Bravo 6 has visual on several armed civilians in grid 015057, over.
Key.English: Sweeper, be advised, Bravo 6 has visual on several armed civilians in grid 015057, over.

Key.Original: Thanks for the tip, Bravo 6. We're moving in to check it out, over.
Key.English: Thanks for the tip, Bravo 6. We're moving in to check it out, over.

Key.Original: Okay, return to base. Sweeper 1 out.
Key.English: Okay, return to base. Sweeper 1 out.

Key.Original: What?! It's the third one this month alone! Shit, you're more efficient in killing humvees than OPFOR... OK, sending a chopper for you.
Key.English: What?! It's the third one this month alone! Shit, you're more efficient in killing humvees than OPFOR... OK, sending a chopper for you.

Key.Original: No chance you'd make it on foot, Bravo 6 reported some more contacts on the way. Stand by for extraction, Sweeper 2 out.
Key.English: No chance you'd make it on foot, Bravo 6 reported some more contacts on the way. Stand by for extraction, Sweeper 2 out.

Key.Original: Sweeper 1, this is Sweeper 2, we've cleared the village, over.
Key.English: Sweeper 1, this is Sweeper 2, we've cleared the village, over.

Key.Original: Destroy the ammo cache you found in Khushab. Use explosives found in the cache.
Key.English: Destroy the ammo cache you found in Khushab. Use explosives found in the cache.

Key.Original: Destroy the ammo cache you found in Khushab. Use explosives found in the cache.
Key.English: Destroy the ammo cache you found in Khushab. Use explosives found in the cache.

Key.Original: Sweeper 2 managed to eliminate OPFOR militia in Khushab.
Key.English: Sweeper 2 managed to eliminate OPFOR militia in Khushab.

Key.Original: Your team was KIA. Takistani militants added another victory to their score.
Key.English: Your team was KIA. Takistani militants added another victory to their score.

Key.Original: Mountains of Takistan, no man's land...
Key.English: Mountains of Takistan, no man's land...

Key.Original: Bravo 6' reports several armed civilians in the village of Khushab. Move to the village and investigate if they are friendly or OPFOR. Neutralize any resistance.
Key.English: Bravo 6' reports several armed civilians in the village of Khushab. Move to the village and investigate if they are friendly or OPFOR. Neutralize any resistance.

Key.Original: The 'Sweeper 2' is a motorized patrol of five soldiers aboard a HMMWV. Supposed enemy presence is in the village of Khushab. 'A few armed civilians' is the best intel we've got. We suppose it might be a section sized militia unit. No intel about their equipment is available, so be careful when moving to contact.
Key.English: The 'Sweeper 2' is a motorized patrol of five soldiers aboard a HMMWV. Supposed enemy presence is in the village of Khushab. 'A few armed civilians' is the best intel we've got. We suppose it might be a section sized militia unit. No intel about their equipment is available, so be careful when moving to contact.

Key.Original: The 3rd Motorized Platoons patrol codename 'Sweeper 2' is on a routine patrol mission scouting for intel on Takistani militias in the countryside. BLUFOR Blackhawk, codename 'Bravo 6' reports supposed OPFOR activity in the village of Khushab. 'Sweeper 2' is the closest possible asset, so you are redirected to move in and investigate OPFOR presence.
Key.English: The 3rd Motorized Platoons patrol codename 'Sweeper 2' is on a routine patrol mission scouting for intel on Takistani militias in the countryside. BLUFOR Blackhawk, codename 'Bravo 6' reports supposed OPFOR activity in the village of Khushab. 'Sweeper 2' is the closest possible asset, so you are redirected to move in and investigate OPFOR presence.

Key.Original: In case 'Sweeper 2' looses the HMMWV, 'Bravo 6' will extract 'Sweeper 2'.
Key.English: In case 'Sweeper 2' looses the HMMWV, 'Bravo 6' will extract 'Sweeper 2'.

Key.Original: Move your HMMWV near the village of Khushab and investigate whether the armed civilians are friendly or OPFOR. Neutralize any OPFOR units.
Key.English: Move your HMMWV near the village of Khushab and investigate whether the armed civilians are friendly or OPFOR. Neutralize any OPFOR units.

Key.Original: Move from your position to <marker name='BIS_village'>Khushab</marker> and investigate OPFOR presence. Neutralize resistance if OPFOR presence is confirmed.
Key.English: Move from your position to <marker name='BIS_village'>Khushab</marker> and investigate OPFOR presence. Neutralize resistance if OPFOR presence is confirmed.

Key.Original: Initializing Mission: Hike in the Hills...
Key.English: Initializing Mission: Hike in the Hills...

Key.Original: Check the situation in a nearby village.
Key.English: Check the situation in a nearby village.

Key.Original: Check the situation in a nearby village and intervene if necessary.
Key.English: Check the situation in a nearby village and intervene if necessary.

Key.Original: Return to base using a chopper.
Key.English: Return to base using a chopper.

Key.Original: Jackal, return to point Idaho immediately, you're out of time. How copy?
Key.English: Jackal, return to point Idaho immediately, you're out of time. How copy?

Key.Original: Hey guys, how's it goin'? Don't fire, I'm Jackal.
Key.English: Hey guys, how's it goin'? Don't fire, I'm Jackal.

Key.Original: Roger that, Citizen, change of plans... Jackal out.
Key.English: Roger that, Citizen, change of plans... Jackal out.

Key.Original: Jackal, be advised the targets are moving away from base. Abort the op and continue to point Idaho, how copy?
Key.English: Jackal, be advised the targets are moving away from base. Abort the op and continue to point Idaho, how copy?

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Jackal. Landing successful, Oscar Mike to target. How copy?
Key.English: Citizen, this is Jackal. Landing successful, Oscar Mike to target. How copy?

Key.Original: Understood, Jackal. Give 'em hell. Citizen out.
Key.English: Understood, Jackal. Give 'em hell. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Jackal to Citizen. All targets destroyed, I say again, all enemy armor was eliminated. Over.
Key.English: Jackal to Citizen. All targets destroyed, I say again, all enemy armor was eliminated. Over.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Jackal. Move to Idaho, Lancer's ready to pick you up. Citizen out.
Key.English: Acknowledged, Jackal. Move to Idaho, Lancer's ready to pick you up. Citizen out.

Key.Original: This is stealthy one-man mission. You will get no support, and during the whole mission, you will also preserve the radio silence.
Key.English: This is stealthy one-man mission. You will get no support, and during the whole mission, you will also preserve the radio silence.

Key.Original: The enemy <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> is small, but heavily secured. Against their defense, supported with all the tanks inside, the direct attack is not the wisest idea. Instead, you will secretly infiltrate inside and do everything necessary. Then exfiltrate and get to the <marker name='BIS_CZpost'>rendezvous point</marker>.
Key.English: The enemy <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> is small, but heavily secured. Against their defense, supported with all the tanks inside, the direct attack is not the wisest idea. Instead, you will secretly infiltrate inside and do everything necessary. Then exfiltrate and get to the <marker name='BIS_CZpost'>rendezvous point</marker>.

Key.Original: Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> and to destroy or immobilize the parking tanks. If you get the chance, damage the base by destroying certain targets (<marker name='BIS_repair'>armory</marker> and <marker name='BIS_fuel'>gas station</marker>) as well.
Key.English: Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> and to destroy or immobilize the parking tanks. If you get the chance, damage the base by destroying certain targets (<marker name='BIS_repair'>armory</marker> and <marker name='BIS_fuel'>gas station</marker>) as well.

Key.Original: The <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> is secured, and we also have reports about motorized patrols in the area. Also be warned, that there is a small military <marker name='BIS_heli'>helipad</marker> near the base, with battle-ready UH-1H parking there.
Key.English: The <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> is secured, and we also have reports about motorized patrols in the area. Also be warned, that there is a small military <marker name='BIS_heli'>helipad</marker> near the base, with battle-ready UH-1H parking there.

Key.Original: Our forces are quickly penetrating deep into Takistan, leaving several small military bases behind their lines. You will be dropped in the late night near <marker name='BIS_base'>one of them</marker> to prevent the tank unit parking inside from flanking our forces.
Key.English: Our forces are quickly penetrating deep into Takistan, leaving several small military bases behind their lines. You will be dropped in the late night near <marker name='BIS_base'>one of them</marker> to prevent the tank unit parking inside from flanking our forces.

Key.Original: You managed to destroy the tanks and damage the base. This is a harmful blow to the enemy.
Key.English: You managed to destroy the tanks and damage the base. This is a harmful blow to the enemy.

Key.Original: Although the base is still operational, destroying the enemy tanks will make our offensive a lot easier.
Key.English: Although the base is still operational, destroying the enemy tanks will make our offensive a lot easier.

Key.Original: You were unable to complete the tasks given to you. Our offensive will be very difficult with the enemy's infrastructure intact.
Key.English: You were unable to complete the tasks given to you. Our offensive will be very difficult with the enemy's infrastructure intact.

Key.Original:
Destroy all tanks stationed in the base before they leave (0400).

You can find additional explosives in the base.
Key.English:
Destroy all tanks stationed in the base before they leave (0400).

You can find additional explosives in the base.

Key.Original:
Before you leave, do some damage to the base. Destroying the service depot along with the gas station should be enough.

You can find additional explosives in the base.
Key.English:
Before you leave, do some damage to the base. Destroying the service depot along with the gas station should be enough.

You can find additional explosives in the base.

Key.Original: Under the cover of darkness, parachute into enemy territory and sabotage enemy tank base.
Key.English: Under the cover of darkness, parachute into enemy territory and sabotage enemy tank base.

Key.Original: Under the cover of darkness, parachute into enemy territory and sabotage enemy tank base.
Key.English: Under the cover of darkness, parachute into enemy territory and sabotage enemy tank base.

Key.Original: All units proceed to objective. Leave no one alive. Command out.
Key.English: All units proceed to objective. Leave no one alive. Command out.

Key.Original: Alpha ready to engage. Moving toward the objective, over.
Key.English: Alpha ready to engage. Moving toward the objective, over.

Key.Original: Hah, it's like a laser show at a rave, man!
Key.English: Hah, it's like a laser show at a rave, man!

Key.Original: Bravo ready to move in, approaching village, over.
Key.English: Bravo ready to move in, approaching village, over.

Key.Original: Hold position in the village, I'm sending a chopper your way to extract you. How copy?
Key.English: Hold position in the village, I'm sending a chopper your way to extract you. How copy?

Key.Original: Alpha team to Revolver, we have eliminated all resistance. Awaiting further orders, over.
Key.English: Alpha team to Revolver, we have eliminated all resistance. Awaiting further orders, over.

Key.Original: Copy that, waiting for extraction. Alpha out.
Key.English: Copy that, waiting for extraction. Alpha out.

Key.Original: Everyone to the bird, move it! Go! Go! Go!
Key.English: Everyone to the bird, move it! Go! Go! Go!

Key.Original: You have successfully neutralized all resistance in the village.
Key.English: You have successfully neutralized all resistance in the village.

Key.Original: Even though you encountered stronger enemy than we have expected, you were able to perform the clean sweep of the village. Great job!
Key.English: Even though you encountered stronger enemy than we have expected, you were able to perform the clean sweep of the village. Great job!

Key.Original: You were not able to complete the mission objective.
Key.English: You were not able to complete the mission objective.

Key.Original: Wait for your exfiltration chopper to arrive, <marker name='lz'>board it</marker> and leave the AO.
Key.English: Wait for your exfiltration chopper to arrive, <marker name='lz'>board it</marker> and leave the AO.

Key.Original: No support is available for this mission.
Key.English: No support is available for this mission.

Key.Original:
Move towards the village in and engage at will.
Use laser pointers and night visors to coordinate your advance and fire.
After neutralizing the OPFOR militia, report and wait for exfiltration chopper.
Key.English:
Move towards the village in and engage at will.
Use laser pointers and night visors to coordinate your advance and fire.
After neutralizing the OPFOR militia, report and wait for exfiltration chopper.

Key.Original: Eliminate all OPFOR units in the <marker name='village'>village</marker>.
Key.English: Eliminate all OPFOR units in the <marker name='village'>village</marker>.

Key.Original:
Two Special Forces teams, 'Alpha' and 'Bravo' will be moved in silence near the eastern Chardarakht.
Insurgents are located inside the village perimeter.
Key.English:
Two Special Forces teams, 'Alpha' and 'Bravo' will be moved in silence near the eastern Chardarakht.
Insurgents are located inside the village perimeter.

Key.Original: Our local intel source confirmed that a nameless <marker name='village'>village</marker> east of Chardarakht is full of milita. Two special forces are deployed there to annihilate them with a surprise attack.
Key.English: Our local intel source confirmed that a nameless <marker name='village'>village</marker> east of Chardarakht is full of milita. Two special forces are deployed there to annihilate them with a surprise attack.

Key.Original: Move to <marker name='village'>village</marker> held by insurgents and neutralize all resistance.
Key.English: Move to <marker name='village'>village</marker> held by insurgents and neutralize all resistance.

Key.Original: Special Forces raid on an insurgent meeting. Leave no survivors, take no prisoners.
Key.English: Special Forces raid on an insurgent meeting. Leave no survivors, take no prisoners.

Key.Original: Special Forces raid on an insurgent meeting. Leave no survivors, take no prisoners.
Key.English: Special Forces raid on an insurgent meeting. Leave no survivors, take no prisoners.

Key.Original: Learn how to use tasks to progress in your mission.
Key.English: 学习如何利用任务列表来规划任务进展.

Key.Original: Monitor to Ghost 1, stop fucking shooting your own men now or I get your ass court-martialed before your rotor stops, understood? Out.
Key.English: Monitor to Ghost 1, stop fucking shooting your own men now or I get your ass court-martialed before your rotor stops, understood? Out.

Key.Original: Man, you just dropped a civvie! You should be more careful. Remember what Kane said about collateral?
Key.English: Man, you just dropped a civvie! You should be more careful. Remember what Kane said about collateral?

Key.Original: Ghost 1, can you hear me? Over.
Key.English: Ghost 1, can you hear me? Over.

Key.Original: It seems so, guess I'll make my way to the wreck... over.
Key.English: It seems so, guess I'll make my way to the wreck... over.

Key.Original: Ghost 1 here, are you all right? Over.
Key.English: Ghost 1 here, are you all right? Over.

Key.Original: Yeah, rendezvous at the crash site. Out.
Key.English: Yeah, rendezvous at the crash site. Out.

Container.name: Convoy_eliminated
Container.situation: flying, last vehicle of convoy destroyed

Key.Original: Looks like the vehicles are all dead. I got some men fleeing and a few dead bodies. Good job, man.
Key.English: Looks like the vehicles are all dead. I got some men fleeing and a few dead bodies. Good job, man.

Key.Original: Well done, resume patrol. Monitor out.
Key.English: Well done, resume patrol. Monitor out.

Key.Original: Okay, glad we're through that. Gotta report it.
Key.English: Okay, glad we're through that. Gotta report it.

Key.Original: Monitor, Ghost 1 reporting convoy eliminated. All vehicles destroyed, some scattered foot mobiles still present, over.
Key.English: Monitor, Ghost 1 reporting convoy eliminated. All vehicles destroyed, some scattered foot mobiles still present, over.

Container.name: Convoy_spotted
Container.situation: flying, convoy spotted by copilot

Key.Original: You better concentrate, Jerry, they do have some big guns down there.
Key.English: You better concentrate, Jerry, they do have some big guns down there.

Key.Original: Nice catch, Ghost. You are cleared to engage. Monitor out.
Key.English: Nice catch, Ghost. You are cleared to engage. Monitor out.

Key.Original: Monitor, we have visual on an OPFOR convoy. Two trucks, about four vehicles, some with heavy machineguns. Over.
Key.English: Monitor, we have visual on an OPFOR convoy. Two trucks, about four vehicles, some with heavy machineguns. Over.

Key.Original: Cool, let's see what this baby can do...
Key.English: Cool, let's see what this baby can do...

Key.Original: Copy that. Hold position, rescue team is inbound, callsign 'Angel 5', over.
Key.English: Copy that. Hold position, rescue team is inbound, callsign 'Angel 5', over.

Key.Original: Well, don't think this'll be airborne ever again…
Key.English: Well, don't think this'll be airborne ever again…

Key.Original: Monitor this is Ghost 1, I've reached the crash site, over.
Key.English: Monitor this is Ghost 1, I've reached the crash site, over.

Container.name: Departing
Container.situation: team boards the rescue chopper, heli lifts off, heading to base, blackout, mission ends

Key.Original: Monitor, this is Angel 5, Ghost is aboard and we are RTB, over.
Key.English: Monitor, this is Angel 5, Ghost is aboard and we are RTB, over.

Container.name: Initial_briefing
Container.situation: briefing at start, team inside littlebird, sitting on the ground

Key.Original: Ghost 1, you're cleared for takeoff. Remember the ROE, stay on course and report all contacts. Good luck, guys, Monitor out.
Key.English: Ghost 1, you're cleared for takeoff. Remember the ROE, stay on course and report all contacts. Good luck, guys, Monitor out.

Key.Original: Monitor, this is Ghost 1 ready to commence patrol over Khushab.
Key.English: Monitor, this is Ghost 1 ready to commence patrol over Khushab.

Container.name: Landed_at_base
Container.situation: successful landing at base

Key.Original: Good to have you back in one piece, Ghost 1. See you in the CC tent for debriefing. Monitor out.
Key.English: Good to have you back in one piece, Ghost 1. See you in the CC tent for debriefing. Monitor out.

Container.name: Last_Waypoint
Container.situation: flying, last last waypoint reached

Key.Original: Whew, I see the base. Finally! These moountains are givin' me goosebumps.
Key.English: Whew, I see the base. Finally! These moountains are givin' me goosebumps.

Key.Original: Roger that, Ghost 1, you're cleared for landing.
Key.English: Roger that, Ghost 1, you're cleared for landing.

Key.Original: Completion of patrol flight, requesting permission to land. Over.
Key.English: Completion of patrol flight, requesting permission to land. Over.

Container.name: LB_crashes_with_crew
Container.situation: littlebird crashes, team is still inside but survives

Key.Original: Shit, how is it we're still alive?
Key.English: Shit, how is it we're still alive?

Key.Original: An excessive amount of luck, I guess.
Key.English: An excessive amount of luck, I guess.

Key.Original: Citizen, this is Ghost 1, we just went down hard. We're all right but we're on the ground, how copy, over?
Key.English: Citizen, this is Ghost 1, we just went down hard. We're all right but we're on the ground, how copy, over?

Key.Original: Citizen, Ghost 1, mayday, mayday, going in hard! I say again, Ghost 1 is going down!
Key.English: Citizen, Ghost 1, mayday, mayday, going in hard! I say again, Ghost 1 is going down!

Container.name: Out_of_Ammo
Container.situation: littlebird gets out of ammo

Key.Original: Copy. Disengage, return to patrol route and stay out of combat. We'll send someone else after your target.
Key.English: Copy. Disengage, return to patrol route and stay out of combat. We'll send someone else after your target.

Key.Original: Ghost 1 to Monitor, we're out of ammo. I say again, Ghost 1 has gone winchester, over.
Key.English: Ghost 1 to Monitor, we're out of ammo. I say again, Ghost 1 has gone winchester, over.

Key.Original: Ghost 1, you are to move to your crash site and await evacuation there. Rescue is spooling up now. Citizen out.
Key.English: Ghost 1, you are to move to your crash site and await evacuation there. Rescue is spooling up now. Citizen out.

Key.Original: Citizen, Ghost 1. We had to eject. How copy, over?
Key.English: Citizen, Ghost 1. We had to eject. How copy, over?

Key.Original: We're all right, just a little shaken. Requesting evac, over.
Key.English: We're all right, just a little shaken. Requesting evac, over.

Key.Original: Monitor to Ghost 1, Angel 5 reports arrival on your position, can you see them, over?
Key.English: Monitor to Ghost 1, Angel 5 reports arrival on your position, can you see them, over?

Key.Original: Alright board and RTB ASAP. Out.
Key.English: Alright board and RTB ASAP. Out.

Key.Original: Ghost 1 here, can see Angel 5 they seem to look for an LZ, over.
Key.English: Ghost 1 here, can see Angel 5 they seem to look for an LZ, over.

Key.Original: Angel 5 is unable to complete their mission. You are to head northeast and cross into friendly territory as soon as possible, understood?
Key.English: Angel 5 is unable to complete their mission. You are to head northeast and cross into friendly territory as soon as possible, understood?

Key.Original: Ghost 1 acknowledges. Sure has turned out to be a swell day, hasn't it? On the way. Out.
Key.English: Ghost 1 acknowledges. Sure has turned out to be a swell day, hasn't it? On the way. Out.

Key.Original: All primary objectives were accomplished. Another job well done..
Key.English: All primary objectives were accomplished. Another job well done..

Key.Original: You are court-martialed for the suspected violation of ROE. What a disgrace!
Key.English: You are court-martialed for the suspected violation of ROE. What a disgrace!

Key.Original: You didn't manage to finish your mission in time!
Key.English: You didn't manage to finish your mission in time!

Key.Original: Patrol completed, but an enemy convoy sliped away unnoticed.
Key.English: Patrol completed, but an enemy convoy sliped away unnoticed.

Key.Original: Patrol completed, but the enemy convoy fled.
Key.English: Patrol completed, but the enemy convoy fled.

Key.Original: Patrol objective failed, but you discovered an enemy convoy and managed to destroy it.
Key.English: Patrol objective failed, but you discovered an enemy convoy and managed to destroy it.

Key.Original: Avoid enemy contact, stay close to the crash site and wait there for rescue.
Key.English: Avoid enemy contact, stay close to the crash site and wait there for rescue.

Key.Original: Warning: Your chopper get seriously damaged!
Key.English: Warning: Your chopper get seriously damaged!

Key.Original:
- CSAR team aboard Blackhawk helicopter available on FARP Blackburn.
- Emergency CAS gunship flights on standby: Renegade 6 (FOB Arizona), Liquid 3 (FOB Revolver), Scorcher 2 (FARP Blackburn).
Key.English:
- CSAR team aboard Blackhawk helicopter available on FARP Blackburn.
