- Emergency CAS gunship flights on standby: Renegade 6 (FOB Arizona), Liquid 3 (FOB Revolver), Scorcher 2 (FARP Blackburn).

Key.Original:
- Take off in AH-6J ('Ghost 1') from FARP Blackburn at 0530 Z.
- Follow the preplanned patrol route (Gospandi - Mulladost - Khushab - Jilavur - Feruz Abad - Falar - Bastam - Lalezar).
- Report any targets of opportunity to FARP Blackburn ('Monitor') and engage after permission.
- Return to base (FARP Blackburn) no later than 0700 Z.
Key.English:
- Take off in AH-6J ('Ghost 1') from FARP Blackburn at 0530 Z.
- Follow the preplanned patrol route (Gospandi - Mulladost - Khushab - Jilavur - Feruz Abad - Falar - Bastam - Lalezar).
- Report any targets of opportunity to FARP Blackburn ('Monitor') and engage after permission.
- Return to base (FARP Blackburn) no later than 0700 Z.

Key.Original:
- Primary: Patrol flight along the preplanned route.
- Secondary: Engage enemy vehicles and troops you encounter.
Key.English:
- Primary: Patrol flight along the preplanned route.
- Secondary: Engage enemy vehicles and troops you encounter.

Key.Original: The Takistani army has been defeated only few weeks ago, but many Republican Militias fled to the mountains to wage the war against the new government. US Army and the Alliance troops have begun a counter-insurgency campaign against them. In the first phase of the operation, command's intent is to disrupt enemy supply lines. Air Force and Army helicopters are flying over the insurgency-controlled areas around the clock, destroying all the enemy they can find.
Key.English: The Takistani army has been defeated only few weeks ago, but many Republican Militias fled to the mountains to wage the war against the new government. US Army and the Alliance troops have begun a counter-insurgency campaign against them. In the first phase of the operation, command's intent is to disrupt enemy supply lines. Air Force and Army helicopters are flying over the insurgency-controlled areas around the clock, destroying all the enemy they can find.

Key.Original: Patrol over the valleys frequently used by insurgents to ship small arms and troops near Allied bases. There's always a chance to spot and engage belated transport vehicle or guerrilla group.
Key.English: Patrol over the valleys frequently used by insurgents to ship small arms and troops near Allied bases. There's always a chance to spot and engage belated transport vehicle or guerrilla group.

Key.Original: Fly along given patrol route. Report all targets you encounter.
Key.English: Fly along given patrol route. Report all targets you encounter.

Key.Original: Killing civilians will not be tolerated.
Key.English: Killing civilians will not be tolerated.

Key.Original: Killing BLUFOR personel will result in court martial after arrival.
Key.English: Killing BLUFOR personel will result in court martial after arrival.

Key.Original: Avoid enemy contact, stay close to the crash site and wait there for rescue.
Key.English: Avoid enemy contact, stay close to the crash site and wait there for rescue.

Key.Original: Move to the rescue chopper and exfiltrate.
Key.English: Move to the rescue chopper and exfiltrate.

Key.Original: Head to the east, avoid contact with the enemy and return back to friendlies.
Key.English: Head to the east, avoid contact with the enemy and return back to friendlies.

Key.Original: Destroy the convoy before it reaches the final destination and unloads the cargo. Remember this is not combat chopper.
Key.English: Destroy the convoy before it reaches the final destination and unloads the cargo. Remember this is not combat chopper.

Key.Original: Return back to FARP Blackburn, land and turn off your engine.
Key.English: Return back to FARP Blackburn, land and turn off your engine.

Key.Original: Fly a patrol over enemy territory suspected for insurgency movements.
Key.English: Fly a patrol over enemy territory suspected for insurgency movements.

Key.Original: Fly along given patrol route. Report all targets you encounter.
Key.English: Fly along given patrol route. Report all targets you encounter.

Key.Original: Avoid enemy contact, stay close to the <marker name='BIS_Mrk_CrashSite'>crash site</marker> and wait there for rescue.
Key.English: Avoid enemy contact, stay close to the <marker name='BIS_Mrk_CrashSite'>crash site</marker> and wait there for rescue.

Key.Original: Move to the <marker name='BIS_Mrk_RescueChopper'>rescue chopper</marker> and exfiltrate.
Key.English: Move to the <marker name='BIS_Mrk_RescueChopper'>rescue chopper</marker> and exfiltrate.

Key.Original: Head to the east, avoid contact with the enemy and return <marker name='BIS_Mrk_FARP_Blackburn'>back to friendlies</marker>.
Key.English: Head to the east, avoid contact with the enemy and return <marker name='BIS_Mrk_FARP_Blackburn'>back to friendlies</marker>.

Key.Original: Fly along given patrol route. Attack all targets of opportunity and return back to <marker name='BIS_Mrk_FARP_Blackburn'>FARP Blackburn</marker>.
Key.English: Fly along given patrol route. Attack all targets of opportunity and return back to <marker name='BIS_Mrk_FARP_Blackburn'>FARP Blackburn</marker>.

Key.Original: Return back to <marker name='BIS_Mrk_FARP_Blackburn'>FARP Blackburn</marker>, land and turn off your engine.
Key.English: Return back to <marker name='BIS_Mrk_FARP_Blackburn'>FARP Blackburn</marker>, land and turn off your engine.

Key.Original: Killing civilians will not be tolerated.
Key.English: Killing civilians will not be tolerated.

Key.Original: Killing BLUFOR personel will result in court martial after arrival.
Key.English: Killing BLUFOR personel will result in court martial after arrival.

Key.Original: Dingo, this is Bishop, do you copy? Over.
Key.English: Dingo, this is Bishop, do you copy? Over.

Key.Original: Spider ETA 5 mikes, what's your status? Over.
Key.English: Spider ETA 5 mikes, what's your status? Over.

Key.Original: Dingo, be advised, Spider's just arrived, hope you're on the spot. Over.
Key.English: Dingo, be advised, Spider's just arrived, hope you're on the spot. Over.

Key.Original: Dingo Actual here, copying you lima charlie. Go ahead, over.
Key.English: Dingo Actual here, copying you lima charlie. Go ahead, over.

Key.Original: Roger, we're on the way, we can make it. Dingo out.
Key.English: Roger, we're on the way, we can make it. Dingo out.

Key.Original: No worries, we'll make it. Dingo out.
Key.English: No worries, we'll make it. Dingo out.

Key.Original: Copy that, Dingo. Please confirm the kill, over.
Key.English: Copy that, Dingo. Please confirm the kill, over.

Key.Original: Good, now get to the safezone ASAP. Bishop out.
Key.English: Good, now get to the safezone ASAP. Bishop out.

Key.Original: Bishop, this is Dingo, we just took out Spider. Over.
Key.English: Bishop, this is Dingo, we just took out Spider. Over.

Key.Original: Bishop to Dingo, radar indicates Spider's chopper is taking off. Did you eliminate Spider, over?
Key.English: Bishop to Dingo, radar indicates Spider's chopper is taking off. Did you eliminate Spider, over?

Key.Original: Well, you must have scared him away. Return to friendly positions immediately. How copy?
Key.English: Well, you must have scared him away. Return to friendly positions immediately. How copy?

Key.Original: Negative, Bishop, we did not. Over.
Key.English: Negative, Bishop, we did not. Over.

Key.Original: Understood, Bishop, we're on the move. Dingo out.
Key.English: Understood, Bishop, we're on the move. Dingo out.

Key.Original: Spider's closing in. ETA 10 mikes, I'll update you in 5. Do you copy?
Key.English: Spider's closing in. ETA 10 mikes, I'll update you in 5. Do you copy?

Key.Original: We're less than one click from the target area. What's the status on Spider, over?
Key.English: We're less than one click from the target area. What's the status on Spider, over?

Key.Original: You successfully eliminated the 'Spider' disrupting enemy command structure.
Key.English: You successfully eliminated the 'Spider' disrupting enemy command structure.

Key.Original: You were not able to assassinate 'Spider'. He got away.
Key.English: You were not able to assassinate 'Spider'. He got away.

Key.Original: Get to mountains to the South and wait for our invading forces.
Key.English: Get to mountains to the South and wait for our invading forces.

Key.Original: Eliminate the Takistani Colonel who's on his way to the <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> nearby.
Key.English: Eliminate the Takistani Colonel who's on his way to the <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker> nearby.

Key.Original:
Spider' will be visiting a base about 1 kilometer away from you. ETA of his chopper is about 10 minutes.
The base is probably guarded by Takistanis on patrol routes. They expect a high officer, so security will be tight.
Your spotter will keep an eye out for them as well help you to identify targets.
Key.English:
Spider' will be visiting a base about 1 kilometer away from you. ETA of his chopper is about 10 minutes.
The base is probably guarded by Takistanis on patrol routes. They expect a high officer, so security will be tight.
Your spotter will keep an eye out for them as well help you to identify targets.

Key.Original: US Army sniper team, codename 'Dingo' is <marker name='BIS_start'>on its way</marker> to <marker name='BIS_base'>Takistani military base</marker>, that an important officer of the Army of Takistan, codename 'Spider' will be inspecting. 'Dingo' must assassinate 'Spider'.
Key.English: US Army sniper team, codename 'Dingo' is <marker name='BIS_start'>on its way</marker> to <marker name='BIS_base'>Takistani military base</marker>, that an important officer of the Army of Takistan, codename 'Spider' will be inspecting. 'Dingo' must assassinate 'Spider'.

Key.Original:
Move to a suitable fire position to gain a good overview of the base.
Wait for the 'Spider' to arrive in his chopper and assassinate him.
Wait for exflitration instructions.
Key.English:
Move to a suitable fire position to gain a good overview of the base.
Wait for the 'Spider' to arrive in his chopper and assassinate him.
Wait for exflitration instructions.

Key.Original: Assassinate 'Spider', Army of Takistan officer, who will arrive in a chopper to nearby Takistani military <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker>.
Key.English: Assassinate 'Spider', Army of Takistan officer, who will arrive in a chopper to nearby Takistani military <marker name='BIS_base'>base</marker>.

Key.Original: Initializing Mission: One Shot One Kill...
Key.English: Initializing Mission: One Shot One Kill...

Key.Original: Eliminate an enemy officer in a nearby base.
Key.English: Eliminate an enemy officer in a nearby base.

Key.Original: Warmonger, Bandito Actual. Be advised, my platoon's been destroyed, we're falling back! Need assistance immediately! Can you hear me?
Key.English: Warmonger, Bandito Actual. Be advised, my platoon's been destroyed, we're falling back! Need assistance immediately! Can you hear me?

Key.Original: Stay low, Joker, no support is available at the moment. Holding the flank comes first. Good luck... Warmonger out.
Key.English: Stay low, Joker, no support is available at the moment. Holding the flank comes first. Good luck... Warmonger out.

Key.Original: Warmonger, Joker here. Enemy armor blown to pieces! We're ready for some more, keep 'em coming!
Key.English: Warmonger, Joker here. Enemy armor blown to pieces! We're ready for some more, keep 'em coming!

Key.Original: Another job well done, Banditos! Move to FOB Arizona for a rearm; I will need you 15 clicks from here in less than an hour. Move out, guys, we're heading north!
Key.English: Another job well done, Banditos! Move to FOB Arizona for a rearm; I will need you 15 clicks from here in less than an hour. Move out, guys, we're heading north!

Key.Original: Copy that, Warmonger, we're moving north, engaging all targets. Bandito 1 out.
Key.English: Copy that, Warmonger, we're moving north, engaging all targets. Bandito 1 out.

Key.Original: All Banditos, Warmonger. I have numerous contacts moving north of your position. Looks like the enemy wants to flank us with some armor. Advance to contact and engage. Acknowledge, over.
Key.English: All Banditos, Warmonger. I have numerous contacts moving north of your position. Looks like the enemy wants to flank us with some armor. Advance to contact and engage. Acknowledge, over.

Key.Original: Warmonger, we cleared point Gold, requesting further orders.
Key.English: Warmonger, we cleared point Gold, requesting further orders.

Key.Original: Well done Bandito, position your formation 300 meters north of Gold and stand by.
Key.English: Well done Bandito, position your formation 300 meters north of Gold and stand by.

Key.Original: You heard it, we're gonna make some sorry asses pay for taking that stretch of rocky desert! Banditos move!
Key.English: You heard it, we're gonna make some sorry asses pay for taking that stretch of rocky desert! Banditos move!

Key.Original: Joker, Warmonger here. Wake up the Banditos, you're cleared to engage. Go and clean point Gold immediately. How copy?
Key.English: Joker, Warmonger here. Wake up the Banditos, you're cleared to engage. Go and clean point Gold immediately. How copy?

Key.Original: You have captured point Gold and defended our forward base. American tanks remain superior on Takistani plains.
Key.English: You have captured point Gold and defended our forward base. American tanks remain superior on Takistani plains.

Key.Original: The enemy reduced most of your tanks to scrap metal. Technical superiority becomes useless in incapable hands.
Key.English: The enemy reduced most of your tanks to scrap metal. Technical superiority becomes useless in incapable hands.

Key.Original: After losing FOB Arizona to enemy tanks, taking point Gold can't be considered as victory today.
Key.English: After losing FOB Arizona to enemy tanks, taking point Gold can't be considered as victory today.

Key.Original: Move to contact, seize the area and neutralize all enemy units in the vicinity.
Key.English: Move to contact, seize the area and neutralize all enemy units in the vicinity.

Key.Original:
- Neutralize all hostile elements near the objective Gold.
- Regroup at Gold and stand by for orders in case more incoming threats.
Key.English:
- Neutralize all hostile elements near the objective Gold.
- Regroup at Gold and stand by for orders in case more incoming threats.

Key.Original:
After seizing the corridor from FOB Revolver to Rasman, BLUFOR presence in the area concentrates along road Blue and FOB Arizona in order to ensure safe passage to the supply convoys and troops. Although the OPFOR elements stationed in and around Rasman military base have been neutralized this night, elements of Takistani 23rd Armored Regiment moving from west may still pose a threat to our supply routes.

Estimated OPFOR strength:
- Objective Gold: 2 x BMP-2, 1 x small APC (type unknown), 1 x infantry squad (HMG emplacements)
- Expected platoon- to company-sized armored elements approaching from the west: T-72 and T-55 MBT, supported by BMP-2 and BRDM-2 personel carriers with ATGMs
Key.English:
After seizing the corridor from FOB Revolver to Rasman, BLUFOR presence in the area concentrates along road Blue and FOB Arizona in order to ensure safe passage to the supply convoys and troops. Although the OPFOR elements stationed in and around Rasman military base have been neutralized this night, elements of Takistani 23rd Armored Regiment moving from west may still pose a threat to our supply routes.

Estimated OPFOR strength:
- Objective Gold: 2 x BMP-2, 1 x small APC (type unknown), 1 x infantry squad (HMG emplacements)
- Expected platoon- to company-sized armored elements approaching from the west: T-72 and T-55 MBT, supported by BMP-2 and BRDM-2 personel carriers with ATGMs

Key.Original:
The majority of Task Force Knight is attacking north towards Zargabad, which left Rasman airbase (FOB Arizona) exposed to OPFOR formations withdrawing from the deserted areas west of Rasman.
Tanks of B Troop / 1st Squadron 'Warmonger' will protect the western flank of Task Force Knight by seizing the objective Gold, which is held by small mechanized OPFOR unit, and stand by for further orders.
Hostile forces must not reach FOB Arizona.
Key.English:
The majority of Task Force Knight is attacking north towards Zargabad, which left Rasman airbase (FOB Arizona) exposed to OPFOR formations withdrawing from the deserted areas west of Rasman.
Tanks of B Troop / 1st Squadron 'Warmonger' will protect the western flank of Task Force Knight by seizing the objective Gold, which is held by small mechanized OPFOR unit, and stand by for further orders.
Hostile forces must not reach FOB Arizona.

Key.Original: Activate high-command function by %1 to issue orders to the two-tank sections in your command.
Key.English: Activate high-command function by %1 to issue orders to the two-tank sections in your command.

Key.Original:
Here are some notes I made on squadron briefing this night:

- Both sections should advance together. One should move, another one should cover.
- I should participate in the battle. Staying on safe spot would leave 20% of B Troop's firepower unused.
- High ground means advantage, although it may leave my tanks vulnerable to missile attacks.
- Running into enemy makes no sense. I should plan my moves to be able to take them out from the distance.
- We should avoid calling the support trucks during combat.
- Our XO adviced me to position my tank sections on the hills bordering the Shamali valley after we take Gold. This may expose them, but they should have good position to cover the desert to the west.
Key.English:
Here are some notes I made on squadron briefing this night:

- Both sections should advance together. One should move, another one should cover.
- I should participate in the battle. Staying on safe spot would leave 20% of B Troop's firepower unused.
- High ground means advantage, although it may leave my tanks vulnerable to missile attacks.
- Running into enemy makes no sense. I should plan my moves to be able to take them out from the distance.
- We should avoid calling the support trucks during combat.
- Our XO adviced me to position my tank sections on the hills bordering the Shamali valley after we take Gold. This may expose them, but they should have good position to cover the desert to the west.

Key.Original:
- Standard logistic support is available at point Copper. Attacking armor will use standard support calling procedures to request assistance (refuelling, rearming, repairs, medic).
- UAV operated by TF Warmonger HQ will report any unexpected contacts.
Key.English:
- Standard logistic support is available at point Copper. Attacking armor will use standard support calling procedures to request assistance (refuelling, rearming, repairs, medic).
- A UAV operated by TF Warmonger HQ will report any unexpected contacts.

Key.Original:
- Your troop (callsign 'Bandito') will move to contact from point Copper at 0600 Z.
- Attack and neutralize all threats in the vicinity of objective Gold.
- Regroup 300 m north of point Gold. Assume defensive positions and stand by for further orders.
- Squadron HQ (callsign 'Warmonger') will designate incoming threats. After the area is secured, your troop will return to FOB Arizona.
Key.English:
- Your troop (callsign 'Bandito') will move to contact from point Copper at 0600 Z.
- Attack and neutralize all threats in the vicinity of objective Gold.
- Regroup 300 m north of point Gold. Assume defensive positions and stand by for further orders.
- Squadron HQ (callsign 'Warmonger') will designate incoming threats. After the area is secured, your troop will return to FOB Arizona.

Key.Original: Enemy at our flank! Lead your tank platoon against the enemy armor.
Key.English: Enemy at our flank! Lead your tank platoon against the enemy armor.

Key.Original: Neutralize all enemy armored vehicles advancing to FOB Arizona.
Key.English: Neutralize all enemy armored vehicles advancing to FOB Arizona.

Key.Original: A helicopter gunship can be highly effective against most types of targets. After sending a target location, the helo will scan the area and engage everything it can find. Try not to send the helo into an area with heavy AA coverage, or the flyboys will not be happy.
Key.English: A helicopter gunship can be highly effective against most types of targets. After sending a target location, the helo will scan the area and engage everything it can find. Try not to send the helo into an area with heavy AA coverage, or the flyboys will not be happy.

Key.Original: %HQ, %Team here. I am requesting release of an attack helicopter near our position. Over.
Key.English: %HQ, %Team here. I am requesting release of an attack helicopter near our position. Over.

Key.Original: %Team, release authorized. Send strike target. Over.
Key.English: %Team, release authorized. Send strike target. Over.

Key.Original: Coordinates received, helo is attacking the target. Out.
Key.English: Coordinates received, helo is attacking the target. Out.
